text: tapassvādhyāyanirataṁ tapasvī vāgvidāṁ varam। nāradaṁ paripapraccha vālmīkir munipuṅgavam।।
prāptarājyasya rāmasya rākṣasānāṃ vadhe kṛte | ājagmurṛṣayaḥ sarve rāghavaṃ pratinanditum || 7.1.1 ||
kauśiko 'tha yavakrīto gārgyo gālava eva ca | kaṇvo medhātitheḥ putraḥ pūrvasyāṃ diśi ye śritāḥ || 7.1.2 ||
svastyātreyo 'tha bhagavānnamuciḥ pramucistathā | ājagmuste sahāgastyā ye śritā dakṣiṇāṃ diśam || 7.1.3 ||
nṛṣadguḥ kavaṣo dhaumyo raudreyaśca mahānṛṣiḥ | te 'pyājagmuḥ saśiṣyā vai ye śritāḥ paścimāṃ diśam || 7.1.4 ||
vasiṣṭhaḥ kaśyapo 'thātrirviśvāmitraḥ sagautamaḥ | jamadagnirbharadvājaste 'pi saptarṣayastathā || 7.1.5 ||
udīcyāṃ diśi saptaite nityameva nivāsinaḥ || 7.1.6 ||
samprāpya te mahātmāno rāghavasya niveśanam | viṣṭitāḥ pratihārārthaṃ hutāśanasamaprabhāḥ | vedavedāṅgaviduṣo nānāśāstraviśāradāḥ || 7.1.7 ||
dvāḥsthaṃ provāca dharmātmā agastyo munisattamaḥ | nivedyatāṃ dāśaratherṛṣīnasmānsamāgatān || 7.1.8 ||
pratīhārastatastūrṇamagastyavacanāddrutam | samīpaṃ rāghavasyāśu praviveśa mahātmanaḥ || 7.1.9 ||
nayeṅgitajñaḥ sadvṛtto dakṣo dhairyasamanvitaḥ | sa rāmaṃ dṛśya sahasā pūrṇacandrasamaprabham || 7.1.10 ||
agastyaṃ kathayāmāsa samprāptamṛṣibhiḥ saha || 7.1.11 ||
śrutvā prāptānmunīṃstāṃstu bālasūryasamaprabhān | pratyuvāca tato dvāssthaṃ praveśaya yathāsukham || 7.1.12 ||
tān samprāptān munīn dṛṣṭvā pratyutthāya kṛtāñjaliḥ | pādyārghyādibhirānarca gāṃ nivedya ca sādaram || 7.1.13 ||
rāmo 'bhivādya prayata āsanānyādideśa ha | teṣu kāñcanacitreṣu mahatsu ca vareṣu ca || 7.1.14 ||
kuśāntardhānadatteṣu mṛgacarmayuteṣu ca | yathārhamupaviṣṭāste āsaneṣvṛṣipuṅgavāḥ || 7.1.15 ||
rāmeṇa kuśalaṃ pṛṣṭāḥ saśiṣyāḥ sapurogamāḥ | maharṣayo vedavido rāmaṃ vacanamabruvan || 7.1.16 ||
kuśalaṃ no mahābāho sarvatra raghunandana | tvāṃ tu diṣṭyā kuśalinaṃ paśyāmo hataśātravam || 7.1.17 ||
diṣṭyā tvayā hato rājanrāvaṇo lokarāvaṇaḥ | na hi bhāraḥ sa te rāma rāvaṇaḥ putrapautravān || 7.1.18 ||
sadhanustvaṃ hi lokāṃstrīnvijayethā na saṃśayaḥ | diṣṭyā tvayā hato rāma rāvaṇo rākṣaseśvaraḥ || 7.1.19 ||
diṣṭyā vijayinaṃ tvādya paśyāmaḥ saha sītayā | lakṣmaṇena ca dharmātmanbhrātrā tvaddhitakāriṇā || 7.1.20 ||
mātṛbhirbhrātṛsahitaṃ paśyāmo 'dya vayaṃ nṛpa | diṣṭyā prahasto vikaṭo virūpākṣo mahodaraḥ | akampanaśca durdharṣo nihatāste niśācarāḥ || 7.1.21 ||
yasya pramāṇādvipulaṃ pramāṇaṃ neha vidyate | diṣṭyā te samare rāma kumbhakarṇo nipātitaḥ || 7.1.22 ||
triśirāścātikāyaśca devāntakanarāntakau | diṣṭyā te nihatā rāma mahāvīryā niśācarāḥ || 7.1.23 ||
kumbhaścaiva nikumbhaśca rākṣasau bhīmadarśanau | diṣṭyā tau nihatau rāma kumbhakarṇasutau mṛdhe || 7.1.24 ||
yuddhonmattaśca mattaśca kālāntakayamopamau | yajñakopaśca balavāndhūmrākṣo nāma rākṣasaḥ || 7.1.25 ||
kurvantaḥ kadanaṃ ghoramete śastrāstrapāragāḥ | antakapratimairbāṇairdiṣṭyā vinihatāstvayā || 7.1.26 ||
diṣṭyā tvaṃ rākṣasendreṇa dvandvayuddhamupāgataḥ | devatānāmavadhyena vijayaṃ prāptavānasi || 7.1.27 ||
saṅkhye tasya na kiñcittu rāvaṇasya parābhavaḥ | dvandvayuddhamanuprāpto diṣṭyā te rāvaṇirhataḥ || 7.1.28 ||
diṣṭyā tasya mahābāho kālasyevābhidhāvataḥ | muktaḥ surariporvīra prāptaśca vijayastvayā || 7.1.29 ||
abhinandāma te sarve saṃśrutyendrajito vadham | so 'vadhyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ mahāmāyādharo yudhi || 7.1.30 ||
vismayastveṣa cāsmākaṃ tacchrutvendrajitaṃ hatam || 7.1.31 ||
ete cānye ca bahavo rākṣasāḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ | diṣṭyā tvayā hatā vīrā raghūṇāṃ kulavarddhana || 7.1.32 ||
dattvā puṇyāmimāṃ vīra saumyāmabhayadakṣiṇām || diṣṭyā vardhasi kākutstha jayenāmitrakarśana || 7.1.33 ||
śrutvā tu teṣāṃ vacanamṛṣīṇāṃ bhāvitātmanām | vismayaṃ paramaṃ gatvā rāmaḥ prāñjalirabravīt || 7.1.34 ||
bhagavantaḥ kumbhakarṇaṃ rāvaṇaṃ ca niśācaram | atikramya mahāvīryau kiṃ praśaṃsatha rāvaṇim || 7.1.35 ||
mahodaraṃ prahastaṃ ca virūpākṣaṃ ca rākṣasam | mattonmattau ca durdharṣau devāntakanarāntakau ||
atikramya mahāvīryān kiṃ praśaṃsatha rāvaṇim || 7.1.36 ||
atikāyaṃ triśirasaṃ dhūmrākṣaṃ ca niśācaram | atikramya mahāvīryānkiṃ praśaṃsatha rāvaṇim || 7.1.37 ||
kīdṛśo vai prabhāvo 'sya kiṃ balaṃ kaḥ parākramaḥ | kena vā kāraṇenaiṣa rāvaṇādatiricyate || 7.1.38 ||
śakyaṃ yadi mayā śrotuṃ na khalvājñāpayāmi vaḥ | yadi guhyaṃ na cedvaktuṃ śrotumicchāmi kathyatām || 7.1.39 ||
śakro 'pi vijitastena kathaṃ labdhavaraśca saḥ | kathaṃ ca balavānanputro na pitā tasya rāvaṇaḥ || 7.1.40 ||
kathaṃ pituścābhyadhiko mahāhave śakrasya jetā hi kathaṃ sa rākṣasaḥ | varāśca labdhāḥ kathayasva me 'dya tatpṛcchataścāsya munīndra sarvam || 7.1.41 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe prathamaḥ sargaḥ || 1 ||
tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ | kumbhayonirmihātejā rāmametaduvāca ha || 7.2.1 ||
śṛṇu rāma kathāvṛttaṃ tasya tejobalaṃ mahat | jaghāna śatrūnyenāsau na ca vadhyaḥ sa śatrubhiḥ || 7.2.2 ||
tāvatte rāvaṇasyedaṃ kulaṃ janma ca rāghava | varapradānaṃ ca tathā tasmai dattaṃ bravīmi te || 7.2.3 ||
purā kṛtayuge rāma prajāpatisutaḥ prabhuḥ | pulastyo nāma brahmarṣiḥ sākṣādiva pitāmahaḥ || 7.2.4 ||
nānukīrtyā guṇāstasya dharmataḥ śīlatastathā | prajāpateḥ putra iti vaktuṃ śakyaṃ hi nāmataḥ || 7.2.5 ||
prajāpatisutatvena devānāṃ vallabho hi saḥ | hṛṣṭaḥ sarvasya lokasya guṇaiḥ śubhrairmahāmatiḥ || 7.2.6 ||
sa tu dharmaprasaṅgena meroḥ pārśve mahāgireḥ | tṛṇavindvāśramaṃ gatvā nyavasanmunipuṅgavaḥ || 7.2.7 ||
tapastepe sa dharmātmā svādhyāyaniyatendriyaḥ | gatvāśramapadaṃ tasya vighnaṃ kurvanti kanyakāḥ || 7.2.8 ||
devapannagakanyāśca rājarṣitanayāśca yāḥ | krīḍantyo 'psarasaścaiva taṃ deśamupapedire || 7.2.9 ||
sarvartuṣṛpabhogyatvādramyatvātkānanasya ca | nityaśastāstu taṃ deśaṃ gatvā krīḍanti kanyakāḥ || 7.2.10 ||
deśasya ramaṇīyatvātpulastyo yatra sa dvijaḥ | gāyantyo vādayantyaśca lāsayantyastathaiva ca | munestapasvinastasya vighnaṃ cakruraninditāḥ || 7.2.11 ||
atha kruddho mahātejā vyājahāra mahāmuniḥ | yā me darśanamāgacchetsā garbhaṃ dhārayiṣyati || 7.2.12 ||
tāstu sarvāḥ pratiśrutya tasya vākyaṃ mahātmanaḥ | brahmaśāpabhayādbhītāstaṃ deśaṃ nopacakramuḥ || 7.2.13 ||
tṛṇabindostu rājarṣestanayā na śṛṇoti tat || 7.2.14 ||
gatvāśramapadaṃ tatra vicacāra sunirbhayā | na sāpaśyatsthitā tatra kāñcidabhyāgatāṃ sakhīm || 7.2.15 ||
tasminkāle mahātejāḥ prājāpatyo mahānṛṣiḥ | svādhyāyamakarottatra tapasā bhāvitaḥ svayam || 7.2.16 ||
sā tu vedaśrutiṃ śrutvā dṛṣṭvā vai tapaso nidhim | abhavatpāṇḍudehā sā suvyañjitaśarīrajā || 7.2.17 ||
vabhūva ca samudvignā dṛṣṭvā taddoṣamātmanaḥ | idaṃ me kintviti jñātvā piturgatvā ' 'śrame sthitā || 7.2.18 ||
tāṃ tu dṛṣṭvā tathābhūtāṃ tṛṇavindurathābravīt | kiṃ tvametattvasadṛśaṃ dhārayasyātmano vapuḥ || 7.2.19 ||
sā tu kṛtvāñjaliṃ dīnā kanyovāca tapodhanam | na jāne kāraṇaṃ tāta yena me rūpamīdṛśam || 7.2.20 ||
kiṃ tu pūrvaṃ gatāsmyekā maharṣerbhāvitātmanaḥ | pulastyasyāśramaṃ divyamanveṣṭuṃ svasakhījanam || 7.2.21 ||
na ca paśyāmyahaṃ tatra kāñcidabhyāgatāṃ sakhīm | rūpasya tu viparyāsaṃ dṛṣṭvā trāsādihāgatā || 7.2.22 ||
tṛṇabindustu rājarṣistapasā dyotitaprabhaḥ | dhyānaṃ viveśa taccāpi hyapaśyadṛṣikarmajam || 7.2.23 ||
sa tu vijñāya taṃ śāpaṃ maharṣerbhāvitātmanaḥ | gṛhītvā tanayāṃ gatvā pulastyamidamabravīt || 7.2.24 ||
bhagavaṃstanayāṃ me tvaṃ guṇaiḥ svaireva bhūṣitām | bhikṣāṃ pratigṛhāṇemāṃ maharṣe svayamudyatām || 7.2.25 ||
tapaścaraṇayuktasya śramyamāṇendriyasya te | śuśrūṣaṇaparā nityaṃ bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ || 7.2.26 ||
taṃ bruvāṇaṃ tu tadvākyaṃ rājarṣiṃ dhārmikaṃ tadā | jighṛkṣurabravītkanyāṃ bāḍhamityeva sa dvijaḥ || 7.2.27 ||
dattvā sa tu yathānyāyaṃ svamāśramapadaṃ gataḥ | sāpi tatrāvasatkanyā toṣayantī patiṃ guṇaiḥ || 7.2.28 ||
tasyāstu śīlavṛttābhyāṃ tutoṣa munipuṅgavaḥ | prītaḥ sa tu mahātejā vākyametaduvāca ha || 7.2.29 ||
parituṣṭo 'smi suśroṇi guṇānāṃ sampadā bhṛśam | tasmāddevi dadāmyadya putramātmasamaṃ tava || 7.2.30 ||
ubhayorvaṃśakartāraṃ paulastya iti viśrutam | yasmāttu viśruto vedastvayaiṣo 'dhyayato mama || 7.2.31 ||
tasmātsa viśravā nāma bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ | evamuktā tu sā devī prahṛṣṭenāntarātmanā || 7.2.32 ||
acireṇaiva kālenāsūta viśravasaṃ sutam | triṣu lokeṣu vikhyātaṃ yaśodharmasamanvitam || 7.2.33 ||
śrutimānsamadarśī ca vratācāraratastathā | piteva tapasā yukto hyabhavadviśravā muniḥ || 7.2.34 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe dvitīyaḥ sargaḥ || 2 ||
atha putraḥ pulastyasya viśravā munipuṅgavaḥ | acireṇaiva kālena piteva tapasi sthitaḥ || 7.3.1 ||
satyavāñchīlavāñchāntaḥ svādhyāyanirataḥ śuciḥ | sarvabhogeṣvasaṃsakto nityaṃ dharmaparāyaṇaḥ || 7.3.2 ||
jñātvā tasya tu tadvṛttaṃ bharadvājo mahāmuniḥ | dadau viśravase bhāryāṃ svasutāṃ devavarṇinīm || 7.3.3 ||
pratigṛhya tu dharmeṇa bharadvājasutāṃ tadā | prajānvekṣikayā buddhyā śreyo hyasya vicintayan || 7.3.4 ||
mudā paramayā yukto viśravā munipuṅgavaḥ | sa tasyāṃ vīryasampannamapatyaṃ paramādbhutam || 7.3.5 ||
janayāmāsa dharmajñaḥ sarvairbrahmaguṇairyutam | tasmiñjāte tu saṃhṛṣṭaḥ sambabhūva pitāmahaḥ || 7.3.6 ||
dṛṣṭvā śreyaskarīṃ buddhiṃ dhanādhyakṣo bhaviṣyati | nāma tasyākarotprītaḥ sārdhaṃ devarṣibhistadā || 7.3.7 ||
yasmādviśravaso 'patyaṃ sādṛśyādviśravā iva | tasmādvaiśravaṇo nāma bhaviṣyatveṣa viśrutaḥ || 7.3.8 ||
sa tu vaiśravaṇastatra tapovanagatastadā | avardhatāhutihuto mahātejā yathānalaḥ || 7.3.9 ||
tasyāśramapadasthasya buddhirjajñe mahātmanaḥ | cariṣye paramaṃ dharmaṃ dharmo hi paramā gatiḥ || 7.3.10 ||
sa tu varṣasahasrāṇi tapastaptvā mahāvane | yantrito niyamairugraiścakāra sumahattapaḥ || 7.3.11 ||
pūrṇe varṣasahasrānte taṃ taṃ vidhimakalpayat | jalāśī mārutāhāro nirāhārastathaiva ca || 7.3.12 ||
evaṃ varṣasahasrāṇi jagmustānyekavarṣavat | atha prīto mahātejāḥ sendraiḥ suragaṇaiḥ saha || 7.3.13 ||
gatvā tasyāśramapadaṃ brahmedaṃ vākyamabravīt | parituṣṭo 'smi te vatsa karmaṇānena suvrata | varaṃ vṛṇīṣva bhadraṃ te varārhastvaṃ mahāmate || 7.3.14 ||
athābravīdvaiśravaṇaḥ pitāmahamupasthitam | bhagavaँllokapālatvamiccheyaṃ vittarakṣaṇam || 7.3.15 ||
athābravīdvaiśravaṇaṃ parituṣṭena cetasā | brahmā suragaṇaiḥ sārdhaṃ bāḍhamityeva hṛṣṭavat || 7.3.16 ||
ahaṃ vai lokapālānāṃ caturthaṃ sraṣṭumudyataḥ || 7.3.17 ||
yamendravaruṇānāṃ ca padaṃ yattava cepsitam | tadgaccha tvaṃ hi dharmajña nidhīśatvamavāpnuhi | śakrāmbupayamānāṃ ca caturthastvaṃ bhaviṣyasi || 7.3.18 ||
etacca puṣpakaṃ nāma vimānaṃ sūryasannibham | pratigṛhṇīṣva yānārthaṃ tridaśaiḥ samatāṃ vraja || 7.3.19 ||
svasti te 'stu gamiṣyāmaḥ sarva eva yathāgatam | kṛtakṛtyā vayaṃ tāta dattvā tava varadvayam || 7.3.20 ||
ityuktvā sa gato brahmā svasthānaṃ tridaśaiḥ saha || 7.3.21 ||
gateṣu brahmapūrveṣu deveṣvatha nabhasthalam | vane sa pitaraṃ prāha prāñjaliḥ prayatātmavān | nivāsanaṃ na me devo vidadhe sa prajāpatiḥ || 7.3.22 ||
bhagavaँllabdhavānasmi varamiṣṭaṃ pitāmahāt | taṃ paśya bhagavankañcinnivāsaṃ sādhu me prabho || 7.3.23 ||
na ca pīḍā bhavedyatra prāṇino yasya kasyacit | evamuktastu putreṇa viśravā munipuṅgavaḥ || 7.3.24 ||
vacanaṃ prāha dharmajñaḥ śrūyatāmiti sattamaḥ | dakṣiṇasyodadhestīre trikūṭo nāma parvataḥ || 7.3.25 ||
tasyāgre tu viśālā sā mahendrasya purī yathā | laṅkā nāma purī ramyā nirmitā viśvakarmaṇā || 7.3.26 ||
rākṣasānāṃ nivāsārthaṃ yathendrasyāmarāvatī | tatra tvaṃ vasa bhadraṃ te laṅkāyāṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ || 7.3.27 ||
hemaprākāraparighā yantraśastrasamāvṛtā | ramaṇīyā purī sā hi rukmavaiḍūryatoraṇā || 7.3.28 ||
rākṣasaiḥ sā parityaktā purā viṣṇubhayārditaiḥ | śūnyā rakṣogaṇaiḥ sarvai rasātalatalaṃ gataiḥ || 7.3.29 ||
śūnyā samprati laṅkā sā prabhustasyā na vidyate | sa tvaṃ tatra nivāsāya gaccha putra yathāsukham || 7.3.30 ||
nirdoṣastatra te vāso na bādhāstatra kasyacit | etacchutvā sa dharmātmā dharmiṣṭhaṃ vacanaṃ pituḥ || 7.3.31 ||
nivāsayāmāsa tadā laṅkāṃ parvatamūrdhani | nairṛtānāṃ sahasraistu hṛṣṭaiḥ pramudutaiḥ saha || 7.3.32 ||
acireṇaiva kālena sampūrṇā tasya śāsanāt || 7.3.33 ||
sa tu tatrāvasatprīto dharmātmā nairṛtarṣabhaḥ | samudraparighāyāṃ tu laṅkāyāṃ viśravātmajaḥ || 7.3.34 ||
kāle kāle tu dharmātmā puṣpakeṇa dhaneśvaraḥ | abhyāgacchadvinītātmā pitaraṃ mātaraṃ ca hi || 7.3.35 ||
sa devagandharvagaṇairabhiṣṭutastathāpsaronṛtyavibhūṣitālayaḥ | gabhastibhiḥ sūrya ivāvabhāsayanpituḥ samīpaṃ prayayau sa vittapaḥ || 7.3.36 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe tṛtīyaḥ sargaḥ || 3 ||
śrutvāgastyeritaṃ vākyaṃ rāmo vismayamāgataḥ | kathamāsīttu laṅkāyāṃ sambhavo rakṣasāṃ purā || 7.4.1 ||
tataḥ śiraḥ kampayitvā tretāgnisamavigraham | tamagastyaṃ muhurdṛṣṭvā smayamāno 'bhyabhāṣata || 7.4.2 ||
bhagavanpūrvamapyeṣā laṅkāsītpiśitāśinām | śrutvedaṃ bhagavadvākyaṃ jāto me vismayaḥ paraḥ || 7.4.3 ||
pulastyavaṃśādudbhūtā rākṣasā iti naḥ śrutam | idānīmanyataścāpi sambhavaḥ kīrtitastvayā || 7.4.4 ||
rāvaṇātkumbhakarṇācca prahastādvikaṭādapi | rāvaṇasya ca putrebhyaḥ kiṃ nu te balavattarāḥ || 7.4.5 ||
ka eṣāṃ pūrvako brahmankinnāmā ca balotkaṭaḥ | aparādhaṃ ca kaṃ prāpya viṣṇunā drāvitāḥ katham || 7.4.6 ||
etadvistarataḥ sarvaṃ kathayasva mamānagha | kutūhalamidaṃ mahyaṃ nuda bhānuryathā tamaḥ || 7.4.7 ||
rāghavasya vacaḥ śrutvā saṃskārālaṅkṛtaṃ śubham | īṣadvismayamānastamagastyaḥ prāha rāghavam || 7.4.8 ||
prajāpatiḥ purā sṛṣṭvā hyapaḥ salilasambhavaḥ | tāsāṃ gopāyane sattvānasṛjatpadmasambhavaḥ || 7.4.9 ||
te sattvāḥ sattvakartāraṃ vinītavadupasthitāḥ | kiṃ kurma iti bhāṣantaḥ kṣutpipāsābhayārditāḥ || 7.4.10 ||
prajāpatistu tānyāha satvāni prahasanniva | ābhāṣya vācā yatnena rakṣadhvamiti mānadaḥ || 7.4.11 ||
rakṣāmeti ca tatrānye jakṣāma iti cāpare | bhukṣitābhukṣitairuktastatastānāha bhūtakṛt || 7.4.12 ||
rakṣāmeti ca yairuktaṃ rākṣasāste bhavantu vaḥ | jakṣāma iti yairuktaṃ yakṣā eva bhavantu vaḥ || 7.4.13 ||
tatra hetiḥ prahetiśca bhrātarau rākṣasādhipau | madhukaiṭabhasaṅkāśau babhūvaturarindamau || 7.4.14 ||
prahetirdhārmikastatra tapovanagatastadā | hetirdārakriyārthe tu paraṃ yatnamathākarot || 7.4.15 ||
sa kālabhaginīṃ kanyāṃ bhayāṃ nāma bhayāvahām | udāvahadameyātmā svayameva mahāmatiḥ || 7.4.16 ||
sa tasyāṃ janayāmāsa hetī rākṣasapuṅgavaḥ | putraṃ putravatāṃ śreṣṭho vidyutkeśa iti śrutam || 7.4.17 ||
vidyutkeśo hetiputraḥ sa dīptārkasamaprabhaḥ | vyavardhata mahātejāstoyamadhya ivāmbudaḥ || 7.4.18 ||
sa yadā yauvanaṃ bhadramanuprāpto niśācaraḥ | tato dārakriyāṃ tasya kartuṃ vyavasitaḥ pitā || 7.4.19 ||
sandhyāyāstanayāṃ so 'tha sandhyātulyāṃ prabhāvataḥ | varayāmāsa putrārthaṃ hetī rākṣasapuṅgavaḥ || 7.4.20 ||
avaśyameva dātavyā parasmai seti sandhyayā | cintayitvā sutā dattā vidyutkeśāya rāghava || 7.4.21 ||
sandhyāyāstanayāṃ labdhvā vidyutkeśo niśācaraḥ | ramate sma tayā sārdhaṃ paulomyā maghavāniva || 7.4.22 ||
kenacittvatha kālena rāma sālakaṭaṅkaṭā | vidyutkeśādgarbhamāpa ghanarājirivārṇavāt || 7.4.23 ||
tataḥ sā rākṣasī garbhaṃ ghanagarbhasamaprabham | prasūtā mandaraṃ gatvā gaṅgā garbhamivāgnijam || 7.4.24 ||
samutsṛjya tu sā garbhaṃ vidyutkeśaratārthinī | reme tu sārdhaṃ patinā vismṛtya sutamātmajam || 7.4.25 ||
utsṛṣṭastu tadā garbho ghanaśabdasamasvanaḥ | tayotsṛṣṭaḥ sa tu śiśuḥ śaradarkasamadyutiḥ | nidhāyāsye svayaṃ muṣṭiṃ ruroda śanakaistadā || 7.4.26 ||
tato vṛṣabhamāsthāya pārvatyā sahitaḥ śivaḥ | vāyumārgeṇa gacchanvai śuśrāva ruditasvanam || 7.4.27 ||
apaśyadumayā sārdhaṃ rudantaṃ rākṣasātmajam | kāruṇyabhāvātpārvatyā bhavastripurasūdanaḥ || 7.4.28 ||
taṃ rākṣasātmajaṃ cakre mātureva vayaḥsamam | amaraṃ caiva taṃ kṛtvā mahādevo 'kṣaro 'vyayaḥ || 7.4.29 ||
puramākāśagaṃ prādātpārvatyāḥ priyakāmyayā | umayāpi varo datto rākṣasānāṃ nṛpātmaja || 7.4.30 ||
sadyopalabdhirgarbhasya prasūtiḥ sadya eva ca | sadya eva vayaḥprāptirmātureva vayassamam || 7.4.31 ||
tataḥ sukeśo varadānagarvitaḥ śriyaṃ prabhoḥ prāpya harasya pārśvataḥ | cacāra sarvatra mahānmahāmatiḥ khagaṃ puraṃ prāpya purandaro yathā || 7.4.32 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe caturthaḥ sargaḥ || 4 ||
sukeśaṃ dhārmikaṃ dṛṣṭvā varalabdhaṃ ca rākṣasam | grāmaṇīrnāma gandharvo viśvāvasusamaprabhaḥ || 7.5.1 ||
tasya devavatī nāma dvitīyā śrīrivātmajā | triṣu lokeṣu vikhyātā rūpayauvanaśālinī | tāṃ sukeśāya dharmeṇa dadau rakṣaḥśriyaṃ yathā || 7.5.2 ||
varadānakṛtaiśvaryaṃ sā taṃ prāpya patiṃ priyam | āsīddevavatī tuṣṭā dhanaṃ prāpyeva nirdhanaḥ || 7.5.3 ||
sa tayā saha saṃyukto rarāja rajanīcaraḥ | añjanādabhiniṣkrāntaḥ kareṇveva mahāgajaḥ || 7.5.4 ||
devavatyāṃ sukeśastu janayāmāsa rāghava || 7.5.5 ||
trīn putrān janayāmāsa tretāgnisamavigrahān | mālyavantaṃ sumāliṃ ca māliṃ ca balināṃ varam | trīṃstrinetrasamānputrānrākṣasānrākṣasādhipaḥ || 7.5.6 ||
trayo lokā ivāvyagrāḥ sthitāstraya ivāgnayaḥ | trayo mantrā ivātyugrāstrayo ghorā ivāmayāḥ || 7.5.7 ||
trayaḥ sukeśasya sutāstretāgnisamatejasaḥ | vivṛddhimagamaṃstatra vyādhayopekṣitā iva || 7.5.8 ||
varaprāptiṃ pituste tu jñātveśvaratapobalāt | tapastaptuṃ gatā meruṃ bhrātaraḥ kṛtaniścayāḥ || 7.5.9 ||
pragṛhya niyamānghorānrākṣasā nṛpasattama | viceruste tapo ghoraṃ sarvabhūtabhayāvaham || 7.5.10 ||
satyārjavaśamopetaistapobhiratiduṣkaraiḥ | santāpayantastrīlloँkānsadevāsuramānuṣān || 7.5.11 ||
tato vibhuścaturvaktro vimānavaramāsthitaḥ | sukeśaputrānāmantrya varado 'smītyabhāṣata || 7.5.12 ||
brahmāṇaṃ varadaṃ jñātvā sendrairdevagaṇairvṛtam | ūcuḥ prāñjalayaḥ sarve vepamānā iva drumāḥ || 7.5.13 ||
tapasārādhito deva yadi no diśase varam | ajeyāḥ śatruhantārastathaiva cirajīvinaḥ || 7.5.14 ||
prabhaviṣṇvo bhavāmeti parasparamanuvratāḥ || 7.5.15 ||
evaṃ bhaviṣyatītyuktvā sukeśatanayānvibhuḥ | sa yayau brahmalokāya brahmā brāhmaṇavatsalaḥ || 7.5.16 ||
varaṃ labdhvā tu te sarve rāma rātriñcarāstadā | surāsurānprabādhante varadānasunirbhayāḥ || 7.5.17 ||
tairvadhyamānāstridaśāḥ sarṣisaṅghāḥ sacāraṇāḥ | trātāraṃ nādhigacchanti nirayasthā yathā narāḥ || 7.5.18 ||
atha te viśvakarmāṇaṃ śilpināṃ varamavyayam | ūcuḥ sametya saṃhṛṣṭā rākṣasā raghusattama || 7.5.19 ||
ojastejobalavatāṃ mahatāmātmatejasā | gṛhakartā bhavāneva devānāṃ hṛdayepsitam || 7.5.20 ||
asmākamapi tāvattvaṃ gṛhaṃ kuru mahāmate | himavantamapāśritya merumandarameva vā | maheśvaragṛhaprakhyaṃ gṛhaṃ naḥ kriyatāṃ mahat || 7.5.21 ||
viśvakarmā tatasteṣāṃ rākṣasānāṃ mahābhujaḥ | nivāsaṃ kathayāmāsa śakrasyevāmarāvatīm || 7.5.22 ||
dakṣiṇasyodadhestīre trikūṭo nāma parvataḥ | suvela iti cāpyanyo dvitīyastatra sattamāḥ || 7.5.23 ||
śikhare tasya śailasya madhyame 'mbudasannibhe | śakunairapi duṣprāpe ṭaṅkacchinnacaturdiśi || 7.5.24 ||
triṃśadyojanakstīrṇā śatayojanamāyatā | svarṇaprākārasaṃvītā hematoraṇasaṃvṛtā || 7.5.25 ||
mayā laṅketi nagarī śakrājñaptena nirmitā | tasyāṃ vasata durdharṣā yūyaṃ rākṣasapuṅgavāḥ || 7.5.26 ||
amarāvatīṃ samāsādya sendrā iva divaukasaḥ | laṅkādurgaṃ samāsādya rākṣasairbahubhirvṛtāḥ || 7.5.27 ||
bhaviṣyatha durādharṣāḥ śatrūṇāṃ śatrusūdanāḥ || 7.5.28 ||
viśvakarmavacaḥ śrutvā tataste rākṣasottamāḥ | sahasrānucarā bhūtvā gatvā tāmavasanpurīm || 7.5.29 ||
dṛḍhaprākāraparikhāṃ haimairgṛhaśatairvṛtām | laṅkāmavāpya te hṛṣṭā nyavasanrajanīcarāḥ || 7.5.30 ||
etasminneva kāle tu yathākāmaṃ ca rāghava | narmadā nāma gandharvī babhūva raghunandana || 7.5.31 ||
tasyāḥ kānyātrayaṃ hyāsīt dhīśrīkirtisamadyuti | jyeṣṭhakrameṇa sā teṣāṃ rākṣasānāmarākṣasī || 7.5.32 ||
kanyāstāḥ pradadau hṛṣṭā pūrṇacandranibhānanāḥ | trayāṇāṃ rākṣasendrāṇāṃ tisro gandharvakanyakāḥ || 7.5.33 ||
dattā mātrā mahābhāgā nakṣatre bhagadaivate | kutadārāstu te rāma sukeśatanayāstadā || 7.5.34 ||
cikrīḍuḥ saha bhāryābhirapsarobhirivāmarāḥ | tato mālyavato bhāryā sundarī nāma sundarī || 7.5.35 ||
sa tasyāṃ janayāmāsa yadapatyaṃ nibodha tat | vajramuṣṭirvirūpākṣodurmukhaścaiva rākṣasaḥ || 7.5.36 ||
suptaghno yajñakopaśca mattonmattau tathaiva ca | analā cābhavatkanyā sundaryāṃ rāma sundarī || 7.5.37 ||
sumālino 'pi bhāryāsītpūrṇacadranibhānanā | nāmnā ketumatī rāma prāṇebhyo 'pi garīyasī || 7.5.38 ||
sumālī janayāmāsa yadapatyaṃ niśācaraḥ | ketumatyāṃ mahārāja tannibodhānupūrvaśaḥ || 7.5.39 ||
prahasto 'kampanaścaiva vikaṭaḥ kālakārmukhaḥ | dhūmrākṣaścaiva daṇḍaśca supārśvaśca mahābalaḥ || 7.5.40 ||
saṃhrādiḥ praghasaścaiva bhāsakarṇaśca rākṣasaḥ | rākā puṣpotkaṭā caiva kaikasī ca śucismitā || kumbhīnasī ca ityete sumāleḥ prasavāḥ smṛtāḥ || 7.5.41 ||
kumbhīnasī ca ityete sumāleḥ prasavāḥ smṛtāḥ || 7.5.41 ||
mālestu vasudhā nāma gandharvī rūpaśālinī | bhāryāsītpadmapatrākṣī svakṣī yakṣīvaropamā || 7.5.42 ||
sumāleranujastasyāṃ janayāmāsa yat prabho | apatyaṃ kathyamānaṃ tu mayā tvaṃ śṛṇu rāghava || 7.5.43 ||
anilaścānalaścaiva haraḥ sampātireva ca | ete vibhīṣaṇāmātyā māleyāstu niśācaraḥ || 7.5.44 ||
tatastu te rākṣasapuṅgavāstrayo niśācaraiḥ putraśataiśca saṃvṛtāḥ | surānsahendrānṛṣināgayakṣānbabādhire tānbahuvīryadarpitāḥ || 7.5.45 ||
jagadbhramanto 'nilavaddurāsadā raṇeṣu mṛtyupratimānatejasaḥ | varapradānādatigarvitā bhṛśaṃ kratukriyāṇāṃ praśamaṅkarāḥ sadā || 7.5.46 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe pañcamaḥ sargaḥ || 5 ||
tairvadhyamānā devāśca ṛṣayaśca tapodhanāḥ | bhayārtāḥ śaraṇaṃ jagmurdevadevaṃ maheśvaram || 7.6.1 ||
jagatsṛṣṭyantakartāramajamavyaktarūpiṇam | ādhāraṃ sarvalokānāmārādhyaṃ paramaṃ gurum || 7.6.2 ||
te sametya tu kāmāriṃ tripurāriṃ trilocanam | ūcuḥ prāñjalayo devā bhayagadgadabhāṣiṇaḥ || 7.6.3 ||
sukeśaputrairbhagavanpitāmahavaroddhataiḥ | prajādhyakṣa prajāḥ sarvā bādhyante ripubādhanaiḥ || 7.6.4 ||
śaraṇyānyaśaraṇyāni hyāśramāṇi kṛtāni naḥ | svargācca devānpracyāvya svarge krīḍanti devavat || 7.6.5 ||
ahaṃ viṣṇurahaṃ rudro brahmāhaṃ devarāḍaham | ahaṃ yamaśca varuṇaścandro 'haṃ ravirapyaham || 7.6.6 ||
iti mālī sumālī ca mālyavāṃścaiva rākṣasāḥ | bādhante samaroddharṣā ye ca teṣāṃ puraḥsarāḥ | tanno deva bhayārtānāmabhayaṃ dātumarhasi || 7.6.7 ||
aśivaṃ vapurāsthāya jahi vai devakaṇṭakān || 7.6.8 ||
dhante samaroddharṣā ye ca teṣāṃ puraḥsarāḥ | ityuktastu suraiḥ sarvaiḥ kapardī nīlalohitaḥ | sukeśaṃ prati sāpekṣaḥ prāha devagaṇānprabhuḥ || 7.6.9 ||
ahaṃ tānna haniṣyāmi mayāvadhyā hi te surāḥ | kiṃ tu mantraṃ pradāsyāmi yo vai tānnihaniṣyati || 7.6.10 ||
etameva samudyogaṃ puraskṛtya maharṣayaḥ | gacchadhvaṃ śaraṇaṃ viṣṇuṃ haniṣyati sa tānprabhuḥ || 7.6.11 ||
tatastu jayaśabdena pratinandya maheśvaram | viṣṇoḥ samīpamājagmurniśācarabhayārditāḥ || 7.6.12 ||
śaṅkhacakradharaṃ devaṃ praṇamya bahumānya ca | ūcuḥ sambhrāntavadvākyaṃ sukeśatanayānprati || 7.6.13 ||
sukeśatanayairdeva tribhistretāgnisannibhaiḥ | ākramya varadānena sthānānyapahṛtāni naḥ || 7.6.14 ||
laṅkā nāma purī durgā trikūṭaśikhare sthitā | tatra sthitāḥ prabādhante sarvānnaḥ kṣaṇadācarāḥ || 7.6.15 ||
sa tvamasmaddhitārthāya jahi tānmadhusūdana | śaraṇaṃ tvāṃ vayaṃ prāptā gatirbhava sureśvara || 7.6.16 ||
cakrakṛttāsyakamalānnivedaya yamāya vai | bhayeṣvabhayado 'smākaṃ nānyo 'sti bhavatā vinā || 7.6.17 ||
rākṣasānsamare duṣṭānsānubandhānmadoddhatān | nudaṃ tvaṃ no bhayaṃ deva nīhāramiva bhāskaraḥ || 7.6.18 ||
ityevaṃ daivatairukto devadevo janārdanaḥ | abhayaṃ bhayado 'rīṇāṃ dattvā devānuvāca ha || 7.6.19 ||
sukeśaṃ rākṣasaṃ jāne īśānavaradarpitam | tāṃścāsya tanayāñjāne yeṣāṃ jyeṣṭhaḥ sa mālyavān || 7.6.20 ||
tānahaṃ samatikrāntamaryādānrākṣasādhamān | nihaniṣyāmi saṅkruddhaḥ surā bhavata vijvarāḥ || 7.6.21 ||
ityuktāste surāḥ sarve viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā | yathāvāsaṃ yayurhṛṣṭāḥ praśaṃsanto janārdanam || 7.6.22 ||
vibudhānāṃ samudyogaṃ mālyavāṃstu niśācaraḥ | śrutvā tau bhrātarau vīrāvidaṃ vacanamabravīt || 7.6.23 ||
amarā ṛṣayaścaiva saṅgamya kila śakaram | asmadvadhaṃ parīpsanta idaṃ vacanamabruvan || 7.6.24 ||
sukeśatanayā deva varadānabaloddhatāḥ | bādhante 'smānsamuddṛptā ghorarūpāḥ pade pade || 7.6.25 ||
rākṣasairabhibhūtāḥ sma na śaktāḥ sma prajāpate | sveṣu sadmasu saṃsthātuṃ bhayātteṣāṃ durātmanām || 7.6.26 ||
tadasmākaṃ hitārthāya jahi tāṃśca trilocana | rākṣasānhuṅkṛtenaiva daha pradahatāṃ vara || 7.6.27 ||
ityevaṃ tridaśairukto niśamyāndhakasūdanaḥ | śiraḥ karaṃ ca dhunvāna idaṃ vacanamabravīt || 7.6.28 ||
avadhyā mama te devāḥ sukeśatanayā raṇe | mantraṃ tu vaḥ pradāsyāmi yastānvai nihaniṣyati || 7.6.29 ||
yo 'sau cakragadāpāṇiḥ pītavāsā janārdanaḥ | harirnārāyaṇaḥ śrīmān śaraṇaṃ taṃ prapadyatha || 7.6.30 ||
harādavāpya te mantraṃ kāmārimabhivādya ca | nārāyaṇālayaṃ prāpya tasmai sarvaṃ nyavedayan || 7.6.31 ||
tato nārāyaṇenoktā devā indrapurogamāḥ | surārīṃstānhaniṣyāmi surā bhavata vijvarāḥ || 7.6.32 ||
devānāṃ bhayabhītānāṃ hariṇā rākṣasarṣabhau | pratijñāto vadho 'smākaṃ cintyatāṃ yadiha kṣamam || 7.6.33 ||
hiraṇyakaśipormṛtyuranyeṣāṃ ca suradviṣām | namuciḥ kālanemiśca saṃhrādo vīrasattamaḥ || 7.6.34 ||
rādheyo bahumāyī ca lokapālo 'tha dhārmikaḥ | yamalārjunau ca hārdikyaḥ śumbhaścaiva niśumbhakaḥ || 7.6.35 ||
asurā dānavāścaiva sattvavanto mahābalāḥ | sarve samaramāsādya na śrūyante 'parājitāḥ || 7.6.36 ||
sarvaiḥ kratuśatairiṣṭaṃ sarve māyāvidastathā | sarve sarvāstrakuśalāḥ sarve śatrubhayaṅkarāḥ || 7.6.37 ||
nārāyaṇena nihatāḥ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ | etajjñātvā tu sarveṣāṃ kṣamaṃ kartumihārhatha || 7.6.38 ||
tataḥ sumālī mālī ca śrutvā mālyavato vacaḥ | ūcaturbhrātaraṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ bhagāṃśāviva vāsavam || 7.6.39 ||
svadhītaṃ dattamiṣṭaṃ cāpyaiśvaryaṃ paripālitam | āyurnirāmayaṃ prāptaṃ sudharmaḥ prāpitaḥ pathi || 7.6.40 ||
devasāgaramakṣobhyaṃ śastraiḥ samavagāhya ca | jitā dviṣo hyapratimāstanno mṛtyukṛtaṃ bhayam || 7.6.41 ||
nārāyaṇaśca rudraśca śakraścāpi yamastathā | asmākaṃ pramukhe sthātuṃ sarve bibhyati sarvadā || 7.6.42 ||
viṣṇordevasya nāstyeva kāraṇaṃ rākṣaseśvara | devānāmeva doṣeṇa viṣṇoḥ pracalitaṃ manaḥ || 7.6.43 ||
tasmādadya samudyuktāḥ sarvasainyasamāvṛtāḥ | devāneva jighāṃsāma ebhyo doṣaḥ samutthitaḥ || 7.6.44 ||
evaṃ sammantrya balinaḥ sarve sainyasamāvṛtāḥ | udyogaṃ ghoṣayitvā tu sarve nairṛtapuṅgavāḥ || yuddhāya niryayuḥ kruddhā jambhavṛtrabalā iva || 7.6.45 ||
iti te rāma sammantrya sarvodyogena rākṣasāḥ | yuddhāya niryayuḥ sarve mahākāyā mahābalāḥ || 7.6.46 ||
syandanairvāraṇaiścaiva hayaiśca girisannibhaiḥ | kharairgobhī rathoṣṭraiśca śiṃśumārairbhujaṅgamaiḥ || 7.6.47 ||
makaraiḥ kacchapairmīnairvihaṅgairgaruḍopamaiḥ | siṃhairvyāghrairvarāhaiśca sṛmaraiścamarairapi || 7.6.48 ||
tyaktvā laṅkāṃ gatāḥ sarve rākṣasā balagarvitāḥ | prayātā devalokāya yoddhuṃ daivataśatravaḥ || 7.6.49 ||
laṅkāviparyayaṃ dṛṣṭvā yāni laṅkālayānyatha | bhūtāni bhayadarśīni vimanaskāni sarvaśaḥ || 7.6.50 ||
rathottamairuhyamānāḥ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ || 7.6.51 ||
prayātā rākṣasāstūrṇaṃ devalokaṃ prayatnataḥ | rakṣasāmeva mārgeṇa daivatānyapacakramuḥ || 7.6.52 ||
bhaumāścaivāntarikṣāśca kālājñaptā bhayāvahāḥ | utpātā rākṣasendrāṇāmabhāvāya samutthitāḥ || 7.6.53 ||
asthīni meghā vavṛṣuruṣṇaṃ śoṇitameva ca | velāṃ samudrāścotkrāntāśceluścāpyatha bhūdharāḥ || 7.6.54 ||
aṭṭahāsānvimuñcanto ghananādasamasvanāḥ | vāśyantyaśca śivāstatra dāruṇaṃ ghoradarśanāḥ || 7.6.55 ||
sampatantyatha bhūtāni dṛśyante ca yathākramam | gṛdhracakraṃ mahaccātra jvalanodgāribhirmukhaiḥ || 7.6.56 ||
rākṣasānāmupari khe bhramate 'lātacakravat | kapotā raktapādāśca śārikā vidrutā yayuḥ || kākā vāśyanti tatraiva biḍālā vai dvipādayaḥ || 7.6.57 ||
utpātāṃstānanādṛtya rākṣasā balagarvitāḥ | yāntyeva na nivarttante mṛtyupāśāvapāśitāḥ || 7.6.58 ||
mālyavāṃśca sumālī ca mālī ca sumahābalāḥ | āsanpuraḥsarāsteṣāṃ kratūnāmiva pāvakāḥ || 7.6.59 ||
mālyavantaṃ ca te sarve mālyavantamivācalam | niśācarā hyāśrayanti dhātāramiva devatāḥ || 7.6.60 ||
tadbalaṃ rākṣasendrāṇāṃ mahābhraghananāditam | jayepsayā devalokaṃ yayau mālivaśe sthitam || 7.6.61 ||
rākṣasānāṃ samudyogaṃ taṃ tu nārāyaṇaḥ prabhuḥ | devadūtādupaśrutya cakre yuddhe tadā manaḥ || 7.6.62 ||
sa sajjāyudhatūṇīro vainateyopari sthitaḥ | āsajjya kavacaṃ divyaṃ sahasrārkasamadyuti || 7.6.63 ||
ābadhya śarasampūrṇe iṣudhī vimale tadā | śroṇisūtraṃ ca khaḍgaṃ ca vimalaṃ kamalekṣaṇaḥ || śaṅkhacakragadāśārṅgakhaḍgākhyapravarāyudhān || 7.6.64 ||
suparṇaṃ girisaṅkāśaṃ vainateyamathāsthitaḥ | rākṣasānāmabhāvāya yayau tūrṇataraṃ prabhuḥ || 7.6.65 ||
suparṇapṛṣṭhe sa babhau śyāmaḥ pītāmbaro hariḥ | kāñcanasya gireḥ śṛṅge sataḍittoyado yathā || 7.6.66 ||
sa siddhadevarṣimahoragaiśca gandharvayakṣairupagīyamānaḥ | samāsasādāsurasainyaśatrūṃścakrāsiśārṅgāyudhaśaṅkhapāṇiḥ || 7.6.67 ||
suparṇapakṣānilanunnapakṣaṃ bhramatpatākaṃ pravikīrṇaśastram | cacāla tadrākṣasarājasainyaṃ calopalaṃ nīla ivācalendraḥ || 7.6.68 ||
tataḥ śaraiḥ śoṇitamāṃsarūṣitairyugāntavaiśvānaratulyavigrahaiḥ | niśācarāḥ samparivārya mādhavaṃ varāyudhairnirbibhiduḥ sahasraśaḥ || 7.6.69 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe ṣaṣṭhaḥ sargaḥ || 6 ||
nārāyaṇagiriṃ te tu garjanto rākṣasāmbudāḥ | vavarṣuḥ śaravarṣeṇa varṣeṇevādrimambudāḥ || 7.7.1 ||
śyāmāvadātastairviṣṇurnīlairnaktañcarottamaiḥ | vṛto 'ñjanagirīvāsīt varṣamāṇaiḥ payodharaiḥ || 7.7.2 ||
śalabhā iva kedāraṃ maśakā iva parvatam | yathāmṛtaghaṭaṃ daṃśā makarā iva cārṇavam || 7.7.3 ||
tathā rakṣodhanurmuktā vajrānilamanojavāḥ | hariṃ viśanti sma śarā lokā iva viparyaye || 7.7.4 ||
syandanaiḥ syandanagatā gajaiśca gajapṛṣṭhagāḥ | aśvārohāstathāśvaiśca pādātāścāmbare sthitāḥ || 7.7.5 ||
rākṣasendrā girinibhāḥ śaraiḥ śaktyṛṣṭitomaraiḥ | niruchvāsaṃ hariṃ cakruḥ prāṇāyāmā iva dvijam || 7.7.6 ||
niśācaraistāḍyamāno mīnairiva mahodadhiḥ | śārṅgamāyamya durdharṣo rākṣasebhyo 'sṛjaccharān || 7.7.7 ||
śaraiḥ pūrṇāyatotsṛṣṭairvajravaktrairmanojavaiḥ | ciccheda viṣṇurniśitaiḥ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ || 7.7.8 ||
vidrāvya śaravarṣeṇa varṣā vāyurivotthitam | pāñcajanyaṃ mahāśaṅkhaṃ pradadhmau puruṣottamaḥ || 7.7.9 ||
so 'mbujo hariṇā dhmātaḥ sarvaprāṇena śaṅkharāṭ | rarāsa bhīmanirhādastrailokyaṃ vyathayanniva || 7.7.10 ||
śaṅkharājaravaḥ so 'tha trāsayāmāsa rākṣasān | mṛgarāja ivāraṇye samadāniva kuñjarān || 7.7.11 ||
na śekuraśvāḥ saṃsthātuṃ vimadāḥ kuñjarābhavan | syandanebhyaścyutā vīrāḥ śaṅkharāvitadurbalāḥ || 7.7.12 ||
śārṅgacāpavinirmuktā vajratulyānanāḥ śarāḥ | vidārya tāni rakṣāṃsi supuṅkhā viviśuḥ kṣitim || 7.7.13 ||
bhidyamānāḥ śaraiḥ saṅkhye nārāyaṇakaracyutaiḥ | nipetū rākṣasā bhūmau śailā vajrahatā iva || 7.7.14 ||
vraṇāni paragātrebhyo viṣṇucakrakṛtāni vai | asṛkkṣaranti dhārābhiḥ svarṇadhārā ivācalāḥ || 7.7.15 ||
śaṅkharājaravaścāpi śārṅgacāparasvastathā | rākṣasānāṃ ravāṃścāpi grasate vaiṣṇavo ravaḥ || 7.7.16 ||
teṣāṃ śirodharāndhūtāñcharadhvajadhanūṃṣi ca | rathānpatākāstūṇīrāṃściccheda sa hariḥ śaraiḥ || 7.7.17 ||
sūryādiva karā ghorā ūrmayaḥ sāgarādiva | parvatādiva nāgendrā dhāraughā iva cāmbudāt || 7.7.18 ||
tathā śārṅgavinirmuktāḥ śarā nārāyaṇeritāḥ | nirdhāvantīṣavastūrṇaṃ śataśotha sahasraśaḥ || 7.7.19 ||
śarabheṇa yathā siṃhāḥ siṃhena dviradā yathā | dviradena yathā vyāghrā vyāghreṇa dvīpino yathā || 7.7.20 ||
dvīpineva yathā śvānaḥ śunā mārjārakā yathā | mārjāreṇa yathā sarpāḥ sarpeṇa ca yathā ' 'khavaḥ || 7.7.21 ||
tathā te rākṣasāḥ sarve viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā | dravanti drāvitāścanye śāyitāśca mahītale || 7.7.22 ||
rākṣasānāṃ sahasrāṇi nihatya madhusūdanaḥ | vārijaṃ pūrayāmāsa toyadaṃ surarāḍiva || 7.7.23 ||
nārāyaṇaśaratrastaṃ śaṅkhanādasuvihvalam | yayau laṅkāmabhimukhaṃ prabhagnaṃ rākṣasaṃ balam || 7.7.24 ||
prabhagne rākṣasabale nārāyaṇaśarāhate | sumālī śaravarṣeṇa nivavāra raṇe harim || 7.7.25 ||
sa tu taṃ chādayāmāsa nīhāra iva bhāskaram | rākṣasāḥ sattvasampannāḥ punardhairyaṃ samādadhuḥ || 7.7.26 ||
atha so 'bhyapatadroṣādrākṣaso baladarpitaḥ | mahānādaṃ prakurvāṇo rākṣasāñjīvayanniva || 7.7.27 ||
utkṣipya lambābharaṇaṃ dhunvankaramiva dvipaḥ | rarāsa rākṣaso harṣātsataḍittoyado yathā || 7.7.28 ||
sumālernardatastasya śiro jvalitakuṇḍalam | ciccheda yanturaśvāśca bhrāntāstasya tu rakṣasaḥ || 7.7.29 ||
tairaśvairbhrāmyate bhrāntaiḥ sumālī rākṣaseśvaraḥ | indriyāśvaiḥ paribhrāntairdhṛtihīno yathā naraḥ || 7.7.30 ||
tato viṣṇuṃ mahābāhuṃ prapatantaṃ raṇājire | hṛte sumāleraśvaiśca rathe viṣṇurathaṃ prati || 7.7.31 ||
mālī cābhyadravadyuktaḥ pragṛhya saśaraṃ dhanuḥ | mālerdhanuścyutā bāṇāḥ kārtasvaravibhūṣitāḥ | viviśurharimāsādya krauñcaṃ patrarathā iva || 7.7.32 ||
ardyamānaḥ śaraiḥ so 'tha mālimuktaiḥ sahasraśaḥ | cukṣubhe na raṇe viṣṇurjitendriya ivādhibhiḥ || 7.7.33 ||
atha maurvīsvanaṃ kṛtvā bhagavānbhūtabhāvanaḥ | mālinaṃ prati bāṇaughānsasarjāriniṣūdanaḥ || 7.7.34 ||
te mālidehamāsādya vajravidyutprabhāḥ śarāḥ | pibanti rudhiraṃ tasya nāgā iva sudhārasam || 7.7.35 ||
mālinaṃ vimukhaṃ kṛtvā śaṅkhacakragadādharaḥ | mālimauliṃ dhvajaṃ cāpaṃ vājinaścāpyapātayat || 7.7.36 ||
virathastu gadāṃ gṛhya mālī naktañcarottamaḥ | āpupluve gadāpāṇirgiryagrādiva kesarī || 7.7.37 ||
gadayā garuḍeśānamīśānamiva cāntakaḥ | lalāṭadeśe 'bhyahanadvajreṇendro yathā 'calam || 7.7.38 ||
gadayābhihatastena mālinā garuḍo bhṛśam | raṇātparāṅmukhaṃ devaṃ kṛtavānvedanāturaḥ || 7.7.39 ||
parāṅmukhe kṛte deve mālinā garuḍena vai | udatiṣṭhanmahāñchabdo rakṣasāmabhinardatām || 7.7.40 ||
rakṣasāṃ ravatāṃ rāvaṃ śrutvā harihayānujaḥ || 7.7.41 ||
tiryagāsthāya saṅkruddhaḥ pakṣīśe bhagavānhariḥ | parāṅmukho 'pyutsasarja māleścakraṃ jighāṃsayā || 7.7.42 ||
tatsūryamaṇḍalābhāsaṃ svabhāsā bhāsayannabhaḥ | kālacakranibhaṃ cakraṃ māleḥ śīrṣamapātayat || 7.7.43 ||
tacchiro rākṣasendrasya cakrotkṛttaṃ bibhīṣaṇam | papāta rudhirodgāri purā rāhuśiro yathā || 7.7.44 ||
tataḥ suraiḥ saṃsahṛṣṭaiḥ sarvaprāṇasamīritaḥ | siṃhanādaravonmuktaḥ sādhu devetivādibhiḥ || 7.7.45 ||
mālinaṃ nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā sumālī mālyavānapi | sabalau śokasantaptau laṅkāmeva pradhāvitau || 7.7.46 ||
garuḍastu samāśvastaḥ sannivṛtya yathā purā | rākṣasāndrāvayāmāsa pakṣavātena kopitaḥ || 7.7.47 ||
cakrakṛttāsyakamalā gadāsañcūrṇitorasaḥ | lāṅgalaglapitagrīvā musalairbhinnamastakāḥ || 7.7.48 ||
keciccaivāsinā chinnāstathānye śarapīḍitāḥ | nipeturambarāttūrṇaṃ rākṣasāḥ sāgarāmbhasi || 7.7.49 ||
nārāyaṇo bāṇavarāśanībhirvidārayāmāsa dhanurvimuktaiḥ | naktañcarānmuktavidhūtakeśānyathā 'śanībhiḥ sataḍinmahābhrāḥ || 7.7.50 ||
bhinnātapatraṃ patamānamastraṃ śarairapadhvastavinītaveṣam | vinissṛtāntraṃ bhayalolanetraṃ balaṃ tadunmattataraṃ babhūva || 7.7.51 ||
siṃhārditānāmiva kuñjarāṇāṃ niśācarāṇāṃ saha kuñjarāṇām | ravāśca vegāśca samaṃ babhūvuḥ purāṇasiṃhena vimarditānām || 7.7.52 ||
te vāryamāṇā haribāṇajālaiḥ sabāṇajālāni samutsṛjantaḥ | dhāvanti naktañcarakālameghā vāyuprabhinnā iva kālameghāḥ || 7.7.53 ||
cakrapahārairvinikṛttaśīrṣāḥ sañcūrṇitāṅgāśca gadāprahāraiḥ | abhiprahārairdvividhā vibhinnāḥ patanti śailā iva rākṣasendrāḥ || 7.7.54 ||
vilambamānairmaṇihārakuṇḍalairniśācarairnīlabalāhakopamaiḥ | nipātyamānairdadṛśe nirantaraṃ nipātyamānairiva nīlaparvataiḥ || 7.7.55 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe saptamaḥ sargaḥ || 7 ||
hanyamāne bale tasminpadmanābhena pṛṣṭhataḥ | mālvānsannivṛtto 'tha velāmetya ivārṇavaḥ || 7.8.1 ||
saṃraktanayanaḥ kopāccalanmaulirniśācaraḥ | padmanābhamidaṃ prāha vacanaṃ puruṣottamam || 7.8.2 ||
nārāyaṇa na jānīṣe kṣātradharmaṃ purātanam | ayuddhamanaso bhītānasmānhaṃsi yathetaraḥ || 7.8.3 ||
parāṅmukhavadhaṃ pāpaṃ yaḥ karotyasuretaraḥ | sa hantā na gataḥ svargaṃ labhate puṇyakarmaṇām || 7.8.4 ||
yuddhaśraddhā 'thavā te 'sti śaṅkhacakragadādhara | 4ahaṃ sthito 'smi paśyāmi balaṃ darśaya yattava || 7.8.5 ||
mālyavantaṃ sthitaṃ dṛṣṭvā mālyavantamivācalam | uvāca rākṣasendraṃ taṃ devarājānujo balī || 7.8.6 ||
yuṣmatto bhayabhītānāṃ devānāṃ vai mayā 'bhayam | rākṣasotsādanaṃ dattaṃ tadetadanupālyate || 7.8.7 ||
prāṇairapi priyaṃ kāryaṃ devānāṃ hi sadā mayā | so 'haṃ vo nihaniṣyāmi rasātalagatānapi || 7.8.8 ||
devadevaṃ bruvāṇaṃ taṃ raktāmburuhalocanam | śaktyā bibheda saṅkruddho rākṣasendro bhujāntare || 7.8.9 ||
mālyavadbhujanirmuktā śaktirghaṇṭākṛtasvanā | harerurasi babhrāja meghastheva śatahradā || 7.8.10 ||
tatastāmeva cotkṛṣya śaktiṃ śaktidharapriyaḥ | mālyavantaṃ samuddiśya cikṣepāmburuhekṣaṇaḥ || 7.8.11 ||
skandotsṛṣṭeva sā śaktirgovindakaranissṛtā | kāṅkṣantī rākṣasaṃ prāyānmāhendrīvāñjanācalam || 7.8.12 ||
sā tasyorasi vistīrṇe hārabhārā 'vabhāsite | apatadrākṣasendrasya girikūṭa ivāśaniḥ || 7.8.13 ||
tayā bhinnatanutrāṇaḥ prāviśadvipulaṃ tamaḥ | mālyavānpunarāśvastastasthau giririvācalaḥ || 7.8.14 ||
tataḥ kārṣṇāyasaṃ śūlaṃ kaṇṭakairbahubhirvatam | pragṛhyābhyahanaddevaṃ stanayorantare dṛḍham || 7.8.15 ||
tathaiva raṇaraktastu muṣṭinā vāsavānujam | tāḍayitvā dhanurmātramapakrānto niśācaraḥ || 7.8.16 ||
tato 'mbare mahāñchabdaḥ sādhusādhviti coditaḥ | āhatya rākṣaso viṣṇuṃ garuḍaṃ cāpyatāḍayat || 7.8.17 ||
vainateyastataḥ kruddhaḥ pakṣavātena rākṣasam | vyapohadbalavānvāyuḥ śuṣkaparṇacayaṃ yathā || 7.8.18 ||
dvijendrapakṣavātena drāvitaṃ dṛśya pūrvajam | sumālī svabalaiḥ sārdhaṃ laṅkāmabhimukho yayau || 7.8.19 ||
pakṣavātabaloddhūto mālyavānapi rākṣasaḥ | svabalena samāgamya yayau laṅkāṃ hriyā vṛtaḥ || 7.8.20 ||
evaṃ te rākṣasā tena hariṇā kamalekṣaṇa | bahuśaḥ saṃyuge bhagnā hatapravaranāyakāḥ || 7.8.21 ||
aśaknuvantaste viṣṇuṃ pratiyoddhuṃ bhayārditāḥ | tyaktvā laṅkāṃ gatā vastuṃ pātālaṃ sahapatnayaḥ || 7.8.22 ||
sumālinaṃ samāsādya rākṣasaṃ raghusattama | sthitāḥ prakhyātavīryāste vaṃśe sālakaṭaṅkaṭe || 7.8.23 ||
ye tvayā nihatāste tu paulastyā nāma rākṣasāḥ | sumālī mālyavānmālī ye ca teṣāṃ puraḥsarāḥ ||
sarve tebhyo mahābhāgā rāvaṇādbalavattarāḥ || 7.8.24 ||
na cānyo rākṣasānhantā surārīndevakaṇṭakān | ṛte nārāyaṇaṃ devaṃ śaṅkhacakragadādharam || 7.8.25 ||
bhavānnārāyaṇo devaścaturbāhuḥ sanātanaḥ | rākṣasānhantumutpanno hyajeyaḥ prabhuravyayaḥ || 7.8.26 ||
naṣṭadharmavyavasthātā kāle kāle prajākaraḥ | utpadyate dasyuvadhe śaraṇāgatavatsalaḥ || 7.8.27 ||
eṣā mayā tava narādhipa rākṣasānāmutpattiradya kathitā sakalā yathāvat | bhūyo nibodha raghusattama rāvaṇasya janmaprabhāvamatulaṃ sasutasya sarvam || 7.8.28 ||
cirātsumālī vyacaradrasātalaṃ sa rākṣaso viṣṇubhayārditastadā | putraiśca pautraiśca samanvito balī tatastu laṅkāmavasaddhaneśvaraḥ || 7.8.29 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe 'ṣṭamaḥ sargaḥ || 8 ||
kasyacittvatha kālasya sumālī nāma rākṣasaḥ | rasātalānmartyalokaṃ sarvaṃ vai vicacāra ha || 7.9.1 ||
nīlajīmūtasaṅkāśastaptakāñcanakuṇḍalaḥ | kanyāṃ duhitaraṃ gṛhya vinā padmamiva śriyam || 7.9.2 ||
rākṣasendraḥ sa tu tadā vicaranvai mahītalam | tadāpaśyatsa gacchantaṃ puṣpakeṇa dhaneśvaram || 7.9.3 ||
gacchantaṃ pitaraṃ draṣṭuṃ pulastyatanayaṃ vibhum | taṃ dṛṣṭvā 'marasaṅkāśaṃ svacchandaṃ tapanopamam || 7.9.4 ||
rasātalaṃ praviṣṭaḥ sanmartyalokātsavismayaḥ | ityevaṃ cintayāmāsa rākṣasānāṃ mahāmatiḥ || 7.9.5 ||
kiṃ kṛtaṃ śreya ityevaṃ vardhemahi kathaṃ vayam | athābravītsutāṃ rakṣaḥ kaikasīṃ nāma nāmataḥ || 7.9.6 ||
putri pradānakālo 'yaṃ yauvanaṃ vyativartate | pratyākhyānācca bhītaistvaṃ na varaiḥ pratigṛhyase || 7.9.7 ||
tvatkṛte ca vayaṃ sarve yantritā dharmabuddhayaḥ | tvaṃ hi sarvaguṇopetā śrīḥ sākṣādiva putrike | kanyāpitṛtvaṃ duḥkhaṃ hi sarveṣāṃ mānakāṅkṣiṇām || 7.9.8 ||
na jñāyate ca kaḥ kanyāṃ varayediti kanyake || 7.9.9 ||
tvaṃ hi sarvaguṇopetā śrīḥ sākṣādiva putrike | mātuḥ kulaṃ pitṛkulaṃ yatra caiva pradīyate | kulatrayaṃ sadā kanyā saṃśaye sthāpya tiṣṭhati || 7.9.10 ||
sā tvaṃ munivaraṃ śreṣṭhaṃ prajāpatikulodbhavam | bhaja viśravasaṃ putri paulastyaṃ varaya svayam || 7.9.11 ||
īdṛśāste bhaviṣyanti putrāḥ putri na saṃśayaḥ | tejasā bhāskarasamo yādṛśo 'yaṃ dhaneśvaraḥ || 7.9.12 ||
sā tu tadvacanaṃ śrutvā kanyakā pitṛgauravāt | tatropāgamya sā tasthau viśravā yatra tapyate || 7.9.13 ||
etasminnantare rāma pulastyatanayo dvijaḥ | agnihotramupātiṣṭhaccaturtha iva pāvakaḥ || 7.9.14 ||
avicintya tu tāṃ velāṃ dāruṇāṃ pitṛgauravāt | upasṛtyāgratastasya caraṇādhomukhī sthitā | vilikhantī muhurbhūmimaṅguṣṭhāgreṇa bhāminī || 7.9.15 ||
sa tu tāṃ vīkṣya suśroṇīṃ pūrṇacandranibhānanām | abravītparamodāro dīpyamānāṃ svatejasā || 7.9.16 ||
bhadre kasyāsi duhitā kuto vā tvamihāgatā | kiṃ kāryaṃ kasya vā hetostattvato brūhi śobhane || 7.9.17 ||
evamuktā tu sā kanyā kṛtāñjalirathābravīt | ātmaprabhāveṇa mune jñātumarhasi me matam || 7.9.18 ||
kiṃ tu māṃ viddhi brahmarṣe śāsanātpiturāgatām | kaikasī nāma nāmnāhaṃ śeṣaṃ tvaṃ jñātumarhasi || 7.9.19 ||
sa tu gatvā munirdhyānaṃ vākyametaduvāca ha | vijñātaṃ te mayā bhadre kāraṇaṃ yanmanogatam || 7.9.20 ||
sutābhilāṣo mattaste mattamātaṅgagāmini | dāruṇāyāṃ tu velāyāṃ yasmāttvaṃ māmupasthitā || 7.9.21 ||
śṛṇu tasmātsutānbhadre yādṛśāñjanayiṣyasi | dāruṇāndāruṇākārāndāruṇābhijanapriyān || 7.9.22 ||
prasaviṣyasi suśroṇi rākṣasānkrūrakarmaṇaḥ | sā tu tadvacanaṃ śrutvā praṇipatyābravīdvacaḥ || 7.9.23 ||
bhagavannīdṛśānputrāṃstvatto 'haṃ brahmavādinaḥ | necchāmi sudurācārānprasādaṃ kartumarhasi || 7.9.24 ||
kanyayā tvevamuktastu viśravā munipuṅgavaḥ | uvāca kaikasīṃ bhūyaḥ pūrṇenduriva rohiṇīm || 7.9.25 ||
paścimo yastava suto bhaviṣyati śubhānane | mama vaṃśānurūpaḥ sa dharmātmā ca bhaviṣyati || 7.9.26 ||
evamuktā tu sā kanyā rāma kālena kenacit | janayāmāsa bībhatsaṃ rakṣorūpaṃ sudāruṇam || 7.9.27 ||
daśagrīvaṃ mahādaṃṣṭraṃ nīlāñjanacayopamam | tāmroṣṭhaṃ viṃśatibhujaṃ mahāsyaṃ dīptamūrdhajam || 7.9.28 ||
tasmiñjāte tu tatkāle sajvālakavalāḥ śivāḥ | kravyādāścāpasavyāni maṇḍalāni pracakramuḥ || 7.9.29 ||
vavarṣa rudhiraṃ devo meghāśca kharaniḥsvanāḥ | prababhau na ca sūryo vai maholkāścāpatanbhuvi || 7.9.30 ||
cakampe jagatī caiva vavurvātāḥ sudāruṇāḥ | akṣobhyaḥ kṣubhitaścaiva samudraḥ saritāṃ patiḥ || 7.9.31 ||
atha nāmākarottasya pitāmahasamaḥ pitā | daśagrīvaḥ prasūto 'yaṃ daśagrīvo bhaviṣyati || 7.9.32 ||
tasya tvanantaraṃ jātaḥ kumbhakarṇo mahābalaḥ | pramāṇādyasya vipulaṃ pramāṇaṃ neha vidyate || 7.9.33 ||
tataḥ śūrpaṇakhā nāma sañjajñe vikṛtānanā | vibhīṣaṇaśca dharmātmā kaikasyāḥ paścimaḥ sutaḥ || 7.9.34 ||
tasmiñjāte mahāsattve puṣpavarṣaṃ papāta ha || 7.9.35 ||
nabhaḥsthāne dundubhayo devānāṃ prāṇadaṃstadā | vākyaṃ caivāntarikṣe ca sādhu sādhviti tattadā || 7.9.36 ||
tau tu tatra mahāraṇye vavṛdhāte mahaujasau | kumbhakarṇadaśagrīvau lokodvegakarau tadā || 7.9.37 ||
kumbhakarṇaḥ pramattastu maharṣīndharmavatsalān | trailokyaṃ bhakṣayannityāsantuṣṭo vicacāra ha || 7.9.38 ||
vibhīṣaṇastu dharmātmā nityaṃ dharme vyavasthitaḥ | svādhyāyaniyatāhāra uvāsa vijitendriyaḥ || 7.9.39 ||
atha vaiśravaṇo devastatra kālena kenacit | āgataḥ pitaraṃ draṣṭuṃ puṣpakeṇa dhaneśvaraḥ || 7.9.40 ||
taṃ dṛṣṭvā kaikasī tatra jvalantamiva tejasā | āgamya rākṣasī tatra daśagrīvamuvāca ha || 7.9.41 ||
putra vaiśravaṇaṃ paśya bhrātaraṃ tejasā vṛtam | bhrātṛbhāve same cāpi paśyātmānaṃ tvamīdṛśam || 7.9.42 ||
daśagrīva tathā yatnaṃ kuruṣvāmitavikrama | yathā tvamasi me putra bhava rvaiśravaṇopamaḥ || 7.9.43 ||
mātustadvacanaṃ śrutvā daśagrīvaḥ pratāpavān | amarṣamatulaṃ lebhe pratijñāṃ cākarottadā || 7.9.44 ||
satyaṃ te pratijānāmi bhrātṛtulyo 'dhiko 'pi vā | bhaviṣyāmyojasā caiva santāpaṃ tyaja hṛdgatam || 7.9.45 ||
tatastenaiva kopena daśagrīvaḥ sahānujaḥ | cikīrṣurduṣkaraṃ karma tapase dhṛtamānasaḥ || 7.9.46 ||
prāpsyāmi tapasā kāmamiti kṛtvā 'dhyavasya ca | āgacchadātmasiddhyarthaṃ gokarṇasyāśramaṃ śubham || 7.9.47 ||
sa rākṣasastatra sahānujastadā tapaścakārātulamugravikramaḥ | atoṣayaccāpi pitāmahaṃ vibhuṃ dadau sa tuṣṭaśca varāñjayāvahān || 7.9.48 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe navamaḥ sargaḥ || 9 ||
athābravīnmuniṃ rāmaḥ kathaṃ te bhrātaro vane | kīdṛśaṃ tu tadā brahmaṃstapastepurmahābalāḥ || 7.10.1 ||
agastyastvabravīttatra rāmaṃ suprītamānasam | tāṃstāndharmavidhīṃstatra bhrātaraste samāviśan || 7.10.2 ||
kumbhakarṇastato yatto nityaṃ dharmapathe sthitaḥ | tatāpa grīṣmakāle tu pañcāgnīnparitaḥ sthitaḥ || 7.10.3 ||
meghāmbusikto varṣāsu vīrāsanamasevata | nityaṃ ca śiśire kāle jalamadhyapratiśrayaḥ || 7.10.4 ||
evaṃ varṣasahasrāṇi daśa tasyāticakramuḥ | dharme prayatamānasya satpathe niṣṭhitasya ca || 7.10.5 ||
vibhīṣaṇastu dharmātmā nityaṃ dharmaparaḥ śuciḥ | pañcavarṣasahasrāṇi pādenaikena tasthivān || 7.10.6 ||
samāpte niyame tasya nanṛtuścāpsarogaṇāḥ | papāta puṣpavarṣaṃ ca kṣubhitāścāpi devatāḥ || 7.10.7 ||
pañcavarṣasahasrāṇi sūryaṃ caivānvavartata | tasthau cordhvaśirobāhuḥ svādhyāyadhṛtamānasaḥ || 7.10.8 ||
evaṃ vibhīṣaṇasyāpi svargasthasyeva nandane | daśavarṣasahasrāṇi gatāni niyatātmanaḥ || 7.10.9 ||
daśavarṣasahasraṃ tu nirāhāro daśānanaḥ | pūrṇe varṣasahasre tu śiraścāgnau juhāva saḥ || 7.10.10 ||
evaṃ varṣasahasrāṇi nava tasyāticakramuḥ | śirāṃsi nava cāpyasya praviṣṭāni hutāśanam || 7.10.11 ||
atha varṣasahasre tu daśame daśamaṃ śiraḥ | chettukāme daśagrīve prāptastatra pitāmahaḥ || 7.10.12 ||
pitāmahastu suprītaḥ sārdhaṃ devairupasthitaḥ | tava tāvaddaśagrīva prīto 'smītyabhyabhāṣata || 7.10.13 ||
śīghraṃ varaya dharmajña varo yaste 'bhikāṅkṣitaḥ | kaṃ te kāmaṃ karomyadya na vṛthā te pariśramaḥ || 7.10.14 ||
athābravīdṛśagrīvaḥ prahṛṣṭenāntarātmanā | praṇamya śirasā devaṃ harṣagadgadayā girā || 7.10.15 ||
bhagavanprāṇināṃ nityaṃ nānyatra maraṇādbhayam | nāsti mṛtyusamaḥ śatruramaratvamahaṃ vṛṇe || 7.10.16 ||
evamuktastadā brahmā daśagrīvamuvāca ha | nāsti sarvāmaratvaṃ te varamanyaṃ vṛṇīṣva me || 7.10.17 ||
evamukte tadā rāma brahmaṇā lokakartṛṇā | daśagrīva uvācedaṃ kṛtāñjalirathāgrataḥ || 7.10.18 ||
suparṇanāgayakṣāṇāṃ daityadānavarakṣasām | avadhyo 'haṃ prajādhyakṣa devatānāṃ ca śāśvata || 7.10.19 ||
nahi cintā mamānyeṣu prāṇiṣvamarapūjita | tṛṇabhūtā hi te manye prāṇino mānuṣādayaḥ || 7.10.20 ||
evamuktastu dharmātmā daśagrīveṇa rakṣasā | uvāca vacanaṃ devaḥ saha devaiḥ pitāmahaḥ || 7.10.21 ||
bhaviṣyatyevametatte vaco rākṣasapuṅgava | evamuktvā tu taṃ rāma daśagrīvaṃ pitāmahaḥ || 7.10.22 ||
śṛṇu cāpi varo bhūyaḥ prītasyeha śubho mama | hutāni yāni śīrṣāṇi pūrvamagnau tvayānagha || 7.10.23 ||
punastāni bhaviṣyanti tathaiva tava rākṣasa | vitarāmīha te saumya varaṃ cānyaṃ durāsadam || 7.10.24 ||
chandatastava rūpaṃ ca manasā yadyathepsitam | bhaviṣyati na sandeho madvarāttavarākṣasa || 7.10.25 ||
evaṃ pitāmahoktasya daśagrīvasya rakṣasaḥ | agnau hutāni śīrṣāṇi punastānyutthitāni vai || 7.10.26 ||
evamuktvā tu taṃ rāma daśagrīvaṃ pitāmahaḥ | vibhīṣaṇamathovāca vākyaṃ lokapitāmahaḥ || 7.10.27 ||
vibhīṣaṇa tvayā vatsa dharmasaṃhitabuddhinā | parituṣṭo 'smi dharmātmanvaraṃ varaya suvrata || 7.10.28 ||
vibhīṣaṇastu dharmātmā vacanaṃ prāha sāñjaliḥ | vṛtaḥ sarvaguṇairnityaṃ candramā raśmibhiryathā || 7.10.29 ||
bhagavankṛtakṛtyo 'haṃ yanme lokaguruḥ svayam | prītena yadi dātavyo varo me śṛṇu suvrata || 7.10.30 ||
paramāpadgatasyāpi dharme mama matirbhavet | aśikṣitaṃ ca brahmāstraṃ bhagavanpratibhātu me || 7.10.31 ||
yā yā me jāyate buddhiryeṣu yeṣvāśrameṣu ca | sā sā bhavatu dharmiṣṭhā taṃ tu dharmaṃ ca pālaye || 7.10.32 ||
eṣa me paramodāra varaḥ paramako mataḥ | nahi dharmābhiraktānāṃ loke kiñcana durlabham || 7.10.33 ||
punaḥ prajāpatiḥ prīto vibhīṣaṇamuvāca ha | dharmiṣṭhastvaṃ yathā vatsa tathā caitadbhaviṣyati || 7.10.34 ||
yasmādrākṣasayonau te jātasyāmitranāśana | nādharme jāyate buddhiramaratvaṃ dadāmi te || 7.10.35 ||
ityuktvā kumbhakarṇāya varaṃ dātumupasthitam | prajāpatiṃ surāḥ sarve vākyaṃ prāñjalayo 'bruvan || 7.10.36 ||
na tāvatkumbhakarṇāya pradātavyo varastvayā | jānīṣe hi yathā lokāṃstrāsayatyeṣa durmatiḥ || 7.10.37 ||
nandane 'psarasaḥ sapta mahendrānucarā daśa | anena bhakṣitā brahmannṛṣayo mānuṣāstathā || 7.10.38 ||
alabdhavarapūrveṇa yatkṛtaṃ rākṣasena tu | tadeṣa varalabdhaḥ syādbhakṣayedbhuvanatrayam || 7.10.39 ||
varavyājena moho 'smai dīyatāmamitaprabha | lokānāṃ svasti caivaṃ syādbhavedasya ca sannatiḥ || 7.10.40 ||
evamuktaḥ surairbrahmā 'cintayat padmasambhavaḥ | cintitā copatasthe 'sya pārśvaṃ devī sarasvatī || 7.10.41 ||
prāñjaliḥ sā tu pārśvasthā prāha vākyaṃ sarasvatī | iyamasmyāgatā deva kiṃ kāryaṃ karavāṇyaham || 7.10.42 ||
prajāpatistuṃ tāṃ prāptāṃ prāha vākyaṃ sarasvatīm | vāṇi tvaṃ rākṣasendrasya bhava yā devatepsitā || 7.10.43 ||
tathetyuktvā praviṣṭā sā prajāpatirathābravīt | kumbhakarṇa mahābāho varaṃ varaya yo mataḥ || 7.10.44 ||
kumbhakarṇastu tadvākyaṃ śrutvā vacanamabravīt | svaptuṃ varṣāṇyanekāni devadeva mamepsitam || 7.10.45 ||
evamastviti taṃ coktvā prāyādbrahmā suraiḥ samam | devī sarasvatī caiva rākṣasaṃ taṃ jahau punaḥ || 7.10.46 ||
brahmaṇā saha deveṣu gateṣu ca nabhaḥsthalam | vimukto 'sau sarasvatyā svāṃ sañjñāṃ ca tato gataḥ || 7.10.47 ||
kumbhakarṇastu duṣṭātmā cintayāmāsa duḥkhitaḥ | īdṛśaṃ kimidaṃ vākyaṃ mamādya vadanāccyutam || 7.10.48 ||
ahaṃ vyāmohito devairiti manye tadā ' 'gataiḥ | evaṃ labdhavarāḥ sarve bhrātaro dīptatejasaḥ | śleṣmātakavanaṃ gatvā tatra te nyavasansukham || 7.10.49 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe daśamaḥ sargaḥ || 10 ||
sumālī varalabdhāṃstu jñātvā caitānniśācarān | udatiṣṭhadbhayaṃ tyaktvā sānugaḥ sa rasātalāt || 7.11.1 ||
mārīcaśca prahastaśca virūpākṣo mahodaraḥ | udatiṣṭhansusaṃrabdhāḥ sacivāstasya rakṣasaḥ || 7.11.2 ||
sumālī sacivaiḥ sārdhaṃ vṛto rākṣasapuṅgavaiḥ | abhigamya daśagrīvaṃ pariṣvajyedamabravīt || 7.11.3 ||
diṣṭyā te vatsa samprāptaścintito 'yaṃ manorathaḥ | yastvaṃ tribhuvanaśreṣṭhāllabdhavānvaramuttamam || 7.11.4 ||
yatkṛte ca vayaṃ laṅkāṃ tyakatvā yātā rasātalam | tadgataṃ no mahābāho mahadviṣṇukṛtaṃ bhayam || 7.11.5 ||
asakṛttadbhayādbhītāḥ parityajya svamālayam | vidrutāḥ sahitāḥ sarve praviṣṭāḥ sma rasātalam || 7.11.6 ||
asmadīyā ca laṅkeyaṃ nagarī rākṣasocitā | niveśitā tava bhrātrā dhanādhyakṣeṇa dhīmatā || 7.11.7 ||
yadi nāmātra śakyaṃ syātsāmnā dānena vānagha | tarasā vā mahābāho pratyānetuṃ kṛtaṃ bhavet || 7.11.8 ||
tvaṃ tu laṅkeśvarastāta bhaviṣyasi na saṃśayaḥ | tvayā rākṣasavaṃśo 'yaṃ nimagno 'pi samuddhṛtaḥ | sarveṣāṃ naḥ prabhuścaiva bhaviṣyasi mahābala || 7.11.9 ||
athābravīddaśagrīvo mātāmahamupasthitam | vitteśo gururasmākaṃ nārhase vaktumīdṛśam || 7.11.10 ||
sāmnāpi rākṣasendreṇa pratyākhyāto garīyasā | kiñcinnāha tadā rakṣo jñātvā tasya cakīrṣitam || 7.11.11 ||
kasyacittvatha kālasya vasantaṃ rāvaṇaṃ tataḥ | uktavantaṃ tathā vākyaṃ daśagrīvaṃ niśācaraḥ || 7.11.12 ||
prahastaḥ praśritaṃ vākyamidamāha sa kāraṇam || 7.11.13 ||
daśagrīva mahābāho nārhastvaṃ vaktumīdṛśam | saubhrātraṃ nāsti śūrāṇāṃ śṛṇu cedaṃ vaco mama || 7.11.14 ||
aditiśca ditiścaiva bhaginyau sahite hi te | bhārye paramarūpiṇyau kaśyapasya prajāpateḥ || 7.11.15 ||
aditirjanayāmāsa devāṃstribhuvaneśvarān | ditistvajanayatputrānkaśyapasyātmasambhavān || 7.11.16 ||
daityānāṃ kila dharmajña purīyaṃ savanārṇavā | saparvatā mahī vīra te 'bhavanprabhaviṣṇavaḥ || 7.11.17 ||
nihatya tāṃstu samare viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā | devānāṃ vaśamānītaṃ trailokyamidamavyayam || 7.11.18 ||
naitadeko bhavāneva kariṣyati viparyayam | surāsurairācaritaṃ tatkuruṣva vaco mama || 7.11.19 ||
evamukto daśagrīvaḥ prahṛṣṭenāntarātmanā | cintayitvā muhūrtaṃ vai bāḍhamityeva so 'bravīt || 7.11.20 ||
sa tu tenaiva harṣeṇa tasminnahani vīryavān | vanaṃ gato daśagrīvaḥ saha taiḥ kṣaṇadācaraiḥ || 7.11.21 ||
trikūṭasthaḥ sa tu tadā daśagrīvo niśācaraḥ | preṣayāmāsa dautyena prahastaṃ vākyakovidam || 7.11.22 ||
prahasta śīghraṃ gaccha tvaṃ brūhi nairṛtapuṅgavam | vacasā mama vitteśaṃ sāmapūrvamidaṃ vacaḥ || 7.11.23 ||
iyaṃ laṅkā purī rājanrākṣasānāṃ mahātmanām | tvayā niveśitā saumya naitadyuktaṃ tavānagha || 7.11.24 ||
tadbhavānyadi no hyadya dadyādatulavikrama | kṛtā bhavenmama prītirdhurmaścaivānupālitaḥ || 7.11.25 ||
sa tu gatvā purīṃ laṅkāṃ dhanadena surakṣitām | abravītparamodāraṃ vittapālamidaṃ vacaḥ || 7.11.26 ||
preṣito 'haṃ tava bhrātrā daśagrīveṇa suvrata | tvatsamīpaṃ mahābāho sarvaśastrabhṛtāṃ vara || 7.11.27 ||
tacchrūyatāṃ mahāprājña sarvaśāstraviśārada | vacanaṃ mama vitteśa yadbravīti daśānanaḥ || 7.11.28 ||
iyaṃ kila purī ramyā sumālipramukhaiḥ purā | bhuktapūrvā viśālākṣa rākṣasairbhīmavikramaiḥ || 7.11.29 ||
tena vijñāpyate so 'yaṃ sāmprataṃ viśravātmaja | tadeṣā dīyatāṃ tāta yācatastasya sāmataḥ || 7.11.30 ||
prahastādabhisaṃśrutya devo vaiśravaṇo vacaḥ | pratyuvāca prahastaṃ taṃ vākyaṃ vākyaviśāradaḥ || 7.11.31 ||
dattā mameyaṃ pitrā tu laṅkā śūnyā niśācaraiḥ | nivāsite ca me yakṣairdānamānādibhirguṇaiḥ || 7.11.32 ||
brūhi gaccha daśagrīvaṃ puraṃ rājyaṃ ca yanmama | tavāpyetanmahābāho bhuṅkṣva rājyamakaṇṭakam || 7.11.33 ||
evamuktvā dhanādhyakṣo jagāma piturantikam || 7.11.34 ||
abhivādya guruṃ prāha rāvaṇasya yadīpsitam | eṣa tāta daśagrīvo dūtaṃ preṣitavānmama || 7.11.35 ||
dīyatāṃ nagarī laṅkā pūrvaṃ rakṣogaṇoṣitā | mayātra yadanuṣṭheyaṃ tanmamācakṣva suvrata || 7.11.36 ||
brahmarṣistvevamukto 'sau viśravā munipuṅgavaḥ | prāñjaliṃ dhanadaṃ prāha śṛṇu putra vaco mama || 7.11.37 ||
daśagrīvo mahābāhuruktavānmama sannidhau | mayā nirbhartsitaścāsīdbahuśoktaḥ sudurmatiḥ || 7.11.38 ||
sa krodhena mayā cokto dhvaṃsate ca punaḥ punaḥ | śreyo 'bhiyuktaṃ dharmyaṃ ca śṛṇu putra vaco mama || 7.11.39 ||
varapradānasammūḍho mānyā 'mānyān sa durmatiḥ | na vetti mama śāpācca prakṛtiṃ dāruṇāṃ gataḥ || 7.11.40 ||
tasmādgaccha mahābāho kailāsaṃ dharaṇīdharam | niveśaya nivāsārthaṃ tyaktvā laṅkāṃ sahānugaḥ || 7.11.41 ||
tatra mandākinī ramyā nadīnāmuttamā nadī | kāñcanaiḥ sūryasaṅkāśaiḥ paṅkajaiḥ saṃvṛtodakā || 7.11.42 ||
kumudairutpalaiścaiva tathā 'nyaiśca sugandhibhiḥ || 7.11.43 ||
tatra devāḥ sagandharvāḥ sāpsaroragakiṃnarāḥ | vihāraśīlāḥ satataṃ ramante sarvadā ' 'śritāḥ || 7.11.44 ||
na hi kṣamaṃ tavānena vairaṃ dhanada rakṣasā | jānīṣe hi yathā 'nena labdhaḥ paramako varaḥ || 7.11.45 ||
evamukto gṛhītvā ' 'śu tadvacaḥ pitṛgauravāt | sadāraputraḥ sāmānyaḥ savāhanadhano gataḥ || 7.11.46 ||
prahasto 'tha daśagrīvaṃ gatvā vacanamabravīt | prahṛṣṭātmā mahātmānaṃ sahāmātyaṃ sahānujam || 7.11.47 ||
śūnyā sā nagarī laṅkā tyakttvaināṃ dhanado gataḥ | praviśya tāṃ sahāsmābhiḥ svadharmaṃ pratipālaya || 7.11.48 ||
evamukto daśagrīvaḥ prahastena mahābalaḥ | viveśa nagarīṃ laṅkāṃ bhrātṛbhiḥ sabalānugaiḥ || 7.11.49 ||
dhanadena parityaktāṃ suvibhaktamahāpathām | āruroha sa devāriḥ svargaṃ devādhipo yathā || 7.11.50 ||
sa cābhiṣiktaḥ kṣaṇadācaraistadā niveśayāmāsa purīṃ daśānanaḥ | nikāmapūrṇā ca babhūva sā purī niśācarairnīlabalāhakopamaiḥ || 7.11.51 ||
dhaneśvarastvatha pitṛvākyagauravānnyaveśayacchaśivimale girau purīm | svalaṅkṛtairbhavanavarairvibhūṣitāṃ purandarasveva tadā 'marāvatīm || 7.11.52 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe ekādaśaḥ sargaḥ || 11 ||
rākṣasendro 'bhiṣiktastu bhrātṛbhyāṃ sahitastadā | tataḥ pradānaṃ rākṣasyā bhaginyāḥ samacintayat || 7.12.1 ||
svasāraṃ kālakeyāya dānavendrāya rākṣasīm | dadau śūrpaṇakhāṃ nāma vidyujjihvāya nāmataḥ || 7.12.2 ||
atha dattvā svayaṃ rakṣo mṛgayāmaṭate sma tat | tatrāpaśyattato rāma mayaṃ nāma diteḥ sutam || 7.12.3 ||
kanyāsahāyaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā daśagrīvo niśācaraḥ | apṛcchatko bhavāneko nirmanuṣyamṛge vane | anayā mṛgaśāvākṣyā kimarthaṃ saha tiṣṭhasi || 7.12.4 ||
mayastathābravīdrāma pṛcchantaṃ taṃ niśācaram | śrūyatāṃ sarvamākhyāsye yathāvṛttamidaṃ mama || 7.12.5 ||
hemā nāmāpsarāstāta śrutapūrvā yadi tvayā | daivatairmama sā dattā paulomīva śatakratoḥ || 7.12.6 ||
tasyāṃ saktamanāstāta pañcavarṣaśatānyaham | sā ca daivatakāryeṇa trayodaśa samā gatāḥ || 7.12.7 ||
varṣaṃ caturdaśaṃ caiva tato hemamayaṃ puram | vajravaiḍūryacitraṃ ca māyayā nirmitaṃ mayā || 7.12.8 ||
tatrāhamavasaṃ dīnastayā hīnaḥ suduḥkhitaḥ || 7.12.9 ||
tasmātpurādduhitaraṃ gṛhītvā vanamāgataḥ | iyaṃ mamātmajā rājaṃstasyāḥ kukṣau vivardhitā || 7.12.10 ||
bhartāramanayā sārdhamasyāḥ prāpto 'smi mārgitum | kanyāpitṛtvaṃ duḥkhaṃ hi sarveṣāṃ mānakāṅkṣiṇām || 7.12.11 ||
kanyā hi dve kule nityaṃ saṃśaye sthāpya tiṣṭhati | putradvayaṃ mamāpyasyāṃ bhāryāyāṃ sambabhūva ha || 7.12.12 ||
māyāvī prathamastāta dundubhistadanantaraḥ | evaṃ te sarvamākhyātaṃ yāthātathyena pṛcchataḥ || 7.12.13 ||
tvāmidānīṃ kathaṃ tāta jānīyāṃ ko bhavāniti | evamuktastu tadrakṣo vinītamidamabravīt || 7.12.14 ||
ahaṃ paulastyatanayo daśagrīvaśca nāmataḥ | munerviśravaso yastu tṛtīyo brahmaṇo 'bhavat || 7.12.15 ||
evamuktastadā rāma rākṣasendreṇa dānavaḥ | maharṣestanayaṃ jñātvā mayo harṣamupāgataḥ | dātuṃ duhitaraṃ tasmai rocayāmāsa yatra vai || 7.12.16 ||
kareṇa tu karaṃ tasyā grāhayitvā mayastadā | prahasanprāha daityendro rākṣasendramidaṃ vacaḥ || 7.12.17 ||
iyaṃ mamātmajā rājanhemayā 'psarasā dhṛtā | kanyā mandodarī nāma patnyarthaṃ pratigṛhyatām || 7.12.18 ||
bāḍhamityeva taṃ rāma daśagrīvo 'bhyabhāṣata | prajcālya tatra caivāgnimakarotpāṇisaṅgraham || 7.12.19 ||
sa hi tasya mayo rāma śāpābhijñastapodhanāt | viditvā tena sā dattā tasya paitāmahaṃ kulam || 7.12.20 ||
amoghāṃ tasya śaktiṃ ca pradadau paramādbhutām | pareṇa tapasā labdhāṃ jaghnivāँllakṣmaṇaṃ yayā || 7.12.21 ||
evaṃ sīkṛtadāro vai laṅkāyā īśvaraḥ prabhuḥ | gatvā tu nagarīṃ bhārye bhrātṛbhyāṃ samupāharat || 7.12.22 ||
vairocanasya dauhitrīṃ vajrajvāleti nāmataḥ | tāṃ bhāryāṃ kumbhakarṇasya rāvaṇaḥ samakalpayat || 7.12.23 ||
gandharvarājasya sutāṃ śailūṣasya mahātmanaḥ | saramāṃ nāma dharmajñāṃ lebhe bhāryāṃ vibhīṣaṇaḥ || 7.12.24 ||
tīre tu saraso vai tu sañjajñe mānasasya hi | sarastadā mānasaṃ tu vavṛdhe jaladāgame || 7.12.25 ||
mātrā tu tasyāḥ kanyāyāḥ snehenākranditaṃ vacaḥ | saro mā vardhayasveti tataḥ sā saramā 'bhavat || 7.12.26 ||
evaṃ te kṛtadārā vai remire tatra rākṣasāḥ | svāṃ svāṃ bhāryāmupāgamya gandharvā iva nandane || 7.12.27 ||
tato mandodarī putraṃ meghanādamajījanat | sa eṣa indrajinnāma yuṣmābhirabhidhīyate || 7.12.28 ||
jātamātreṇa hi purā tena rāvaṇasūnunā | rudatā sumahānmukto nādo jaladharopamaḥ || 7.12.29 ||
jaḍīkṛtā ca sā laṅkā tasya nādena rāghava | pitā tasyākaronnāma meghanāda iti svayam || 7.12.30 ||
so 'vardhata tadā rāma rāvaṇāntaḥpure śubhe | rakṣyamāṇo varastrībhiśchannaḥ kāṣṭhairivānalaḥ || 7.12.31 ||
mātāpitrormahāharṣaṃ janayanrāvaṇātmajaḥ || 7.12.32 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe dvādaśaḥ sargaḥ || 12 ||
atha lokeśvarotsṛṣṭā tatra kālena kenacit | nidrā samabhavattīvrā kumbhakarṇasya rūpiṇī || 7.13.1 ||
tato bhrātaramāsīnaṃ kumbhakarṇo 'bravīdvacaḥ | nidrā māṃ bādhate rājankārayasva mamālayam || 7.13.2 ||
viniyuktāstato rājñā śilpino viśvakarmavat | vistīrṇaṃ yojanaṃ śubhraṃ tato dviguṇamāyatam || 7.13.3 ||
darśanīyaṃ nirābādhaṃ kumbhakarṇasya cakrire | sphāṭikaiḥ kāñcanaiścitraiḥ stambhaiḥ sarvatra śobhitam || 7.13.4 ||
vaiḍūryakṛtasopānaṃ kiṅkiṇījālakaṃ tathā | dāntatoraṇavinyastaṃ vajrasphaṭikavedikam || 7.13.5 ||
manoharaṃ sarvasukhaṃ kārayāmāsa rākṣasaḥ | sarvatra sukhadaṃ nityaṃ meroḥ puṇyāṃ guhāmiva || 7.13.6 ||
tatra nidrāṃ samāviṣṭaḥ kumbhakarṇo mahābalaḥ | bahūnyabdasahasrāṇi śayāno na prabuddhyate || 7.13.7 ||
nidrābhibhūte tu tadā kumbhakarṇe daśānanaḥ | devarṣiyakṣagandharvānsañjaghne hi niraṅkuśaḥ || 7.13.8 ||
udyānāni ca citrāṇi nandanādīni yāni ca | tāni gatvā susaṅakruddho bhinatti sma daśānanaḥ || 7.13.9 ||
nadīṃ gaja iva krīḍanvṛkṣānvāyuriva kṣipan | nagānvrajra ivotsṛṣṭo vidhvaṃsayati rākṣasaḥ || 7.13.10 ||
tathāvṛttaṃ tu vijñāya daśagrīvaṃ dhaneśvaraḥ | kulānurūpaṃ dharmajño vṛttaṃ saṃsmṛtya cātmanaḥ || 7.13.11 ||
saubhrātradarśanārthaṃ tu dūtaṃ vaiśravaṇastadā | laṅkāṃ sampreṣayāmāsa daśagrīvasya vai hitam || 7.13.12 ||
sa gatvā nagarīṃ laṅkāmāsasāda vibhīṣaṇam | mānitastena dharmeṇa pṛṣṭaścāgamanaṃ prati || 7.13.13 ||
pṛṣṭvā ca kuśalaṃ rājño jñātīnāṃ ca bibhīṣaṇaḥ | sabhāyāṃ darśayāmāsa tamāsīnaṃ daśānanam || 7.13.14 ||
sa dṛṣṭvā tatra rājānaṃ dīpyamānaṃ svatejasā | jayeti vācā sampūjya tūṣṇīṃ samabhivartata || 7.13.15 ||
taṃ tatrottamaparyaṅke varāstaraṇaśobhite | upaviṣṭaṃ daśagrīvaṃ dūto vākyamathābravīt || 7.13.16 ||
rājanvadāmi te sarvaṃ bhrātā tava yadabravīt | ubhayoḥ sadṛśaṃ vīra vṛttasya ca kulasya ca || 7.13.17 ||
sādhu paryāptametāvatkṛtaścāritrasaṅgrahaḥ | sādhu dharme vyavasthānaṃ kriyatāṃ yadi śakyate || 7.13.18 ||
dṛṣṭaṃ me nandanaṃ bhagnamṛṣayo nihatāḥ śrutāḥ | devatānāṃ samudyogastvatto rājanmama śrutaḥ || 7.13.19 ||
nirākṛtaśca bahuśastvayā 'haṃ rākṣasādhipa | aparāddhā hi bālyācca ramaṇīyāḥ svabāndhavāḥ || 7.13.20 ||
ahaṃ tu himavatpṛṣṭhaṃ gato dharmamupāsitum | raudraṃ vrattaṃ samāsthāya niyato niyatendriyaḥ || 7.13.21 ||
tatra devo mayā dṛṣṭaḥ saha devyā mayā prabhuḥ | savyaṃ cakṣurmayā daivāttatra devyāṃ nipātitam || 7.13.22 ||
kā nviyaṃ syāditi śubhā na khalvanyena hetunā | rūpaṃ hyanupamaṃ kṛtvā rudrāṇī tatra tiṣṭhati || 7.13.23 ||
devyā divyaprabhāveṇa dagdhaṃ savyaṃ mamekṣaṇam | reṇudhvastamiva jyotiḥ piṅgulatvamupāgatam || 7.13.24 ||
tato 'hamanyadvistīrṇaṃ gatvā tasya girestaṭam | tūṣṇīṃ varṣaśatānyaṣṭau samādhāraṃ mahāvratam || 7.13.25 ||
samāpte niyame tasmiṃstatra devo maheśvaraḥ | prītaḥ prītena manasā prāha vākyamidaṃ prabhuḥ || 7.13.26 ||
paiṅgalyaṃ yadavāptaṃ hi devyā rūpanirīkṣaṇāt | prīto 'smi tava dharmajña tapasā nena suvrata || 7.13.27 ||
mayā caitadvrataṃ cīrṇaṃ tvayā caiva dhanādhipa | tṛtīyaḥ puruṣo nāsti yaścarevratamīdṛśam || 7.13.28 ||
vrataṃ suniścayaṃ hyetanmayā hyutpāditaṃ purā | tatsakhitvaṃ mayā saumya rocayasva dhaneśvara || 7.13.29 ||
tapasā nirjitaścaiva sakhā bhava mamānagha | devyā dagdhaṃ prabhāveṇa yacca savyaṃ tavekṣaṇam || 7.13.30 ||
ekākṣipiṅgaletyeva nāma sthāsyati śāśvatam | evaṃ tena sakhitvaṃ ca prāpyānujñāṃ ca śaṅkarāt || 7.13.31 ||
āgatya ca śruto 'yaṃ me tava pāpaviniścayaḥ || 7.13.32 ||
tadadharmiṣṭhasaṃyogānnivarta kuladūṣaṇāt | cintyate hi vadhopāyaḥ sarṣisaṅghaiḥ suraistava || 7.13.33 ||
evamukto daśagrīvaḥ kruddhasaṃraktalocanaḥ | hastau dantāṃśca sampīḍya vākyametaduvāca ha || 7.13.34 ||
vijñātaṃ te mayā dūta vākyaṃ yasya prabhāṣase | naitattvamasi naivāsau bhrātrā yenāsi coditaḥ || 7.13.35 ||
hitaṃ naiṣa mamaitaddhi bravīti dhanarakṣakaḥ | maheśvarasakhitvaṃ tu mūḍha śrāvayate kila || 7.13.36 ||
na cedaṃ kṣamaṇīyaṃ me yadetadbhāṣitaṃ tvayā | yadetāvanmayā kālaṃ dūta tasya tu marṣitam || 7.13.37 ||
na hantavyo gururjyeṣṭho mayā 'yamiti manyate | tasya tvidānīṃ śrutvā me vākyameṣā kṛtā matiḥ || 7.13.38 ||
trīँllokānapi jeṣyāmi bāhuvīryamupāśritaḥ || 7.13.39 ||
etanmuhūrtamevāhaṃ tasyaikasya tu vai kṛte | caturo lokapālāṃstānnayiṣyāmi yamakṣayam || 7.13.40 ||
evamuktvā tu laṅkeśo dūtaṃ khaḍgena jaghnivān | dadau bhakṣayituṃ hyenaṃ rākṣasānāṃ durātmanām || 7.13.41 ||
evaṃ kṛtasvastyayano rathamāruhya rāvaṇaḥ | trailokyavijayākāṅkṣī yayau yatra dhaneśvaraḥ || 7.13.42 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe trayodaśaḥ sargaḥ || 13 ||
tatastu sacivaiḥ sārdhaṃ ṣaḍbhirnityaṃ baloddhataiḥ | mahodaraprahastābhyāṃ mārīcaśukasāraṇaiḥ || 7.14.1 ||
dhūmrākṣeṇa ca vīreṇa nityaṃ samaragṛdhnunā | vṛtaḥ saṃprayayau śrīmānkrodhāllokāndahanniva || 7.14.2 ||
purāṇi sa nadīḥ śailānvanānyupavanāni ca | atikramya muhūrtena kailāsaṃ girimāgamat || 7.14.3 ||
sanniviṣṭaṃ girau tasminrākṣasendraṃ niśamya tu | yuddhe 'tyarthakṛtotsāhaṃ durātmānaṃ samantriṇam || 7.14.4 ||
yakṣā na śekuḥ saṃsthātuṃ pramukhe tasya rakṣasaḥ | rājño bhrāteti vijñāya gatā yatra dhaneśvaraḥ || 7.14.5 ||
te gatvā sarvamācakhyurbhrātustasya cikīrṣitam | anujñātā yayurhaṣṭā yuddhāya dhanadena te || 7.14.6 ||
tato balānāṃ saṅkṣobho vyavardhata mahodadheḥ | tasya nairṛtarājasya śailaṃ sañcālayanniva || 7.14.7 ||
tato yuddhaṃ samabhavadyakṣarākṣasasaṅkulam | vyathitāścābhavaṃstatra sacivā rākṣasasya te || 7.14.8 ||
sa dṛṣṭvā tādṛśaṃ sainyaṃ daśagrīvo niśācaraḥ | harṣanādānbahūnkṛtvā sa krodhādabhyadhāvata || 7.14.9 ||
ye tu te rākṣasendrasya sacivā ghoravikramāḥ | teṣāṃ sahasramekaikaṃ yakṣāṇāṃ samayodhayan || 7.14.10 ||
tato gadābhirmusalairasibhiḥ śaktitomaraiḥ | hanyamāno daśagrīvastatsainyaṃ samagāhata || 7.14.11 ||
sa nirucchvāsavattatra vadhyamāno daśānanaḥ | varṣadbhiriva jīmūtairdhārābhiravarudhyata || 7.14.12 ||
na cakāra vyathāṃ caiva yakṣaśastraiḥ samāhataḥ | mahīdhara ivāmbhodairdhārāśatasamukṣitaḥ || 7.14.13 ||
sa durātmā samudyamya kāladaṇḍopamāṃ gadām | praviveśa tataḥ sainyaṃ nayanyakṣānyamakṣayam || 7.14.14 ||
sa kakṣamiva vistīrṇaṃ śuṣkendhanamivākulam | vātenāgnirivāyatto yakṣasainyaṃ dadāha tat || 7.14.15 ||
taistu tatra mahāmātyairmahodaraśukādibhiḥ | alpāvaśeṣāste yakṣāḥ kṛtā vātairivāmbudāḥ || 7.14.16 ||
kecitsamāhatā bhagnāḥ patitāḥ samarakṣitau | oṣṭhāṃśca daśanaistīkṣṇairadaśankupitā raṇe || 7.14.17 ||
śrāntāścānyonyamāliṅgya bhraṣṭaśastrā raṇājire | sīdanti ca tadā yakṣāḥ kūlā iva jalena ha || 7.14.18 ||
hatānāṃ gacchatāṃ svargaṃ yudhyatāṃ pṛthivītale | prekṣatāmṛṣisaṅghānāṃ na babhūvāntaraṃ divi || 7.14.19 ||
bhagnāṃstu tānsamālakṣya yakṣendrāṃstu mahābalān | dhanādhyakṣo mahābāhuḥ preṣayāmāsa yakṣakān || 7.14.20 ||
etasminnantare rāma vistīrṇabalavāhanaḥ | preṣito nyapatadyakṣo nāmnā saṃyodhakaṇṭakaḥ || 7.14.21 ||
tena cakreṇa mārīco viṣṇuneva raṇe hataḥ | patito bhūtale śailātkṣīṇapuṇya iva grahaḥ || 7.14.22 ||
sasañjñastu muhūrtena sa viśramya niśācaraḥ | taṃ yakṣaṃ yodhayāmāsa sa ca bhagnaḥ pradudruve || 7.14.23 ||
tataḥ kāñcanacitrāṅgaṃ vaiḍūryarajasokṣitam | maryādāṃ pratihārāṇāṃ toraṇāntaramāviśat || 7.14.24 ||
taṃ tu rājandaśagrīvaṃ praviśantaṃ niśācaram | sūryabhānuriti khyāto dvārapālo nyavārayat || 7.14.25 ||
sa vāryamāṇo yakṣeṇa praviveśa niśācaraḥ | yadā tu vārito rāma na vyatiṣṭhatsa rākṣasaḥ || 7.14.26 ||
tatastoraṇamutpāṭya tena yakṣeṇa tāḍitaḥ | rudhiraṃ prasravanbhāti śailo dhātusravairiva || 7.14.27 ||
sa śailaśikharābheṇa toraṇena samāhataḥ | jagāma na kṣatiṃ vīro varadānātsvayambhuvaḥ || 7.14.28 ||
tenaiva toraṇenātha yakṣastenābhitāḍitaḥ | nādṛśyata tadā yakṣo bhasmīkṛtatanustadā || 7.14.29 ||
tataḥ pradudruvuḥ sarve dṛṣṭvā rakṣaḥparākramam | tato nadīrguhāścaiva viviśurbhayapīḍitāḥ | tyaktapraharaṇāḥ śrāntā vivarṇavadanāstadā || 7.14.30 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe caturdaśaḥ sargaḥ || 14 ||
tatastāँllakṣya vitrastānyakṣendrāṃśca sahasraśaḥ | dhanādhyakṣo mahāyakṣaṃ māṇicāramathābravīt || 7.15.1 ||
rāvaṇaṃ jahi yakṣendra durvṛttaṃ pāpacetasam | śaraṇaṃ bhava vīrāṇāṃ yakṣāṇāṃ yuddhaśālinām || 7.15.2 ||
evamukto mahābāhurmāṇibhadraḥ sudurjayaḥ | vṛto yakṣasahasraistu caturbhiḥ samayodhayat || 7.15.3 ||
te gadāmusalaprāsaiḥ śaktitomaramudgaraiḥ | abhighnantastadā yakṣā rākṣasānsamupādravan || 7.15.4 ||
kurvantastumulaṃ yuddhaṃ carantaḥ śyenavallaghu | bāḍhaṃ prayacchannecchāmi dīyatāmiti bhāṣiṇaḥ || 7.15.5 ||
tato devāḥ sagandharvā ṛṣayo brahmavādinaḥ | dṛṣṭvā tattumulaṃ yuddhaṃ paraṃ vismayamāgaman || 7.15.6 ||
yakṣāṇāṃ tu prahastena sahasraṃ nihataṃ raṇe | mahodareṇa cānindyaṃ sahasramaparaṃ hatam || 7.15.7 ||
kruddhena ca tadā rājanmārīcena yuyutsunā | nimeṣāntaramātreṇa dve sahasre nipātite || 7.15.8 ||
kva ca yakṣārjavaṃ yuddhaṃ kva ca māyābalāśrayam | rakṣasāṃ puruṣavyāghra tena te 'bhyadhikā yudhi || 7.15.9 ||
dhūmrākṣeṇa samāgamya māṇibhadro mahāraṇe | musalenorasi krodhāttaḍito na ca kampitaḥ || 7.15.10 ||
tato gadāṃ samāvidhya māṇibhadreṇa rākṣasaḥ | dhūmrākṣastāḍito mūrdhni vihvalaḥ sa papāta ha || 7.15.11 ||
dhūmrākṣaṃ tāḍitaṃ dṛṣṭvā patitaṃ śoṇitokṣitam | abhyadhāvata saṅgrāme māṇibhadraṃ daśānanaḥ || 7.15.12 ||
taṃ kruddhamabhidhāvantaṃ māṇibhadro daśānanam | śaktibhistāḍayāmāsa tisṛbhiryakṣapuṅgavaḥ || 7.15.13 ||
tāḍito māṇibhadrasya mukuṭe prāharadraṇe | tasya tena prahārema mukuṭaṃ pārśvamāgatam || 7.15.14 ||
tataḥ saṃyudhyamānena viṣṭabdho na vyakampata | tadāprabhṛti yakṣo 'sau pārśvamauliriti smṛtaḥ | sannādaḥ sumahānrājaṃstasminśaile 'bhyavartata || 7.15.15 ||
tato dūrātpradadṛśe dhanādhyakṣo gadādharaḥ | śukraprauṣṭhapadābhyāṃ ca padmaśaṅkhasamāvṛtaḥ || 7.15.16 ||
sa dṛṣṭvā bhrātaraṃ saṅkhye śāpādvibhraṣṭagauravam | uvāca vacanaṃ dhīmānyuktaṃ paitāmahe kule || 7.15.17 ||
yanmayā vāryamāṇastvaṃ nāvagacchasi durmate | paścādasya phalaṃ prāpya jñāsyase nirayaṃ gataḥ || 7.15.18 ||
yo hi mohādviṣaṃ pītvā nāvagacchati durmatiḥ | sa tasya pariṇāmānte jānīte karmaṇaḥ phalam || 7.15.19 ||
devatā nābhinandanti dharmayuktena kenacit | yena tvamīdṛśaṃ bhāvaṃ nītassannāvabuddhyase || 7.15.20 ||
mātaraṃ pitaraṃ yo hi ācāryaṃ cāvamanyate | sa paśyati phalaṃ tasya pretarājavaśaṃ gataḥ || 7.15.21 ||
adhruve hi śarīre yo na karoti taporjanam | sa paścāttapyate mūḍho mṛto dṛṣṭvā ' 'tmano gatim || 7.15.22 ||
dharmādrājyaṃ dhanaṃ saukhyamadharmādduḥkhameva ca | tasmāddharmaṃ sukhārthāya kuryātpāpaṃ visarjayet || 7.15.23 ||
pāpasya hi phalaṃ duḥkhaṃ tadbhoktavyamihātmanā | tasmādātmāpaghātārthaṃ mūḍhaḥ pāpaṃ kariṣyati || 7.15.24 ||
kasya cinna hi durbuddheśchandato jāyate matiḥ | devaṃ ceṣṭayate sarvaṃ hato daivena hanyate | yādṛśaṃ kurute karma tādṛśaṃ phalamaśnute || 7.15.25 ||
buddhirūpaṃ phalaṃ putrāñchauryaṃ dhīratvameva ca | prāpnuvanti narā loke nirjitaṃ puṇyakarmabhiḥ || 7.15.26 ||
evaṃ nirayagāmī tvaṃ yasya te matirīdṛśī | na tvāṃ samabhibhāṣiṣye 'sadvṛtteṣveva nirṇayaḥ || 7.15.27 ||
evamuktāstatastena tasyāmātyāḥ samāhatāḥ | mārīcapramukhāḥ sarve vimukhā vipradudruvuḥ || 7.15.28 ||
tatastena daśagrīvo yakṣendreṇa mahātmanā | gadayābhihato mūrdhni na ca sthānātprakampitaḥ || 7.15.29 ||
tatastau rāma nighnantau tadānyonyaṃ mahāmṛdhe | na vihvalau na ca śrāntau babhūvaturamarṣaṇau || 7.15.30 ||
āgneyamastraṃ tasmai sa mumoca dhanadastadā | rākṣasendro vāruṇena tadastraṃ pratyavārayat || 7.15.31 ||
tato māyāṃ praviṣṭo 'sau rākṣasīṃ rākṣaseśvaraḥ | rūpāṇāṃ śatasāhasraṃ vināśāya cakāra ca || 7.15.32 ||
vyāghro varāho jīmūtaḥ parvataḥ sāgaro drumaḥ | yakṣo daityasvarūpī ca so 'dṛśyata daśānanaḥ || 7.15.33 ||
bahūni ca karoti sma dṛśyante na tvasau tataḥ | pratigṛhya tato rāma mahadastraṃ daśānanaḥ || 7.15.34 ||
jaghāna mūrdhni dhanadaṃ vyāviddhya mahatīṃ gadām | evaṃ sa tenābhihato vihvalaḥ śoṇitokṣitaḥ || 7.15.35 ||
kṛttamūla ivāśoko nipapāta dhanādhipaḥ || 7.15.36 ||
tataḥ padmādibhistatra nidhibhiḥ sa tadā vṛtaḥ | dhanadocchvāsitastaistu vanamānīya nandanam || 7.15.37 ||
nirjitya rākṣasendrastaṃ dhanadaṃ hṛṣṭamānasaḥ | puṣpakaṃ tasya jagrāha vimānaṃ jayalakṣaṇam || 7.15.38 ||
kāñcanastambhasaṃvītaṃ vaiḍūryamaṇitoraṇam | muktājālapraticchannaṃ sarvakāmaphaladrumam || 7.15.39 ||
manojavaṃ kāmagamaṃ kāmarūpaṃ vihaṅgamam | maṇikāñcanasopānaṃ taptakāñcanavedikam || 7.15.40 ||
devopavāhyamakṣayyaṃ sadādṛṣṭimanaḥsukham | bahvāścaryaṃ bhakticitraṃ brahmaṇā parinirmitam || 7.15.41 ||
nirmitaṃ sarvakāmaistu manoharamanuttamam | na tu śītaṃ na coṣṇaṃ ca sarvartusukhadaṃ śubham || 7.15.42 ||
sa taṃ rājā samāruhya kāmagaṃ vīryanirjitam | jitaṃ tribhuvanaṃ mene darpotsekātsudurmatiḥ || 7.15.43 ||
jitvā vaiśravaṇaṃ devaṃ kailāsātsamavātarat || 7.15.44 ||
svatejasā vipulamavāpya taṃ jayaṃ pratāpavānvimalakirīṭahāravān | rarāja vai paramavimānamāsthito niśācaraḥ sadasi gato yathānalaḥ || 7.15.45 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe pañcadaśaḥ sargaḥ || 15 ||
sa jitvā dhanadaṃ rāma bhrātaraṃ rākṣasādhipaḥ | mahāsenaprasūtiṃ tadyayau śaravaṇaṃ mahat || 7.16.1 ||
athāpaśyadṛśagrīvo raukmaṃ śaravaṇaṃ mahat | gabhastijālasaṃvītaṃ dvitīyamiva bhāskaram || 7.16.2 ||
sa parvataṃ samāruhya kañcidramyavanāntaram | apaśyat puṣpakaṃ tatra rāmaviṣṭambhitaṃ tadā || 7.16.3 ||
viṣṭabdhaṃ puṣpakaṃ dṛṣṭvā hyagamaṃ kāmāgaṃ kṛtam | acintayadrākṣasendraḥ sacivaistaiḥ samāvṛtaḥ || 7.16.4 ||
kinnimittaṃ cecchayā me nedaṃ gacchati puṣpakam | parvatasyopariṣṭhasya karmedaṃ kasyacidbhavet || 7.16.5 ||
tato 'bravīttadā rāma mārīco buddhikovidaḥ | nedaṃ niṣkāraṇaṃ rājanpuṣpakaṃ yanna gacchati || 7.16.6 ||
athavā puṣpakamidaṃ dhanadānnānyavāhanam | ato niṣpandamabhavaddhanādhyakṣavinākṛtam || 7.16.7 ||
iti vākyāntare tasya karālaḥ kṛṣṇapiṅgalaḥ | vāmano vikaṭo muṇḍī nandī prahvabhujo balī || 7.16.8 ||
tataḥ pārśvamupāgamya bhavasyānucaro 'bravīt | nandīśvaro vacaścedaṃ rākṣasendramaśaṅkitaḥ || 7.16.9 ||
nivartasva daśagrīva śaile krīḍati śaṅkaraḥ | suparṇanāgayakṣāṇāṃ devagandharvarakṣasām || 7.16.10 ||
sarveṣāmeva bhūtānāmagamyaḥ parvataḥ kṛtaḥ | iti nandivacaḥ śrutvā krodhātkampitakuṇḍalaḥ || 7.16.11 ||
roṣāttu tāmranayanaḥ puṣpakādavaruhya saḥ | ko 'yaṃ śaṅkara ityuktvā śailamūlamupāgataḥ || 7.16.12 ||
so 'paśyannandinaṃ tatra devasyādūrataḥ sthitam | dīptaṃ śūlamavaṣṭabhya dvitīyamiva śaṅkaram || 7.16.13 ||
taṃ dṛṣṭvā vānaramukhamavajñāya sa rākṣasaḥ | prahāsaṃ mumuce tatra satoya iva toyadaḥ || 7.16.14 ||
taṃ kruddho bhagavānnandī śaṅkarasyāparā tanuḥ | abravīttatra tadrakṣo daśānanamupasthitam || 7.16.15 ||
yasmādvānararūpaṃ māmavajñāya daśānana | aśanīpātasaṅkāśamapahāsaṃ pramuktavān || 7.16.16 ||
tasmānmadrūpasampannā madvīryasamatejasaḥ | utpatsyanti vadhārthaṃ hi kulasya tava vānarāḥ || 7.16.17 ||
nakhadaṃṣṭrāyudhāḥ krūrā manaḥsampātaraṃhasaḥ | yuddhonmattā balodriktāḥ śailā iva visarpiṇaḥ || 7.16.18 ||
te tava prabalaṃ darpamutsedhaṃ ca pṛthagvidham | vyapaneṣyanti sambhūya sahāmātyasutasya ca || 7.16.19 ||
kiṃ tvidānīṃ mayā śakyaṃ hantuṃ tvāṃ he niśācara | na hantavyo hatastvaṃ hi pūrvameva svakarmabhiḥ || 7.16.20 ||
ityudīritavākye tu deve tasminmahātmani | devadundubhayo neduḥ puṣpavṛṣṭiśca khāccyutā || 7.16.21 ||
acintayitvā sa tadā nandivākyaṃ mahābalaḥ | parvataṃ tu samāsādya vākyamāha daśānanaḥ || 7.16.22 ||
puṣpakasya gatiśchinnā yatkṛte mama gacchataḥ | tamimaṃ śailamunmūlaṃ karomi tava gopate || 7.16.23 ||
kena prabhāveṇa bhavo nityaṃ krīḍati rājavat | vijñātavyaṃ na jānīte bhayasthānamupasthitam || 7.16.24 ||
evamuktvā tato rāma bhujānvikṣipya parvate | tolayāmāsa taṃ śīghraṃ sa śailaṃ samakampata || 7.16.25 ||
cālanātparvatasyaiva gaṇā devasya kampitāḥ | cacāla pārvatī cāpi tadā ' 'śliṣṭā maheśvaram || 7.16.26 ||
tato rāma mahādavo devānāṃ pravaro haraḥ | pādāṅguṣṭhena taṃ śailaṃ pīḍayāmāsa līlayā || 7.16.27 ||
pīḍitāstu tatastasya śailasyādhogatā bhujāḥ | vismitāścābhavaṃstatra sacivāstasya rakṣasaḥ || 7.16.28 ||
rakṣasā tena roṣācca bhujānāṃ pīḍanāttadā | mukto virāvaḥ sahasā trailokyaṃ yena kampitam || 7.16.29 ||
menire vajraniṣpeṣaṃ tasyāmātyā yugakṣaye | tadā vartmasthacalitā devā indrapurogamāḥ || 7.16.30 ||
samudrāścāpi saṅkṣubdhāścalitāścāpi parvatāḥ | yakṣā vidyādharāḥ siddhāḥ kimetaditi cābruvan || 7.16.31 ||
atha te mantriṇastasya vikrośantamathābruvan | toṣayasva mahādevaṃ nīlakaṇṭhamumāpatim || 7.16.32 ||
tamṛte śaraṇaṃ nānyaṃ paśyāmo 'tra daśānana | stutibhiḥ praṇato bhūtvā tameva śaraṇaṃ vraja || 7.16.33 ||
kṛpāluḥ śaṅkarastuṣṭaḥ prasādaṃ te vidhāsyati | evamuktastadāmātyaistuṣṭāva vṛṣabhadhvajam || 7.16.34 ||
sāmabhirvividhaiḥ stotraiḥ praṇamya sa daśānanaḥ | saṃvatsarasahasraṃ tu rudato rakṣaso gatam || 7.16.35 ||
tataḥ prīto mahādevaḥ śailāgre viṣṭhitaḥ prabhuḥ | muktvā cāsya bhujānrāma prāha vākyaṃ daśānanam || 7.16.36 ||
prīto 'smi tava vīryasya śauṇḍāryācca daśānana | śailākrāntena yo muktastvayā rāvaḥ sudāruṇaḥ || 7.16.37 ||
yasmāllokatrayaṃ caitadrāvitaṃ bhayamāgatam | tasmāttvaṃ rāvaṇo nāma nāmnā rājanbhaviṣyasi || 7.16.38 ||
devatā mānuṣā yakṣā ye cānye jagatītale | evaṃ tvāmabhidhāsyanti rāvaṇaṃ lokarāvaṇam || 7.16.39 ||
gaccha paulastya visrabdhaṃ pathā yena tvamicchasi | mayā caivābhyanujñāto rākṣasādhipa gamyatām || 7.16.40 ||
evamuktastu laṅkeśaḥ śambhunā svayamabravīt | prīto yadi mahādeva varaṃ me dehi yācataḥ || 7.16.41 ||
avadhyatvaṃ mayā prāptaṃ devagandharvadānavaiḥ | rākṣasairguhyakairnāgairye cānye balavattarāḥ || 7.16.42 ||
mānuṣānna gaṇe deva svalpāste mama sammatāḥ | dīrghamāyuśca me prāptaṃ brahmaṇastripurāntaka || 7.16.43 ||
vāñchitaṃ cāyuṣaḥ śeṣaṃ śastraṃ tvaṃ ca prayaccha me | evamuktastatastena rāvaṇena sa śaṅkaraḥ || 7.16.44 ||
dadau khaḍgaṃ mahādīptaṃ candrahāsamiti śrutam | āyuṣaścāvaśeṣaṃ ca sthitvā bhūtapatistadā || 7.16.45 ||
dattvovāca tataḥ śambhurnāvajñeyamidaṃ tvayā | avajñātaṃ yadi hi te māmevaiṣyatyasaṃśayaḥ || 7.16.46 ||
evaṃ maheśvareṇaiva kṛtanāmā sa rāvaṇaḥ | abhivādya mahādevamārurohātha puṣpakam || 7.16.47 ||
tato mahītale rāma paryakrāmata rāvaṇaḥ | kṣatऺ्itrayānsumahāvīryānbādhamāna itastataḥ || 7.16.48 ||
kecittejasvinaḥ śūrāḥ kṣatऺ्itrayā yuddhadurmadāḥ | tacchāsanamakurvanto vineśuḥ saparicchadāḥ || 7.16.49 ||
apare durjayaṃ rakṣo jānantaḥ prājñasammatāḥ | jitāḥ sma ityabhāṣanta rākṣasaṃ baladarpitam || 7.16.50 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe ṣoḍaśaḥ sargaḥ || 16 ||
atha rājanmahābāhurvicaransa mahītale | himavadvanamāsādya paricakrāma rāvaṇaḥ || 7.17.1 ||
tatrāpaśyatsa vai kanyāṃ kṛṣṇājinajaṭādharām | ārṣeṇa vidhinā yuktāṃ dīpyantīṃ devatāmiva || 7.17.2 ||
sa dṛṣṭvā rūpasampannāṃ kanyāṃ tāṃ sumahāvratām | kāmamohaparītātmā papraccha prahasanniva || 7.17.3 ||
kimidaṃ vartase bhadre viruddhaṃ yauvanasya te | nahi yuktā tavaitasya rūpasyaiva pratikriyā || 7.17.4 ||
rūpaṃ te 'nupamaṃ bhīru kāmonmādakaraṃ nṛṇām | na yuktaṃ tapasi sthātuṃ nirgato hyeṣa nirṇayaḥ || 7.17.5 ||
kasyāsi kimidaṃ bhadre kaśca bhartā varānane | yena sambhujyase bhīru sa naraḥ puṇyabhāgbhuvi || 7.17.6 ||
pṛcchataḥ śaṃsa me sarvaṃ kasya hetoḥ pariśramaḥ | evamuktā tu sā kanyā rāvaṇena yaśasvinī || 7.17.7 ||
kuśadhvajo mama pitā brahmarṣiramitaprabhaḥ | bṛhaspatisutaḥ śrīmānbuddhyā tulyo bṛhaspateḥ || 7.17.8 ||
tasyāhaṃ kurvato nityaṃ vedābhyāsaṃ mahātmanaḥ | sambhūya vāṅmayī kanyā nāmnā vedavatī smṛtā || 7.17.9 ||
tato devāḥ sagandharvā yakṣarākṣasapannagāḥ | te 'pi gatvā hi pitaraṃ varaṇaṃ rocayanti me || 7.17.10 ||
na ca māṃ sa pitā tebhyo dattavānrākṣasarṣabha | kāraṇaṃ tadvadiṣyāmi niśācara niśāmaya || 7.17.11 ||
pitustu mama jāmātā viṣṇuḥ kila sureśvaraḥ | abhipretastrilokeśastasmānnānyasya me pitā || 7.17.12 ||
dātumicchati tasmai tu tacchrutvā baladarpitaḥ | dambhurnāma tato rājā daityānāṃ kupito 'bhavat || 7.17.13 ||
tena rātrau śayāno me pitā pāpena hiṃsitaḥ || 7.17.14 ||
tato me jananī dīnā taccharīraṃ piturmama | pariṣvajya mahābhāgā praviṣṭā havyavāhanam || 7.17.15 ||
tato manorathaṃ satyaṃ piturnārāyaṇaṃ prati | karomīti tamevāhaṃ hṛdayena samudvahe || 7.17.16 ||
iti pratijñāmāruhya carāmi vipulaṃ tapaḥ | etatte sarvamākhyātaṃ mayā rākṣasapuṅgava || 7.17.17 ||
nārāyaṇo mama patirna tvanyaḥ puruṣottamāt | āśraye niyamaṃ ghoraṃ nārāyaṇaparīpsayā | vijñātastvaṃ hi me rājangaccha paulastyanandana || 7.17.18 ||
jānāmi tapasā sarvaṃ trailokye yaddhi vartate || 7.17.19 ||
so 'bravīdrāvaṇo bhūyastāṃ kanyāṃ sumahāvratām | avaruhya vimānāgrātkandarpaśarapīḍitaḥ || 7.17.20 ||
avaliptā 'si suśroṇi yasyāste matirīdṛśī | vṛddhānāṃ mṛgaśāvākṣi bhrājate puṇyasañcayaḥ || 7.17.21 ||
tvaṃ sarvaṃguṇasampannā nārhase vaktumīdṛśam | trailokyasundarī bhīru yauvanaṃ te nivartate || 7.17.22 ||
ahaṃ laṅkāpatirbhadre daśagrīva iti śrutaḥ | tasya me bhava bhāryā tvaṃ bhuṅkṣva bhogānyathāsukham || 7.17.23 ||
kaśca tāvadasau yaṃ tvaṃ viṣṇurityabhibhāṣase | vīryeṇa tapasā caiva bhogena ca balena ca ||
na mayā sa samo bhadre yaṃ tvaṃ kāmayase 'ṅgane || 7.17.24 ||
ityuktavati tasmiṃstu vedavatyatha sā 'bravīt || 7.17.25 ||
vai bhogena ca balena ca || mā maivamiti sā kanyā tamuvāca niśācaram | trailokyādhipati viṣṇuṃ sarvalokanamaskṛtam | tvadṛte rākṣasendrānyaḥ ko 'vamanyeta buddhimān || 7.17.26 ||
evamuktastayā tatra vedavatyā niśācaraḥ | mūrdhajeṣu tadā kanyāṃ karāgreṇa parāmṛśat || 7.17.27 ||
tato vedavatī kruddhā keśānhastena sā 'cchinat | asirbhūtvā karastasyāḥ keśāṃśchinnāṃstadā 'karot || 7.17.28 ||
sā jvalantīva roṣeṇa dahantīva niśācaram | uvācāgniṃ samādhāya maraṇāya kṛtatvarā || 7.17.29 ||
dharṣitāyāstvayānārya na me jīvitamiṣyate | rakṣastasmātpravekṣyāmi paśyataste hutāśanam || 7.17.30 ||
yasmāttu dharṣitā cāhaṃ tvayā pāpātmanā vane | tasmāttava vadhārthaṃ hi samutpatsye hyahaṃ punaḥ || 7.17.31 ||
na hi śakyaṃ striyā hantuṃ puruṣaḥ pāpaniścaḥ | śāpe tvayi mayotsṛṣṭe tapasaśca vyayo bhavet || 7.17.32 ||
yadi tvasti mayā kiñcitkṛtaṃ dattaṃ hutaṃ tathā | tasmāttvayonijā sādhvī bhaveyaṃ dharmiṇaḥ sutā || 7.17.33 ||
evamuktvā praviṣṭā sā jvalitaṃ jātavedasam | papāta ca divo divyā puṣpavṛṣṭiḥ samantataḥ || 7.17.34 ||
punareva samudbhūtā padme padmasamaprabhā | tasmādapi punaḥ prāptā pūrvavattena rakṣasā || 7.17.35 ||
kanyāṃ kamalagarbhābhāṃ pragṛhya svagṛhaṃ yayau | pragṛhya rāvaṇastvetāṃ darśayāmāsa mantriṇe || 7.17.36 ||
lakṣaṇajño nirīkṣyaiva rāvaṇaṃ caivamabravīt | gṛhasthaiṣāṃ hi suśroṇī tvadvadhāyaiva dṛśyate || 7.17.37 ||
etacchrutvā 'rṇave rāma tāṃ pracikṣepa rāvaṇaḥ | sā caiva kṣitimāsādya yajñāyatanamadhyagā || 7.17.38 ||
rājño halamukhotkṛṣṭā punarapyutthitā satī | saiṣā janakarājasya prasūtā tanayā prabho | tava bhāryā mahābāho viṣṇustvaṃ hi sanātanaḥ || 7.17.39 ||
pūrvaṃ krodhāhitaḥ śatruryayā 'sau nihatastathā | upāśrayitvā śailabhastava vīryamamānuṣam || 7.17.40 ||
evameṣā mahābhāgā martyeṣūtpatsyate punaḥ | kṣetre halamukhotkṛṣṭe vedyāmagniśikhopamā || 7.17.41 ||
eṣā vedavatī nāma pūrvamāsītkṛte yuge | tretāyugamanuprāpya vadhārthaṃ tasya rakṣasaḥ || 7.17.42 ||
utpannā maithilakule janakasya mahātmanaḥ | sītotpannā tu sīteti mānuṣaiḥ punarucyate || 7.17.43 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe saptadaśaḥ sargaḥ || 17 ||
praviṣṭāyāṃ hutāśaṃ tu vedavatyāṃ sa rāvaṇaḥ | puṣpakaṃ tu samāruhya paricakrāma medinīm || 7.18.1 ||
tato maruttaṃ nṛpatiṃ yajantaṃ saha daivataiḥ | uśīrabījamāsādya dadarśa sa tu rāvaṇaḥ || 7.18.2 ||
saṃvarto nāma brahmarṣiḥ sākṣādbhrātā bṛhaspateḥ | yājayāmāsa dharmajñaḥ sarvairdevagaṇairvṛtaḥ || 7.18.3 ||
dṛṣṭvā devāstu tadrakṣo varadānena durjayam | tiryagyoniṃ samāviṣṭāstasya darśanabhīravaḥ || 7.18.4 ||
indro mayūraḥ saṃvṛtto dharmarājastu vāyasaḥ | kṛkalāso dhanādhyakṣo haṃsaśca varuṇo 'bhavat || 7.18.5 ||
anyeṣvapi gateṣvevaṃ deveṣvariniṣūdana | rāvaṇaḥ prāviśadyajñaṃ sārameya ivāśuciḥ || 7.18.6 ||
taṃ ca rājānamāsādya rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ | prāha yuddhaṃ prayaccheti nirjito 'smīti vā vada || 7.18.7 ||
tato marutto nṛpatiḥ ko bhavānityuvāca tam | apahāsaṃ tato muktvā rāvaṇo vākyamabravīt || 7.18.8 ||
akutūhalabhāvena prīto 'smi tava pārthiva | dhanadasyānujaṃ yo māṃ nāvagacchasi rāvaṇam || 7.18.9 ||
