triṣu lokeṣu ko 'nyo 'sti yo na jānāti me balam | bhrātaraṃ yena nirjitya vimānamidamāhṛtam | tato maruttaḥ sa nṛpastaṃ rāvaṇamathābravīt || 7.18.10 ||
dhanyaḥ khalu bhavānyena jyeṣṭho bhrātā raṇe jitaḥ | na tvayā sadṛśaḥ ślādhyastriṣu lokeṣu vidyate || 7.18.11 ||
nādharmasahitaṃ ślādhyaṃ tallokaṃ pratisaṃhitam | karma daurātmyakaṃ kṛtvā ślāghyase bhrātṛnirjayāt || 7.18.12 ||
ka tvaṃ prākkevalaṃ dharmaṃ caritvā labdhavānvaram | śrūtapūrvaṃ hi na mayā bhāṣase yādṛśaṃ svayam || 7.18.13 ||
tiṣṭhedānīṃ na me jīvanpratiyāsyasi durmate | adya tvāṃ niśitairbāṇaiḥ preṣayāmi yamakṣayam || 7.18.14 ||
tataḥ śarāsanaṃ gṛhya sāyakāṃśca narādhipaḥ | raṇāya niryayau kruddhaḥ saṃvarto mārgamāvṛṇot || 7.18.15 ||
so 'bravītsnehasaṃyuktaṃ maruttaṃ taṃ mahānṛṣiḥ | śrotavyaṃ yadi madvākyaṃ samprahāro na te kṣamaḥ || 7.18.16 ||
māheśvaramidaṃ satramasamāptaṃ kulaṃ dahet || 7.18.17 ||
dīkṣitasya kuto yuddhaṃ krodhitvaṃ dīkṣite kutaḥ | saṃśayaśca jaye nityaṃ rākṣasaśca sudurjayaḥ || 7.18.18 ||
sa nivṛtto gurorvākyānmaruttaḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ | visṛjya saśaraṃ cāpaṃ svastho makhamukho 'bhavat || 7.18.19 ||
tatastaṃ nirjitaṃ matvā ghoṣayāmāsa vai śukaḥ | rāvaṇo jayatītyuccairharṣānnādaṃ vimuktavān || 7.18.20 ||
tānbhakṣayitvā tatrasthānmaharṣīnyajñamāgatān | vitṛpto rudhiraisteṣāṃ punaḥ samprayayau mahīm || 7.18.21 ||
rāvaṇe tu gate devāḥ sendrāścaiva divaukasaḥ | tataḥ svāṃ yonimāsādya tāni sattvāni cābruvan || 7.18.22 ||
harṣāttadābravīdindro mayūraṃ nīlabarhiṇam | prīto 'smi tava dharmajña bhujaṅgāddhi na te bhayam || 7.18.23 ||
idaṃ netrasahasraṃ tu yattvadbarhe bhaviṣyati | varṣamāṇe mayi mudaṃ prāpsyase prītilakṣaṇām | evamindro varaṃ prādānmayūrasya sureśvaraḥ || 7.18.24 ||
nīlāḥ kila purā barhā mayūrāṇāṃ narādhipa | surādhipādvaraṃ prāpya gatāḥ sarve 'pi barhiṇaḥ || 7.18.25 ||
dharmarājo 'bravīdrāma prāgvaṃśe vāyasaṃ sthitam | pakṣiṃstavāsmi suprītaḥ prītasya vacanaṃ śṛṇu || 7.18.26 ||
yathānye vividhai rogai; pīḍyante prāṇino mayā | te na te prabhaviṣyanti mayi prīte na saṃśayaḥ || 7.18.27 ||
mṛtyutaste bhayaṃ nāsti varānmama vihaṅgama | yāvattvāṃ na vadhiṣyanti narāstāvadbhaviṣyasi || 7.18.28 ||
ete madviṣayasthā vai mānavāḥ kṣudbhayārditāḥ | tvayi bhukte tu tṛptāste bhaviṣyanti sabāndhavāḥ || 7.18.29 ||
varuṇastvabravīddhaṃsaṃ gaṅgātoyavihāriṇam | śrūyatāṃ prītisaṃyuktaṃ vacaḥ patraratheśvara || 7.18.30 ||
varṇo manoharaḥ saumyaścandramaṇḍalasannibhaḥ | bhaviṣyati tavodagraḥ śuddhaphenasamaprabhaḥ || 7.18.31 ||
maccharīraṃ samāsādya kānto nityaṃ bhaviṣyasi | prāpsyase cātulāṃ prītimetanme prītilakṣaṇam || 7.18.32 ||
haṃsānāṃ hi purā rāma nīlavarṇaḥ sapāṇḍuraḥ | pakṣā nīlāgrasaṃvītāḥ kroḍāḥ śaṣpāgranirmalāḥ || 7.18.33 ||
athābravīdvaiśravaṇaḥ kṛkalāsaṃ girau sthitam | hairaṇyaṃ samprayacchāmi varṇaṃ prītastavāpyaham || 7.18.34 ||
sadravyaṃ ca śiro nityaṃ bhaviṣyati tavākṣayam | eṣa kāñcanako varṇo matprītyā te bhaviṣyati || 7.18.35 ||
evaṃ dattvā varāṃstebhyastasminyajñotsave surāḥ | nivṛttāḥ saha rājñā te punaḥ svabhavanaṃ gatāḥ || 7.18.36 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe 'ṣṭādaśaḥ sargaḥ || 18 ||
atha jitvā maruttaṃ sa prayayau rākṣasādhipaḥ | nagarāṇi narendrāṇāṃ yuddhakāṅkṣī daśānanaḥ || 7.19.1 ||
samāsādya tu rājendrānmahendravaruṇopamān | abravīdrākṣasendrastu yuddhaṃ me dīyatāmiti || 7.19.2 ||
nirjitāḥ smeti vā brūta eṣa me hi suniścayaḥ | anyathā kurvatāmevaṃ mokṣo naivopapadyate || 7.19.3 ||
tatastvabhīravaḥ prājñāḥ pārthivā dharmaniścayāḥ | mantrayitvā tato 'nyonyaṃ rājānaḥ sumahābalāḥ | nirjitāḥ smetyabhāṣanta jñātvā varabalaṃ ripoḥ || 7.19.4 ||
duṣyantaḥ suratho gādhirgayo rājā purūravāḥ | ete sarve 'bruvaṃstāta nirjitāḥ smeti pārthivāḥ || 7.19.5 ||
athāyodhyāṃ samāsādya rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ || 7.19.6 ||
suguptāmanaraṇyena śakreṇevāmarāvatīm | sa taṃ puruṣaśārdūlaṃ purandarasamaṃ bale || 7.19.7 ||
prāha rājānamāsādya yuddhaṃ dehīti rāvaṇaḥ | nirjito 'smīti vā brūhi tvamevaṃ mama śāsanam || 7.19.8 ||
ayodhyādhipatistasya śrutvā pāpātmano vacaḥ | anaraṇyastu saṅkruddho rākṣasendramathābravīt || 7.19.9 ||
dīyate dvandvayuddhaṃ te rākṣasādhipate mayā | santiṣṭha kṣipramāyatto bhava caivaṃ bhavāmyaham || 7.19.10 ||
atha pūrvaṃ śrutārthena nirjitaṃ sumahadbalam | niṣkrāmattannarendrasya balaṃ rakṣovadhodyatam || 7.19.11 ||
nāgānāṃ daśasāhasraṃ vājināṃ niyutaṃ tathā | rathānāṃ bahusāhasraṃ pattīnāṃ ca narottama || 7.19.12 ||
mahīṃ sañchādya niṣkrāntaṃ sapadātirathaṃ raṇe | tataḥ pravṛttaṃ sumahadyuddhaṃ yuddhaviśārada || 7.19.13 ||
anaraṇyasya nṛpate rākṣasendrasya cādbhutam | tadrāvaṇabalaṃ prāpya balaṃ tasya mahīpateḥ || 7.19.14 ||
prāṇaśyata tadā sarvaṃ havyaṃ hutamivānale | yuddhvā ca suciraṃ kālaṃ kṛtvā vikramamuttamam || 7.19.15 ||
prajvalantaṃ tamāsādya kṣipramevāvaśeṣitam | prāviśatsaṅkulaṃ tatra śalabhā iva pāvakam | naśyati sma balaṃ tatra havyaṃ hutamivānale || 7.19.16 ||
so 'paśyattannarendrastu naśyamānaṃ mahābalam | mahārṇavaṃ samāsādya vanāpagaśataṃ yathā || 7.19.17 ||
tataḥ śakradhanuḥprakhyaṃ dhanurvisphārayansvayam | āsasāda narendrastaṃ rāvaṇaṃ krodhamūrcchitaḥ || 7.19.18 ||
anaraṇyena te 'mātyā mārīcaśukasāraṇāḥ | prahastasahitā bhagnā vyadravanta mṛgā iva || 7.19.19 ||
tato bāṇaśatānyaṣṭau pātayāmāsa mūrdhani | tasya rākṣasarājasya ikṣvākukulanandanaḥ || 7.19.20 ||
tasya bāṇāḥ patantaste cakrire na kṣataṃ kvacit | vāridhārā ivābhrebhyaḥ patantyo girimūrdhani || 7.19.21 ||
tato rākṣasarājena kruddhena nṛpatistadā | talenābhihato mūrdhni sa rathānnipapāta ha || 7.19.22 ||
sa rājā patito bhūmau vihvalāṅgaḥ pravepitaḥ | vajradagdha ivāraṇye sālo nipatito yathā || 7.19.23 ||
taṃ prahasyābravīddrakṣa ikṣvākuṃ pṛthivīpatim | kimidānīṃ phalaṃ prāptaṃ tvayā māṃ prati yuddhyatā || 7.19.24 ||
trailokye nāsti yo dvandvaṃ mama dadyānnarādhipa | śaṅke prasakto bhogeṣu na śṛṇoṣi balaṃ mama || 7.19.25 ||
tasyaivaṃ bruvato rājā mandāsurvākyamabravīt | kiṃ śakyamiha kartuṃ vai kālo hi duratikramaḥ || 7.19.26 ||
nahyahaṃ nirjito rakṣastvayā cātmapraśaṃsinā | kālenaiva vipanno 'haṃ hetubhūtastu me bhavān || 7.19.27 ||
kiṃ tvidānīṃ mayā śakyaṃ kartuṃ prāṇaparikṣaye | nahyahaṃ vimukhī rakṣo yudhyamānastvayā hataḥ || 7.19.28 ||
ikṣvākuparibhāvitvādvaco vakṣyāmi rākṣasa | yadi dattaṃ yadi hutaṃ yadi me sukṛtaṃ tapaḥ || yadi guptāḥ prajāḥ samyaktadā satyaṃ vaco 'stu me || 7.19.29 ||
utpatsyate kule hyasminnikṣvākūṇāṃ mahātmanām | rāmo dāśarathirnāma yaste prāṇānhariṣyati || 7.19.30 ||
tato jaladharodagrastāḍito devadundubhiḥ | tasminnudāhṛte śāpe puṣpavṛṣṭiśca khāccyutā || 7.19.31 ||
tataḥ sa rājā rājendra gataḥ sthānaṃ triviṣṭapam | svargate ca nṛpe tasminrākṣasaḥ so 'pasarpata || 7.19.32 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe ekonaviṃśaḥ sargaḥ || 19 ||
tato vitrāsayanmartyānpṛthivyāṃ rākṣasādhipaḥ | āsasāda ghane tasminnāradaṃ munipuṅgavam || 7.20.1 ||
tasyābhivādanaṃ kṛtvā daśagrīvo niśācaraḥ | abravītkuśalaṃ pṛṣṭvā hetumāgamanasya ca || 7.20.2 ||
nāradastu mahātejā devarṣiramitaprabhaḥ | abravīnmeghapṛṣṭhastho rāvaṇaṃ puṣpake sthitam || 7.20.3 ||
rākṣasādhipate saumya tiṣṭha viśravasaḥ suta | prīto 'smyabhijanopetavikramairūrjitaistava || 7.20.4 ||
viṣṇunā daityaghātaiśca gandharvoragadharṣaṇaiḥ | tvayā samaṃ vimardaiśca bhṛśaṃ hi paritoṣitaḥ || 7.20.5 ||
kiṃcidvakṣyāmi tāvatte śrotavyaṃ śroṣyase yadi | śrutvā cānantaraṃ kāryaṃ tvayā rākṣasasattama | tanme nigadatastāta samādhiṃ śravaṇe kuru || 7.20.6 ||
kimayaṃ vadhyate tāta tvayā 'vadhyena daivataiḥ | hata eva hyayaṃ loko yadā mṛtyuvaśaṃ gataḥ || 7.20.7 || ्tama |
devadānavadaityānāṃ yakṣagandharvarakṣasām | avadhyena tvayā lokaḥ kleṣṭuṃ yukto na mānuṣaḥ || 7.20.8 ||
nityaṃ śreyasi sammūḍhaṃ mahadbhirvyasanairvṛtam | hanyātkastādṛśaṃ lokaṃ jarāvyādhiśatairyutam || 7.20.9 ||
taistairaniṣṭopagamairajasraṃ yatra kutra kaḥ | matimānmānuṣe loke yuddhena praṇayī bhavet || 7.20.10 ||
kṣīyamāṇaṃ daivahataṃ śrutpipāsājarādibhiḥ | viṣādaśokasammūḍhaṃ lokaṃ tvaṃ kṣapayasva mā || 7.20.11 ||
paśya tāvanmahābāho rākṣaseśvara mānuṣam | mūḍhamevaṃ vicitrārthaṃ yasya na jñāyate gatiḥ || 7.20.12 ||
kvacidvāditranṛtyādi sevyate muditairjanaiḥ | rudyate cāparairārtairdhārāśrunayanānanaiḥ || 7.20.13 ||
mātāpitṛsutasnehairbhāryābandhumanoramaiḥ | mohito 'yaṃ jano dhvastaḥ kleśaṃ svaṃ nāvabudhyate || 7.20.14 ||
alamenaṃ parikliśya lokaṃ mohanirākṛtam | jita eva tvayā saumya martyaloko na saṃśayaḥ || 7.20.15 ||
avaśyamebhiḥ sarvaiśca gantavyaṃ yamasādanam | tannigṛhṇīṣva paulastya yamaṃ parapurañjaya || 7.20.16 ||
tasmiñjite jitaṃ sarvaṃ bhavatyeva na saṃśayaḥ | evamuktastu laṅkeśo dīpyamānaṃ svatejasā | abravīnnāradaṃ tatra samprahasyābhivādya ca || 7.20.17 ||
maharṣe devagandharvavihāra samarapriya | ahaṃ samudyato gantuṃ vijayārthaṃ rasātalam || 7.20.18 ||
tato lokatrayaṃ jitvā sthāpya nāgānsurānvaśe | samudramamṛtārthaṃ ca mathiṣyāmi rasālayam || 7.20.19 ||
athābravīdṛśagrīvaṃ nārado bhagavānṛṣiḥ | kva khalvidānīṃ mārgeṇa tvayā hyanyena gamyate || 7.20.20 ||
ayaṃ khalu sudurgamyaḥ pretarājapuraṃ prati | mārgo gacchati durdharṣo yamasyāmitrakarśana || 7.20.21 ||
sa tu śāradameghābhaṃ hāsaṃ muktvā daśānanaḥ | uvāca kṛtamityeva vacanaṃ cedamabravīt || 7.20.22 ||
tasmādevamahaṃ brahman vaivasvatavadhodyataḥ | gacchāmi dakṣiṇāmāśāṃ yatra sūryātmajo nṛpaḥ || 7.20.23 ||
mayā hi bhagavankrodhātpratijñātaṃ raṇārthinā | avajeṣyāmi caturo lokapālāniti prabho || 7.20.24 ||
tadiha prasthito 'haṃ vai pretarājapuraṃ prati | prāṇisaṅkleśakartāraṃ yojayiṣyāmi mṛtyunā || 7.20.25 ||
evamuktvā daśagrīvo muniṃ tamabhivādya ca | prayayau dakṣiṇāmāśāṃ praviṣṭaḥ saha mantribhiḥ || 7.20.26 ||
nāradastu mahātejā muhūrtaṃ dhyānamāsthitaḥ | cintayāmāsa viprendro vidhūma iva pāvakaḥ || 7.20.27 ||
yena lokāstrayaḥ sendrāḥ kliśyante sacarācarāḥ | kṣīṇe cāyuṣi dharmeṇa sa kālo jeṣyate katham || 7.20.28 ||
svadattakṛtasākṣī yo dvitīya iva pāvakaḥ | labdhasañjñā vijeṣyante lokā yasya mahātmanaḥ || 7.20.29 ||
yasya nityaṃ trayo lokā vidravanti bhayārditāḥ | taṃ kathaṃ rākṣasendro 'sau svayameva gamiṣyati || 7.20.30 ||
yo vidhātā ca dhātā ca sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ tathā | trailokyaṃ vijitaṃ yena taṃ kathaṃ vijayiṣyate || 7.20.31 ||
aparaṃ kintu kṛtvāyaṃ vidhānaṃ saṃvidhāsyati | kautūhalasamutpanno yāsyāmi yamasādanam || 7.20.32 ||
vimardaṃ draṣṭumanayoryamarākṣasayoḥ svayam || 7.20.33 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe viṃśaḥ sargaḥ || 20 ||
evaṃ sañcintya viprendo jagāma laghuvikramaḥ | ākhyātuṃ tadyathāvṛttaṃ yamasya sadanaṃ prati || 7.21.1 ||
apaśyatsa yamaṃ tatra devamagnipuraskṛtam | vidhānamupatiṣṭhantaṃ prāṇino yasya yādṛśam || 7.21.2 ||
sa tu dṛṣṭvā yamaḥ prāptaṃ maharṣiṃ tatra nāradam | abravītsukhamāsīnamarghyamāvedya dharmataḥ || 7.21.3 ||
kaccitkṣemaṃ tu devarṣe kacciddharmo na naśyati | kimāgamanakṛtyaṃ te devagandharvasevita || 7.21.4 ||
abravīttu tadā vākyaṃ nārado bhagavānṛṣiḥ | śrūyatāmabhidhāsyāmi vidhānaṃ ca vidhīyatām || 7.21.5 ||
eṣa nāmno daśagrīvaḥ pitṛrāja niśācaraḥ | upayāti vaśaṃ netuṃ vikramaistvāṃ sudurjayam || 7.21.6 ||
etena kāraṇenāhaṃ tvarito hyāgataḥ prabho | daṇḍapraharaṇasyādya tava kiṃ nu bhaviṣyati || 7.21.7 ||
etasminnantare durādaṃśumantamivoditam | dadṛśurdīptamāyāntaṃ vimānaṃ tasya rakṣasaḥ || 7.21.8 ||
taṃ deśaṃ prabhayā tasya puṣpakasya mahābalaḥ | kṛtvā vitimiraṃ sarvaṃ samīpaṃ so 'bhyavartata || 7.21.9 ||
so 'paśyatsa mahābāhurdaśagrīvastatastataḥ | prāṇinaḥ sukṛtaṃ karma bhuñjānāṃścaiva duṣkṛtam || 7.21.10 ||
apaśyatsainikāṃścāsya yamasyānucaraiḥ saha | yamasya puruṣairugrairghorarūpairbhayānakaiḥ || 7.21.11 ||
dadarśa vadhyamānāṃśca kliśyamānāṃśca dehinaḥ | krośataśca mahānādaṃ tīvraniṣṭanatatparān || 7.21.12 ||
kṛmibhirbhakṣyamāṇāṃśca sārameyaiśca dāruṇaiḥ || 7.21.13 ||
kṣotrāyāsakarā vāco vadataśca bhayāvahāḥ | santāryamāṇānvaitaraṇīṃ bahuśaḥ śoṇitodakām || 7.21.14 ||
vālukāsu ca taptāsu tapyamānānmuhūrmuhuḥ | asipatravane caiva bhidyamānānadhārmikān || 7.21.15 ||
raurave kṣāranadyāṃ ca kṣuradhārāsu caiva hi | pānīyaṃ yācamānāṃśca tṛṣitānkṣudhitānapi || 7.21.16 ||
śavabhūtānkṛśāndīnānvivarṇānmuktamūrdhajān | malapaṅkadharāndīnānrūkṣāṃśca paridhāvataḥ || 7.21.17 ||
dadarśa rāvaṇo mārge śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ | kāṃścicca gṛhamukhyeṣu gītavāditraniḥsvanaiḥ | pramodamānānadrākṣīdrāvaṇaḥ sukṛtaiḥ svakaiḥ || 7.21.18 ||
gaurasaṃ gopradātāro hyannaṃ caivānnadāyinaḥ | gṛhāṃśca gṛhadātāraḥ svakarmaphalamaśnataḥ || 7.21.19 ||
suvarṇamaṇimuktābhiḥ pramadābhiralaṅkṛtān || 7.21.20 ||
dhārmikānaparāṃstatra dīpyamānānsvatejasā | dadarśa sumahābāhū rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ || 7.21.21 ||
tatastānbhidyamānāṃśca karmabhirduṣkṛtaiḥ svakaiḥ | rāvaṇo mocayāmāsa vikrameṇa balādbalī || 7.21.22 ||
prāṇino mocitāstena daśagrīveṇa rakṣasā | sukhamāpurmuhūrtaṃ te hyatarkitamacintitam || 7.21.23 ||
preteṣu mucyamāneṣu rākṣasena mahīyasā | pretagopāḥ susaṅkruddhā rākṣasendramabhidravan || 7.21.24 ||
tato halahalāśabdaḥ sarvadigbhyaḥ samutthitaḥ | dharmarājasya yodhānāṃ śūrāṇāṃ sampradhāvatām || 7.21.25 ||
te prāsaiḥ parighaiḥ śūlairmusalaiḥ śaktitomaraiḥ | puṣpakaṃ samavarṣanta śūrāḥ śatasahasraśaḥ || 7.21.26 ||
tasyāsanāni prāsādānvedikāstoraṇāni ca | puṣpakasya babhañjuste śīghraṃ madhukarā iva || 7.21.27 ||
devaniṣṭhānabhūtaṃ tadvimānaṃ puṣpakaṃ mṛdhe | bhajyamānaṃ tathaivāsīdakṣayaṃ brahmatejasā || 7.21.28 ||
asaṅkhyā sumahatyāsīttasya senā mahātmanaḥ | śūrāṇāmagrayāta'ṇāṃ sahasrāṇi śatāni ca || 7.21.29 ||
tato vṛkṣaiśca śailaiśca prāsādānāṃ śataistathā | tataste sacivāstasya yathākāmaṃ yathābalam | ayudhyanta mahāvīrāḥ sa ca rājā daśānanaḥ || 7.21.30 ||
te tu śoṇitadigdhāṅgāḥ sarvaśastrasamāhatāḥ | amātyā rākṣasendrasya cakrurāyodhanaṃ mahat || 7.21.31 ||
anyonyaṃ te mahābhāgā jaghnuḥ praharaṇairbhṛśam | yamasya ca mahābāho rāvaṇasya ca mantriṇaḥ || 7.21.32 ||
amātyāṃstāṃstu santyajya yamayodhā mahābalāḥ | tameva cābhyadhāvanta śūlavarṣairdaśānanam || 7.21.33 ||
tataḥ śoṇitadigdhāṅgaḥ prahārairjarjarīkṛtaḥ | phullāśoka ivābhāti puṣpake rākṣasādhipaḥ || 7.21.34 ||
sa tu śūlagadāpāsāñchaktitomarasāyakān | musalāni śilāvṛkṣānmumocāstrabalādbalī || 7.21.35 ||
tarūṇāṃ ca śilānāṃ ca śastrāṇāṃ cātidāruṇam | yamasainyeṣu tadvarṣaṃ papāta dharaṇītale || 7.21.36 ||
tāṃstu sarvānvinirbhidya tadastramapahatya ca | jaghnuste rākṣasaṃ ghoramekaṃ śatasahasraśaḥ || 7.21.37 ||
parivārya ca taṃ sarve śailaṃ moghotkarā iva | bhindipālaiśca śūlaiśca nirucchvāsamapothayan || 7.21.38 ||
vimuktakavacaḥ kruddhaḥ siktaḥ śoṇitavisravaiḥ | tataḥ sa puṣpakaṃ tyaktvā pṛthivyāmavatiṣṭhata || 7.21.39 ||
tataḥ sa kārmukī vāṇī samare cābhivartata | labdhasañjño muhūrtena kruddhastasthau yathāntakaḥ || 7.21.40 ||
tataḥ pāśupataṃ divyamastraṃ sandhāya kārmuke | tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti tānuktvā taccāpaṃ vicakarṣa sa || 7.21.41 ||
ākarṇātsa vikṛṣyātha cāpamindrārirāhave | mumoca taṃ śaraṃ kruddhastripure śaṅkaro yathā || 7.21.42 ||
tasya rūpaṃ śarasyāsītvidhūmajvālamaṇḍalam | vanaṃ dahiṣyato gharme dāvāgneriva mūrcchataḥ || 7.21.43 ||
jvālāmālī sa tu śaraḥ kravyādānugato raṇe | mukto gulmāndrumāṃścāpi bhasma kṛtvā pradhāvati || 7.21.44 ||
te tasya tejasā dagdhāḥ sainyā vaivasvatasya tu | raṇe tasminnipatitā dāvadagdhā nagā iva || 7.21.45 ||
tatastu sicavaiḥ sārdhaṃ rākṣaso bhīmavikramaḥ | nanāda sumahānādaṃ kampayanniva medinīm || 7.21.46 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe ekaviṃśaḥ sargaḥ || 21 ||
sa tasya tu mahānādaṃ śrutvā vaivasvataḥ prabhuḥ | śatruṃ vijayinaṃ mene svabalasya ca saṅkṣayam || 7.22.1 ||
sa hi yodhānhatānmatvā krodhasaṃraktalocanaḥ | abravīttvaritaṃ sūtaṃ ratho 'yamupanīyatām || 7.22.2 ||
tasya sūtastadā divyamupasthāpya mahāratham | sthitaḥ sa ca mahātejā hyadhyārohata taṃ ratham | prāśamudgarahastaśca mṛtyustasyāgrataḥ sthitaḥ || 7.22.3 ||
yena saṅkṣipyate sarvaṃ trailokyamidamavyayam | kāladaṇḍastu pārśvastho mūrtimānasya cābhavat | yamapraharaṇaṃ divyaṃ tejasā jvaladagnimat || 7.22.4 ||
tasya pārśveṣu nicchidrāḥ kālapāśāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ || 7.22.5 ||
pāvakasparśasaṅkāśaḥ sthito mūrtaśca mudgaraḥ || 7.22.6 ||
tato lokatrayaṃ kṣubdhamakampanta divaukasaḥ | kālaṃ dṛṣṭvā tathā kruddhaṃ sarvalokabhayāvaham || 7.22.7 ||
tataḥ pracodayansūtastānaśvānruciraprabhān | prayayau bhīmasannādo yatra rakṣaḥpatiḥ sthitaḥ || 7.22.8 ||
muhūrtena yamaṃ te tu hayā harihayopamāḥ | prāpayanmanasastulyā yatra tatprastutaṃ raṇam || 7.22.9 ||
dṛṣṭvā tathaiva vikṛtaṃ rathaṃ mṛtyusamanvitam | sacivā rākṣasendrasya sahasā vipradudruvuḥ || 7.22.10 ||
laghusattvatayā te hi naṣṭasañjñā bhayārditāḥ | neha yoddhuṃ samarthāḥ sma ityuktvā prayayurdiśaḥ || 7.22.11 ||
sa tu taṃ tādṛśaṃ dṛṣṭvā rathaṃ lokabhayāvaham | nākṣubhyata daśagrīvo na cāpi bhayamāviśat || 7.22.12 ||
sa tu rāvaṇamāsādya vyasṛjacchaktitomarān | yamo marmāṇi saṅkruddho rāvaṇasyopakṛntata || 7.22.13 ||
rāvaṇastu tataḥ svasthaḥ śaravarṣaṃ mumoca ha | tasminvaivasvatarathe toyavarṣamivāmbudaḥ || 7.22.14 ||
tato mahāśaktiśaraiḥ pātyamānairmahorasi (pātyamāno) | nāśaknotpratikartuṃ sa rākṣasaḥ śalyapīḍitaḥ || 7.22.15 ||
evaṃ nānāpraharaṇairyamenāmitrakarṣiṇā | saptarātraṃ kṛtaḥ saṅkhye visañjño vimukho ripuḥ || 7.22.16 ||
tadāsīttumulaṃ yuddhaṃ yamarākṣasayordvayoḥ | jayamākāṅkṣatorvīra samareṣvanivartinoḥ || 7.22.17 ||
tato devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhāśca paramarṣayaḥ | prajāpatiṃ puraskṛtya sametāstadraṇājiram || 7.22.18 ||
saṃvarta iva lokānāṃ krudhyatorabhavattadā | rākṣasānāṃ ca mukhyasya pretānāmīśvarasya ca || 7.22.19 ||
rākṣasendro 'pi visphārya cāpamindrāśaniprabham | nirantaramivākāśaṃ kurvanbāṇāṃstato 'sṛjat || 7.22.20 ||
mṛtyuṃ caturbhirviśikhaiḥ sūtaṃ saptabhirārdayat | yamaṃ śatasahasreṇa śīghraṃ marmasvatāḍayat || 7.22.21 ||
tataḥ kruddhasya vadanādyamasya samajāyata | jvālāmālī saniḥśvāsaḥ sadhūmaḥ kopapāvakaḥ || 7.22.22 ||
tadāścaryamatho dṛṣṭvā devadānavasannidhau | praharṣitau susaṃrabdhau mṛtyukālau babhūvatuḥ || 7.22.23 ||
tato mṛtyuḥ kruddhataro vaivasvatamabhāṣata | muñca māṃ samare yāvaddhanmīmaṃ pāparākṣasam | naiṣā rakṣo bhavedadya maryādā hi nisargataḥ || 7.22.24 ||
hiraṇyakaśipuḥ śrīmānnamuciḥ śambarastathā | visandhirdhūmaketuśca balirvairocano 'pi ca || 7.22.25 ||
dambhurdaityamahārājo vṛtro bāṇastathaiva ca | rājarṣayaḥ śāstravido gandharvāḥ samahoragāḥ || 7.22.26 ||
ṛṣayaḥ pannagā daityā yakṣāścāpyapsarogaṇāḥ | yugāntaparivarte ca pṛthivī samahārṇavā || 7.22.27 ||
kṣayaṃ nītā mahārāja saparvatasariddrumā | ete cānye ca bahavo balavanto durāsadāḥ || 7.22.28 ||
vinipannā mayā dṛṣṭāḥ kimutāyaṃ niśācaraḥ || 7.22.29 ||
muñcaṃ māṃ sādhu dharmajña yāvadenaṃ nihanmyaham | nahi kaścinmayā dṛṣṭo balavānapi jīvati || 7.22.30 ||
balaṃ mama na khalvetanmaryādaiṣā nisargataḥ | sa dṛṣṭo na mayā kālaṃ muhurtamāpi jīvati || 7.22.31 ||
tasyaivaṃ vacanaṃ śrutvā dharmarājaḥ pratāpavān | abravīttatra taṃ mutyuṃ tvaṃ tiṣṭhainaṃ nihanmyaham || 7.22.32 ||
tataḥ saṃraktanayanaḥ kruddho vaivasvataḥ prabhuḥ | kāladaṇḍamamoghaṃ tu tolayāmāsa pāṇinā || 7.22.33 ||
yasya pārśveṣu nikhilā kālapāśāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ | pāvakāśanisaṅkāśo mudgaro mūrtimānsthitaḥ || 7.22.34 ||
darśanādeva yaḥ prāṇānprāṇināmapakarṣati | kiṃ punaḥ spṛśyamānasya pātyamānasya vā punaḥ || 7.22.35 ||
sa jvālāparivārastu nirdahanniva rākṣasam | tena spṛṣṭo balavatā mahāpraharaṇo 'sphurat || 7.22.36 ||
tato vidudruvuḥ sarve tasmātrastā raṇājire | surāśca kṣubhitāḥ sarve dṛṣṭvā daṇḍodyataṃ yamam || 7.22.37 ||
tasminprahartukāme tu yame daṇḍena rāvaṇam | yamaṃ pitāmahaḥ sākṣāddarśayitvedamabravīt || 7.22.38 ||
vaivasvata mahābāho na khalvamitavikrama | na hantavyastvayā tena daṇḍenaiva niśācaraḥ || 7.22.39 ||
varaḥ khalu mayaitasmai dattastridaśapuṅgava | sa tvayā nānṛtaḥ kāryo yanmayā vyāhṛtaṃ vacaḥ || 7.22.40 ||
yo hi māmanṛtaṃ kuryāddevo vā mānuṣo 'pi vā | trailokyamanṛtaṃ tena kṛtaṃ syānnātra saṃśayaḥ || 7.22.41 ||
kruddhena vipramukto 'yaṃ nirviśeṣaṃ priyāpriye | prajāḥ saṃharate raudro lokatrayabhayāvahaḥ || 7.22.42 ||
amogho hyeṣa sarveṣāṃ prāṇināmamitaprabhaḥ | kāladaṇḍo mayā sṛṣṭaḥ pūrvaṃ mṛtyupuraskṛtaḥ || 7.22.43 ||
tanna khalveṣa te saumya pātyo rāvaṇamūrdhani | nahyasminpatite kaścinmuhūrtamapi jīvati || 7.22.44 ||
yadi hyanminnipatite na mriyetaiṣa rākṣasaḥ | mriyate vā daśagrīvastadāpyubhayato 'nṛtam || 7.22.45 ||
tannivartaya laṅkeśaṃ ddaṇḍametaṃ samudyatam | satyaṃ ca māṃ kuruṣvādya lokāṃstvaṃ yadyavekṣase || 7.22.46 ||
evamuktastu dharmātmā pratyuvāca yamastadā | eṣa vyāvartito daṇḍaḥ prabhaviṣṇurhi no bhavān || 7.22.47 ||
kiṃ nvidānīṃ mayā śakyaṃ kartuṃ raṇagatena hi | na mayā yadyayaṃ śakyo hantuṃ varapuraskṛtaḥ || 7.22.48 ||
eṣa tasmātpraṇaśyāmi darśanādasya rakṣasaḥ | ityuktvā sarathaḥ sāśvastatraivāntaradhīyata || 7.22.49 ||
daśagrīvastu taṃ jitvā nāma viśrāvya cātmanaḥ | āruhya puṣpakaṃ bhūyo niṣkrānto yamasādanāt || 7.22.50 ||
sa tu vaivasvato devaiḥ saha brahmapurogamaiḥ | jagāma tridivaṃ hṛṣṭo nāradaśca mahāmuniḥ || 7.22.51 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe dvāviṃśaḥ sargaḥ || 22 ||
tato jitvā daśagrīvo yamaṃ tridaśapuṅgavam | rāvaṇastu raṇaślāghī svasahāyāndadarśa ha || 7.23.1 ||
tato rudhirasiktāṅgaṃ prahārairjarjarīkṛtam | rāvaṇaṃ rākṣasā dṛṣṭvā hyaṣṭavat samupāgaman || 7.23.2 ||
jayena vardhayitvā ca mārīcapramukhāstataḥ | puṣpakaṃ bhejire sarve sāntvitā rāvaṇena tu || 7.23.3 ||
tato rasātalaṃ gacchan praviṣṭaḥ payasāṃ nidhim | daityoragagaṇādhyuṣṭaṃ varuṇena surakṣitam || 7.23.4 ||
sa tu bhogavatīṃ gatvā purīṃ vāsukipālitām | kṛtvā nāgānvaśe hṛṣṭo yayau maṇimayīṃ purīm || 7.23.5 ||
nivātakavacāstatra daityā labdhavarā vasan | rākṣasāntānsamāgamya yuddhāya samupāhvayat || 7.23.6 ||
te tu sarve suvikrāntā daiteyā balaśālinaḥ | nānāpraharaṇāstatra prahṛṣṭā yuddhadurmadāḥ || 7.23.7 ||
śūlaistriśūlaiḥ kuliśaiḥ paṭṭiśāsiparaśvadhaiḥ | anyonyaṃ bibhiduḥ kruddhā rākṣasā dānavāstathā || 7.23.8 ||
teṣāṃ tu yudhyamānānāṃ sāgraḥ saṃvatsaro gataḥ | na cānyatarayostatra vijayo vā kṣayo 'pi vā || 7.23.9 ||
tataḥ pitāmahastatra trailokyagatiravyayaḥ | ājagāma drutaṃ devo vimānavaramāsthitaḥ || 7.23.10 ||
nivātakavacānāṃ tu nivārya raṇakarma tat | vṛddhaḥ pitāmaho vākyamuvāca viditārthavat || 7.23.11 ||
nahyayaṃ rāvaṇo yuddhe śakyo jetuṃ surāsuraiḥ | na bhavantaḥ kṣayaṃ netumapi sāmaradānavaiḥ || 7.23.12 ||
rākṣasasya sakhitvaṃ ca bhavadbhiḥ saha rocate | avibhaktāśca sarvārthāḥ suhṛdāṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ || 7.23.13 ||
tato 'gnisākṣikaṃ sakhyaṃ kṛtavāṃstatra rāvaṇaḥ | nivātakavacaiḥ sārdhaṃ prītimānabhavattadā || 7.23.14 ||
arthatastairyathānyāyaṃ saṃvatsaramathoṣitaḥ | svapurānnirviśeṣaṃ ca priyaṃ prāpto daśānanaḥ || 7.23.15 ||
tatopadhārya māyānāṃ śatamekaṃ samāptavān | salilendrapurānveṣī bhramati sma rasātalam || 7.23.16 ||
tato 'śmanagaraṃ nāma kālakeyairadhiṣṭhitam | gatvā tu kālakeyāṃśca hatvā tatra balotkaṭān || 7.23.17 ||
śūrpaṇakhyāśca bhartāramasinā prācchinattadā | śyālaṃ ca balavantaṃ ca vidyujjihvaṃ balotkaṭam | jihvayā saṃlihantaṃ ca rākṣasaṃ samare tathā || 7.23.18 ||
taṃ vijitya muhūrtena jaghne daityāṃścatuḥśatam || 7.23.19 ||
tataḥ pāṇḍurameghābhaṃ kailāsamiva bhāsvaram | varuṇasyālayaṃ divyamapaśyadrākṣasādhipaḥ || 7.23.20 ||
kṣarantīṃ ca payastatra surabhiṃ gāmavasthitām | yasyāḥ payobhiniṣyandātkṣīrodo nāma sāgaraḥ || 7.23.21 ||
dadarśa rāvaṇastatra govṛṣendravarāraṇim | yasmāccandraḥ prabhavati śītaraśmirniśākaraḥ || 7.23.22 ||
yaṃ samāśritya jīvanti phenapāḥ paramarṣayaḥ | amṛtaṃ yatra cotpannaṃ svadhā ca svadhabhojinām || 7.23.23 ||
yāṃ bruvanti narā loke surabhiṃ nāma nāmataḥ | pradakṣiṇaṃ tu tāṃ kṛtvā rāvaṇaḥ paramādbhutām || 7.23.24 ||
praviveśa mahāghoraṃ guptaṃ bahuvidhairbalaiḥ | tato dhārāśatākīrṇaṃ śāradābhranibhaṃ tadā | nityaprahṛṣṭaṃ dadṛśe varuṇasya gṛhottamam || 7.23.25 ||
tato hatvā balādhyakṣānsamare taiśca tāḍitaḥ | abravīcca tato yodhānrājā śīghraṃ nivedyatām || 7.23.26 ||
yuddhārthī rāvaṇaḥ prāptastasya yuddhaṃ pradīyatām | vada vā na bhayaṃ te 'sti nirjito 'smīti sāñjaliḥ || 7.23.27 ||
etasminnantare kruddhā varuṇasya mahātmanaḥ | putrāḥ pautrāśca niṣkrāmangauśca puṣkara eva ca || 7.23.28 ||
te tu vīryaguṇopetā balaiḥ parivṛtāḥ svakaiḥ | yuṅktvā rathānkāmagamānudyadbhāsvaravarcasaḥ || 7.23.29 ||
tato yuddhaṃ samabhavaddāruṇaṃ romaharṣaṇam | salilendrasya putrāṇāṃ rāvaṇasya ca dhīmataḥ || 7.23.30 ||
amātyaiśca mahāvīryairdaśagrīvasya rakṣasaḥ | vāruṇaṃ tadbalaṃ kṛtsnaṃ kṣaṇena vinipātitam || 7.23.31 ||
samīkṣya svabalaṃ saṅkhye varuṇasya sutāstadā | arditāḥ śarajālena nivṛttā raṇakarmaṇaḥ || 7.23.32 ||
mahītalagatāste tu rāvaṇaṃ dṛśya puṣpake | ākāśamāśu viviśuḥ syandanaiḥ śīghragāmibhiḥ || 7.23.33 ||
mahādāsīttatasteṣāṃ tulyaṃ sthānamavāpya tat | ākāśayuddhaṃ tumulaṃ devadānavayoriva || 7.23.34 ||
tataste rāvaṇaṃ yuddhe śaraiḥ pāvakasannibhaiḥ | vimukhīkṛtya santuṣṭā vinedurvividhānravān || 7.23.35 ||
tato mahodaraḥ kruddho rājānaṃ dṛśya dharṣitam | tyaktvā mṛtyubhayaṃ vīro yuddhakāṅkṣī vyalokayat || 7.23.36 ||
tena te dāruṇā yuddhe kāmagāḥ pavanopamāḥ | mahodareṇa gadayā hatā vai prayayuḥ kṣitim || 7.23.37 ||
teṣāṃ varuṇaputrāṇāṃ hatvā yodhānhayāñchatān | mumocāśu mahānādaṃ virathānprekṣya tānsthitān || 7.23.38 ||
te tu teṣāṃ rathāḥ sāśvāḥ saha sārathibhirhataiḥ | mahodareṇa nihatāḥ patitāḥ pṛthivītale || 7.23.39 ||
te tu tyaktvā rathānputrā varuṇasya mahātmanaḥ | ākāśe viṣṭhitāḥ śūrāḥ svaprabhāvānna vivyathuḥ || 7.23.40 ||
dhanūṃṣi kṛtvā sajjāni vinirbhidya mahodaram | rāvaṇaṃ samare kruddhāḥ sahitāḥ samabhidravan || 7.23.41 ||
sāyakaiścāpavibhraṣṭairvajrakalpaiḥ sudāruṇaiḥ | dārayanti sma saṅkruddhā meghā iva mahāgirim || 7.23.42 ||
tataḥ kruddho daśagrīvaḥ kālāgniriva nirgataḥ | śaravarṣairmahāghoraisteṣāṃ marmasvatāḍayat || 7.23.43 ||
tatastenaiva sahasā sīdanti sma padātayaḥ | musalāni vicitrāṇi tato bhallaśatāni ca || 7.23.44 ||
paṭṭiśāṃścaiva śaktīśca śataghnīstomarāṃstathā | pātayāmāsa durdharṣasteṣāmupari viṣṭhitaḥ || 7.23.45 ||
apaviddhāstu te vīrā viniṣpetuḥ padātayaḥ | mahāpaṅkamivāsādya kuñjarāṣṣaṣṭihāyanāḥ || 7.23.46 ||
sīdamānānsutāndṛṣṭvā vihvalānsumahaujasaḥ | nanāda rāvaṇo harṣānmahānambudharo yathā || 7.23.47 ||
tato rakṣo mahānādānmuktvā hanti sma vāruṇān | nānāpraharaṇopetairdhārāpātairivāmbudaḥ || 7.23.48 ||
tataste vimukhāḥ sarve patitā dharaṇītale | raṇātsvapuruṣaiḥ śīghraṃ gṛhāṇyeva praveśitāḥ || 7.23.49 ||
tānabravīttato rakṣo varuṇāya nivedyatām || 7.23.50 ||
rāvaṇaṃ tvabravīnmantrī prahasto (prahaso) nāma vāruṇaḥ | gataḥ khalu mahārājo brahmalokaṃ jaleśvaraḥ || 7.23.51 ||
gāndharvaṃ varuṇaḥ śrotuṃ yaṃ tvamāhvayase yudhi | tatkiṃ tava vṛthā vīra pariśramya gate nṛpe | ye tu sannihitā vīrāḥ kumārāste parājitāḥ || 7.23.52 ||
rākṣasendrastu tacchrutvā nāma viśrāvya cātmanaḥ | harṣānnādaṃ vimuñcanvai niṣkrānto varuṇālayāt || 7.23.53 ||
āgatastu pathā yena tenaiva vinivṛtya saḥ | laṅkāmabhimukho rakṣo nabhastalagato yayau || 7.23.54 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe trayoviṃśaḥ sargaḥ || 23 ||
nivartamānaḥ saṃhṛṣṭo rāvaṇassudurātmavān | jahre pathi narendrarṣidevagandharvakanyakāḥ || 7.24.1 ||
darśanīyāṃ hi rakṣaḥ sa kanyāṃ strīṃ vāpi paśyati | hatvā bandhujanaṃ tasyā vimāne tāṃ rurodha ha || 7.24.2 ||
evaṃ pannagakanyāśca rākṣasāsuramānuṣīḥ | yakṣadānavakanyāśca vimāne so 'dhyaropayat || 7.24.3 ||
tāśca sarvāḥ samaṃ duḥkhānmumucurbāṣpajaṃ jalam | tulyamagnyarciṣāṃ tatra śokāgnibhayasambhavam || 7.24.4 ||
tābhiḥ sarvānavadyābhirnadībhiriva sāgaraḥ | āpūritaṃ vimānaṃ tadbhayaśokāśivāśrubhiḥ || 7.24.5 ||
nāgagandharvakanyāśca maharṣitanayāśca yāḥ | daityadānavakanyāśca vimāne śataśo 'rudan || 7.24.6 ||
dīrghakeśyaḥ sucārvaṅgyaḥ pūrṇacandranibhānanāḥ | pīnastanyastathā vajravedimadhyasamaprabhāḥ || 7.24.7 ||
rathakūbarasaṅkāśaiḥ śroṇideśairmanoharāḥ | striyaḥ surāṅganāprakhyā niṣṭaptakanakaprabhāḥ || 7.24.8 ||
śokaduḥkhabhayatrastā vihvalāśca sumadhyamāḥ | tāsāṃ niśvāsavātena sarvataḥ sampradīpitam || 7.24.9 ||
agnihotramivābhāti sanniruddhāgnipuṣpakam | daśagrīvavaśaṃ prāptāstāstu śokākulāḥ striyaḥ || 7.24.10 ||
dīnavakrekṣaṇāḥ śyāmā mṛgyaḥ siṃhavaśā iva | kāciccintayatī tatra kiṃ nu māṃ bhakṣayiṣyati || 7.24.11 ||
kāciddadhyau suduḥkhārtā api māṃ mārayedayam | iti mātṛpita'nsmṛtvā bharta'nbhrāta'ṃstathaiva ca | duḥkhaśokasamāviṣṭā vilepuḥ sahitāḥ striyaḥ || 7.24.12 ||
kathaṃ nu khalu me putro bhaviṣyati mayā vinā | kathaṃ mātā kathaṃ bhrātā nimagnāḥ śokasāgare || 7.24.13 || |
hā kathaṃ nu kariṣyāmi bhartustasmādahaṃ vinā | mṛtyo prasādayāmi tvāṃ naya māṃ duḥkhabhāginīm || 7.24.14 ||
kinnu tadduṣkṛtaṃ karma purā dehāntare kṛtam || 7.24.15 ||
evaṃ sma duḥkhitāḥ sarvāḥ patitāḥ śokasāgare | na khalvidānīṃ paśyāmo duḥkhasyāsyāntamātmanaḥ || 7.24.16 ||
aho dhiṅmānuṣaṃ lokaṃ nāsti khalvadhamaḥ paraḥ | yaddurbalā balavatā bhartāro rāvaṇena naḥ || 7.24.17 ||
sūryeṇodayatā kāle nakṣatrāṇīva nāśitāḥ | aho subalavadrakṣo vadhopāyeṣu yujyate || 7.24.18 ||
aho durvṛttamāsthāya nātmānaṃ vaijugupsate | sarvathā sadṛśastāvadvikramo 'sya durātmanaḥ || 7.24.19 ||
idaṃ tvasadṛśaṃ karma paradārābhimarśanam | yasmādeṣa parakyāsu ramate rākṣasādhamaḥ || 7.24.20 ||
tasmādvai strīkṛtenaiva prāpsyate durmatirvadham | satībhirvaranārībhirevaṃ vākye 'bhyudīrite || 7.24.21 ||
nedurdundubhayaḥ khasthāḥ puṣpavṛṣṭiḥ papāta ca | śaptaḥ strībhiḥ sa tu samaṃ hataujā iva niṣprabhaḥ || 7.24.22 ||
pativratābhiḥ sādhvībhirbabhūva vimanā iva | evaṃ vilapitaṃ tāsāṃ śṛṇvanrākṣasapuṅgavaḥ | praviveśa purīṃ laṅkāṃ pūjyamāno niśācaraiḥ || 7.24.23 ||
etasminnantare ghorā rākṣasī kāmarūpiṇī | sahasā patitā bhūmau bhaginī rāvaṇasya sā || 7.24.24 ||
tāṃ svasāraṃ samutthāpya rāvaṇaḥ parisāntvayan | abravītkimidaṃ bhadre vaktukāmā 'si me drutam || 7.24.25 ||
sā bāṣpapariruddhākṣī raktākṣī vākyamabravīt | kṛtā 'smi vidhavā rājaṃstvayā balavatā balāt || 7.24.26 ||
ete rājaṃstvayā vīrā daityā vinihatā raṇe | kālakeyā iti khyātāḥ sahasrāṇi caturdaśa || 7.24.27 ||
prāṇebhyo 'pi garīyānme tatra bhartā mahābalaḥ || 7.24.28 ||
so 'pi tvayā hatastāta ripuṇā bhrātṛgṛdhnunā | tvayā 'smi nihatā rājansvayameva hi bandhunā || 7.24.29 ||
rājanvaidhavyaśabdaṃ ca bhokṣyāmi tvatkṛte hyaham | nanu nāma tvayā rakṣyo jāmātā samareṣvapi | sa tvayā nihato yuddhe svayameva na lajjase || 7.24.30 ||
evamukto daśagrīvo bhaginyā krośamānayā | abravītsāntvayitvā tāṃ sāmapūrvamidaṃ vacaḥ || 7.24.31 ||
alaṃ vatse ruditvā te na bhetavyaṃ ca sarvaśaḥ | dānamānaprasādaistvāṃ toṣayiṣyāmi yatnataḥ || 7.24.32 ||
yuddhapramatto vyākṣipto jayākāṅkṣī kṣipañcharān | nāvagacchāmi yuddheṣu svānparānvāpyahaṃ śubhe || 7.24.33 ||
jāmātaraṃ na jāne sma praharanyuddhadurmadaḥ | tenāsau nihataḥ saṅkhye mayā bhartā tava svasaḥ || 7.24.34 ||
asminkāle tu yatprāptaṃ tatkariṣyāmi te hitam | bhrāturaiśvaryayuktasya kharasya vasa pārśvataḥ || 7.24.35 ||
caturdaśānāṃ bhrātā te sahasrāṇāṃ bhaviṣyati | prabhuḥ prayāṇe dāne ca rākṣasānāṃ mahābalaḥ || 7.24.36 ||
tatra mātṛṣvaseyaste bhrātā 'yaṃ vai kharaḥ prabhuḥ | bhaviṣyati tavādeśaṃ sadā kurvanniśācaraḥ || 7.24.37 ||
śīghraṃ gacchatvayaṃ vīro daṇḍakānparirakṣitum | dūṣaṇo 'sya balādhyakṣo bhaviṣyati mahābalaḥ || 7.24.38 ||
tatra te vacanaṃ śūraḥ kariṣyati sadā kharaḥ | rakṣasāṃ kāmarūpāṇāṃ prabhureṣa bhaviṣyati || 7.24.39 ||
evamuktvā daśagrīvaḥ sainyamasyādideśa ha | caturdaśa sahasrāṇi rakṣasāṃ vīryaśālinām || 7.24.40 ||
sa taiḥ parivṛtassarvai rākṣasairghoradarśanaiḥ | āgacchata kharaḥ śīghraṃ daṇḍakānakutobhayaḥ || 7.24.41 ||
sa tatra kārayāmāsa rājyaṃ nihatakaṇṭakam | sā ca śūrpaṇakhā tatra nyavasaddaṇḍakāvane || 7.24.42 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe caturviṃśaḥ sargaḥ || 24 ||
sa tu dattvā daśagrīvo vanaṃ ghoraṃ svarasya tat | bhaginīṃ ca samāśvāsya hṛṣṭaḥ svasthataro 'bhavat || 7.25.1 ||
tato nikumbhilā nāma laṅkopavanamuttamam | tadrākṣasendro balavānpraviveśa sahānugaḥ || 7.25.2 ||
tato yūpaśatākīrṇaṃ saumyacaityopaśobhitam | dadarśa viṣṭhitaṃ yajñaṃ śriyā samprajvalanniva || 7.25.3 ||
tataḥ kṛṣṇājinadharaṃ kamaṇḍaluśikhādhvajam | dadarśa svasutaṃ tatra meghanādaṃ bhayāvaham || 7.25.4 ||
taṃ samāsādya laṅkeśaḥ pariṣvajvātha bāhubhiḥ | abravītkimidaṃ vatsa vartase brūhi tattvataḥ || 7.25.5 ||
uśanā tvabravīttatra yajñasampatsamṛddhaye | rāvaṇaṃ rākṣasaśreṣṭhaṃ dvijaśreṣṭho mahātapāḥ || 7.25.6 ||
ahamākhyāmi te rājañchrūyatāṃ sarvameva tat | yajñāste sapta putreṇa prāptāssubahuvistarāḥ || 7.25.7 ||
agniṣṭomo 'śvamedhaśca yajño bahusuvarṇakaḥ | rājasūyastathā yajño gomedho vaiṣvavastathā || 7.25.8 ||
māheśvare pravṛtte tu yajñe pumbhiḥ sudurlabhe | varāṃste labdhavānputraḥ sākṣātpaśupateriha || 7.25.9 ||
kāmagaṃ syandanaṃ divyamantarikṣacaraṃ dhruvam | māyāṃ ca tāmasīṃ nāma yayā sampadyate tamaḥ || 7.25.10 ||
etayā kila saṅgrāme māyayā rākṣaseśvara | prayuktayā gatiḥ śakyā nahi jñātuṃ surāsuraiḥ || 7.25.11 ||
akṣayāviṣudhī bāṇaiścāpaṃ cāpi sudurjayam | astraṃ ca balavadrājañchatruvidhvaṃsanaṃ raṇe || 7.25.12 ||
etānsarvānvarāṃllabdhvā putraste 'yaṃ daśānana | adya yajñasamāptau ca tvāṃ didṛkṣussthito hyaham || 7.25.13 ||
tato 'bravīdṛśagrīvo na śobhanamidaṃ kṛtam | pūjitāḥ śatravo yasmāddravyairindrapurogamāḥ || 7.25.14 ||
ehīdānīṃ kṛtaṃ viddhi sukṛtaṃ tanna saṃśayaḥ | āgaccha saumya gacchāmaḥ svameva bhavanaṃ prati || 7.25.15 ||
tato gatvā daśagrīvaḥ saputraḥ savibhīṣaṇaḥ | striyo 'vatārayāmāsa sarvāstā bāṣpagadgadāḥ || 7.25.16 ||
lakṣiṇyo ratnabhūtāśca devadānavarakṣasām | tasya tāsu matiṃ jñātvā dharmatmā vākyamabravīt || 7.25.17 ||
īdṛśaistvaṃ samācārairyaśorthakulanāśanaiḥ | dharṣaṇaṃ jñātināṃ jñātvā svamatena viceṣṭase || 7.25.18 ||
jñātīṃstāndharṣayitvemāstvayā ' 'nītā varāṅganāḥ | tvāmatikramya madhunā rājankumbhīnasī hṛtā || 7.25.19 ||
rāvaṇastvabravīdvākyaṃ nāvagacchāmi kiṃ tvidam | ko 'yaṃ yastu tvayā ' 'khyāto madhurityeva nāmataḥ || 7.25.20 ||
vibhīṣaṇastu saṅkruddho bhrātaraṃ vākyamabravīt | śrūyatāmasya pāpasya karmaṇaḥ phalamāgatam || 7.25.21 ||
mātāmahasya yo bhrātā jyeṣṭho bhrātā sumālinaḥ | mālyavāniti vikhyāto vṛddhaḥ prājño niśācaraḥ || 7.25.22 ||
pitā jyeṣṭho jananyā no hyasmākaṃ cāryako 'bhavat | tasya kumbhīnasī nāma duhiturduhitā 'bhavat || 7.25.23 ||
mātṛṣvasurathāsmākaṃ sā ca kanyā 'nalodbhavā | bhavatyasmākamevaiṣā bhrātṛṇāṃ dharmataḥ svasā || 7.25.24 ||
sā hṛtā, madhunā rājanrākṣasena balīyasā | yajñapravṛtte putre tu mayi cāntarjaloṣite || 7.25.25 ||
kumbhakarṇe mahārāja nidrāmanubhavatyatha | nihatya rākṣasaśreṣṭhānamātyāniha sammatān || 7.25.26 ||
dharṣayitvā hṛtā sā tu suptāpyantaḥpure tava | śrutvā 'pi tanmahārāja kṣāntameva hato na saḥ || 7.25.27 ||
yasmādavaśyaṃ dātavyā kanyā bhartre hi bhrātṛbhiḥ | tadetatkarmaṇo hyasya phalaṃ pāpasya durmate || 7.25.28 ||
asminnevābhisamprāptaṃ loke viditamastu te | vibhīṣaṇavacaḥ śrutvā rākṣasendraḥ sa rāvaṇaḥ | daurātmyenātmanoddhūtastaptāmbha iva sāgaraḥ || 7.25.29 ||
tato 'bravīdṛśagrīvaḥ kruddhaḥ saṃraktalocanaḥ | kalpyatāṃ me rathaḥ śīghraṃ śūrāḥ sajjībhavantu naḥ || 7.25.30 ||
bhrātā me kumbhakarṇaśca ye ca mukhyā niśācarāḥ | vāhanānyadhirohantu nānāpraharaṇāyudhāḥ || 7.25.31 ||
adya taṃ samare hatvā madhuṃ rāvaṇanirbhayam | suralokaṃ gamiṣyāmi yuddhakāṅkṣī suhṛdvṛtaḥ || 7.25.32 ||
akṣauhiṇīsahasrāṇi catvāryagryāṇi rakṣasām | nānāpraharaṇānyāśu niryayuryuddhakāṅkṣiṇām || 7.25.33 ||
indrajittvagrataḥ (agrataḥ) sainyātsainikānparigṛhya ca | jagāma rāvaṇo madhye kumbhakarṇaśca pṛṣṭhataḥ || 7.25.34 ||
vibhīṣaṇaśca dharmātmā laṅkāyāṃ dharmāmācarat | śoṣāḥ sarve mahābhāgā yayurmadhupuraṃ prati || 7.25.35 ||
kharairuṣṭrairhayairdīptaiḥ śiṃśumārairmahoragaiḥ | rākṣasāḥ prayayuḥ sarve kṛtvā ' 'kāśaṃ nirantaram || 7.25.36 ||
daityāśca śataśastatra kṛtavairāśca daivataiḥ | rāvaṇaṃ prekṣya gacchantamanvagacchanhi pṛṣṭhataḥ || 7.25.37 ||
sa tu gatvā madhupuraṃ praviśya ca daśānanaḥ | na dadarśa madhuṃ tatra bhaginīṃ tatra dṛṣṭavān || 7.25.38 ||
sā ca prahvāñjalirbhūtvā śirasā caraṇau gatā || 7.25.39 ||
tasya rākṣasarājasya trastā kumbhīnasī tadā | tāṃ samutthāpayāmāsa na bhetavyamiti bruvan || 7.25.40 ||
rāvaṇo rākṣasaśreṣṭhaḥ kiṃ cāpi karavāṇi te | sābravīdyadi me rājanprasannastvaṃ mahābhuja | bhartāraṃ na mamehādya hanturmahasi mānada || 7.25.41 ||
na hīdṛśaṃ bhayaṃ kiñcitkulastrīṇāmihocyate | bhayānāmapi sarveṣāṃ vaidhavyaṃ vyasanaṃ mahat || 7.25.42 ||
satyavāgbhava rājendra māmavekṣasva yācatīm | tvayāpyuktaṃ mahārāja na bhetavyamiti svayam || 7.25.43 ||
rāvaṇastvabravīddhṛṣṭaḥ svasāraṃ tatra saṃsthitām | kva cāsau tava bhartā vai mama śīghraṃ nivedyatām || 7.25.44 ||
saha tena gamiṣyāmi suralokaṃ jayāvahe | tava kāruṇyasauhārdānnivṛtto 'smi madhorvadhāt || 7.25.45 ||
ityuktā sā samutthāpya prasuptaṃ taṃ niśācaram | abravītsamprahṛṣṭeva rākṣasī sā patiṃ vacaḥ || 7.25.46 ||
eṣa prāpto daśagrīvo mama bhrātā mahābalaḥ | suralokajayākāṅkṣī sāhāyye tvāṃ vṛṇoti ca || 7.25.47 ||
tadasya tvaṃ sahāyārthaṃ sabandhurgaccha rākṣasa | snigdhasya bhajamānasya yuktamarthāya kalpitum || 7.25.48 ||
tasyāstadvacanaṃ śrutvā tathetyāha madhurvacaḥ || 7.25.49 ||
dadarśa rākṣasaśreṣṭhaṃ yathānyāyamupetya saḥ | pūjayamāsa dharmeṇa rāvaṇaṃ rākṣasādhipam || 7.25.50 ||
prāpya pūjāṃ daśagrīvo madhuveśmāni vīryavān | tatra caikāṃ niśāmuṣya gamanāyopacakrame || 7.25.51 ||
tataḥ kailāsamāsādya śailaṃ vaiśravaṇālayam | rākṣasendro mahendrābhaḥ senāmupaniveśayat || 7.25.52 ||
sa tu tatra daśagrīvaḥ saha sainyena vīryavān | astaṃ prāpte dinakare nivāsaṃ samarocayat || 7.26.1 ||
udite vimale candre tulyaparvatavarcasi | prasuptaṃ sumahatsainyaṃ nānāpraharaṇāyudham || 7.26.2 ||
rāvaṇastu mahāvīryo niṣaṇṇaḥ śailamūrdhani | sa dadarśa guṇāṃstatra candrapādapaśobhitān || 7.26.3 ||
karṇikāravanairdīptaiḥ kadambagahanaistathā | padminībhiśca phullābhirmandākinyā jalairapi || 7.26.4 ||
campakāśokapunnāgamandāratarubhistathā | cūtapāṭalalodhraiśca priyaṅgvarjunaketakaiḥ | tagarairnārikailaiśca priyālapanasaistathā || 7.26.5 ||
āragvadhaistamālaiśca priyālavakulairapi | etairanyaiśca tarubhirudbhāsitavanāntare | kinnarā madanenārtā raktā madhurakaṇṭhinaḥ || 7.26.6 ||
samaṃ samprajaguryatra manastuṣṭivivardhanam || 7.26.7 ||
bhirudbhāsitavanāntare | vidyādharā madakṣībā madaraktāntalocanāḥ | yoṣidbhiḥ saha saṅkrāntāścikrīḍurjahṛṣuśca vai || 7.26.8 ||
ghaṇṭānāmiva sannādaḥ śuśruve madhurasvaraḥ | apsarogaṇasaṅghānāṃ gāyatāṃ dhanadālaye || 7.26.9 ||
puṣpavarṣāṇi muñcanto nagāḥ pavanatāḍitāḥ | śailaṃ taṃ vāsayantīva madhumādhavagandhinaḥ || 7.26.10 ||
madhupuṣparajaḥpṛktaṃ gandhamādāya puṣkalam | pravavau vardhayankāmaṃ rāvaṇasya sukho 'nilaḥ || 7.26.11 ||
geyātpuṣpasamṛddhyā ca śaityādvāyorgirerguṇāt | pravṛttāyāṃ rajanyāṃ ca candrasyodayanena ca || 7.26.12 ||
rāvaṇastu mahāvīryaḥ kāmasya vaśamāgataḥ | viniḥśvasya viniḥśvasya śaśinaṃ samavaikṣata || 7.26.13 ||
etasminnantare tatra divyābharaṇabhūṣitā | sarvāpsarovarā rambhā divyapuṣpavibhūṣitā || 7.26.14 ||
divyacandanaliptāṅgī mandārakṛtamūrdhajā | divyotsavakṛtārambhā pūrṇacandranibhānanā || 7.26.15 ||
cakṣurmanoharaṃ pīnaṃ mekhalādāmabhūṣitam | samudvahantī jaghanaṃ ratiprābhṛtamuttamam || 7.26.16 ||
kṛtairviśeṣakairārdraiḥ ṣaḍartukusumodbhavaiḥ || 7.26.17 ||
babhāvanyatameva śrīkāntidyutimatihriyām | nīlaṃ satoyameghābhaṃ vastraṃ samavakuṇṭhitā || 7.26.18 ||
yasyā vaktraṃ śaśinibhaṃ bhruvau cāpanibhe śubhe | ūrū karikarākārau karau pallavakomalau | sainyamadhyena gacchantī rāvaṇenopavīkṣitā || 7.26.19 ||
tāṃ samutthāya gacchantīṃ kāmabāṇavaśaṃ gataḥ | kare gṛhītvā lajjantīṃ smayamāno 'bhyabhāṣata || 7.26.20 ||
kva gacchasi varārohe kāṃ siddhiṃ bhajase svayam | kasyābhyudayakālo 'yaṃ yastvāṃ samupabhokṣyate || 7.26.21 ||
tvadānanarasasyādya padmotpalasugandhinaḥ | sudhāmṛtarasasyeva ko 'dya tṛptiṃ gamiṣyati || 7.26.22 ||
svarṇakumbhanibhau pīnau śubhau bhīru nirantarau | kasyorasthalasaṃsparśaṃ dāsyataste kucāvimau || 7.26.23 ||
suvarṇacakrapratimaṃ svarṇadāmacitaṃ pṛthu | adhyārohati kaste 'dya jaghanaṃ svargarūpiṇam || 7.26.24 ||
madviśiṣṭaḥ pumānko 'dya śakro viṣṇurathāśvinau | māmatītya hi yaṃ ca tvaṃ yāsi bhīru na śobhanam || 7.26.25 ||
viśrama tvaṃ pṛthuśroṇi śilātalamidaṃ śubham || 7.26.26 ||
trailokye yaḥ prabhuścaiva madanyo naiva vidyate || 7.26.27 ||
tadevaṃ prāñjaliḥ prahvo yācate tvāṃ daśānanaḥ | bharturbhartā vidhātā ca trailokyasya bhajasva mām || 7.26.28 ||
evamuktā 'bravīdrambhā vepamānā kṛtāñjaliḥ | prasīda nārhase vaktumīdṛśaṃ tvaṃ hi me guruḥ || 7.26.29 ||
anyebhyo hi tvayā rakṣyā prāpnuyāṃ dharṣaṇaṃ yadi | taddharmataḥ snuṣā te 'haṃ tattvameva bravīmi te || 7.26.30 ||
athābravīddaśagrīvaścaraṇādhomukhīṃ sthitām | romaharṣamanuprāptāṃ dṛṣṭamātreṇa tāṃ tadā || 7.26.31 ||
sutasya yadi me bhāryā tatastvaṃ hi snuṣā bhaveḥ | bāḍhamityeva sā rambhā prāha rāvaṇamuttaram || 7.26.32 ||
dharmataste sutasyāhaṃ bhāryā rākṣasapuṅgava | putraḥ priyataraḥ prāṇairbhrāturvaiśravaṇasya te | vikhyātastriṣu lokeṣu nalakūbara ityayam || 7.26.33 ||
dharmato yo bhavedvipraḥ kṣatriyo vīryato bhavet | krodhādyaśca bhavedagniḥ kṣāntyā ca vasudhāsamaḥ || 7.26.34 ||
tasyāsmi kṛtasaṅketā lokapālasutasya vai | tamuddiśya tu me sarvaṃ vibhūṣaṇamidaṃ kṛtam || 7.26.35 ||
tathā tasya hi nānyasya bhāvo māṃ prati tiṣṭhati || 7.26.36 ||
tena satyena māṃ rājanmoktumarhasyarindama || 7.26.37 ||
sa hi tiṣṭhati dharmātmā māṃ pratīkṣya samutsukaḥ | tatra vighnaṃ sutasyeha kartuṃ nārhasi muñca mām || 7.26.38 ||
sadbhirācaritaṃ mārgaṃ gaccha rākṣasupuṅgava | mānanīyo mama tvaṃ hi pālanīyā tathā 'smi te || 7.26.39 ||
evamukto daśagrīvaḥ pratyuvāca vinītavat | snuṣā 'smi yadavocastvamekapatnīṣvayaṃ kramaḥ | devalokasthitiriyaṃ surāṇāṃ śāśvatī matā || 7.26.40 ||
patirapsarasāṃ nāsti na caikastrīparigrahaḥ || 7.26.41 ||
asmi yadavocastvamekapatnīṣvayaṃ kramaḥ | evamuktvā sa tāṃ rakṣo niveśya ca śilātale | kāmabhogābhisaṃsakto maithunāyopacakrame || 7.26.42 ||
sā vimuktā tato rambhā bhraṣṭamālyavibhūṣaṇā | gajendrākrīḍamathitā nadīvākulatāṃ gatā || 7.26.43 ||
lulitākulakeśāntā karavepitapallavā | pavanenāvadhūteva latā kusumaśālinī || 7.26.44 ||
sā vepamānā lajjantī bhītā karakṛtāñjaliḥ | nalakūbaramāsādya pādayornipapāta ha || 7.26.45 ||
tadavasthāṃ ca tāṃ dṛṣṭvā mahātmā nalakūbaraḥ | abravītkimidaṃ bhadre pādayoḥ patitā 'si me || 7.26.46 ||
sā vai niḥśvasamānā tu vepamānā kṛtāñjaliḥ | tasmai sarvaṃ yathātattvamākhyātumupacakrame || 7.26.47 ||
eṣa deva daśagrīvaḥ prāpto gantuṃ triviṣṭapam | tena sainyasahāyena niśeyaṃ pariṇāmitā || 7.26.48 ||
āyantī tena dṛṣṭā 'smi tvatsakāśamarindama | gṛhītā tena pṛṣṭā 'smi kasya tvamiti rakṣasā || 7.26.49 ||
mayā tu sarvaṃ yatsatyaṃ tasmai sarvaṃ niveditam | kāmamohābhibhūtātmā nāśrauṣīttadvaco mama || 7.26.50 ||
yācyamāno mayā deva snuṣā te 'hamiti prabho | tatsarvaṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ kṛtvā balāttenāsmi dharṣitā || 7.26.51 ||
evaṃ tvamaparādhaṃ me kṣantumarhasi suvrata | na hi tulyaṃ balaṃ saumya striyāśca puruṣasya ca || 7.26.52 ||
etachutvā tu saṅkruddhastadā vaiśravaṇātmajaḥ | dharṣaṇāṃ tāṃ parāṃ śrutvā dhyānaṃ sampraviveśa ha || 7.26.53 ||
tasya tatkarma vijñāya tadā vaiśravaṇātmajaḥ | muhūrtātkrodhatāmrākṣastoyaṃ jagrāha pāṇinā || 7.26.54 ||
gṛhītvā salilaṃ sarvamupaspṛśya yathāvidhi | utsasarja yathā śāpaṃ rākṣasendrāya dāruṇam || 7.26.55 ||
akāmā tena yasmāttvaṃ balādbhadre pradharṣitā | tasmātsa yuvatīmanyāṃ nākāmāmupayāsyati || 7.26.56 ||
yadā hyakāmāṃ kāmārto dharṣayiṣyati yoṣitam | mūrdhā tu saptadhā tasya śakalībhavitā tadā || 7.26.57 ||
tasminnudāhṛte śāpe jvalitāgnisamaprabhe | devadundubhayo neduḥ puṣpavṛṣṭiśca khāccyutā | pitāmahamukhāścaiva sarve devāḥ praharṣitāḥ || 7.26.58 ||
jñātvā lokagatiṃ sarvāṃ tasya mṛtyuṃ ca rakṣasaḥ | ṛṣayaḥ pitaraścaiva prītimāpuranuttamām || 7.26.59 ||
śrutvā tu sa daśagrīvastaṃ śāpaṃ romaharṣaṇam | nārīṣu maithune bhāvaṃ nākāmāsvabhyarocayat || 7.26.60 ||
tena nītāḥ striyaḥ prītimāpuḥ sarvāḥ pativratāḥ | nalakūbaranirmuktaṃ śāpaṃ śrutvā manaḥpriyam || 7.26.61 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe ṣaḍvaviṃśaḥ sargaḥ || 26 ||
kailāsaṃ laṅghayitvātha daśagrīvaḥ sa rāvaṇaḥ | āsasāda mahātejā indralokaṃ niśācaraḥ || 7.27.1 ||
tasya rākṣasasainyasya samantādupayāsyataḥ | devalokaṃ yayau śabdo mathyamānārṇavopamaḥ || 7.27.2 ||
śrutvā tu rāvaṇaṃ prāptamindraścalita āsanāt | abravīttatra tān devān sarvāneva samāgatān || 7.27.3 ||
ādityānsavasūnrudrānviśvānsādhyānmarudgaṇān | sajjībhavata yuddhārthaṃ rāvaṇasya durātmanaḥ || 7.27.4 ||
evamuktāstu śakreṇa devāḥ śakrasamā yudhi | sannahya sumahāsattvā yuddhaśraddhāsamanvitāḥ || 7.27.5 ||
sa tu dīnaḥ paritrasto mahendro rāvaṇaṃ prati | viṣṇoḥ samīpamāgatya vākyametaduvāca ha || 7.27.6 ||
viṣṇo kathaṃ kariṣyāmi mahāvīryaparākramaḥ | asau hi balavadrakṣo yuddhārthamabhivartate || 7.27.7 ||
varapradānādbalavānna khalvanyena hetunā | tattu satyavacaḥ kāryaṃ yaduktaṃ padmayoninā || 7.27.8 ||
tadyathā namucirvṛtro balirnarakaśambarau | tvadbalaṃ samavaṣṭabhya mayā dagdhāstathā kuru || 7.27.9 ||
nahyanyo devadeveśa tvāmṛte madhusūdana | gatiḥ parāyaṇaṃ nāsti trailokye sacarācare || 7.27.10 ||
tvaṃ hi nārāyaṇaḥ śrīmānpadmanābhaḥ sanātanaḥ | tvayeme sthāpitā lokāḥ śakraścāhaṃ sureśvaraḥ || 7.27.11 ||
tvayā sṛṣṭamidaṃ sarvaṃ trailokyaṃ sacarācaram | tvāmeva bhagavansarve praviśanti yugakṣaye || 7.27.12 ||
tadācakṣva yathā tattvaṃ devadeva mama svayam | api cakrasahāyastvaṃ yotsyase rāvaṇaṃ prabho || 7.27.13 ||
evamuktaḥ sa śakreṇa devo nārāyaṇaḥ prabhuḥ | abravīnna paritrāsaḥ kartavyaḥ śrūyatāṃ ca me || 7.27.14 ||
na tāvadeṣa duṣṭātmā śakyo jetuṃ surāsuraiḥ | hantuṃ cāpi samāsādya varadānena durjayaḥ || 7.27.15 ||
sarvathā tu mahatkarma kariṣyati balotkaṭaḥ | rākṣasaḥ putrasahito dṛṣṭametannisargataḥ || 7.27.16 ||
yattu māṃ tvamabhāṣiṣṭha yuddhyasveti sureśvara | nāhaṃ taṃ pratiyotsyāmi rāvaṇaṃ rākṣasaṃ yudhi || 7.27.17 ||
nāhatvā samare śatruṃ viṣṇuḥ pratinivartate | durlabhaścaiva kāmo 'dya varaguptāddhi rāvaṇāt || 7.27.18 ||
pratijāne ca devendra tvatsamīpe śatakrato | bhavitā 'smi yathā 'syāhaṃ rakṣaso mṛtyukāraṇam || 7.27.19 ||
ahameva nihantā 'smi rāvaṇaṃ sapuraḥsaram | devatā nandayiṣyāmi jñātvā kālamupāgatam | etatte kathitaṃ tattvaṃ devarāja śacīpate || 7.27.20 ||
yuddhyasva vigatatrāsaḥ sarvaiḥ sārdhaṃ mahābala || 7.27.21 ||
yāmi jñātvā kālamupāgatam | tato rudrāḥ sahādityā vasavo maruto 'śvanau | sannaddhā niryayustūrṇaṃ rākṣasānabhitaḥ purāt || 7.27.22 ||
etasminnantare nādaḥ śuśruve rajanīkṣaye | tasya rāvaṇasainyasya prayuddhasya samantataḥ || 7.27.23 ||
te prayuddhā mahāvīryā hyanyonyamabhivīkṣya vai | saṅgrāmamevābhimukhā hyabhavartanta hṛṣṭavat || 7.27.24 ||
tato daivatasainyanāṃ saṅkṣobhaḥ samajāyata | tadakṣayaṃ mahāsainyaṃ dṛṣṭvā samaramūrdhani || 7.27.25 ||
tato yuddhaṃ samabhaveddevadānavarakṣasām | ghoraṃ tumulanirhrādaṃ nānāpraharaṇodyatam || 7.27.26 ||
etasminnantare śūrā rākṣasā ghoradarśanāḥ | yuddhārthaṃ samavartanta sacivā rāvaṇasya te || 7.27.27 ||
mārīcaśca prahastaśca mahāpārśvamahodarau | akampano nikumbhaśca śukaḥ sāraṇa eva ca || 7.27.28 ||
saṃhlādo dhūmaketuśca mahādaṃṣṭro ghaṭodaraḥ | jambumālī mahāhrādo virūpākṣaśca rākṣasaḥ || 7.27.29 ||
suptaghno yajñakopaśca durmukho dūṣaṇaḥ kharaḥ | triśirāḥ karavīrākṣaḥ sūryaśatruśca rākṣasaḥ || 7.27.30 ||
mahākāyo 'tikāyaśca devāntakanarāntakau | etaiḥ sarvaiḥ parivṛto mahāvīryo mahābalaḥ || 7.27.31 ||
rāvaṇasyāryakaḥ sainyaṃ sumālī praviveśa ha | sa daivatagaṇānsarvānnānāpraharaṇaiḥ śitaiḥ | vyadhvaṃsayatsusaṅkruddho vāyurjaladharāniva || 7.27.32 ||
taddaivatabalaṃ rāma hanyamānaṃ niśācaraiḥ | praṇunnaṃ sarvato digbhyaḥ siṃhanunnā mṛgā iva || 7.27.33 ||
etasminnantare śūro vasūnāmaṣṭamo vasuḥ | sāvitra iti vikhyātaḥ praviveśa raṇājiram || 7.27.34 ||
tathā ' 'dityau mahāvīryau tvaṣṭā pūṣā ca daṃśitau | niṃrbhayau saha sainyena tadā prāviśatāṃ raṇe || 7.27.35 ||
tato yuddhaṃ samabhavatsurāṇāṃ saha rākṣasaiḥ | kruddhānāṃ rakṣasāṃ kīrtiṃ samareṣvanivartinām || 7.27.36 ||
tataste rākṣasāḥ sarve vibudhānsamare sthitān | nānāpraharaṇairghorairjaghnuḥ śatasahasraśaḥ || 7.27.37 ||
devāśca rākṣasānghorānmahābalaparākramān | samare vimalaiḥ śastrairupaninyuryamakṣayam || 7.27.38 ||
etasminnantare rāma sumālī nāma rākṣasaḥ | nānāpraharaṇaiḥ kruddhastatsainyaṃ so 'bhyavartata || 7.27.39 ||
sa daivatabalaṃ sarvaṃ nānāprahaṇaiḥ śitaiḥ | vyadhvaṃsayata saṅkruddho vāyurjaladharaṃ yathā || 7.27.40 ||
te mahābāṇavarṣaiśca śūlaprāsaiḥ sudāruṇaiḥ | hanyamānāḥ surāḥ sarve na vyatiṣṭhanta saṃhatāḥ || 7.27.41 ||
tato vidrāvyamāṇeṣu daivateṣu sumālinā | vasūnāmaṣṭamaḥ kruddhaḥ sāvitro vai vyavasthitaḥ || 7.27.42 ||
saṃvṛtaḥ svairathānīkaiḥ praharantaṃ niśācaram | vikrameṇa mahātejā vārayāmāsa saṃyuge || 7.27.43 ||
tatastayormahāyuddhamabhavadromaharṣaṇam || 7.27.44 ||
sumālino vasoścaiva samareṣvanivartinoḥ | tatastasya mahābāṇairvasunā sumahātmanā | nihataḥ pannagarathaḥ kṣaṇena vinipātitaḥ || 7.27.45 ||
hatvā tu saṃyuge tasya rathaṃ bāṇaśataiścitam | gadāṃ tasya vadhārthāya vasurjagrāha pāṇinā || 7.27.46 ||
tataḥ pragṛhya dīptāgrāṃ kāladaṇḍopamāṃ gadām | tāṃ mūrdhni pātayāmāsa sāvitro vai sumālinaḥ || 7.27.47 ||
sā tasyopari colkābhā patantīva babhau gadā | indrapramuktā garjantī girāviva mahāśaniḥ || 7.27.48 ||
tasya naivāsthi na śiro na māṃsaṃ dadṛśe tadā | gadayā bhasmatāṃ nītaṃ nihatasya raṇājire || 7.27.49 ||
taṃ dṛṣṭvā nihataṃ saṅkhye rākṣasāste samantataḥ | vyadravansahitāḥ sarve krośamānāḥ parasparam | vidrāvyamāṇā vasunā rākṣasā nāvatasthire || 7.27.50 ||
sumālinaṃ hataṃ dṛṣṭvā vasunā bhasmasātkṛtam | svasainyaṃ vidrutaṃ cāpi lakṣayitvā 'rditaṃ suraiḥ || 7.28.1 ||
tataḥ sa balavānkruddho rāvaṇasya sutastadā | nivartya rākṣasānsarvānmeghanādo vyavasthitaḥ || 7.28.2 ||
surathenāgnivarṇena kāmagena mahārathaḥ | abhidudrāva senāṃ tāṃ vanānyagniriva jvalan || 7.28.3 ||
tataḥ praviśatastasya vividhāyudhadhāriṇaḥ | vidudruvurdiśaḥ sarvā darśanādeva devatāḥ || 7.28.4 ||
na babhūva tadā kaścidyuyutsorasya sammukhe | sarvānāviddhya vitrastāṃstataḥ śakro 'bravītsurān || 7.28.5 ||
na bhetavyaṃ na gantavyaṃ nivartadhvaṃ raṇe surāḥ | eṣa gacchati putro me yuddhārthamaparājitaḥ || 7.28.6 ||
tataḥ śakrasuto devo jayanta iti viśrutaḥ | rathenādbhutakalpena saṅgrāme so 'bhyavartata || 7.28.7 ||
tataste tridaśāḥ sarve parivārya śacīsutam | rāvaṇasya sutaṃ yuddhe samāsādya prajaghnire || 7.28.8 ||
teṣāṃ yuddhaṃ samabhavatsadṛśaṃ devarakṣasām | mahendrasya ca putrasya rākṣasendrasutasya ca || 7.28.9 ||
tato mātaliputre tu gomukhe rākṣasātmajaḥ | sārathau pātayāmāsa śarānkanakabhūṣaṇān || 7.28.10 ||
śacīsutaścāpi tathā jayantastasya sārathim | taṃ cāpi rāvaṇiḥ kruddhaḥ samantātpratyavidhyata || 7.28.11 ||
sa hi krodhasamāviṣṭo balī visphāritekṣaṇaḥ | rāvaṇiḥ śakratanayaṃ śaravarṣairavākirat || 7.28.12 ||
tato nānāpraharaṇāñchitadhārānsahasraśaḥ | pātayāmāsa saṅkruddhaḥ surasainyeṣu rāvaṇiḥ || 7.28.13 ||
śataghnīmusalaprāsagadākhaḍgaparaśvadhān | mahānti giriśṛṅgāṇi pātayāmāsa rāvaṇiḥ || 7.28.14 ||
tataḥ pravyathitā lokāḥ sañjajñe ca tamo 'bhavat | tasya rāvaṇaputrasya śatrusainyāni nighnataḥ || 7.28.15 ||
tatastaddaivatabalaṃ samantāttaṃ śacīsutam | bahuprakāramasvasthamabhavaccharapīḍitam || 7.28.16 ||
nābhyajānanta cānyonyaṃ rakṣo vā devatā 'thavā | tatra tatra viparyastaṃ samantātparidhāvati || 7.28.17 ||
devā devānnijaghnuste rākṣasānrākṣasāstathā | sammūḍhāstamasācchannā vyadravannapare tathā || 7.28.18 ||
etasminnantare vīraḥ pulomā nāma vīryavān | daityendrastena saṅgṛhya śacīputro 'pavāhitaḥ || 7.28.19 ||
saṅgṛhya taṃ tu dauhitraṃ praviṣṭaḥ sāgaraṃ tadā | āryakaḥ sa hi tasyāsītpulomā yena sā śacī || 7.28.20 ||
jñātvā praṇāśaṃ tu tadā jayantasyātha devatāḥ | aprahṛṣṭāstataḥ sarvā vyathitāḥ sampradudruvuḥ || 7.28.21 ||
rāvaṇistvatha saṅkruddho balaiḥ parivṛtaḥ svakaiḥ | abhyadhāvata devāṃstānmumoca ca mahāsvanam || 7.28.22 ||
dṛṣṭvā praṇāśaṃ putrasya daivateṣu ca vidrutam | mātaliṃ cāha deveśo rathaḥ samupanīyatām || 7.28.23 ||
sa tu divyo mahābhīmaḥ sajja eva mahārathaḥ | upasthito mātalinā vāhyamāno mahājavaḥ || 7.28.24 ||
tato meghā rathe tasmiṃstaḍittvanto mahābalāḥ | agrato vāyucapalā neduḥ paramaniḥsvanāḥ || 7.28.25 ||
nānāvādyāni vādyanta gandharvāśca samāhitāḥ | nanṛtuścāpsaraḥsaṅghā niryāte tridaśeśvare || 7.28.26 ||
rudrairvasubhirādityaissādhyaiśca samarudgaṇaiḥ | vṛto nānāpraharaṇairniryayau tridaśādhipaḥ || 7.28.27 ||
nirgacchatastu śakrasya paruṣaṃ pavano vavau | bhāskaro niṣprabhaścāsīnmaholkāśca prapedire || 7.28.28 ||
etasminnantare śūro daśagrīvaḥ pratāpavān | āruroha rathaṃ divyaṃ nirmitaṃ viśvakarmaṇā || 7.28.29 ||
pannagaiḥ sumahākāryairveṣṭitaṃ romaharṣaṇaiḥ | teṣāṃ niḥśvāsavātena pradīptamiva saṃyuge || 7.28.30 ||
daityairniśācaraiścaiva sa rathaḥ parivāritaḥ | samarābhimukho daityo mahendraṃ so 'bhyavartata || 7.28.31 ||
putraṃ taṃ vārayitvā tu svayameva vyavasthitaḥ | so 'pi yuddhādviniṣkramya rāvaṇiḥ samupāviśat || 7.28.32 ||
tato yuddhaṃ pravṛttaṃ tu surāṇāṃ rākṣasaiḥ saha | śastrāṇi varṣatāṃ ghoraṃ meghānāmiva saṃyuge || 7.28.33 ||
kumbhakarṇastu duṣṭātmā nānāpraharaṇodyataḥ | nājñāyata tadā yuddhe saha kenāpyayudhyata || 7.28.34 ||
dantaiḥ bhujābhyāṃ padmāṃ ca śaktitomarasāyakaiḥ | yena kenaiva saṃrabdhastāḍayāmāsa vai surān || 7.28.35 ||
tato rudrairmahāghoraiḥ saṅgamyātha niśācaraḥ | prayuddhastaiśca saṅgrāme kṣataḥ śastrairnirantaram || 7.28.36 ||
babhau śastrācitatanuḥ kumbhakarṇaḥ kṣarannasṛk | vidyutstanitanirghoṣo dhāravāniva toyadaḥ || 7.28.37 ||
tatastadrākṣasaṃ sainyaṃ prayuddhaṃ samarudgaṇaiḥ | raṇe vidrāvitaṃ sarvaṃ nānāpraharaṇaiḥ śitaiḥ || 7.28.38 ||
kecidvinihatāḥ kṛttāśceṣṭanti sma mahītale | vāhaneṣvavasaktāśca sthitā evāpare raṇe || 7.28.39 ||
rathānnāgānkharānuṣṭrānpannagāṃsturagān raṇe | śiṃśumārānvarāhāṃśca piśācavadanāntathā || 7.28.40 ||
tānsamāliṅgya bāhubhyāṃ viṣṭabdhāḥ keciducchrutāḥ | devaistu śastrasambhinnā mamrire ca niśācarāḥ || 7.28.41 ||
citrakarma ivābhāti sa teṣāṃ raṇasamplavaḥ | nihatānāṃ pramattānāṃ rākṣasānāṃ mahītale || 7.28.42 ||
śoṇitodakaniṣpandakaṅkagṛdhrasamākulā | pravṛttā saṃyugamukhe śastragrāhavatī nadī || 7.28.43 ||
etasminnantare kruddho daśagrīvaḥ pratāpavān | nirīkṣya tadbalaṃ kṛtsnaṃ daivatairvinipātitam || 7.28.44 ||
sa taṃ prati vigāhyāśu pravṛddhaṃ sainyasāgaram | tridaśānsamare nighnañchakramevābhyavartata || 7.28.45 ||
āgācchakro mahaccāpaṃ visphārya sumahāsvanam | yasya visphāraghoṣeṇa stananti sma diśo daśa || 7.28.46 ||
tadvikṛṣya mahaccāpamindro rāvaṇamūrdhani | nipātayāmāsa śarānpāvakādityavarcasaḥ || 7.28.47 ||
tathaiva ca mahābāhurdaśagrīvo vyavasthitaḥ | śakraṃ kārmukavibhraṣṭaiḥ śaravarṣairavākirat || 7.28.48 ||
prayudhyatoratha tayorbāṇavarṣaiḥ samantataḥ | na jñāyate tadā kiñcitsarvaṃ hi tamasā vṛtam || 7.28.49 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe 'ṣṭāviṃśaḥ sargaḥ || 28 ||
tatastamasi sañjāte sarve te devarākṣasāḥ | ayuddhyanta balonmattāḥ sūdayantaḥ parasparam || 7.29.1 ||
tatastu devasainyena rākṣasānāṃ bṛhadbalam | daśāṃśaṃ sthāpitaṃ yuddhe śeṣaṃ nītaṃ yamakṣayam || 7.29.2 ||
tasmiṃstu tāmase yuddhe sarve te devarākṣasāḥ | anyonyaṃ nābhyajānanta yudhyamānāḥ parasparam || 7.29.3 ||
indraśca rāvaṇaścaiva rāvaṇiśca mahābalaḥ | tasmiṃstamojālavṛte mohamīyurna te trayaḥ || 7.29.4 ||
sa tu dṛṣṭvā balaṃ sarvaṃ rāvaṇo nihataṃ kṣaṇāt | krodhamabhyagamattīvraṃ mahānādaṃ ca muktavān || 7.29.5 ||
krodhātsūtaṃ ca durdharṣaḥ syandanasthamuvāca ha | parasainyasya madhyena yāvadanto nayasva mām || 7.29.6 ||
adyaitān tridaśānsarvānvikramaiḥ samare svayam | nānāśastrairmahāghorairnayāmi yamasādanam || 7.29.7 ||
ahamindraṃ vadhiṣyāmi dhanadaṃ varuṇaṃ yamam | tridaśānvinihatyātha svayaṃ sthāsyāmyathopari | viṣādo na ca kartavyaḥ śīghraṃ vāhaya me ratham || 7.29.8 ||
dviḥ khalu tvāṃ bravīmyadya yāvadanto nayasva mām || 7.29.9 ||
ayaṃ sa nandanoddeśo yatra vartāmahe vayam | naya māmadya tatra tvamudayo yatra parvataḥ || 7.29.10 ||
tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā turagānsa manojavān | ādideśātha śatraṇāṃ madhyenaiva ca sārathiḥ || 7.29.11 ||
tasya taṃ niścayaṃ jñātvā śakro deveśvarastadā | rathasthaḥ samarasthastāndevānvākyamathābravīt || 7.29.12 ||
surāḥ śṛṇuta madvākyaṃ yattāvanmama rocate | jīvanneva daśagrīvaḥ sādhu rakṣo nigṛhyatām || 7.29.13 ||
eṣa hyatibalaḥ sainyai rathena pavanaujasā | gamiṣyati pravṛddhormiḥ samudra iva parvaṇi || 7.29.14 ||
nahyeṣa hantuṃ śakyo 'dya varadānātsunirbhayaḥ | tadgrahīṣyāmahe rakṣo yattā bhavata saṃyuge || 7.29.15 ||
yathā balau niruddhe ca trailokyaṃ bhujyate mayā | evametasya pāpasya nirodho mama rocate || 7.29.16 ||
tato 'nyaṃ deśamāsthāya śakraḥ santyajya rāvaṇam | ayudhyata mahārāja rākṣasāṃstrāsayanraṇe || 7.29.17 ||
uttareṇa daśagrīvaḥ praviveśānivartakaḥ | dakṣiṇena tu pārśvena praviveśa śatakratuḥ || 7.29.18 ||
tataḥ sa yojanaśataṃ praviṣṭo rākṣasādhipaḥ | devatānāṃ balaṃ sarvaṃ śaravarṣairavākirat || 7.29.19 ||
tataḥ śakro nirīkṣyātha pranaṣṭaṃ tu svakaṃ balam | nyavartayadasambhrāntaḥ samāvṛtya daśānanam || 7.29.20 ||
etasminnantare nādo mukto dānavarākṣasaiḥ | hā hatāḥ sma iti grastaṃ dṛṣṭvā śakreṇa rāvaṇam || 7.29.21 ||
tato rathaṃ samāsthāya rāvaṇiḥ krodhamūrcchitaḥ | tatsainyamatisaṅkruddhaḥ praviveśa sudāruṇam || 7.29.22 ||
tāṃ praviśya mahāmāyāṃ prāptāṃ gopatinā purā | praviveśa susaṃrabdhastatsainyaṃ samabhidravat || 7.29.23 ||
sa sarvā devatāstyaktvā śakramevābhyadhāvata | mahendraśca mahātejā nāpaśyacca sutaṃ ripoḥ || 7.29.24 ||
vimuktakavacastatra vadhyamāno 'pi rāvaṇiḥ | tridaśaiḥ sumahāvīryairna cakāra ca kiñcana || 7.29.25 ||
sa mātaliṃ samāyāntaṃ tāḍayitvā śarottamaiḥ | mahendraṃ bāṇavarṣeṇa bhūya evābhyavākirat || 7.29.26 ||
tatastyaktvā rathaṃ śakro visasarja ca sārathim | airāvataṃ samāruhya mṛgayāmāsa rāvaṇim || 7.29.27 ||
sa tatra māyābalavānadṛśyo 'thāntarikṣagaḥ | indraṃ māyāparikṣiptaṃ kṛtvā sa prādravaccharaiḥ || 7.29.28 ||
sa taṃ yadā pariśrāntamindraṃ jajñe 'tha rāvaṇiḥ | tadainaṃ māyayā baddhvā svasainyamabhito 'nayat || 7.29.29 ||
taṃ tu dṛṣṭvā balāttena nīyamānaṃ mahāraṇāt | mahendramamarāḥ sarve kiṃ nu syādityacintayan || 7.29.30 ||
dṛśyate na sa māyāvī śakrajitsamitiñjayaḥ | vidyāvānapi yenendro māyayā nīyate balāt || 7.29.31 ||
etasminnantare kruddhāḥ sarve suragaṇāstadā | rāvaṇaṃ vimukhīkṛtya śaravarṣairavākiran || 7.29.32 ||
rāvaṇastu samāsādya ādityāṃśca vasūṃstadā | na śaśāka sa saṅgrāme yoddhuṃ śatrubhirarditaḥ || 7.29.33 ||
sa taṃ dṛṣṭvā parimlānaṃ prahārairjarjarīkṛtam | rāvaṇiḥ pitaraṃ yuddhe darśanastho 'bravīdidam || 7.29.34 ||
āgaccha tāta gacchāmo raṇakarma nivartatām | jitaṃ no viditaṃ te 'stu svastho bhava gatajvaraḥ || 7.29.35 ||
ayaṃ hi surasainyasya trailokyasya ca yaḥ prabhuḥ | sa gṛhīto daivabalādbhagnadarpāḥ surāḥ kṛtāḥ || 7.29.36 ||
yatheṣṭaṃ bhuṅkṣva lokāṃstrīnnigṛhyārātimojasā | vṛthā kiṃ te śrameṇeha yuddhamadya tu niṣphalam || 7.29.37 ||
tataste daivatagaṇā nivṛttā raṇakarmaṇaḥ | tacchrutvā rāvaṇervākyaṃ svasthacetāḥ babhūva ha || 7.29.38 ||
atha sa raṇavigatajvaraḥ prabhurvijayamavāpya niśācarādhipaḥ | svabhavanamabhito jagāma hṛṣṭaḥ svasutamavāpya ca vākyamabravīt || 7.29.39 ||
atibalasadṛśaiḥ parākramaistairmama kulamānavivardhanaṃ kṛtam | yadayamatulyabalastvayādya vai tridaśapatistridaśāśca nirjitāḥ || 7.29.40 ||
naya rathamadhiropya vāsavaṃ nagaramito vraja senayā vṛtastvam | ahamapi tava gacchato drutaṃ saha sacivairanuyāmi pṛṣṭhataḥ || 7.29.41 ||
atha sa balavṛtaḥ savāhanastridaśapatiṃ parigṛhya rāvaṇiḥ | svabhavanamabhigamya vīryavānkṛtasamarānvisasarja rākṣasān || 7.29.42 ||
jite mahendre 'tibale rāvaṇasya sutena vai | prajāpatiṃ puraskṛtya yayurlaṅkāṃ surāstadā || 7.30.1 ||
tatra rāvaṇamāsādya putrabhrātṛbhirāvṛtam | abravīdgagane tiṣṭhansāmapūrvaṃ prajāpatiḥ || 7.30.2 ||
vatsa rāvaṇa tuṣṭo 'smi putrasya tava saṃyuge | aho 'sya vikramaudāryaṃ tava tulyo 'dhiko 'pi vā || 7.30.3 ||
jitaṃ hi bhavatā sarvaṃ trailokyaṃ svena tejasā | kṛtā pratijñā saphalā prīto 'smi svasutena vai || 7.30.4 ||
ayaṃ ca putro 'tibalastava rāvaṇa vīryavān | jagatīndrajidityeva parikhyāto bhaviṣyati || 7.30.5 ||
balavāndurjayaścaiva bhaviṣyatyeva rākṣasaḥ | yaṃ samāśritya te rājansthāpitāstridaśā vaśe || 7.30.6 ||
tanmucyatāṃ mahābāho mahendraḥ pākaśāsanaḥ | kiñcāsya mokṣaṇārthāya prayacchantu divaukasaḥ || 7.30.7 ||
athābravīnmahātejā indrajitsamitiñjayaḥ | amaratvamahaṃ deva vṛṇe yadyeṣa mucyate || 7.30.8 ||
catuṣpadāṃ khecarāṇāmanyeṣāṃ vā mahaujasām | vṛkṣagulmakṣupalatātṛṇopalamahībhṛtām || 7.30.9 ||
sarve 'pi jantavo 'nyonyaṃ bhetavye sati bibhyati | ato 'tra loke sarveṣāṃ sarvasmācca bhavedbhayam || 7.30.10 ||
tato 'bravīnmahātejā meghanādaṃ prajāpatiḥ | nāsti sarvāmaratvaṃ hi kasyacitprāṇino bhuvi | catuṣpadaḥ pakṣiṇaśca bhūtānāṃ vā mahaujasām || 7.30.11 ||
śrutvā pitāmahenoktamindrajitprabhuṇāvyayam || 7.30.12 ||
्vaṃ hi kasyacitprāṇino bhuvi | athābravītsa tatrasthaṃ meghanādo mahābalaḥ | śrūyatāṃ vā bhavetsiddhiḥ śatakratuvimokṣaṇe || 7.30.13 ||
mameṣṭaṃ nityaśo harvyairmantraiḥ sampūjya pāvakam | saṅgrāmamavatarttuṃ ca śatrunirjayakāṅkṣiṇaḥ || 7.30.14 ||
aśvayukto ratho mahyamuttiṣṭhettu vibhāvasoḥ | tatsthasyāmaratā syānme eṣa me niścayo varaḥ || 7.30.15 ||
tasminyadyasamāpte ca japyahome vibhāvasau | yudhyeyaṃ deva saṅgrāme tadā me syādvināśanam || 7.30.16 ||
sarvo hi tapasā deva vṛṇotyamaratāṃ pumān | vikrameṇa mayā tvetadamaratvaṃ pravartitam || 7.30.17 ||
evamastviti taṃ cāha vākyaṃ devaḥ pitāmahaḥ | muktaścendrajitā śakro gatāśca tridivaṃ surāḥ || 7.30.18 ||
etasminnantare rāma dīno bhraṣṭāmbaradyutiḥ | indraścintāparītātmā dhyānatatparatāṃ gataḥ || 7.30.19 ||
taṃ tu dṛṣṭvā tathābhūtaṃ prāha devaḥ prajāpatiḥ | śatakrato kimu purā karoti sma suduṣkṛtam || 7.30.20 ||
amarendra mayā bahvyaḥ prajāḥ sṛṣṭāstathā prabho | ekavarṇāḥ samābhāṣā ekarūpāśca sarvaśaḥ || 7.30.21 ||
tāsāṃ nāsti viśeṣo hi darśane lakṣaṇe 'pi vā | tato 'hamekāgramanāstāḥ prajāḥ paricintayam || 7.30.22 ||
so 'haṃ tāsāṃ viśeṣārthaṃ striyamekāṃ vinirmame | yadyatprajānāṃ pratyaṅgaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ tattaduddhṛtam || 7.30.23 ||
tato mayā rūpaguṇairahalyā strī vinirmitā | halaṃ nāmeha vairūpaṃ halyaṃ tatprabhavaṃ bhavet || 7.30.24 ||
yasmānna vidyate halyaṃ tenāhalyeti viśrutā | ahalyeti mayā śakra tasyā nāma pravartitam || 7.30.25 ||
nirmitāyāṃ ca devendra tasyāṃ nāryāṃ surarṣabha | bhaviṣyatīti kasyaiṣā mama cintā tato 'bhavat || 7.30.26 ||
tvaṃ tu śakra tadā nārīṃ jānīṣe manasā prabho | sthānādhikatayā patnī mamaiṣeti purandara || 7.30.27 ||
sā mayā nyāsabhūtā tu gautamasya mahātmanaḥ | nyastā bahūni varṣāṇi tena niryātitā ca ha || 7.30.28 ||
tatastasya parijñāya mahāsthairyaṃ mahāmuneḥ | jñātvā tapasi siddhiṃ ca patnyarthaṃ sparśitā tadā || 7.30.29 ||
saṅkruddhastvaṃ hi dharmātman gatvā tasyāśramaṃ muneḥ | dṛṣṭavāṃśca tadā tāṃ strīṃ dīptāmagniśikhāmiva || 7.30.30 ||
sā tvayā dharṣitā śakra kāmārtena samanyunā | dṛṣṭastvaṃ ca tadā tena hyāśrame paramarṣiṇā || 7.30.31 ||
tataḥ kruddhena tenā 'si śaptaḥ paramatejasā | gato 'si yena devendra daśābhāgaviparyayam || 7.30.32 ||
yasmānme dharṣitā patnī tvayā vāsava nirbhayam | tasmāttvaṃ samare rājañchatruhastaṃ gamiṣyasi || 7.30.33 ||
ayaṃ tu bhāvo durbuddhe yastvayeha pravartitaḥ | mānuṣeṣvapi lokeṣu bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ || 7.30.34 ||
tatrārdhaṃ tasya yaḥ kartā tvayyardhaṃ nipatiṣyati | na ca te sthāvaraṃ sthānaṃ bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ || 7.30.35 ||
yaśca yaśca surendraḥ syāddhruvaḥ sa na bhaviṣyati | eṣa śāpo mayā mukta ityasau tvāṃ tadā 'bravīt || 7.30.36 ||
tāṃ tu bhāryāṃ sa nirbhartsya so 'bravītsumahātapāḥ | durvinīte vinidhvaṃsa mamāśramasamīpataḥ || 7.30.37 ||
rūpayauvanasampannā yasmāttvamanavasthitā | tasmādrūpavatī loke na tvamekā bhaviṣyati || 7.30.38 ||
rūpaṃ ca te prajāḥ sarvā gamiṣyanti na saṃśayaḥ | yattadekaṃ samāśritya vibhramo 'yamupasthitaḥ || 7.30.39 ||
tadāprabhṛti bhūyiṣṭhaṃ prajā rūpasamanvitāḥ | sā taṃ prasādayāmāsa maharṣiṃ gautamaṃ tadā || 7.30.40 ||
ajñānāddharṣitā vipra tvadrūpeṇa divaukasā | na kāmakārādviprarṣe prasādaṃ kartumarhasi || 7.30.41 ||
ahalyayā tvevamuktaḥ pratyuvāca sa gautamaḥ | utpatsyati mahātejā ikṣvākūṇāṃ mahārathaḥ || 7.30.42 ||
rāmo nāma śruto loke vanaṃ cāpyupayāsyati | brāhmaṇārthe mahābāhurviṣṇurmānuṣavigrahaḥ | taṃ drakṣyasi yadā bhadre tataḥ pūtā bhaviṣyasi || 7.30.43 ||
sa hi pāvayituṃ śaktastvayā yadduṣkṛtaṃ kṛtam | tasyātithyaṃ ca kṛtvā vai matsamīpaṃ gamiṣyasi || 7.30.44 ||
vatsyasi tvaṃ mayā sārdhaṃ tadā hi varavarṇini | evamuktvā sa viprarṣirājagāma svamāśramam || 7.30.45 ||
tapaścācāra sumahatsā patnī brahmavādinaḥ | śāpotsargāddhi tasyedaṃ muneḥ sarvamupasthitam || 7.30.46 ||
tatsmara tvaṃ mahābāho duṣkṛtaṃ yattvayā kṛtam | tena tvaṃ grahaṇaṃ śatroryāto nānyena vāsava || 7.30.47 ||
śīghraṃ vai yaja yajñaṃ tvaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ susamāhitaḥ | pāvitastena yajñena yāsyase tridivaṃ tataḥ || 7.30.48 ||
putraśca tava devendra na vinaṣṭo mahāraṇe | nītaḥ sannihitaścaiva āryakeṇa mahodadhau || 7.30.49 ||
etacchrutvā mahendrastu yajñamiṣṭvā ca vaiṣṇavam | punastridivamākrāmadanvaśāsacca devarāṭ || 7.30.50 ||
etadindrajito nāma balaṃ yatkīrtitaṃ mayā | nirjitastena devendraḥ prāṇino 'nye tu kiṃ punaḥ || 7.30.51 ||
āścaryamiti rāmaśca lakṣmaṇaścābravīttadā | agastyavacanaṃ śrutvā vānarā rākṣasāstadā || 7.30.52 ||
vibhīṣaṇastu rāmasya pārśvastho vākyamabravīt | āścaryaṃ smārito 'smyadya yattaddṛṣṭaṃ purātanam || 7.30.53 ||
agastyaṃ tvabravīdrāmaḥ satyametacchrutaṃ ca me || 7.30.54 ||
evaṃ rāma samudbhūto rāvaṇo lokakaṇṭakaḥ | saputro yena saṅgrāme jitaḥ śakraḥ sureśvaraḥ || 7.30.55 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe triṃśaḥ sargaḥ || 30 ||
tato rāmo mahātejā vismayātpunareva hi | uvāca praṇato vākyamagastyamṛṣisattamam || 7.31.1 ||
bhagavanrākṣasaḥ krūro yadāprabhṛti medinīm | paryaṭatkiṃ tadā lokāḥ śūnyā āsandvijottama || 7.31.2 ||
rājā vā rājamātro vā kiṃ tadā nātra kaścana | dharṣaṇaṃ yatra na prāpto rāvaṇo rākṣaseśvaraḥ || 7.31.3 ||
utāho hatavīryāste babhūvuḥ pṛthivīkṣitaḥ | bahiṣkṛtā varāstraiśca bahavo nirjitā nṛpāḥ || 7.31.4 ||
rāghavasya vacaḥ śrutvā hyagastyo bhagavānṛṣiḥ | uvāca rāmaṃ prahasanpitāmaha iveśvaram || 7.31.5 ||
ityevaṃ bādhamānastu pārthivānpārthivarṣabha | cacāra rāvaṇo rāma pṛthivīṃ pṛthivīpate || 7.31.6 ||
tato māhiṣmatīṃ nāma purīṃ svargapurīprabhām | samprāpto yatra sānnidhyaṃ sadāsīdvasuretasaḥ || 7.31.7 ||
tulya āsīnnṛpastasya prabhāvādvasuretasaḥ | arjuno nāma yatrāgniḥ śarakuṇḍeśayaḥ sadā || 7.31.8 ||
tameva divasaṃ so 'tha haihayādhipatirbalī | arjuno narmadāṃ rantuṃ gataḥ strībhiḥ saheśvaraḥ || 7.31.9 ||
tameva divasaṃ so 'tha rāvaṇastatra āgataḥ | rāvaṇo rākṣasendrastu tasyāmātyānapṛcchata || 7.31.10 ||
kvārjuno nṛpatiḥ śīghraṃ samyagākhyātumarhatha | rāvaṇo 'hamanuprāpto yuddhepsurnṛvareṇa ha | mamāgamanamapyagre yuṣmābhiḥ sannivedyatām || 7.31.11 ||
ityevaṃ rāvaṇenoktāste 'mātyāḥ suvipaścitaḥ | abruvanrākṣasapatimasānnidhyaṃ mahīpateḥ || 7.31.12 ||
śrutvā viśravasaḥ putraḥ paurāṇāmarjunaṃ gatam | apasṛtyāgato vindhyaṃ himavatsannibhaṃ girim || 7.31.13 ||
sa tamabhramivāviṣṭamudbhrantamiva medinīm | apaśyadrāvaṇo vindhyamālikhantamivāmbaram || 7.31.14 ||
sahasraśikharopetaṃ siṃhādhyuṣitakandaram | prapātapatitaistoyaiḥ sāṭṭahāsamivāmbudhim || 7.31.15 ||
devadānavagandharvaiḥ sāpsarogaṇakinnaraiḥ | svastrībhiḥ krīḍamānaiśca svargabhūtaṃ mahocchrayam || 7.31.16 ||
nadībhiḥ syandamānābhiḥ sphaṭikapratimaṃ jalam | phaṇābhiścalajihvābhiranantamiva viṣṭhitam || 7.31.17 ||
utkrāmantaṃ darīvantaṃ himavatsannibhaṃ girim | paśyamānastato vindhyaṃ rāvaṇo narmadāṃ yayau || 7.31.18 ||
calopalajalāṃ puṇyāṃ paścimodadhigāminīm || 7.31.19 ||
mahiṣaiḥ sṛmaraiḥ siṃhaiḥ śārdūlarkṣagajottamaiḥ | uṣṇābhitaptaistṛṣitaiḥ saṅkṣobhitajalāśayām || 7.31.20 ||
cakravākaiḥ sakāraṇḍaiḥ sahaṃsajalakukkuṭaiḥ | sārasaiśca sadā mattaiḥ sukūjadbhiḥ samāvṛtām || 7.31.21 ||
phulladrumakṛtottaṃsāṃ cakravākayugastanīm | vistīrṇapulinaśroṇīṃ haṃsāvalisumekhalām || 7.31.22 ||
puṣpareṇvanuliptāṅgīṃ jalaphenāmalāṃśukām | jalāvagāhasaṃsparśāṃ phullotpalaśubhekṣaṇām | puṣpakādavaruhyāśu narmadāṃ saritāṃ varām || 7.31.23 ||
iṣṭāmiva varāṃ nārīmavagāhya daśānanaḥ | sa tasyāḥ puline ramye nānāmuniniṣevite || 7.31.24 ||
upopaviṣṭaiḥ sacivaiḥ sārdhaṃ rākṣasapuṅgavaḥ | prakhyāya narmadāṃ so 'tha gaṅgeyamiti rāvaṇaḥ || 7.31.25 ||
narmadādarśajaṃ harṣamāptavān rākṣasādhipaḥ | uvāca sacivāṃstatra salīlaṃ śukasāraṇau || 7.31.26 ||
eṣa raśmisahasreṇa jagatkṛtvaiva kāñcanam | tīkṣṇatāpakaraḥ sūryo nabhaso 'rdhaṃ samāśritaḥ || 7.31.27 ||
māmāsīnaṃ viditvaiva candrāyati divākaraḥ || 7.31.28 ||
narmadājalaśītaśca sugandhiḥ śramanāśanaḥ | madbhayādanilo 'pyatra vātyeṣa susamāhitaḥ || 7.31.29 ||
iyaṃ vāpi saricchreṣṭhā narmadā narmavardhinī | nakramīnavihaṅgormiḥ sabhayevāṅganā sthitā || 7.31.30 ||
tadbhavantaḥ kṣatāḥ śastrairnṛpairindrasamairyudhi | candanasya raseneva rudhireṇa samukṣitāḥ || 7.31.31 ||
te yūyamavagāhadhvaṃ narmadāṃ śarmadāṃ śubhām | mahāpadmamukhā mattā gaṅgāmiva gahāgajāḥ | asyāṃ snātvā mahānadyāṃ pāpmānaṃ vipramokṣyatha || 7.31.32 ||
ahamapyadya puline śaradindusamaprabhe | puṣpopahāraṃ śanakaiḥ kariṣyāmi kapardinaḥ || 7.31.33 ||
rāvaṇenaivamuktāstu prahastaśukasāraṇāḥ | samahodaradhūmrākṣā narmadāṃ vijagāhire || 7.31.34 ||
rākṣasendragajaistaistu kṣobhitā narmadā nadī | vāmanāñjanapadmādyairgaṅgā iva mahāgajaiḥ || 7.31.35 ||
tataste rākṣasāḥ snātvā narmadāyāṃ mahābalāḥ | uttīrya puṣpāṇyājahrurbalyarthaṃ rāvaṇasya tu || 7.31.36 ||
narmadāpuline hṛdye śubhrābhrasadṛśaprabhe | rākṣasaistu muhūrtena kṛtaḥ puṣpamayo giriḥ || 7.31.37 ||
puṣpeṣūpahṛteṣvevaṃ rāvaṇo rākṣaseśvaraḥ | avatīrṇo nadīṃ snātuṃ gaṅgāmiva mahāgajaḥ || 7.31.38 ||
tatra snātvā ca vidhivajjaptvā japyamanuttamam | narmadāsalilāttasmāduttatāra sa rāvaṇaḥ || 7.31.39 ||
tataḥ klinnāmbaraṃ tyaktvā śuklavastrasamāvṛtam | rāvaṇaṃ prāñjaliṃ yāntamanvayuḥ sarvarākṣasāḥ || 7.31.40 ||
tadgatīvaśamāpannā mūrtimanta ivācalāḥ | yatra yatra ca yāti sma rāvaṇo rākṣaseśvaraḥ | jāmbūnadamayaṃ liṅgaṃ tatra tatra sma nīyate || 7.31.41 ||
vālukāvedimadhye tu talliṅgaṃ sthāpya rāvaṇaḥ | arcayāmāsa gandhaiśca puṣpaiścāmṛtagandhibhiḥ || 7.31.42 ||
tataḥ satāmārtiharaṃ paraṃ varaṃ varapradaṃ candramayūkhabhūṣaṇam | samarcayitvā sa niśācaro jagau prasārya hastānpraṇanarta cāgrataḥ || 7.31.43 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe ekatriṃśaḥ sargaḥ || 31 ||
narmadāpuline yatra rākṣasendraḥ sudāruṇaḥ | puṣpopahāraṃ kurute tasmāddeśādadūrataḥ || 7.32.1 ||
arjuno jayatāṃ śreṣṭho māhiṣmatyāḥ patiḥ prabhuḥ | krīḍate saha nārībhirnarmadātoyamāśritaḥ || 7.32.2 ||
tāsāṃ madhyagato rājā rarāja ca tadārjunaḥ | kareṇūnāṃ sahasrasya madhyastha iva kuñjaraḥ || 7.32.3 ||
jijñāsuḥ sa tu bāhūnāṃ sahasrasyottamaṃ balam | rurodha narmadāvegaṃ bāhubhirbahubhirvṛtaḥ || 7.32.4 ||
kārtavīryabhujāsaktaṃ tajjalaṃ prāpya nirmalam | kūlopahāraṃ kurvāṇaṃ pratisrotaḥ pradhāvati || 7.32.5 ||
samīnanakramakaraḥ sapuṣpakuśasaṃstaraḥ | sa narmadāmbhaso vegaḥ prāvṛṭkāla ivābabhau || 7.32.6 ||
sa vegaḥ kārtavīryeṇa sampreṣita ivāmbhasaḥ | puṣpopahāraṃ sakalaṃ rāvaṇasya jahāra ha || 7.32.7 ||
rāvaṇo 'rdhasamāptaṃ tamutsṛjya niyamaṃ tadā | narmadāṃ paśyate kāntāṃ pratikūlāṃ yathā priyām || 7.32.8 ||
paścimena tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā sāgarodgārasannibham | vardhantamambhaso vegaṃ pūrvāmāśāṃ praviśya tu || 7.32.9 ||
tato 'nubhrāntaśakunāṃ svabhāvoparame sthitām | nirvikārāṅganābhāsāmapaśyadrāvaṇo nadīm || 7.32.10 ||
savyetarakarāṅgulyā saśabdaṃ ca daśānanaḥ | vegaprabhāvamanveṣṭuṃ so 'diśacchukasāraṇau || 7.32.11 ||
tau tu rāvaṇasandiṣṭau bhrātarau śukasāraṇau | vyomāntaragatau vīrau prasthitau paścimāmukhau || 7.32.12 ||
ardhayojanamātraṃ tu gatvā tau rajanīcarau | paśyetāṃ puruṣaṃ toye krīḍantaṃ sahayoṣitam || 7.32.13 ||
bṛhatsālapratīkāśaṃ toyavyākulamūrdhajam | madaraktāntanayanaṃ madavyākulatejasam || 7.32.14 ||
nadīṃ bāhusahasreṇa rundhantamarimardanam | giriṃ pādasahasreṇa rundhantamiva medinīm || 7.32.15 ||
bālānāṃ varanārīṇāṃ sahasreṇa samāvṛtam | samadānāṃ kareṇūnāṃ sahasreṇeva kuñjaram || 7.32.16 ||
tamadbhutatamaṃ dṛṣṭvā rākṣasau śukasāraṇau | sannivṛttāvupāgamya rāvaṇaṃ tamathocatuḥ || 7.32.17 ||
bṛhatsālapratīkāśaḥ ko 'pyasau rākṣaseśvara | narmadāṃ rodhavadruddhvā krīḍāpayati yoṣitaḥ || 7.32.18 ||
tena bāhusahasreṇa sanniruddhajalā nadī | sāgarodgārasaṅkāśānudgārānsṛjate muhuḥ || 7.32.19 ||
ityevaṃ bhāṣamāṇau tau niśāmya śukasāraṇau | rāvaṇo 'rjuna ityuktvā prayayau yuddhalālasaḥ || 7.32.20 ||
arjunābhimukhe tasminrāvaṇe rākṣasādhipe | caṇḍaḥ pravāti pavanaḥ sanādaḥ surajāstathā || 7.32.21 ||
sakṛdeva kṛto rāvaḥ saraktaḥ preṣito ghanaiḥ | mahodaramahāpārśvadhūmrākṣaśukasāraṇaiḥ || 7.32.22 ||
saṃvṛto rākṣasendrastu tatrāgādyatra cārjunaḥ | adīrgheṇaiva kālena sa tadā rākṣaso balī | taṃ narmadāhradaṃ bhīmamājagāmāñjanaprabhaḥ || 7.32.23 ||
sa tatra strīparivṛtaṃ vāśitābhiriva dvipam | narendraṃ paśyate rājā rākṣasānāṃ tadārjunam || 7.32.24 ||
sa roṣādraktanayano rākṣasendro baloddhataḥ || 7.32.25 ||
ityevamarjunāmātyanāha gambhīrayā girā | amātyāḥ kṣipramākhyāta haihayasya nṛpasya vai || 7.32.26 ||
yuddhārthī samanuprāpto rāvaṇo nāma rākṣasaḥ | rāvaṇasya vacaḥ śrutvā mantriṇo 'thārjunasya te | uttasthuḥ sāyudhāstrāśca rāvaṇaṃ vākyamabruvan || 7.32.27 ||
yuddhasya kālo vijñeyaḥ sādhu bhoḥ sādhu rāvaṇa || 7.32.28 ||
caḥ śrutvā mantriṇo 'thārjunasya te | yaḥ kṣībaṃ strīvṛtaṃ caiva yoddhumutsahate nṛpam | strīsamakṣaṃ kathaṃ yattadyoddhumutsahase 'rjunam | vāśitāmadhyagaṃ mattaṃ śārdūla iva kuñjaram || 7.32.29 ||
kṣamasvādya daśagrīva coṣyatāṃ rajanī tvayā | yuddhe śraddhā ca yadyasti śvastāta samare 'rjunam || 7.32.30 ||
yadyadyāsti matiryoddhuṃ yuddhatṛṣṇāsamāvṛtā | nihatyāsmāṃstato yuddhamarjunenopayāsyasi || 7.32.31 ||
tataste rāvaṇāmātyairamātyāḥ pārthivasya tu | sūditāścāpi te yuddhe bhakṣitāśca bubhukṣitaiḥ || 7.32.32 ||
tato halahalāśabdo narmadātīra ābabhau | arjunasyānuyāta'ṇāṃ rāvaṇasya ca mantriṇām || 7.32.33 ||
iṣubhistomaraiḥ śūlaistriśūlairvajrakarṣaṇaiḥ | sarāvaṇānardayantaḥ samantātsamabhidrutāḥ || 7.32.34 ||
haihayādhipayodhānāṃ vega āsītsudāruṇaḥ | sanakramīnamakarasamudrasyeva niḥsvanaḥ || 7.32.35 ||
rāvaṇasya tu te 'mātyāḥ prahastaśukasāraṇāḥ | kārtavīryabalaṃ kruddhā nirdahanti sma tejasā || 7.32.36 ||
arjunāya tu tatkarma rāvaṇasya samantriṇaḥ | krīḍamānāya kathitaṃ puruṣairdvārarakṣibhiḥ || 7.32.37 ||
śrutvā na bhetavyamiti strījanaṃ taṃ tato 'rjunaḥ | uttatāra jalāttasmādgaṅgātoyādivāñjanaḥ || 7.32.38 ||
krodhadūṣitanetrastu sa tato 'rjunapāvakaḥ | prajajvāla mahāghoro yugānta iva pāvakaḥ || 7.32.39 ||
sa tūrṇataramādāya varahemāṅgado gadām | abhidudrāva rakṣāṃsi tamāṃsīva divākaraḥ || 7.32.40 ||
bāhuvikṣepakaraṇāṃ samudyamya mahāgadām | gāruḍaṃ vegamāsthāya cāpapātaiva so 'rjunaḥ || 7.32.41 ||
tasya mārgaṃ samāruddhya vindhyo 'rkasyeva parvataḥ | sthito vindhya ivākampyaḥ prahasto musalāyudhaḥ || 7.32.42 ||
tato 'sya musalaṃ ghoraṃ lohabaddhaṃ mahoddhataḥ | prahastaḥ preṣayankruddho rarāsa ca yathāmbudaḥ || 7.32.43 ||
tasyāgre musalasyāgniraśokāpīḍasannibhaḥ | prahastakaramuktasya babhūva pradahanniva || 7.32.44 ||
athāyāntaṃ tu musalaṃ kārtavīryastadārjunaḥ | nipuṇaṃ vañcayāmāsa sagado 'gadavikramaḥ || 7.32.45 ||
tatastamabhidudrāva prahastaṃ haihayādhipaḥ | bhrāmayāno gadāṃ gurvīṃ pañcabāhuśatocchrayām || 7.32.46 ||
tathā hato 'tivegena prahasto gadayā tadā | nipapāta sthitaḥ śailo vajrivajrahato yathā || 7.32.47 ||
prahastaṃ patitaṃ dṛṣṭvā mārīcaśukasāraṇāḥ | samahodaradhūmrākṣā hyapasṛṣṭā raṇājirāt || 7.32.48 ||
apakrānteṣvamātyeṣu prahaste vai nipātite | rāvaṇo 'bhyadravattūrṇamarjunaṃ nṛpasattamam || 7.32.49 ||
sahasrabāhostadyuddhaṃ viṃśadbāhośca dāruṇam | nṛparākṣasayostatra cārabdhaṃ romaharṣaṇam || 7.32.50 ||
sāgarāviva saṃrabdhau calanmūlāvivācalau | tejoyuktāvivādityau pradahantāvivānalau || 7.32.51 ||
baloddhatau yathā nāgau vāśitārthe yathā vṛṣau | meghāviva vinardantau siṃhāviva balotkaṭau || 7.32.52 ||
rudrakālāviva kruddhau tadā tau rākṣasārjunau | parasparaṃ gadābhyāṃ tau tāḍayāmāsaturbhṛśam || 7.32.53 ||
vajraprahārānacalā yathā ghorānviṣehire | gadāprahārāṃstau tatra sehāte nararākṣasau || 7.32.54 ||
yathā ' śaniravebhyastu jāyate 'tha pratiśrutiḥ | tathā tayorgadāpothairdiśaḥ sarvāḥ pratiśrutāḥ || 7.32.55 ||
arjunasya gadā sā tu pātyamānā 'hitorasi | kāñcanābhaṃ nabhaścakre vidyutsaudāminī yathā || 7.32.56 ||
tathaiva rāvaṇenāpi pātyamānā muhurmuhuḥ | arjunorasi nirbhāti gadolkeva mahāgirau || 7.32.57 ||
nārjunaḥ khedamāyāti na rākṣasagaṇeśvaraḥ | idamāsīttayoryuddhaṃ yathā pūrvaṃ balīndrayoḥ || 7.32.58 ||
śṛṅgairiva vṛṣāyudhyandantāgrairiva kuñjarau | parasparaṃ tau nighnantau nararākṣasasattamau || 7.32.59 ||
tato 'rjunena kruddhena sarvaprāṇena sā gadā | stanayorantare muktā rāvaṇasya mahorasi || 7.32.60 ||
varadānakṛtatrāṇe sā gadā rāvaṇorasi | durbaleva yathāvegaṃ dvidhābhūtvā 'patatkṣitau || 7.32.61 ||
sa tvarjunapramuktena gadāpātena rāvaṇaḥ | apāsarpaddhanurmātraṃ niṣasāda ca niṣṭanan || 7.32.62 ||
sa vihvalaṃ tadālakṣya daśagrīvaṃ tato 'rjunaḥ | sahasotpatya jagrāha garutmāniva pannagam || 7.32.63 ||
sa tu bāhusahasreṇa balādgṛhya daśānanam | babandha balavānrājā baliṃ nārāyaṇo yathā || 7.32.64 ||
badhyamāne daśagrīve siddhacāraṇadevatāḥ | sādhvītivādinaḥ puṣpaiḥ kirantyarjunamūrdhani || 7.32.65 ||
vyāghro mṛgamivādāya mṛgarāḍiva dantinam | nanāda haihayo rājā harṣādambudavanmuhuḥ || 7.32.66 ||
prahastastu samāśvasto dṛṣṭvā baddhaṃ daśānanam | saha tai rākṣasaiḥ kruddhaścābhidudrāva pārthivam || 7.32.67 ||
naktañcarāṇāṃ vegastu teṣāmāpatatāṃ babhau | udbhūta ātapāpāye payodānāmivāmbudhau || 7.32.68 ||
muñca muñceti bhāṣantastiṣṭhatiṣṭheti cāsakṛt | musalāni saśūlāni sotsasarja tadārjune || 7.32.69 ||
aprāptānyeva tānyāśu asambhrāntastadārjunaḥ | āyudhānyamarārīṇāṃ jagrāhāriniṣūdanaḥ || 7.32.70 ||
tatastaireva rakṣāṃsi durdharaiḥ pravarāyudhaiḥ | bhittvā vidrāvayāmāsa vāyurambudharāniva || 7.32.71 ||
rākṣasāṃstrāsayitvā tu kārtavīryo 'rjunastadā | rāvaṇaṃ gṛhya nagaraṃ praviveśa suhṛdvṛtaḥ || 7.32.72 ||
sa kīryamāṇaḥ kusumākṣatotkarairdvijaiḥ sapauraiḥ puruhūtasannibhaḥ | tadā 'rjunaḥ sampraviveśa tāṃ purīṃ baliṃ nigṛhyeva sahasralocanaḥ || 7.32.73 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe dvātriṃśaḥ sargaḥ || 32 ||
rāvaṇagrahaṇaṃ tattu vāyugrahaṇasannibham | tataḥ pulastyaḥ śuśrāva kathitaṃ divi daivataiḥ || 7.33.1 ||
tataḥ putrakṛtasnehātkampyamāno mahādhṛtiḥ | māhiṣmatīpatiṃ draṣṭumājagāma mahānṛṣiḥ || 7.33.2 ||
sa vāyumārgamāsthāya vāyutulyagatirdvijaḥ | purīṃ māhiṣmatīṃ prāpto manaḥsampātavikramaḥ || 7.33.3 ||
so 'marāvatisaṅkāśāṃ hṛṣṭapuṣṭajanākulām | praviveśa purīṃ brahmā indrasyevāmarāvatīm || 7.33.4 ||
pādacāramivādityaṃ niṣpatantaṃ sudurdaśam | tataste pratyabhijñāya arjunāya nivedayan || 7.33.5 ||
pulastya iti vijñāya vacanāddhaihayādhipaḥ | śirasyañjalimādhāya pratyudgacchattapasvinam || 7.33.6 ||
purohito 'sya gṛhyārghyaṃ madhuparkaṃ tathaiva ca | purastātprayayau rājñaḥ śakrasyeva bṛhaspatiḥ || 7.33.7 ||
tatastamṛṣimāyāntamudyantamiva bhāskaram | arjuno dṛśya sambhrānto vavandendra iveśvaram || 7.33.8 ||
sa tasya madhuparkaṃ gāṃ pādyamarghyaṃ nivedya ca | pulastyamāha rājendro harṣagadgadayā girā || 7.33.9 ||
adyaivamamarāvatyā tulyā māhiṣmatī kṛtā | adyāhaṃ tu dvijendra tvāṃ yasmātpaśyāmi durdaśam || 7.33.10 ||
adya me kuśalaṃ deva adya me kuśalaṃ vratam | adya me saphalaṃ janma adya me saphalaṃ tapaḥ | yasmāddevagaṇairvandyau vande 'haṃ caraṇau tava || 7.33.11 ||
idaṃ rājyamime putrā ime dārā ime vayam | brahmankiṃ kurmi kiṃ kāryamājñāpayatu no bhavān || 7.33.12 ||
taṃ dharme 'gniṣu putreṣu śivaṃ pṛṣṭvā ca pārthivam | pulastyovāca rājānaṃ haihayānāṃ tathā 'rjunam || 7.33.13 ||
narendrāmbujapatrākṣa pūrṇacandranibhānana | atulaṃ te balaṃ yena daśagrīvastvayā jitaḥ || 7.33.14 ||
bhayādyasyopatiṣṭhetāṃ niṣpandau sāgarānilau | so 'yaṃ mṛdhe tvayā baddhaḥ pautro me raṇadurjayaḥ || 7.33.15 ||
putrakasya yaśaḥ pītaṃ nāma viśrāvitaṃ tvayā | madvākyādyācyamāno 'dya muñca vatsaṃ daśānanam || 7.33.16 ||
pulastyājñāṃ pragṛhyoce na kiñcana vaco 'rjunaḥ | mumoca vai pārthivendro rākṣasendraṃ prahṛṣṭavat || 7.33.17 ||
sa taṃ pramucya tridaśārimarjunaḥ prapūjya divyābharaṇasragambaraiḥ | ahiṃsakaṃ sakhyamupetya sāgnikaṃ praṇamya taṃ brahmasutaṃ gṛhaṃ yayau || 7.33.18 ||
pulastyenāpi santyakto rākṣasendraḥ pratāpavān | pariṣvaktaḥ kṛtātithyo lajjamāno vinirjitaḥ || 7.33.19 ||
pitāmahasutaścāpi pulastyo munipuṅgavaḥ | mocayitvā daśagrīvaṃ brahmalokaṃ jagāma ha || 7.33.20 ||
evaṃ sa rāvaṇaḥ prāptaḥ kārtavīryātpradharṣaṇam | pulastyavacanāccāpi punarmukto mahābalaḥ || 7.33.21 ||
evaṃ balibhyo balinaḥ santi rāghavanandana | nāvajñā hi pare kāryā ya icchet priyamātmanaḥ || 7.33.22 ||
tataḥ sa rājā piśitāśanānāṃ sahasrabāhorupalabhya maitrīm | punarnṛpāṇāṃ kadanaṃ cakāra cacāra sarvāṃ pṛthivīṃ ca darpāt || 7.33.23 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe trayastriṃśaḥ sargaḥ || 33 ||
arjunena vimuktastu rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ | cacāra pṛthivīṃ sarvāmanirviṇṇastathā kṛtaḥ || 7.34.1 ||
rākṣasaṃ vā manuṣyaṃ vā śṛṇute 'yaṃ balādhikam | rāvaṇastaṃ samāsādya yuddhe hvayati darpitaḥ || 7.34.2 ||
tataḥ kadācitkiṣkindhāṃ nagarīṃ vālipālitām | gatvā hvayati yuddhāya vālinaṃ hemamālinam || 7.34.3 ||
tatastu vānarāmātyastārastārāpitā prabhuḥ | uvāca vānaro vākyaṃ yuddhaprepsumupāgatam || 7.34.4 ||
rākṣasenda gato vālī yaste pratibalo bhavet | ko 'nyaḥ pramukhataḥ sthātuṃ tava śaktaḥ plavaṅgamaḥ || 7.34.5 ||
caturbhyo 'pi samudrebhyaḥ sandhyāmanvāsya rāvaṇa | imaṃ muhūrtamāyāti vālī tiṣṭha muhūrtakam || 7.34.6 ||
etānasthicayānpaśya ya ete śaṅkhapāṇḍurāḥ | yuddhārthināmime rājanvānarādhipatejasā || 7.34.7 ||
yadvā 'mṛtarasaḥ pītastvayā rāvaṇa rākṣasa | tadā vālinamāsādya tadantaṃ tava jīvitam || 7.34.8 ||
paśyedānīṃ jagaccitramimaṃ viśravasaḥ suta | idaṃ muhūrtaṃ tiṣṭhasva durlabhaṃ te bhaviṣyati || 7.34.9 ||
