athavā tvarase martuṃ gaccha dakṣiṇasāgaram | vālinaṃ drakṣyase tatra bhūmisthamiva pāvakam || 7.34.10 ||
sa tu tāraṃ vinirbhartsya rāvaṇo lokarāvaṇaḥ | puṣpakaṃ tatsamāruhya prayayau dakṣiṇārṇavam || 7.34.11 ||
tatra hemagiriprakhyaṃ taruṇārkanibhānanam | rāvaṇo vālinaṃ dṛṣṭvā sandhyopāsanatatparam || 7.34.12 ||
puṣpakādavaruhyātha rāvaṇo 'ñjanasannibhaḥ | grahītuṃ vālinaṃ tūrṇaṃ niḥśabdapadamāvrajat || 7.34.13 ||
yadṛcchayā tadā dṛṣṭo vālināpi sa rāvaṇaḥ | pāpābhiprāyavān dṛṣṭvā cakāra na tu sambhramam || 7.34.14 ||
śaśamālakṣya siṃho vā pannagaṃ garuḍo yathā | na cintayati taṃ vālī rāvaṇaṃ pāpaniścayam || 7.34.15 ||
jighṛkṣamāṇamāyāntaṃ rāvaṇaṃ pāpacetasam | kakṣāvalambinaṃ kṛtvā gamiṣye trīnmahārṇavān || 7.34.16 ||
drakṣyantyariṃ mamāṅkasthaṃ sraṃsadūrukarāmbaram | lambamānaṃ daśagrīvaṃ garuḍasyeva pannagam || 7.34.17 ||
ityevaṃ matimāsthāya vālī karṇamupāśritaḥ | japanvai naigamānmantrāṃstasthau parvatarāḍiva || 7.34.18 ||
tāvanyonyaṃ jighṛkṣantau harirākṣasapārthivau | prayatnavantau tatkarma īhaturbaladarpitau || 7.34.19 ||
hastagrāhaṃ tu taṃ matvā pādaśabdena rāvaṇam | parāṅmukho 'pi jagrāha vālī sarpamivāṇḍajaḥ || 7.34.20 ||
grahītukāmaṃ taṃ gṛhya rakṣasāmīśvaraṃ hariḥ | khamutpapāta vegena kṛtvā kakṣāvalambinam || 7.34.21 ||
taṃ cāpīḍayamānaṃ tu vitudantaṃ nakhairmuhuḥ | jahāra rāvaṇaṃ vālī pavanastoyadaṃ yathā || 7.34.22 ||
atha te rākṣasāmātyā hriyamāṇaṃ daśānanam | mumokṣayiṣavo vāliṃ ravamāṇā abhidrutāḥ || 7.34.23 ||
anvīyamānastairvālī bhrājate 'mbaramadhyagaḥ | anvīyamāno meghaughairambarastha ivāṃśumān || 7.34.24 ||
te 'śaknuvantaḥ samprāptuṃ vālinaṃ rākṣasottamāḥ | tasya bāhūruvegena pariśrāntā vyavasthitāḥ || 7.34.25 ||
vālimārgādapākrāmanparvatendro hi gacchataḥ | kiṃ punarjīvitaprepsurbibhradvai māṃsaśoṇitam || 7.34.26 ||
apakṣigaṇasampātānvānarendro mahājavaḥ | kramaśaḥ sāgarānsarvānsandhyākālamavandata || 7.34.27 ||
sabhājyamāno bhūtaistu khaicaraiḥ khaicarottamaḥ | paścimaṃ sāgaraṃ vālī hyājagāma sarāvaṇaḥ || 7.34.28 ||
tasminsandhyāmupāsitvā snātvā japtvā ca vānaraḥ | uttaraṃ sāgaraṃ prāyādvahamāno daśānanam || 7.34.29 ||
bahuyojanasāhasraṃ vahamāno mahāhariḥ | vāyuvacca manovacca jagāma saha śatruṇā || 7.34.30 ||
uttare sāgare sandhyāmupāsitvā daśānanam | vahamāno 'gamadvālī pūrvaṃ vai sa mahodadhim || 7.34.31 ||
tatrāpi sandhyāmanvāsya vāsaviḥ saharīśvaraḥ | kiṣkindhāmabhito gṛhya rāvaṇaṃ punarāgamat || 7.34.32 ||
caturṣvapi samudreṣu sandhyāmanvāsya vānaraḥ | rāvaṇodvahanaśrāntaḥ kiṣkindhopavane 'patat || 7.34.33 ||
rāvaṇaṃ tu mumocātha svakakṣātkapisattamaḥ | kutastvamiti covāca prahasanrāvaṇaṃ muhuḥ || 7.34.34 ||
vismayaṃ tu mahadgatvā śramalolanirīkṣaṇaḥ | rākṣasendro harīndraṃ tamidaṃ vacanamabravīt || 7.34.35 ||
vānarendra mahendrābha rākṣasendro 'smi rāvaṇaḥ | yuddhepsuriha samprāptaḥ sa cādyāsāditastvayā || 7.34.36 ||
aho balamaho vīryamaho gāmbhīryameva ca | yenāhaṃ paśuvadgṛhya bhrāmitaścaturo 'rṇavān || 7.34.37 ||
evamaśrāntavadvīra śīghrameva mahārṇavān | māṃ caivodvahamānastu ko 'nyo vīraḥ kramiṣyati || 7.34.38 ||
trayāṇāmeva bhūtānāṃ gatireṣā plavaṅgama | manonilasuparṇānāṃ tava cātra na saṃśayaḥ || 7.34.39 ||
so 'haṃ dṛṣṭabalastubhyamicchāmi haripuṅgava | tvayā saha ciraṃ sakhyaṃ susnigdhaṃ pāvakāgrataḥ || 7.34.40 ||
dārāḥ putrāḥ puraṃ rāṣṭraṃ bhogācchādanabhojanam | sarvamevāvibhaktaṃ nau bhaviṣyati harīśvara || 7.34.41 ||
tataḥ prajvālayitvāgniṃ tāvubhau harīrākṣasau | bhrātṛtvamupasampannau pariṣvajya parasparam || 7.34.42 ||
anyonyaṃ lambitakarau tatastau harirākṣasau | kiṣkindhāṃ viśaturhṛṣṭau siṃhau giriguhāmiva || 7.34.43 ||
sa tatra māsamuṣitaḥ sugrīva iva rāvaṇaḥ | amātyairāgatairnītastrailokyotsādanārthibhiḥ || 7.34.44 ||
evametatpurāvṛttaṃ vālinā rāvaṇaḥ prabho | dharṣitaśca kṛtaścāpi bhrātā pāvakasannidhau || 7.34.45 ||
balamapratimaṃ rāma vālino 'bhavaduttamam | so 'pi tvayā vinirdagdhaḥ śalabho vahninā yathā || 7.34.46 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe catustriṃśaḥ sargaḥ || 34 ||
apṛcchata tadā rāmo dakṣiṇāśāśramaṃ munim | prāñjalirvinayopeta idamāha vaco 'rthavat || 7.35.1 ||
atulaṃ balametadvai vālino rāvaṇasya ca | na tvetābhyāṃ hanumatā samaṃ tviti matirmama || 7.35.2 ||
śauryaṃ dākṣyaṃ balaṃ dhairyaṃ prājñatā nayasādhanam | vikramaśca prabhāvaśca hanūmati kṛtālayāḥ || 7.35.3 ||
dṛṣṭvaiva sāgaraṃ vīkṣya sīdantīṃ kapivāhinīm | samāśvāsya mahābāhuryojanānāṃ śataṃ plutaḥ || 7.35.4 ||
dharṣayitvā purīṃ laṅkāṃ rāvaṇāntaḥpuraṃ tadā | dṛṣṭvā sambhāṣitā cāpi sītā hyāśvāsitā tathā || 7.35.5 ||
senāgragā mantrisutāḥ kiṅkarā rāvaṇātmajaḥ | ete hanumatā tatra hyekena vitipātitāḥ || 7.35.6 ||
bhūyo bandhādvimuktena bhāṣayitvā daśānanam | laṅkā bhasmīkṛtā yena pāvakeneva medinī || 7.35.7 ||
na kālasya na śakrasya na viṣṇorvittapasya ca | karmāṇi tāni śrūyante yāni yuddhe hanūmataḥ || 7.35.8 ||
etasya bāhuvīryeṇa laṅkā sītā ca lakṣmaṇaḥ | prāptā mayā jayaścaiva rājyaṃ mitrāṇi bāndhavāḥ || 7.35.9 ||
hanūmānyadi me naḥ syādvānarādhipateḥ sakhā | pravṛttimapi ko vettuṃ jānakyāḥ śaktimānbhavet || 7.35.10 ||
kimarthaṃ vālyanenaiva sugrīvapriyakāmyayā | tadā vaire samutpanne na dagdho vīrudho yathā || 7.35.11 ||
nahi veditavānmanye hanūmānātmano balam | yaddṛṣṭavāñjīviteṣṭaṃ kliśyantaṃ vānarādhipam || 7.35.12 ||
etanme bhagavansarvaṃ hanūmati mahāmatau | vistareṇa yathātattvaṃ kathayāmarapūjita || 7.35.13 ||
rāghavasya vacaḥ śrutvā hetuyuktamṛṣistadā | hanūmataḥ samakṣaṃ tamidaṃ vacanamabravīt || 7.35.14 ||
satyametadraghuśreṣṭha yadbravīṣi hanūmataḥ | na bale vidyate tulyo na gatau na matau paraḥ || 7.35.15 ||
amoghaśāpaiḥ śaptastu datto 'sya munibhiḥ purā | na vettā hi balaṃ yena balī sannirimardanaḥ || 7.35.16 ||
bālye 'pyetena yatkarma kṛtaṃ rāma mahābala | tanna varṇayituṃ śakyamiti bālatayā ' 'syate || 7.35.17 ||
yadi vā 'sti tvabhiprāyastacchrotuṃ tava rāghava | samādhāya matiṃ rāma niśāmaya vadāmyaham || 7.35.18 ||
sūryadattavarasvarṇaḥ sumerurnāma parvataḥ | yatra rājyaṃ praśāstyasya kesarī nāma vai pitā || 7.35.19 ||
tasya bhāryā babhūvaiṣā hyañjaneti pariśrutā | janayāmāsa tasyāṃ vai vāyurātmajamuttamam || 7.35.20 ||
śāliśūkanibhābhāsaṃ prāsūtāmuṃ tadā 'ñjanā | phalānyāhartukāmā vai niṣkrāntā gahanecarā || 7.35.21 ||
eṣa māturviyogācca kṣudhayā ca bhṛśārditaḥ | ruroda śiśuratyarthaṃ śiśuḥ śaravaṇe yathā || 7.35.22 ||
tadodyantaṃ vivasvantaṃ japāpuṣpotkaropamam | dadarśa phalalobhācca hyutpapāta raviṃ prati || 7.35.23 ||
bālārkābhimukho bālo bālārka iva mūrtimān | grahītukāmo bālārkaṃ plavate 'mbaramadhyagaḥ || 7.35.24 ||
etasminplavamāne tu śiśubhāve hanūmati | devadānavayakṣāṇāṃ vismayaḥ sumahānabhūt || 7.35.25 ||
nāpyevaṃ vegavānvāyurgaruḍo vā manastathā | yathā 'yaṃ vāyuputrastu kramate 'mbaramuttamam || 7.35.26 ||
yadi tāvacchiśorasya tvīdṛśo gativikramaḥ | yauvanaṃ balamāsādya kathaṃ vego bhaviṣyati || 7.35.27 ||
tamanuplavate vāyuḥ plavantaṃ putramātmanaḥ | sūryadāhabhayādrakṣaṃstuṣāracayaśītalaḥ || 7.35.28 ||
bahuyojanasāhasraṃ kramatyeṣa gatombaram | piturbalācca bālyācca bhāskarābhyāśamāgataḥ || 7.35.29 ||
śiśureṣa tvadoṣajña iti matvā divākaraḥ | kāryaṃ cātra samāyattamityevaṃ na dadāha saḥ || 7.35.30 ||
yameva divasaṃ hyeṣa grahītuṃ bhāskaraṃ plutaḥ | tameva divasaṃ rāhurjighṛkṣati divākaram || 7.35.31 ||
anena sa parāmṛṣṭo rāma sūryarathopari | apakrāntastatastrasto rāhuścandrārkamardanaḥ || 7.35.32 ||
sa indrabhavanaṃ gatvā saroṣaḥ siṃhikāsutaḥ | abravīdbhrukuṭiṃ kṛtvā devaṃ devagaṇairvṛtam || 7.35.33 ||
bubhukṣāpanayaṃ dattvā candrārkau mama vāsava | kimidaṃ tattvayā dattamanyasya balavṛtrahan || 7.35.34 ||
adyāhaṃ parvakāle tu jighṛkṣuḥ sūryamāgataḥ | athānyo rāhurāsādya jagrāha sahasā ravim || 7.35.35 ||
sa rāhorvacanaṃ śrutvā vāsavaḥ sambhramānvitaḥ | utpapātāsanaṃ hitvā codvahankāñcanīṃ srajam || 7.35.36 ||
tataḥ kailāsakūṭābhaṃ caturdantaṃ madasravam | śṛṅgāradhāriṇaṃ prāṃśuṃ svarṇaghaṇṭāṭṭahāsinam || 7.35.37 ||
indraḥ karīndramāruhya rāhuṃ kṛtvā puraḥsaram | prāyādyatrābhavatsūryaḥ sahānena hanūmatā || 7.35.38 ||
athātirabhasenāgādrāhurutsṛjya vāsavam | anena ca sa vai dṛṣṭaḥ pradhāvañchailakūṭavat || 7.35.39 ||
tataḥ sūryaṃ samutsṛjya rāhuṃ phalamavekṣya ca | utpapāta punarvyoma grahītuṃ siṃhikāsutam || 7.35.40 ||
utsṛjyārkamimaṃ rāma pradhāvantaṃ plavaṅgamam | avekṣyaivaṃ parāvṛttya mukhaśeṣaḥ parāṅmukhaḥ || 7.35.41 ||
indramāśaṃsamānastu trātāraṃ siṃhikāsutaḥ | indra indreti saṃtrāsānmuhurmahurabhāṣata || 7.35.42 ||
rāhorvikrośamānasya prāgevālakṣitaṃ svaram | śrutvendrovāca mā bhaiṣīrahamenaṃ niṣūdaye || 7.35.43 ||
airāvataṃ tato dṛṣṭvā mahattadidamityapi | phalaṃ matvā hastirājamabhidudrāva mārutiḥ || 7.35.44 ||
tathāsya dhāvato rūpamairāvatajighṛkṣayā | muhūrtamabhavadghoramindrāgnyoriva bhāsvaram || 7.35.45 ||
evamādhāvamānaṃ tu nātikruddhaḥ śacīpatiḥ | hastāntādatimuktena kuliśenābhyatāḍayat || 7.35.46 ||
tato girau papātaiṣa indravajrābhitāḍitaḥ | patamānasya caitasya vāmo hanurabhajyata || 7.35.47 ||
tasmiṃstu patite bāle vajratāḍanavihvale | cukrodhendrāya pavanaḥ prajānāmahitāya saḥ || 7.35.48 ||
pracāraṃ sa tu saṅgṛhya prajāsvantargataḥ prabhuḥ | guhāṃ praviṣṭaḥ svasutaṃ śiśumādāya mārutaḥ || 7.35.49 ||
viṇmūtrāśayamāvṛtya prajānāṃ paramārtikṛt | rurodha sarvabhūtāni yathā varṣāṇi vāsavaḥ || 7.35.50 ||
vāyuprakopādbhūtāni nirucchvāsāni sarvataḥ | sandhibhirbhidyamānaiśca kāṣṭhabhūtāni jajñire || 7.35.51 ||
niḥsvādhyāyavaṣaṭkāraṃ niṣkriyaṃ dharmavarjitam | vāyuprakopātऺtrailokyaṃ nirayasthamivābhavat || 7.35.52 ||
tataḥ prajāḥ sagandharvāḥ sadevāsuramānuṣāḥ | prajāpatiṃ samādhāvanduḥkhitāśca sukhecchayā || 7.35.53 ||
ūcuḥ prāñjalayo devā mahodaranibhodarāḥ | tvayā nu bhagavansṛṣṭāḥ prajānātha caturvidhāḥ || 7.35.54 ||
tvayā datto 'yamasmākamāyuṣaḥ pavanaḥ patiḥ | so 'smānprāṇeśvaro bhūtvā kasmādeṣo 'dya sattama || 7.35.55 ||
rurodha duḥkhaṃ janayannantaḥpura iva striyaḥ | tasmāttvāṃ śaraṇaṃ prāptā vāyunohatā vayam || 7.35.56 ||
etatprajānāṃ śrutvā tu prajānāthaḥ prajāpatiḥ | kāraṇāditi coktvāsau prajāḥ punarabhāṣata || 7.35.57 ||
yasmiṃśca kāraṇe vāyuścukrodha ca rurodha ca | prajāḥ śṛṇudhvaṃ tatsarvaṃ śrotavyaṃ cātmanaḥ kṣamam || 7.35.58 ||
putrastasyāmareśena indreṇādya nipātitaḥ | rāhorvacanamāsthāya tataḥ sa kupito 'nilaḥ || 7.35.59 ||
aśarīraḥ śarīreṣu vāyuścarati pālayan | śarīraṃ hi vinā vāyuṃ samatāṃ yāti dārubhiḥ || 7.35.60 ||
vāyuḥ prāṇaḥ sukhaṃ vāyurvāyuḥ sarvamidaṃ jagat | vāyunā samparityaktaṃ na sukhaṃ vindate jagat || 7.35.61 ||
adyaiva ca parityaktaṃ vāyunā jagadāyuṣā | adyaiva te nirucchvāsāḥ kāṣṭhakuḍyopamāḥ sthitāḥ || 7.35.62 ||
tadyāmastatra yatrāste māruto rukprado hi naḥ | mā vināśaṃ gamiṣyāma aprasādyāditeḥ sutāḥ || 7.35.63 ||
tataḥ prajābhiḥ sahitaḥ prajāpatiḥ sadevagandharvabhujaṅgaguhyakaiḥ | jagāma tatrāsyati yatra mārutaḥ sutaṃ surendrābhihataṃ pragṛhya saḥ || 7.35.64 ||
tato 'rkavaiśvānarakāñcanaprabhaṃ sutaṃ tadotsaṅgagataṃ sadāgateḥ | caturmukho vīkṣya kṛpāmathākarotsadevagandharvarṣiyakṣarākṣasaiḥ || 7.35.65 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe paṃcatriṃśaḥ sargaḥ || 35 ||
tataḥ pitāmahaṃ dṛṣṭvā vāyuḥ putravadhārditaḥ | śiśukaṃ taṃ samādāya uttasthau dhāturagrataḥ || 7.36.1 ||
calakuṇḍalamaulisraktapanīyavibhūṣaṇaḥ | pādayornyapatadvāyustisropasthāya vedhase || 7.36.2 ||
taṃ tu vedavidā tena lambābharaṇaśobhinā | vāyumutthāpya hastena śiśuṃ taṃ parimṛṣṭavān || 7.36.3 ||
spṛṣṭamātrastataḥ so 'tha salīlaṃ padmayoninā | jalasiktaṃ yathā sasyaṃ punarjīvitamāptavān || 7.36.4 ||
prāṇavantamimaṃ dṛṣṭvā prāṇo gandhavaho mudā | cacāra sarvabhūteṣu sanniruddhaṃ yathā purā || 7.36.5 ||
marudrodhādvinirmuktāstāḥ prajā muditā 'bhavan | śītadāhavinirmuktāḥ padminya iva sāmbujāḥ || 7.36.6 ||
tatastriyugmastrikakutऺ्itradhāmā tridaśārcitaḥ | uvāca devatā brahmā mārutapriyakāmyayā || 7.36.7 ||
bho mahendreśavaruṇaprajeśvaradhaneśvarāḥ | jānatāmapi vaḥ sarvaṃ vakṣyāmi śrūyatāṃ hitam || 7.36.8 ||
anena śiśunā kāryaṃ kartavyaṃ vo bhaviṣyati | tadvadadhvaṃ varānsarve mārutasyāsya tuṣṭaye || 7.36.9 ||
tataḥ sahasranayanaḥ prītiyuktaḥ śubhānanaḥ | kuśeśayamayīṃ mālāmutkṣipyedaṃ vaco 'bravīt || 7.36.10 ||
matkarotsṛṣṭavajreṇa hanurasya yathā hataḥ | nāmnā vai kapiśārdūlo bhavitā hanumāniti || 7.36.11 ||
ahamasya pradāsyāmi paramaṃ varamadbhutam | itaḥ prabhṛti vajrasya mamāvadhyo bhaviṣyati || 7.36.12 ||
mārtaṇḍastvabravīttatra bhagavāṃstimirāpahaḥ | tejaso 'sya madīyasya dadāmi śatikāṃ kalām || 7.36.13 ||
yadā tu śāstrāṇyadhyetuṃ śaktirasya bhaviṣyati | tadāsya śāstraṃ dāsyāmi yena vāggmī bhaviṣyati || 7.36.14 ||
nacāsya bhavitā kaścitsadṛśaḥ śāstradarśane | varuṇaśca varaṃ prādānnāsya mṛtyurbhaviṣyati | varṣāyutaśatenāpi matpāśādudakādapi || 7.36.15 ||
yamo daṇḍādavadhyatvamarogatvaṃ ca nityaśaḥ | varaṃ dadāmi santuṣṭa aviṣādaṃ ca saṃyuge || 7.36.16 ||
gadeyaṃ māmikā nainaṃ saṃyugeṣu vadhiṣyati | ityevaṃ varadaḥ prāha tadā hyekākṣipiṅgalaḥ || 7.36.17 ||
matto madāyudhānāṃ ca na vadhyo 'yaṃ bhaviṣyati | ityevaṃ śaṅkareṇāpi datto 'sya paramo varaḥ || 7.36.18 ||
sarveṣāṃ brahmadaṇḍānāmavadhyo 'yaṃ bhaviṣyati | dīrghāyuśca mahātmā ca iti brahmābravīdvacaḥ || 7.36.19 ||
viśvakarmā ca dṛṣṭvainaṃ bālasūryopamaṃ śiśum | śilpināṃ pravaraḥ prādādvaramasya mahāmatiḥ || 7.36.20 ||
matkṛtāni ca śastrāṇi yāni divyāni saṃyuge | tairavadhyatvamāpannaścirajīvī bhaviṣyati || 7.36.21 ||
tataḥ surāṇāṃ tu varairdṛṣṭvā hyenamalaṅkṛtam | caturmukhastuṣṭamanā vāyumāha jagadguruḥ || 7.36.22 ||
amitrāṇāṃ bhayakaro mitrāṇāmabhayaṅkaraḥ | ajeyo bhavitā putrastava māruta mārutiḥ || 7.36.23 ||
kāmarūpaḥ kāmacārī kāmagaḥ plavatāṃ varaḥ | bhavatyavyāhatagatiḥ kīrtimāṃśca bhaviṣyati || 7.36.24 ||
rāvaṇotsādanārthāni rāmapriyakaraṇi ca | romaharṣakarāṇyeṣa kartā karmāṇi saṃyuge || 7.36.25 ||
evamuktvā tamāmantrya mārutaṃ tvamaraiḥ saha | yathāgataṃ yayuḥ sarve pitāmahapurogamāḥ || 7.36.26 ||
so 'pi gandhavahaḥ putraṃ pragṛhya gṛhamānayat | añjanāyāstamācakhyau varadattaṃ vinirgataḥ || 7.36.27 ||
prāpya rāma varāneṣa varadānasamanvitaḥ | balenātmani saṃsthena so 'pūryata yathā 'rṇavaḥ || 7.36.28 ||
tarasā pūryamāṇo 'pi tadā vānarapuṅgavaḥ | āśrameṣu maharṣīṇāmaparādhyati nirbhayaḥ || 7.36.29 ||
srugbhāṇḍānyagnihotraṃ ca valkalājinasañcayān | bhagnavicchinnavidhvastānsaṃśāntānāṃ karotyayam || 7.36.30 ||
evaṃvidhāni karmāṇi prāvartata mahābalaḥ | sarveṣāṃ brahmadaṇḍānāmavadhyaḥ śambhunā kṛtaḥ || 7.36.31 ||
jānanta ṛṣayastaṃ vai sahante tasya śaktitaḥ || 7.36.32 ||
yathā kesariṇā tveṣa vāyunā so 'ñjanāsutaḥ | pratiṣiddho 'pi maryādāṃ laṅghayatyeva vānaraḥ || 7.36.33 ||
tato maharṣayaḥ kruddhā bhṛgvaṅgirasavaṃśajāḥ | śepurenaṃ raghuśreṣṭha nātikruddhātimanyavaḥ || 7.36.34 ||
bādhase yatsamāśritya balamasmānplavaṅgama | taddīrghakālaṃ vettāsi nāsmākaṃ śāpamohitaḥ | yadā te smāryate kīrtistadā te vardhate balam || 7.36.35 ||
tatassa hṛtatejaujā maharṣivacanaujasā | eṣośramāṇi tānyeva mṛdubhāvaṃ gato 'carat || 7.36.36 ||
atharkṣarajaso nāma vālisugrīvayoḥ pitā | sarvavānararājā ' 'sīttejasā bhāskaraprabhaḥ || 7.36.37 ||
sa tu rājyaṃ ciraṃ kṛtvā vānarāṇāṃ harīśvaraḥ | sa ca ṛkṣarajā nāma kāladharmeṇa saṅgataḥ || 7.36.38 ||
tasminnastamite cātha mantribhirmantrakovidaiḥ | pitrye pade kṛto vālī sugrīvo vālinaḥ pade || 7.36.39 ||
sugrīveṇa samaṃ tvasya advaidhaṃ chidravarjitam | ābālyaṃ sakhyamabhavadanilasyāgninā yathā || 7.36.40 ||
eṣa śāpavaśādeva na veda balamātmanaḥ | vālisugrīvayorvairaṃ yadā rāma samutthitam || 7.36.41 ||
na hyeṣa rāma sugrīvo bhrāmyamāṇo 'pi vālinā || 7.36.42 ||
deva jānāti na hyeṣa balamātmani mārutiḥ | ṛṣiśāpāhṛtabalastadaiṣa kapisattamaḥ || 7.36.43 ||
siṃhaḥ kuñjararuddho vā āsthitaḥ sahito raṇe || 7.36.44 ||
parākramotsāhamatipratāpasauśīlyamādhuryanayānayaiśca | gāmbhīryacāturyasuvīryadhairyairhanūmataḥ ko 'bhyadhiko 'sti loke || 7.36.45 ||
asau punarvyākaraṇaṃ grahīṣyansūryonmukhaḥ praṣṭumanā kapīndraḥ | udyadgirerastagiriṃ jagāma granthaṃ mahaddhārayanaprameyaḥ || 7.36.46 ||
sasūtravṛttyarthapadaṃ mahārthaṃ sasaṅgrahaṃ sāddhyati vai kapīndraḥ | nahyasya kaścitsadṛśo 'sti śāstre vaiśārade cchandagatau tathaiva || 7.36.47 ||
sarvāsu vidyāsu tapovidhāne praspardhate 'yo hi guruṃ surāṇām | so 'yaṃ navavyākaraṇārthavettā brahmā bhaviṣyatyapi te prasādāt || 7.36.48 ||
pravīvivakṣoriva sāgarasya lokāndidhakṣoriva pāvakasyayugakṣaye hyeva yathāntakasya hanūmataḥ sthāsyati kaḥ purastāt || 7.36.49 ||
eṣeva cānye ca mahākapīndrāḥ sugrīvamaindadvividāḥ sanīlāḥ | satāratāreyanalāḥ sarambhāstvatkāraṇādrāma surairhi sṛṣṭāḥ || 7.36.50 ||
tadetkathitaṃ sarvaṃ yanmāṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi | hanūmato bālabhāve karmaitatkathitaṃ mayā || 7.36.51 ||
śrutvā 'gastyasya kathitaṃ rāmaḥ saumitrireva ca | vismayaṃ paramaṃ jagmurvānarā rākṣasaiḥ saha || 7.36.52 ||
agastyastvabravīdrāmaṃ sarvametachrutaṃ tvayā | dṛṣṭaḥ sambhāṣitaścāsi rāma gacchāmahe vayam || 7.36.53 ||
śrutvaitadrāghavo vākyamagastyasyogratejasaḥ | prāñjaliḥ praṇataścāpi maharṣimidamabravīt || 7.36.54 ||
adya me devatā hṛṣṭāḥ pitaraḥ prapitāmahāḥ | yuṣmākaṃ darśanādeva nityaṃ tuṣṭāḥ sabāndhavāḥ || 7.36.55 ||
vijñāpyaṃ tu mamaitaddhi yadvadāmyāgataspṛhaḥ | tadbhavadbhirmama kṛte kartavyamanukampayā || 7.36.56 ||
paurajānapadānsthāpya svakāryeṣvahamāgataḥ | kratūneva kariṣyāmi prabhāvādbhavatāṃ satām || 7.36.57 ||
sadasyā mama yajñeṣu bhavanto nityameva tat | bhaviṣyatha mahāvīryā mamānugrahakāṅkṣiṇaḥ || 7.36.58 ||
ahaṃ yuṣmānsamāśritya taponirdhūtakalmaṣān | anugrahītaḥ pitṛbhirbhaviṣyāmi sunirvṛtaḥ || 7.36.59 ||
tadāgantavyamaniśaṃ bhavadbhiriha saṅgataiḥ | agastyādyāstu tacchrutvā ṛṣayaḥ saṃśitavratāḥ || 7.36.60 ||
evamastviti taṃ coktvā prayātumupacakramuḥ || 7.36.61 ||
evamuktvā gatāḥ sarve ṛṣayaste yathāgatam | rāghavaśca tamevārthaṃ cintayāmāsa vismitaḥ || 7.36.62 ||
tato 'staṃ bhāskare yāte visṛjya nṛpavānarān | sandhyāmupāsya vidhivattadā naravarottamaḥ | pravṛttāyāṃ rajanyāṃ tu so 'ntaḥpuracaro 'bhavat || 7.36.63 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe ṣaṭtriṃśaḥ sargaḥ || 36 ||
abhiṣikte tu kākutsthe dharmeṇa viditātmani | vyatītā yā niśā pūrvā paurāṇāṃ harṣavardhinī || 7.37.1 ||
tasyāṃ rajanyāṃ vyuṣṭāyāṃ prātarnṛpatibodhakāḥ | vandinaḥ samupātiṣṭhansaumyā nṛpativeśmani || 7.37.2 ||
te raktakaṇṭhinaḥ sarve kinnarā iva śikṣitāḥ | tuṣṭuvurnapatiṃ vīraṃ yathāvat sampraharṣiṇaḥ || 7.37.3 ||
vīra saumya prabudhyasva kausalyāprītivardhana | jagaddhi sarvaṃ svapiti tvayi supte narādhipa || 7.37.4 ||
vikramaste yathā viṣṇo rūpaṃ caivāśvinoriva | buddhyā bṛhaspatestulyaḥ prajāpatisamo hyasi || 7.37.5 ||
kṣamā te pṛthivītulyā tejasā bhāskaropamaḥ | vegaste vāyunā tulyo gāmbhīryamudadheriva || 7.37.6 ||
aprakampyo yatā sthāṇuścandre saumyatvamīdṛśam | nedṛśāḥ pārthivāḥ pūrvaṃ bhavitāro narādhipa || 7.37.7 ||
yathā tvamatidurdharṣo dharmanityaḥ prajāhitaḥ | na tvāṃ jahāti kīrtiśca lakṣmīśca puruṣarṣabha || 7.37.8 ||
śrīśca dharmaśca kākutstha tvayi nityaṃ pratiṣṭhitau | etāścānyāśca madhurā vandibhiḥ parikīrtitāḥ || 7.37.9 ||
sūtāśca saṃstavairdivyairbodhayanti sma rāghavam | stutibhiḥ stūyamānābhiḥ pratyabudhyata rāghavaḥ || 7.37.10 ||
sa tadvihāya śayanaṃ pāṇḍarācchādanāstṛtam | uttasthau nāgaśayanāddharirnārāyaṇo yathā || 7.37.11 ||
tamutthitaṃ mahātmānaṃ prahvāḥ prāñjalayo narāḥ | salilaṃ bhājanaiḥ śubhrairupatasthuḥ sahasraśaḥ || 7.37.12 ||
kṛtodakaśucirbhūtvā kāle hutahutāśanaḥ | devāgāraṃ jagāmāśu puṇyamikṣvākusevitam || 7.37.13 ||
tatra devānpita'nviprānarcayitvā yathāvidhi | bāhyakakṣāntaraṃ rāmo nirjagāma janairvṛtaḥ || 7.37.14 ||
upatasthurmahātmāno mantriṇaḥ sapurohitāḥ | vasiṣṭhapramukhāḥ sarve dīpyamānā ivāgnayaḥ || 7.37.15 ||
kṣatriyāśca mahātmāno nānājanapadeśvarāḥ | rāmasyopāviśanpārśve śakrasyeva yathā 'marāḥ || 7.37.16 ||
bharato lakṣmaṇaścātra śatrughnaśca mahāyaśāḥ | upāsāñcakrire hṛṣṭā vedāstraya ivādhvaram || 7.37.17 ||
yātāḥ prāñjalayo bhūtvā kiṅkarā muditānanāḥ | muditā nāma pārśvasthā bahavaḥ samupāviśan || 7.37.18 ||
vānarāśca mahāvīryā viṃśatiḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ | sugrīvapramukhā rāmamupāsante mahaujasaḥ || 7.37.19 ||
vibhīṣaṇaśca rakṣobhiścaturbhiḥ parivāritaḥ | upāsate mahātmānaṃ dhaneśamiva guhyakāḥ || 7.37.20 ||
tathā nigamavṛddhāśca kulīnā ye ca mānavāḥ | śirasā ' 'vandya rājānamupāsante vicakṣaṇāḥ || 7.37.21 ||
tathā parivṛto rājā śrīmadbhirṛṣibhirvṛtaḥ | rājabhiśca mahāvīryairvānaraiśca sarākṣasaiḥ || 7.37.22 ||
yathā deveśvaro nityamṛṣibhiḥ samupāsyate | adhikastena rūpeṇa sahasrākṣādvirocate || 7.37.23 ||
teṣāṃ samupaviṣṭānāṃ tāstāḥ sumadhurāḥ kathāḥ | kathyante dharmasaṃyuktāḥ purāṇajñairmahātmabhiḥ || 7.37.24 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe saptatriṃśaḥ sargaḥ || 37 ||
evamāste mahābāhurahanyahani rāghavaḥ | praśāsatsarvakāryāṇi paurajānapadeṣu ca || 7.38.1 ||
tataḥ katipayāhaḥsu vaidehaṃ mithilādhipam | rāghavaḥ prāñjalirbhūtvā vākyametaduvāca ha || 7.38.2 ||
bhavānhi gatiravyagrā bhavatā pālitā vayam | bhavatastejasogreṇa rāvaṇo nihato mayā || 7.38.3 ||
ikṣvākūṇāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ maithilānāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ | atulāḥ prītayo rājansambandhakapurogamāḥ || 7.38.4 ||
tadbhavānsvapuraṃ yātu ratnānyādāya pārthiva | bharataśca sahāyārthaṃ pṛṣṭhataste 'nuyāsyati || 7.38.5 ||
sa tatheti nṛpaḥ kṛtvā rāghavaṃ vākyamabravīt | prīto 'smi bhavato rājandarśanena nayena ca || 7.38.6 ||
yānyetāni tu ratnāni madarthaṃ sañcitāni vai | duhitre tāni vai rājansarvāṇyeva dadāmi ca || 7.38.7 ||
evamuktvā tu kākutsthaṃ janako hṛṣṭamānasaḥ | prayayau mithilāṃ śrīmāṃstamanujñāya rāghavam || 7.38.8 ||
tataḥ prayāte janake kekayaṃ mātulaṃ prabhuḥ | rāghavaḥ prāñjalirbhūtvā vākyametaduvāca ha || 7.38.9 ||
idaṃ rājyamahaṃ caiva bharataśca salakṣmaṇaḥ | āyattāstvaṃ hi no rājangatiśca puruṣarṣabha || 7.38.10 ||
rājā hi vṛddhaḥ santāpaṃ tvadarthamupayāsyati | tasmādgamanamadyaiva rocate tava pārthiva || 7.38.11 ||
lakṣmaṇenānuyātreṇa pṛṣṭhato 'nugamiṣyate | dhanamādāya vipulaṃ ratnāni vividhāni ca || 7.38.12 ||
yudhājittu tathetyāha gamanaṃ prati rāghavam | ratnāni ca dhanaṃ caiva tvayyevākṣayyamastviti || 7.38.13 ||
pradakṣiṇaṃ sa rājānaṃ kṛtvā kekayavardhanaḥ | rāmeṇa hi kṛtaḥ pūrvamabhivādya pradakṣiṇam || 7.38.14 ||
lakṣmaṇena sahāyena prayātaḥ kekayeśvaraḥ | hate 'sure yathā vṛtre viṣṇunā saha vāsavaḥ || 7.38.15 ||
taṃ visṛjya tato rāmo vayasyamakutobhayam | pratardanaṃ kāśipatiṃ pariṣvajyedamabravīt || 7.38.16 ||
darśitā bhavatā prītirdarśitaṃ sauhṛdaṃ param | udyogaśca kṛto rājanbharatena tvayā saha || 7.38.17 ||
tadbhavānadya kāśeya purīṃ vārāṇasīṃ vraja | ramaṇīyāṃ tvayā guptāṃ suprakāśāṃ sutoraṇām || 7.38.18 ||
etāvaduktvā cotthāya kākutsthaḥ paramāsanāt | paryaṣvajata dharmātmā nirantaramurogatam || 7.38.19 ||
visarjayāmāsa tadā kausalyānandavardhanaḥ | rāghaveṇābhyanujñātaḥ kāśīśo 'pyakutobhayaḥ | vārāṇasīṃ yayau tūrṇaṃ rāghaveṇa visarjitaḥ || 7.38.20 ||
visṛjya taṃ kāśipatiṃ triśataṃ pṛthivīpatīn | prahasanrāghavo vākyamuvāca madhurākṣaram || 7.38.21 ||
bhavatāṃ prītiravyagrā tejasā parirakṣitā | dharmaśca niyato nityaṃ satyaṃ ca bhavatāṃ sadā || 7.38.22 ||
yuṣmākaṃ cānubhāvena tejasā ca mahātmanām | hato durātmā durbuddhī rāvaṇo rākṣasādhamaḥ || 7.38.23 ||
hetumātramahaṃ tatra bhavatāṃ tejasā hataḥ | rāvaṇaḥ sagaṇo yuddhe saputrāmātyabāndhavaḥ || 7.38.24 ||
bhavantaśca samānītā bharatena mahātmanā | śrutvā janakarājasya kānanāttanayāṃ hṛtām || 7.38.25 ||
udyuktānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ pārthivānāṃ mahātmanām | kālo vyatītaḥ sumahāngamanaṃ rocayāmyataḥ || 7.38.26 ||
pratyūcustaṃ ca rājāno harṣeṇa mahatā vṛtāḥ | diṣṭyāṃ tvaṃ vijayī rāma svarājye 'pi pratiṣṭhitaḥ || 7.38.27 ||
diṣṭyā pratyāhṛtā sītā diṣṭyā śatruḥ parājitaḥ | eṣa naḥ paramaḥ kāma eṣā naḥ pītiruttamā || 7.38.28 ||
yattvāṃ vijayinaṃ rāma paśyāmo hataśātravam || 7.38.29 ||
etattvayyupapannaṃ ca yadasmāṃstvaṃ praśaṃsase | praśaṃsārha na jānīmaḥ praśaṃsāṃ vaktumīdṛśīm || 7.38.30 ||
āpṛcchāmo gamiṣyāmo hṛdistho naḥ sadā bhavān | vartāmahe mahābāho prītyātra mahatā vṛtāḥ | bhavecca te mahārāja prītirasmāsu nityadā || 7.38.31 ||
bāḍhamityeva rājāno harṣeṇa paramānvitāḥ | ucuḥ prāñjalayaḥ sarve rāghavaṃ gamanotsukāḥ || 7.38.32 ||
pūjitāścaiva rāmeṇa jagmurdeśānsvakānsvakān || 7.38.33 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe 'ṣṭātriṃśaḥ sargaḥ || 38 ||
te prayātā mahātmānaḥ pārthivāste prahṛṣṭavat | gajavājisahasraughaiḥ kampayanto vasundharām || 7.39.1 ||
akṣauhiṇyo hi tatrāsanrāghavārthe samudyatāḥ | bharatasyājñayā 'nekāḥ prahṛṣṭā balavāhanāḥ || 7.39.2 ||
ūcuste ca mahīpālā baladarpasamanvitāḥ | na rāmarāvaṇaṃ yuddhe paśyāmaḥ purataḥ sthitam || 7.39.3 ||
bharatena vayaṃ paścātsamānītā nirarthakam | hatā hi rākṣasāḥ kṣipraṃ pārthivaiḥ syurna saṃśayaḥ || 7.39.4 ||
rāmasya bāhuvīryeṇa rakṣitā lakṣmaṇasya ca | sukhaṃ pāresamudrasya yudhyema vigatajvarāḥ || 7.39.5 ||
etāścānyāśca rājānaḥ kathāstatra sahasraśaḥ | kathayantaḥ svarājyāni jagmurharṣasamanvitāḥ || 7.39.6 ||
svāni rājyāni mukhyāni ṛddhāni muditāni ca | samṛddhadhanadhānyāni pūrṇāni vasumanti ca || 7.39.7 ||
yathāpurāṇi te gatvā ratnāni vividhānyatha | rāmasya priyakāmārthamupahārān nṛpā daduḥ || 7.39.8 ||
aśvānyānāni ratnāni hastinaśca madotkaṭān | candanāni ca mukhyāni divyānyābharaṇāni ca || 7.39.9 ||
maṇimuktāpravālāṃstu dāsyo rūpasamanvitāḥ | ajāvikāṃśca vividhān rathāṃstu vividhāndaduḥ || 7.39.10 ||
bharato lakṣmaṇaścaiva śatrughnaśca mahābalāḥ | ādāya tāni ratnāni svāṃ purīṃ punarāgatāḥ || 7.39.11 ||
āgamya ca purīṃ ramyāmayodhyāṃ puruṣarṣabhāḥ | tāni ratnāni citrāṇi rāmāya samupāharan || 7.39.12 ||
pratigṛhya ca tatsarvaṃ rāmaḥ prītisamanvitaḥ | sugrīvāya dadau rājñe mahātmā kṛtakarmaṇe || 7.39.13 ||
bibhīṣaṇāya ca dadau tathānyebhyo 'pi rāghavaḥ | rākṣasebhyaḥ kapibhyaśca yairvṛto jayamāptavān || 7.39.14 ||
te sarve rāmadattāni ratnāni kapirākṣasāḥ | śirobhirdhārayāmāsurbāhubhiśca mahābalāḥ || 7.39.15 ||
hanūmantaṃ ca nṛpatirikṣvākūṇāṃ mahārathaḥ | aṅgadaṃ ca mahābāhumaṅkamāropya vīryavān || 7.39.16 ||
rāmaḥ kamalapatrākṣaḥ sugrīvamidamabravīt | aṅgadaste suputro 'yaṃ mantrī cāpyanilātmajaḥ || 7.39.17 ||
sugrīvamantrite yuktau mama cāpi hite ratau | arhato vividhāṃ pūjāṃ tvatkṛte vai harīśvara || 7.39.18 ||
ityuktvā vyavamucyāṅgādbhūṣaṇāni mahāyaśāḥ | sa babandha mahārhāṇi tadāṅgadahanūmatoḥ || 7.39.19 ||
ābhāṣya ca mahāvīryānrāghavo yūthaparṣabhān | nīlaṃ nalaṃ kesariṇaṃ kumudaṃ gandhamādanam || 7.39.20 ||
suṣeṇaṃ panasaṃ vīraṃ maindaṃ dvividameva ca | jāmbavantaṃ gavākṣaṃ ca vinataṃ dhūmrameva ca || 7.39.21 ||
valīmukhaṃ prajaṅghaṃ ca sannādaṃ ca mahābalam | darīmukhaṃ dadhimukhamindrajānuṃ ca yūthapam || 7.39.22 ||
madhuraṃ ślakṣṇayā vācā netrābhyāmāpibanniva | suhṛdo me bhavantaśca śarīraṃ bhrātarastathā || 7.39.23 ||
yuṣmābhiruddhṛtaścāhaṃ vyasanātkānanaukasaḥ | dhanyo rājā ca sugrīvo bhavadbhiḥ suhṛdāṃ varaiḥ || 7.39.24 ||
evamuktvā dadau tebhyo bhūṣaṇāni yathārhataḥ | vajrāṇi ca mahārhāṇi sasvaje ca nararṣabhaḥ || 7.39.25 ||
te pibantaḥ sugandhīni madhūni madhupiṅgalāḥ | māṃsāni ca sumṛṣṭāni mūlāni ca phalāni ca || 7.39.26 ||
evaṃ teṣāṃ nivasatāṃ māsaḥ sāgro yayau tadā | muhūrtamiva te sarve rāmabhaktyā ca menire || 7.39.27 ||
rāmo 'pi reme taiḥ sārdhaṃ vānaraiḥ kāmarūpibhiḥ | rākṣasaiśca mahāvīryairṛkṣaiścaiva mahābalaiḥ || 7.39.28 ||
evaṃ teṣāṃ yayau māso dvitīyaḥ śiśiraḥ sukham | vānarāṇāṃ prahṛṣṭānāṃ rākṣasānāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ || 7.39.29 ||
ikṣvākunagare ramye parāṃ prītimupāsatām | rāmasya prītikaraṇaiḥ kālasteṣāṃ sukhaṃ yayau || 7.39.30 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe ekonacatvāriṃśaḥ sargaḥ || 39 ||
tathā sma teṣāṃ vasatāmṛkṣavānararakṣasām | rāghavastu mahātejāḥ sugrīvamidamabravīt || 7.40.1 ||
gamyatāṃ saumya kiṣkindhāṃ durādharṣāṃ surāsuraiḥ | pālayasva sahāmātyo rājyaṃ nihatakaṇṭakam || 7.40.2 ||
aṅgadaṃ ca mahābāho prītyā paramayā yutaḥ | paśya tvaṃ hanumantaṃ ca nalaṃ ca sumahābalam || 7.40.3 ||
suṣeṇaṃ śvaśuraṃ vīraṃ tāraṃ ca balināṃ varam | kumudaṃ caiva durdharṣaṃ nīlaṃ caiva mahābalam || 7.40.4 ||
vīraṃ śatavaliṃ caiva maindaṃ dvividameva ca | gajaṃ gavākṣaṃ gavayaṃ śarabhaṃ ca mahābalam | paśya prītisamāyukto gandhamādanameva ca || 7.40.5 ||
ṛṣabhaṃ ca suvikrāntaṃ jāmbavantaṃ mahābalam | ye ceme sumahātmāno madarthe tyaktajīvitāḥ || 7.40.6 ||
paśya tvaṃ prītisaṃyukto mā caiṣāṃ vipriyaṃ kṛthāḥ || 7.40.7 ||
evamuktvā tu sugrīvamāśliṣya ca punaḥ punaḥ | vibhīṣaṇamuvācātha rāmo madhurayā girā || 7.40.8 ||
laṅkāṃ praśādhi dharmeṇa dharmajñastvaṃ mato mama | purasya rākṣasānāṃ ca svabhrātussammato hyasi || 7.40.9 ||
mā ca buddhimadharme tvaṃ kuryā rājankathañcana | buddhimanto hi rājāno dhruvamaśnanti medinīm || 7.40.10 ||
ahaṃ ca nityaśo rājansugrīvasahitastvayā | smartavyaḥ parayā prītyā gaccha tvaṃ vigatajvaraḥ || 7.40.11 ||
rāmasya bhāṣitaṃ śrutvā ṛkṣavānararākṣasāḥ | sādhusādhviti kākutsthaṃ praśaśaṃsuḥ punaḥ punaḥ || 7.40.12 ||
tava buddhirmahābāho vīryamadbhutameva ca | mādhuryaṃ paramaṃ rāma svayambhoriva nityadā || 7.40.13 ||
teṣāmevaṃ bruvāṇānāṃ vānarāṇāṃ ca rākṣasām | hanūmānpravaṇaḥ bhūtvā rāghavaṃ vākyamabravīt || 7.40.14 ||
sneho me paramo rājaṃstvayi tiṣṭhatu nityadā | bhaktiśca niyatā vīra bhāvo nānyatra gacchatu || 7.40.15 ||
vāyadrāmakathā vīra cariṣyati mahītale | tāvaccharīre vatsyanti prāṇā mama na saṃśayaḥ || 7.40.16 ||
yaccaitaccaritaṃ divyaṃ kathā te raghunandana | tanmayāpsaraso nāma śrāvayeyurnararṣabha || 7.40.17 ||
tacchrutvāhaṃ tato vīra tava caryāmṛtaṃ prabho | utkaṇṭhāṃ tāṃ hariṣyāmi meghalekhāmivānilaḥ || 7.40.18 ||
evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ rāmastu hanūmantaṃ varāsanāt | utthāya sasvaje snehādvākyametaduvāca ha || 7.40.19 ||
evametatkapiśreṣṭha bhavitā nātra saṃśayaḥ | cariṣyati kathā yāvadeṣā loke ca māmikā | tāvatte bhavitā kīrtiḥ śarīre 'pyasavastathā || 7.40.20 ||
lokā hi yāvatsthāsyanti tāvatsthāsyati me kathā || 7.40.21 ||
loke ca māmikā | ekaikasyopakārasya prāṇāndāsyāmi te kape | naraḥ pratyupakārāṇāmāpastvāyāti pātratām || 7.40.22 ||
tato 'sya hāraṃ candrābhaṃ mucya kaṇṭhātsa rāghavaḥ | vaiḍūryataralaṃ kaṇṭhe babandha ca hanūmataḥ || 7.40.23 ||
tenorasi nibaddhena hāreṇa mahatā kapiḥ | rarāja hemaśailendraścandreṇākrāntamastakaḥ || 7.40.24 ||
śrutvā tu rāghavasyaitadutthāyotthāya vānarāḥ | praṇamya śirasā pādau nirjagmuste mahābalāḥ || 7.40.25 ||
sugrīvaḥ sa ca rāmeṇa nirantaramurogataḥ | vibhīṣaṇaśca dharmātmā sarve te bāṣpaviklavāḥ || 7.40.26 ||
sarve ca te bāṣpakalāḥ sāśrunetrā vicetasaḥ | sammūḍhā iva duḥkhena tyajanto rāghavaṃ tadā || 7.40.27 ||
kṛtaprasādāstenaivaṃ rāghaveṇa mahātmanā | jagmuḥ svaṃ svaṃ gṛhaṃ sarve dehī dehamiva tyajan || 7.40.28 ||
tatastu te rākṣasaṛkṣavānarāḥ praṇamya rāmaṃ raghuvaṃśavardhanam | viyogajāśrupratipūrṇalocanāḥ pratiprayātāstu yathā nivāsinaḥ || 7.40.29 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe catvāriṃśaḥ sargaḥ || 40 ||
visṛjya ca mahābāhurṛkṣavānararākṣasān | bhrātṛbhiḥ sahito rāmaḥ pramumoda sukhaṃ sukhī || 7.41.1 ||
athāparāhṇasamaye bhrātṛbhiḥ saha rāghavaḥ | śuśrāva madhurāṃ vāṇīmantarikṣāt prabhāṣitām || 7.41.2 ||
saumya rāma nirīkṣasva saumyena vadanena mām | kuberabhavanātprāptaṃ viddhi māṃ puṣpakaṃ prabho || 7.41.3 ||
tava śāsanamājñāya gato 'smi bhavanaṃ prati | upasthātuṃ naraśreṣṭha sa ca māṃ pratyabhāṣata || 7.41.4 ||
nirjitastvaṃ narendreṇa rāghaveṇa mahātmanā | nihatya yudhi durdharṣaṃ rāvaṇaṃ rākṣaseśvaram || 7.41.5 ||
mamāpi paramā prītarhate tasmindurātmani | rāvaṇe sagaṇe caiva saputre sahabāndhave || 7.41.6 ||
sa tvaṃ rāmeṇa laṅkāyāṃ nirjitaḥ paramātmanā | vaha saumya tameva tvamahamājñāpayāmi te || 7.41.7 ||
paramo hyeṣa me kāmo yattvaṃ rāghavanandanam | vaherlokasya saṃyānaṃ gacchasva vigatajvaraḥ || 7.41.8 ||
so 'haṃ śāsanamājñāya dhanadasya mahātmanaḥ | tvatsakāśamanuprāpto nirviśaṅkaḥ pratīkṣa mām || 7.41.9 ||
adṛṣyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ sarveṣāṃ dhanadājñayā | carāmyahaṃ prabhāveṇa tavājñāṃ paripālayan || 7.41.10 ||
evamuktastadā rāmaḥ puṣpakeṇa mahābalaḥ | uvāca puṣpakaṃ dṛṣṭvā vimānaṃ punarāgatam || 7.41.11 ||
yadyevaṃ svāgataṃ te 'stu vimānavara puṣpaka | ānukūlyāddhaneśasya vṛttadoṣo na no bhavet || 7.41.12 ||
lājaiścaiva tathā puṣpairdhūpaiścaiva sugandhibhiḥ | pūjayitvā mahābāhū rāghavaḥ puṣpakaṃ tadā || 7.41.13 ||
gamyatāmiti covāca āgaccha tvaṃ smare yadā | siddhānāṃ ca gatau saumya mā viṣādena yojaya | pratighātaśca te mā bhūdyatheṣṭaṃ gacchato diśaḥ || 7.41.14 ||
evamastviti rāmeṇa pūjayitvā visarjitam | abhipretāṃ diśaṃ tasmātprāyāttatpuṣpakaṃ tadā || 7.41.15 ||
evamantarhite tasminpuṣpake sukṛtātmani | bharataḥ prāñjalirvākyamuvāca raghunandanam || 7.41.16 ||
vividhātmani dṛśyante tvayi vīra praśāsati | amānuṣāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ vyāhṛtāni muhurmuhuḥ || 7.41.17 ||
anāmayaśca satvānāṃ sāgro māso gato hyayam | jīrṇānāmapi sattvānāṃ mṛtyurnāyāti rāghava || 7.41.18 ||
arogaprasavā nāryo vapuṣmanto hi mānavāḥ | harṣaścābhyadhiko rājañjanasya puravāsinaḥ || 7.41.19 ||
kāle varṣati parjanyaḥ pātayannamṛtaṃ payaḥ | vātāścāpi pravāntyete sparśayuktāḥ sukhāḥ śivāḥ || 7.41.20 ||
īdṛśo 'naśvaro rājā bhavediti nareśvaraḥ | kathayanti pure rājanpaurajānapadāstathā || 7.41.21 ||
etā vācaḥ sumadhurā bharatena samīritāḥ | śrutvā rāmo mudā yukto babhūva nṛpasattamaḥ || 7.41.22 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe ekacatvāriṃśaḥ sargaḥ || 41 ||
sa visṛjya tato rāmaḥ puṣpakaṃ hemabhūṣitam | praviveśa mahābāhuraśokavanikāṃ tadā || 7.42.1 ||
candanāgurucūtaiśca tuṅgakāleyakairapi | devadāruvanaiścāpi samantādupaśobhitām || 7.42.2 ||
campakāśokapunnāgamadhūkapanasāsanaiḥ | śobhitāṃ pārijātaiśca vidhūmajvalanaprabhaiḥ || 7.42.3 ||
lodhranīpārjunairnāgaiḥ saptaparṇātimuktakaiḥ | mandārakadalīgulmalatājālasamāvṛtām || 7.42.4 ||
priyaṅgubhiḥ kadambaiśca tathā ca vakulairapi | jambūbhirdāḍimaiścaiva kovidāraiśca śobhitām || 7.42.5 ||
sarvadā kusumai ramyaiḥ phalavadbhirmanoramaiḥ | divyagandharasopetaistaruṇāṅkurapallavaiḥ || 7.42.6 ||
tathaiva tarubhirdivyaiḥ śilpibhiḥ parikalpitaiḥ | cārupallavapuṣpāḍhyairmattabhramarasaṅkulaiḥ || 7.42.7 ||
kokilairbhṛṅgarājaiśca nānāvarṇaiśca pakṣibhiḥ | śobhitāṃ śataśaścitrāṃ cūtavṛkṣāvataṃsakaiḥ || 7.42.8 ||
śātakumbhanibhāḥ kecitkecidagniśikhopamāḥ | nīlāñjananibhāścānye bhānti tatratyapādapāḥ || 7.42.9 ||
surabhīṇi ca puṣpāṇi mālyāni vividhāni ca | dīrghikā vividhākārāḥ pūrṇāḥ paramavāriṇā || 7.42.10 ||
māṇikyakṛtasopānāḥ sphāṭikāntarakuṭṭimāḥ | phullapadmotpalavanāścakravākopaśobhitāḥ || 7.42.11 ||
dātyūhaśukasaṅghuṣṭā haṃsasārasanāditāḥ | tarubhiḥ puṣpavadbhiśca tīrajairupaśobhitāḥ || 7.42.12 ||
prākārairvividhākāraiḥ śobhitāśca śilātalaiḥ | tatraiva ca vanoddeśe vaiḍūryamaṇisannibhaiḥ || 7.42.13 ||
śādvalaiḥ paramopetāṃ puṣpitadrumakānanām | tatra saṅgharṣajātānāṃ vṛkṣāṇāṃ puṣpaśālinām || 7.42.14 ||
prastarāḥ puṣpaśabalā nabhastārāgaṇairiva | nandanaṃ hi yathendrasya brāhmaṃ caitrarathaṃ yathā | tathābhūtaṃ hi rāmasya kānanaṃ sanniveśanam || 7.42.15 ||
bahvāsanagṛhopetāṃ latāgṛhasamāvṛtām | aśokavanikāṃ sphītāṃ praviśya raghunandanaḥ || 7.42.16 ||
āsane ca śubhākāre puṣpaprakarabhūṣite | kuśāstaraṇasaṃstīrṇe rāmaḥ sanniṣasāda ha || 7.42.17 ||
sītāmādāyaṃ hastena madhumaireyakaṃ śuci | pāyayāmāsa kākutsthaḥ śacīmiva purandaraḥ || 7.42.18 ||
māṃsāni ca samṛṣṭāni phalāni vividhāni ca | rāmasyābhyavahārārthaṃ kiṅkarāstūrṇamāharan || 7.42.19 ||
upānṛtyaṃśca rājānaṃ nṛtyagītaviśāradāḥ | bālāśca rūpavatyaśca striyaḥ pānavaśānugāḥ || 7.42.20 ||
manobhirāmā rāmāstā rāmo ramayatāṃ varaḥ | ramayāmāsa dharmātmā nityaṃ paramabhūṣitaḥ || 7.42.21 ||
sa tayā sītayā sārdhamāsīno virarāja ha | arundhatyā sahāsīno vasiṣṭha iva tejasā || 7.42.22 ||
evaṃ rāmo mudā yuktaḥ sītāṃ surasutopamām | ramayāmāsa vaidehīmahanyahani devavat || 7.42.23 ||
tathā tayorviharatoḥ sītārāghavayościram | atyakrāmacchubhaḥ kālaḥ śaiśiro bhogadaḥ sadā || 7.42.24 ||
daśavarṣasahasrāṇi gatāni sumahātmanoḥ | prāptayorvividhānbhogānatītaḥ śiśirāgamaḥ || 7.42.25 ||
pūrvāhṇe dharmakāryāṇi kṛtvā dharmeṇa dharmavit | śeṣaṃ divasabhāgārdhamantaḥpuragato 'bhavat || 7.42.26 ||
sītāpi devakāryāṇi kṛtvā paurvāhṇikāni vai | śvaśrūṇāmakarotpūjāṃ sarvāsāmaviśeṣataḥ || 7.42.27 ||
abhyagacchattato rāmaṃ vicitrābharaṇāmbarā | triviṣṭape sahasrākṣamupaviṣṭaṃ yathā śacī || 7.42.28 ||
dṛṣṭvā tu rāghavaḥ patnīṃ kalyāṇena samanvitām | praharṣamatulaṃ lebhe sādhu sādhviti cābravīt || 7.42.29 ||
abravīcca varārohāṃ sītāṃ surasutopamām | apatyalābho vaidehi tvayi me samupasthitaḥ || 7.42.30 ||
kimicchasi varārohe kāmaḥ kiṃ kriyatāṃ tava || 7.42.31 ||
smitaṃ kṛtvā tu vaidehī rāmaṃ vākyamathābravīt | tapovanāni puṇyāni draṣṭumicchāmi rāghava || 7.42.32 ||
gaṅgātīropaviṣṭānāmṛṣīṇāmugratejasām | phalamūlāśināṃ deva pādamūleṣu vartitum || 7.42.33 ||
eṣa me paramaḥ kāmo yanmūlaphalabhojinām | apyekarātraṃ kākutstha nivaseyaṃ tapovane || 7.42.34 ||
tatheti ca pratijñātaṃ rāmeṇākliṣṭakarmaṇā | visrabdhā bhava vaidehi śvo gamiṣyasyasaṃśayam || 7.42.35 ||
evamuktvā tu kākutstho maithilīṃ janakātmajām | madhyakakṣāntaraṃ rāmo nirjagāma suhṛdvṛtaḥ || 7.42.36 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe dvicatvāriṃśaḥ sargaḥ || 42 ||
tatropaviṣṭaṃ rājānamupāsante vicakṣaṇāḥ | kathānāṃ bahurūpāṇāṃ hāsyakārāḥ samantataḥ || 7.43.1 ||
vijayo madhumattaśca kāśyapo maṅgalaḥ kuṭaḥ | surājaḥ kāliyo bhadro dantavakraḥ sumāgadhaḥ || 7.43.2 ||
ete kathā bahuvidhāḥ parihāsasamanvitāḥ | kathayanti sma saṃhṛṣṭā rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ || 7.43.3 ||
tataḥ kathāyāṃ kasyāñcidrāghavaḥ samabhāṣata | kāḥ kathā nagare bhadra vartante viṣayeṣu ca || 7.43.4 ||
māmāśritāni kānyāhuḥ paurajānapadā janāḥ | kiṃ ca sītāṃ samāśritya bharataṃ kiṃ ca lakṣmaṇam || 7.43.5 ||
kiṃ nu śatrughnamuddiśya kaikayīṃ kiṃ nu mātaram | vaktavyatāṃ ca rājāno vare rājye vrajanti ca || 7.43.6 ||
evamukte tu rāmeṇa bhadraḥ prāñjalirabravīt | sthitāḥ kathā śubhāḥ rājanvartante puravāsinām || 7.43.7 ||
amuṃ tu vijayaṃ saumya daśagrīvavadhārjitam | bhūyiṣṭhaṃ svapure pauraiḥ kathyante puruṣarṣabha || 7.43.8 ||
evamuktastu bhadreṇa rāghavo vākyamabravīt | kathayasva yathātattvaṃ sarvaṃ niravaśeṣataḥ || 7.43.9 ||
śubhāśubhāni vākyāni yānyāhuḥ puravāsinaḥ | śrutvedānīṃ śubhaṃ kuryāṃ nakuryāmaśubhāni ca || 7.43.10 ||
kathayasva ca visrabdho nirbhayaṃ vigatajvaraḥ | kathayanti yathā paurāḥ pāpā janapadeṣu ca || 7.43.11 ||
rāghaveṇaivamuktastu bhadraḥ suruciraṃ vacaḥ | pratyuvāca mahābāhuṃ prāñjaliḥ susamāhitaḥ || 7.43.12 ||
śṛṇu rājanyathā paurāḥ kathayanti śubhāśubham | catvarāpaṇarathyāsu vaneṣūpavaneṣu ca || 7.43.13 ||
duṣkaraṃ kṛtavānrāmaḥ samudre setubandhanam | aśrutaṃ pūrvakaiḥ kaiściddevairapi sadānavaiḥ || 7.43.14 ||
rāvaṇaśca durādharṣo hataḥ sabalavāhanaḥ | vānarāśca vaśaṃ nītā ṛkṣāśca saha rākṣasaiḥ || 7.43.15 ||
hatvā ca rāvaṇaṃ saṅkhye sītāmāhṛtya rāghavaḥ | amarṣaṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ kṛtvā svaveśma punarānayat || 7.43.16 ||
kīdṛśaṃ hṛdaye tasya sītāsambhogajaṃ sukham | aṅkamāropya tu purā rāvaṇena balāddhṛtām || 7.43.17 ||
laṅkāmapi purā nītāmaśokavanikāṃ gatām | rakṣasāṃ vaśamāpannāṃ kathaṃ rāmo na kutsate || 7.43.18 ||
asmākamapi dāreṣu sahanīyaṃ bhaviṣyati | yathā hi kurute rājā prajā tamanuvartate || 7.43.19 ||
evaṃ bahuvidhā vāco vadanti puravāsinaḥ | nagareṣu ca sarveṣu rājañjanapadeṣu ca || 7.43.20 ||
tasyaivaṃ bhāṣitaṃ śrutvā rāghavaḥ paramārtavat | uvāca suhṛdaḥ sarvānkathametadbravītha mām || 7.43.21 ||
sarve tu śirasā bhūmāvabhivādya praṇamya ca | pratyūcū rāghavaṃ dīnamevametanna saṃśayaḥ || 7.43.22 ||
śrutvā tu vākyaṃ kākutsthaḥ sarveṣāṃ samudīritam | visarjayāmāsa tadā vayasyāñchatrusūdanaḥ || 7.43.23 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe tricatvāriṃśaḥ sargaḥ || 43 ||
visṛjya tu suhṛdvargaṃ buddhyā niścitya rāghavaḥ | samīpe dvāḥsthamāsīnamidaṃ vacanamabravīt || 7.44.1 ||
śīghramānaya saumitriṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ śubhalakṣaṇam | bharataṃ ca mahābhāgaṃ śatrughnamaparājitam || 7.44.2 ||
rāmasya vacanaṃ śrutvā dvāḥstho mūrdhni kṛtāñjaliḥ | lakṣmaṇasya gṛhaṃ gatvā praviveśānivāritaḥ || 7.44.3 ||
uvāca sumahātmānaṃ vardhayitvā kṛtāñjaliḥ | draṣṭumicchati rājā tvāṃ gamyatāṃ tatra mā ciram || 7.44.4 ||
bāḍhamityeva saumitriḥ śrutvā rāghavaśāsanam | prādravadrathamāruhya rāghavasya niveśanam || 7.44.5 ||
prayāntaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā dvāḥstho bharatamantikāt | uvāca bharataṃ tatra vardhayitvā kṛtāñjaliḥ || 7.44.6 ||
vinayāvanato bhūtvā rājā tvāṃ draṣṭumicchati | bharatastu vacaḥśrutvā dvāḥsthādrāmasamīritam || 7.44.7 ||
utpapātāsanāttūrṇaṃ padbhyāmeva yayau balī | dṛṣṭvā prayāntaṃ bharataṃ tvaramāṇaḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ || 7.44.8 ||
śatrughnabhavanaṃ gatvā tato vākyamuvāca ha | ehyāgaccha raghuśreṣṭha rājā tvāṃ draṣṭumicchati || 7.44.9 ||
gato hi lakṣmaṇaḥ pūrvaṃ bharataśca mahāyaśāḥ | śrutvā tu vacanaṃ tasya śatrughnaḥ paramāsanāt || 7.44.10 ||
śirasā dharaṇīṃ prāpya prayayau yatra rāghavaḥ | dvāḥsthastvāgamya rāmāya sarvāneva kṛtāñjaliḥ | nivedayāmāsa tadā bhrāta'nsvānsamupasthitān || 7.44.11 ||
kumārānāgatāñchrutvā cintāvyākulitendriyaḥ | avāṅmukho dīnamanā dvāḥsthaṃ vacanamabravīt || 7.44.12 ||
praveśaya kumārāṃstvaṃ matsamīpaṃ tvarānvitaḥ | eteṣu jīvitaṃ mahyamete prāṇāḥ priyā mama || 7.44.13 ||
ājñaptāstu narendreṇa kumārāḥ śakratejasaḥ | prahvāḥ prāñjalayo bhūtvā viviśuste samāhitāḥ || 7.44.14 ||
te tu dṛṣṭvā mukhaṃ tasya sagrahaṃ śaśinaṃ yathā | sandhyāgatamivādityaṃ prabhayā parivarjitam || 7.44.15 ||
bāṣpapūrṇe ca nayane dṛṣṭvā rāmasya dhīmataḥ | hataśobhaṃ yathā padmaṃ mukhaṃ vīkṣya ca tasya te || 7.44.16 ||
tato 'bhivādya tvaritāḥ pādau rāmasya mūrdhabhiḥ | tasthuḥ samāhitāḥ sarve rāmastvaśrūṇyavartayat || 7.44.17 ||
tānpariṣvajya bāhubhyāmutthāpya ca mahābalaḥ | āsaneṣvāsatetyuktvā tato vākyaṃ jagāda ha || 7.44.18 ||
bhavanto mama sarvasvaṃ bhavanto jīvitaṃ mama | bhavadbhiśca kṛtaṃ rājyaṃ pālayāmi nareśvarāḥ || 7.44.19 ||
bhavantaḥ kṛtaśāstrārthā buddhyā ca pariniṣṭhitāḥ | sambhūya ca madartho 'yamanveṣṭavyo nareśvarāḥ || 7.44.20 ||
tathā vadati kākutsthe avadhānaparāyaṇāḥ | udvignamanasaḥ sarve kiṃ nu rājābhidhāsyati || 7.44.21 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe catuścatvāriṃśaḥ sargaḥ || 44 ||
teṣāṃ samupaviṣṭānāṃ sarveṣāṃ dīnacetasām | uvāca vākyaṃ kākutstho mukhena pariśuṣyatā || 7.45.1 ||
sarve śṛṇuta bhadraṃ vo mā kurudhvaṃ mano 'nyathā | paurāṇāṃ mama sītāyāṃ yādṛśī vartate kathā || 7.45.2 ||
paurāpavādaḥ sumahāṃstathā janapadasya ca | vartate mayi bībhatsā sā me marmāṇi kṛntati || 7.45.3 ||
ahaṃ kila kule jāta ikṣvākūṇāṃ mahātmanām | sītā 'pi satkule jātā janakānāṃ mahātmanām || 7.45.4 ||
jānāsi tvaṃ yathā saumya daṇḍake vijane vane | rāvaṇena hṛtā sītā sa ca vidhvaṃsito mayā || 7.45.5 ||
tatra me buddhirutpannā janakasya sutāṃ prati | atroṣitāmimāṃ sītāmānayeyaṃ kathaṃ purīm || 7.45.6 ||
pratyayārthaṃ tataḥ sītā viveśa jvalanaṃ tadā | pratyakṣaṃ tava saumitre devānāṃ havyavāhanaḥ | apāpāṃ maithilīmāha vāyuścākāśagocaraḥ || 7.45.7 ||
candrādityau ca śaṃsete surāṇāṃ sannidhau purā | ṛṣīṇāṃ caiva sarveṣāmapāpāṃ janakātmajām || 7.45.8 ||
evaṃ śuddhasamācārā devagandharvasannidhau | laṅkādvīpe mahendreṇa mama haste niveśitā || 7.45.9 ||
antarātmā ca me vetti sītāṃ śuddhāṃ yaśasvinīm | tato gṛhītvā vaidehīmayodhyāmahamāgataḥ || 7.45.10 ||
ayaṃ tu me mahānvādaḥ śokaśca hṛdi vartate | paurāpavādaḥ sumahāṃstathā janapadasya ca || 7.45.11 ||
akīrtiryasya gīyeta loke bhūtasya kasyacit | patatyevādhamāँllokānyāvacchabdaḥ prakīrtyate || 7.45.12 ||
akīrtirnindyate devaiḥ kīrtirlokeṣu pūjyate | kīrtyarthaṃ tu samārambhaḥ sarveṣāṃ sumahātmanām || 7.45.13 ||
apyahaṃ jīvitaṃ jahyāṃ yuṣmānvā puruṣarṣabhāḥ | apavādabhayādbhītaḥ kiṃ punarjanakātmajām || 7.45.14 ||
tasmādbhavantaḥ paśyantu patitaṃ śokasāgare | nahi paśyāmyahaṃ bhūtaṃ kiñcidduḥkhamato 'dhikam || 7.45.15 ||
śvastvaṃ prabhāte saumitre sumantrādhiṣṭhitaṃ ratham | āruhya sītāmāropya viṣayānte samutsṛja || 7.45.16 ||
gaṅgāyāstu pare pāre vālmīkestu mahātmanaḥ | āśramo divyasaṅkāśastamasātīramāśritaḥ || 7.45.17 ||
tatraināṃ vijane deśe visṛjya raghunandana | śīghramāgaccha bhadraṃ te kuruṣva vacanaṃ mama || 7.45.18 ||
na cāsmin prativaktavyaḥ sītāṃ prati kathañcana | tasmāttvaṃ gaccha saumitre nātra kāryā vicāraṇā || 7.45.19 ||
aprītirhi parā mahyaṃ tvayetatprativārite | śāpitā hi mayā yūyaṃ bhujābhyāṃ jīvitena ca || 7.45.20 ||
ye māṃ vākyāntare brūyuranunetuṃ kathañcana | ahitā nāma te nityaṃ madabhīṣṭavighātanāt || 7.45.21 ||
mānayantu bhavanto māṃ yadi macchāsane sthitāḥ | ito 'dya nīyatāṃ sītā kuruṣva vacanaṃ mama || 7.45.22 ||
pūrvamukto 'hamanayā gaṅgātīre 'hamāśramān | paśyeyamiti tasyāśca kāmaḥ saṃvartyatāmayam || 7.45.23 ||
evamuktvā tu kākutstho bāṣpeṇa pihitānanaḥ | praviveśa sa dharmātmā bhrātṛbhiḥ parivāritaḥ || 7.45.24 ||
śokasaṃlagnahṛdayo niśaśvāsa yathā dvipaḥ || 7.45.25 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe pañcacatvāriṃśaḥ sargaḥ || 45 ||
tato rajanyāṃ vyuṣṭāyāṃ lakṣmaṇo dīnacetanaḥ | sumantramabravīdvākyaṃ mukhena pariśuṣyatā || 7.46.1 ||
sārathe turagāñchīghraṃ yojayasva rathottame | svāstīrṇaṃ rājabhavanātsītāyāścāsanaṃ kuru || 7.46.2 ||
sītā hi rājavacanādāśramaṃ puṇyakarmaṇām | mayā neyā maharṣīṇāṃ śrīghramānīyatāṃ rathaḥ || 7.46.3 ||
sumantrastu tathetyuktvā yuktaṃ paramavājibhiḥ | rathaṃ suruciraprakhyaṃ svāstīrṇaṃ sukhaśayyayā || 7.46.4 ||
ānīyovāca saumitriṃ mitrāṇāṃ mānavardhanam | ratho 'yaṃ samanuprāpto yatkāryaṃ kriyatāṃ prabho || 7.46.5 ||
evamuktaḥ sumantreṇa rājaveśmani lakṣmaṇaḥ | praviśya sītāmāsādya vyājahāra nararṣabhaḥ || 7.46.6 ||
tvayā kilaiṣa nṛpatirvaraṃ vai yācitaḥ prabhuḥ | nṛpeṇa ca pratijñātamājñaptaścāśramaṃ prati || 7.46.7 ||
gaṅgītīre mayā devi ṛṣīṇāmāśramāñchubhān | śīghraṃ gatvā tu vaidehi śāsanātpārthivasya naḥ | araṇye munibhirjuṣṭe apaneyā bhaviṣyasi || 7.46.8 ||
evamuktā tu vaidehī lakṣmaṇena mahātmanā | praharṣamatulaṃ lebhe gamanaṃ cāpyarocayat || 7.46.9 ||
vāsāṃsi ca mahārhāṇi ratnāni vividhāni ca | gṛhītvā tāni vaidehī gamanāyopacakrame || 7.46.10 ||
imāni munipatnīnāṃ dāsyāmyābharaṇānham | vastrāṇi ca mahārhāṇi dhanāni vividhāni ca || 7.46.11 ||
saumitristu tathetyuktvā rathamāropya maithilīm | prayayau śīghraturagai rāmasyājñāmanusmaran || 7.46.12 ||
abravīcca tadā sītā lakṣmaṇaṃ lakṣmivardhanam | aśubhāni bahūnyeva paśyāmi raghunandana || 7.46.13 ||
nayanaṃ me sphuratyadya gātrotkampaśca jāyate | hṛdayaṃ caiva saumitre asvasthamiva lakṣaye || 7.46.14 ||
autsukyaṃ paramaṃ cāpi adhṛtiśca parā mama | śūnyāmeva ca paśyāmi pṛthivīṃ pṛthulocana || 7.46.15 ||
api svasti bhavettasya bhrātuste bhrātṛvatsala | śvaśrūṇāṃ caiva me vīra sarvāsāmaviśeṣataḥ || 7.46.16 ||
pure janapade caiva kuśalaṃ prāṇināmapi | ityañjalikṛtā sītā devatā abhyayācata || 7.46.17 ||
lakṣmaṇo 'rthaṃ tataḥ śrutvā śirasā vandya maithilīm | śivamityabravīddhṛṣṭo hṛdayena viśuṣyatā || 7.46.18 ||
tato vāsamupāgamya gomatītīra āśrame | prabhāte punarutthāya saumitriḥ sūtamabravīt || 7.46.19 ||
yojayasva rathaṃ śīghramadya bhāgīrathījalam | śirasā dhārayiṣyāmi tryambakaḥ parvate yathā || 7.46.20 ||
so 'śvān rajvātha caturo rathe yuṅktvā manojavān | ārohasveti vaidehīṃ sūtaḥ prāñjalirabravīt || 7.46.21 ||
sā tu sūtasya vacanādāruroha rathottamam | sītā saumitriṇā sārdhaṃ sumantreṇa ca dhīmatā || 7.46.22 ||
āsasāda viśālākṣī gaṅgāṃ pāpavināśinīm | athārdhadivasaṃ gatvā bhāgīrathyā jalāśayam || 7.46.23 ||
nirīkṣya lakṣmaṇo dīnaḥ praruroda mahāsvanaḥ || 7.46.24 ||
sītā tu paramāyattā dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇamāturam | uvāca vākyaṃ dharmajñā kimidaṃ rudyate tvayā || 7.46.25 ||
jāhnavītīramāsādya cirābhilaṣitaṃ mama | harṣakāle kimarthaṃ māṃ viṣādayasi lakṣmaṇa || 7.46.26 ||
nityaṃ tvaṃ rāmapārśveṣu vartase puruṣarṣabha | kaccidvinākṛtastena dvirātraṃ śokamāgataḥ || 7.46.27 ||
mamāpi dayito rāmo jīvitādapi lakṣmaṇa | na cāhamevaṃ śocāmi maivaṃ tvaṃ bāliśo bhava || 7.46.28 ||
tārayasva ca māṃ gaṅgāṃ darśayasva ca tāpasān | tato munibhyo dāsyāmi vāṃsāsyābharaṇāni ca || 7.46.29 ||
tataḥ kṛtvā maharṣīṇāṃ yathārhamabhivādanam | tatra caikāṃ niśāmuṣya yāsyāmastāṃ purīṃ punaḥ || 7.46.30 ||
mamāpi padmapatrākṣaṃ siṃhoraskaṃ kṛśodaram | tvarate hi mano draṣṭuṃ rāmaṃ ramayatāṃ varam || 7.46.31 ||
tasyāstadvacanaṃ śrutvā pramṛjya nayane śubhe | nāvikānāhvayāmāsa lakṣmaṇaḥ paravīrahā || 7.46.32 ||
iyaṃ ca sajjā nauśceti dāśāḥ prāñjalayo 'bruvan || 7.46.33 ||
titīrṣurlakṣmaṇo gaṅgāṃ śubhāṃ nāvamupāruhat | gaṅgāṃ santārayāmāsa lakṣmaṇastāṃ samāhitaḥ || 7.46.34 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe ṣaṭcatvāriṃśaḥ sargaḥ || 46 ||
atha nāvaṃ suvistīrṇāṃ naiṣādīṃ rāghavānujaḥ | āruroha samāyuktāṃ pūrvamāropya maithilīm || 7.47.1 ||
sumantraṃ caiva sarathaṃ sthīyatāmiti lakṣmaṇaḥ | uvāca śokasantaptaḥ prayāhīti ca nāvikam || 7.47.2 ||
tatastīramupāgamya bhāgīrathyāḥ sa lakṣmaṇaḥ | uvāca maithilīṃ vākyaṃ prāñjalirbāṣpasamplutaḥ || 7.47.3 ||
hṛdgataṃ me mahacchalyaṃ yasmādāryeṇa dhīmatā | asminnimitte vaidehi lokasya vacanīkṛtaḥ || 7.47.4 ||
śreyo hi maraṇaṃ me 'dya mṛtyurvā yatparaṃ bhavet | na cāsminnīdṛśe kārye niyojyo lokanindite || 7.47.5 ||
prasīda ca na me pāpaṃ kartumarhasi śobhane | ityañjalikṛto bhūmau nipapāta sa lakṣmaṇaḥ || 7.47.6 ||
rudantaṃ prāñjaliṃ dṛṣṭvā kāṅkṣantaṃ mṛtyumātmanaḥ | maithilī bhṛśasaṃvignā lakṣmaṇaṃ vākyamabravīt || 7.47.7 ||
kimidaṃ nāvagacchāmi brūhi tattvena lakṣmaṇa | paśyāmi tvāṃ na ca svasthamapi kṣemaṃ mahīpateḥ || 7.47.8 ||
śāpito 'si narendreṇa yattvaṃ santāpamāgataḥ | tadbrūyāḥ sannidhau mahyamahamājñāpayāmi te || 7.47.9 ||
vaidehyā codyamānastu lakṣmaṇo dīnacetanaḥ | avāṅmukho bāṣpakalaṃ vākyametaduvāca ha || 7.47.10 ||
śrutvā pariṣado madhye hyapavādaṃ sudāruṇam | pure janapade caiva tvatkṛte janakātmaje | rāmaḥ santaptahṛdayo mā nivedya gṛhaṃ gataḥ || 7.47.11 ||
na tāni vacanīyāni mayā devi tavāgrataḥ | yāni rājñā hṛdi nyastānyamarṣātpṛṣṭhataḥ kṛtaḥ || 7.47.12 ||
sā tvaṃ tyaktā nṛpatinā nirdoṣā mama sannidhau | paurāpavādabhītena grāhyaṃ devi na te 'nyathā || 7.47.13 ||
āśramānteṣu ca mayā tyaktavyā tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi | rājñaḥ śāsanamājñāya tavedaṃ kila daurhṛdam || 7.47.14 ||
tadetajjāhnavītīre brahmarṣīṇāṃ tapovanam | puṇyaṃ ca ramaṇīyaṃ ca mā viṣādaṃ kṛthāḥ śubhe || 7.47.15 ||
rājño daśarathasyeṣṭaḥ piturme munipuṅgavaḥ | sakhā paramako vipro vālmīkiḥ sumahāyaśāḥ || 7.47.16 ||
pādacchāyāmupāgamya sukhamasya mahātmanaḥ | upavāsaparaikāgrā vasa tvaṃ janakātmaje || 7.47.17 ||
pativratātvamāsthāya rāmaṃ kṛtvā sadā hṛdi | śreyaste paramaṃ devi tathā kṛtvā bhaviṣyati || 7.47.18 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe saptacatvāriṃśaḥ sargaḥ || 47 ||
lakṣmaṇasya vacaḥ śrutvā dāruṇaṃ janakātmajā | paraṃ viṣādamāgamya vaidehī nipapāta ha || 7.48.1 ||
sā muhūrtamivāsañjñā bāṣpaparyākulekṣaṇā | lakṣmaṇaṃ dīnayā vācā uvāca janakātmajā || 7.48.2 ||
māmikeyaṃ tanurnūnaṃ sṛṣṭā duḥkhāya lakṣmaṇa | dhātrā yasyāstathā me 'dya duḥkhamūrtiḥ pradṛśyate || 7.48.3 ||
kiṃ nu pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ pūrvaṃ ko vā dārairviyojitaḥ | yā 'haṃ śuddhasamācārā tyaktā nṛpatinā satī || 7.48.4 ||
purā 'hamāśrame vāsaṃ rāmapādānuvartinī | anurudhyāpi saumitre duḥkhe ca parivartinī || 7.48.5 ||
sā kathaṃ hyāśrame saumya vatsyāmi vijanīkṛtā | ākhyāsyāmi ca kasyāhaṃ duḥkhaṃ duḥkhaparāyaṇā || 7.48.6 ||
kiṃ nu vakṣyāmi muniṣu karma vā satkṛtaṃ ca kim | kasmiṃścit kāraṇe tyaktā rāghaveṇa mahātmanā || 7.48.7 ||
na khalvadyaiva saumitre jīvitaṃ jāhnavījale | tyajeyaṃ rājavaṃśastu bharturme parihāsyate || 7.48.8 ||
yathājñaṃ kuru somitre tyaja māṃ duḥkhabhāginīm | nideśe sthīyatāṃ rājñaḥ śṛṇu cedaṃ vaco mama || 7.48.9 ||
śvaśrūṇāmaviśeṣeṇa prāñjalipragraheṇa ca | śirasā ' 'vandya caraṇau kuśalaṃ brūhi pārthivam || 7.48.10 ||
śirasā 'bhinato brūyāḥ sarvāsāmeva lakṣmaṇa | vaktavyaścāpi nṛpatirdharmeṣu susamāhitaḥ || 7.48.11 ||
jānāsi ca yathā śuddhā sītā tattvena rāghava | bhaktyā ca parayā yuktā hitā ca tava nityaśaḥ || 7.48.12 ||
ahaṃ tyaktā tvayā vīra ayaśobhīruṇā jane | yacca te vacanīyaṃ syādapavādasamutthitam | mayā ca parihartavyaṃ tvaṃ hi me paramā gatiḥ || 7.48.13 ||
vaktavyaśceti nṛpatirdhameṇa susamāhitaḥ | yathā bhrātṛṣu vartethāstathā paureṣu nityadā || 7.48.14 ||
paramo hyeṣa dharmaste tasmātkīrtiranuttamā || 7.48.15 ||
yattu paurajano rājandharmeṇa samavāpnuyāt | ahaṃ tu nānuśocāmi svaśarīraṃ nararṣabha || 7.48.16 ||
yathāpavādaṃ paurāṇāṃ tathaiva raghunandana | patirhi devatā nāryāḥ patirbandhuḥ patirguruḥ || 7.48.17 ||
prāṇairapi priyaṃ tasmādbhartuḥ kāryaṃ viśeṣataḥ | iti madvacanādrāmo vaktavyo mama saṅgrahaḥ | nirīkṣya mā 'dya gaccha tvamṛtukālātivartinīm || 7.48.18 ||
evaṃ bruvantyāṃ sītāyāṃ lakṣmaṇo dīnacetanaḥ | śirasā ' 'vandya dharaṇīṃ vyāhartuṃ na śaśāka ha || 7.48.19 ||
pradakṣiṇaṃ ca tāṃ kṛtvā rudanneva mahāsvanaḥ | dhyātvā muhūrtaṃ tāmāha kiṃ māṃ vakṣyasi śobhane || 7.48.20 ||
dṛṣṭapūrvaṃ na te rūpaṃ pādau dṛṣṭau tavānaghe | kathamatra hi paśyāmi rāmeṇa rahitāṃ vane || 7.48.21 ||
ityuktvā tāṃ namaskṛtya punarnāvamupāruhat | āruhya ca punarnāvaṃ nāvikaṃ cābhyacodayat || 7.48.22 ||
sa gatvā cottaraṃ tīraṃ śokabhārasamanvitaḥ | sammūḍha iva duḥkhena rathamadhyāruhaddrutam || 7.48.23 ||
muhurmuhuḥ parāvṛtya dṛṣṭvā sītāmanāthavat | ceṣṭantīṃ paratīrasthāṃ lakṣmaṇaḥ prayayāvatha || 7.48.24 ||
dūrasthaṃ rathamālokya lakṣmaṇaṃ ca muhūrmuhuḥ | nirīkṣamāṇāṃ tūdvignāṃ sītāṃ śokaḥ samāviśat || 7.48.25 ||
sā duḥkhabhārāvanatā yaśasvinī yaśodhanā nāthamapaśyatī satī | ruroda sā barhiṇanādite vane mahāsvanaṃ duḥkhaparāyaṇā satī || 7.48.26 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe 'ṣṭacatvāriṃśaḥ sargaḥ || 48 ||
sītāṃ tu rudatīṃ dṛṣṭvā te tatra munidārakāḥ | prādravanyatra bhagavānāste vālmīkirugradhīḥ || 7.49.1 ||
abhivādya muneḥ pādau muniputrā maharṣaye | sarvaṃ nivedayāmāsustasyāstu ruditasvanam || 7.49.2 ||
adṛṣṭapūrvā bhagavankasyāpyeṣā mahātmanaḥ | patnī śrīriva sammohādvirauti vikṛtānanā || 7.49.3 ||
bhagavansādhu paśya tvaṃ devatāmiva khāccyutām | nadyāstu tīre bhagavanvarastrī kāpi duḥkhitā || 7.49.4 ||
dṛṣṭāsmābhiḥ praruditā dṛḍhaṃ śokaparāyaṇā | anarhā duḥkhaśokābhyāmekāṃ dīnāṃ hyanāthavat || 7.49.5 ||
na hyenāṃ mānuṣīṃ vidmaḥ satkriyā 'syāḥ prayujyatām | āśramasyāvidūre ca tvāmiyaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatā || 7.49.6 ||
trātāramicchate sādhvī bhagavaṃstrātumarhasi | teṣāṃ tu vacanaṃ śrutvā buddhyā niścitya dharmavit | tapasā labdhacakṣuṣmān prādravadyatra maithilī || 7.49.7 ||
taṃ prayāntamabhipretya śiṣyā hyenaṃ mahāmatim | taṃ tu deśamabhi pretya kiñcitpadbhyāṃ mahāmatiḥ || 7.49.8 ||
arghyamādāya ruciraṃ jāhnavītīramāgamat | dadarśa rāghavasyeṣṭāṃ sītāṃ patnīmanāthavat || 7.49.9 ||
tāṃ sītāṃ śokabhārārtāṃ vālmīkirmunipuṅgavaḥ | uvāca madhurāṃ vāṇīṃ hlādayanniva tejasā || 7.49.10 ||
snuṣā daśarathasya tvaṃ rāmasya mahiṣī priyā | janakasya sutā rājñaḥ svāgataṃ te pativrate || 7.49.11 ||
āyāntī cāsi vijñātā mayā dharmasamādhinā | kāraṇaṃ caiva sarvaṃ me hṛdayenopalakṣitam || 7.49.12 ||
tava caiva mahābhāge viditaṃ mama tattvataḥ | sarvaṃ ca viditaṃ mahyaṃ trailokye yaddhi vartate || 7.49.13 ||
apāpāṃ vedmi sīte tvāṃ tapolabdhena cakṣuṣā | visrabdhā bhava vaidehi sāmprataṃ mayi vartase || 7.49.14 ||
āśramasyāvidūre me tāpasyastapasi sthitāḥ | tāstvāṃ vatse yathā vatsaṃ pālayiṣyanti nityaśaḥ || 7.49.15 ||
idamardhyaṃ pratīccha tvaṃ visrabdhā vigatajvarā | yathā svagṛhamabhyetya viṣādaṃ caiva mā kṛthāḥ || 7.49.16 ||
śrutvā tu bhāṣitaṃ sītā muneḥ paramamadbhutam | śirasā ' 'vandya caraṇau tathetyāha kṛtāñjaliḥ || 7.49.17 ||
taṃ prayāntaṃ muniṃ sītā prāñjaliḥ pṛṣṭhato 'nvagāt || 7.49.18 ||
taṃ dṛṣṭvā munimāyāntaṃ vaidehyā munipatnayaḥ | upājagmurmudā yuktā vacanaṃ cedamabruvan || 7.49.19 ||
svāgataṃ te muniśreṣṭha cirasyāgamanaṃ ca te | abhivādayāmastvāṃ sarvā ucyatāṃ ki ca kurmahe || 7.49.20 ||
tāsāṃ tadvacanaṃ śrutvā vālmīkiridamabravīt | sīteyaṃ samanuprāptā patnī rāmasya dhīmataḥ || 7.49.21 ||
snuṣā daśarathasyaiṣā janakasya sutā satī | apāpā patinā tyaktā paripālyā mayā sadā || 7.49.22 ||
imāṃ bhavantyaḥ(?) paśyantu snehena parameṇa hi | gauravānmama vākyācca pūjyā vo 'stu viśeṣataḥ || 7.49.23 ||
muhurmuhuśca vaidehīṃ praṇidhāya mahāyaśāḥ | svamāśramaṃ śiṣyavṛtaḥ punarāyānmahātapāḥ || 7.49.24 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe ekonapañcāśaḥ sargaḥ || 49 ||
dṛṣṭvā tu maithilīṃ sītāmāśrame sampraveśitām | santāpamagamadghoraṃ lakṣmaṇo dīnacetanaḥ || 7.50.1 ||
abravīcca mahātejāḥ sumantraṃ mantrasārathim | sītāsantāpajaṃ duḥkhaṃ paśya rāmasya sārathe || 7.50.2 ||
tato duḥkhataraṃ kiṃ nu rāghavasya bhaviṣyati | patnīṃ śuddhasamācārāṃ visṛjya janakātmajām || 7.50.3 ||
vyaktaṃ daivādahaṃ manye rāghavasya vinā bhavam | vaidehyā sārathe nityaṃ daivaṃ hi duratikramam || 7.50.4 ||
yo hi devānsagandharvānasurānsaha rākṣasaiḥ | nihanyādrāghavaḥ kruddhaḥ sa daivamanuvartate || 7.50.5 ||
purā rāmaḥ piturvākyāddaṇḍake vijane vane | uṣitvā nava varṣāṇi pañca caiva mahāvane || 7.50.6 ||
tato duḥkhataraṃ bhūyaḥ sītāyā vipravāsanam | paurāṇāṃ vacanaṃ śrutvā nṛśaṃsaṃ pratibhāti me || 7.50.7 ||
ko nu dharmāśrayaḥ sūta karmaṇyasminyaśohare | maithilīṃ pratisamprāptaḥ paurairhīnārthavādibhiḥ || 7.50.8 ||
etā vāco bahuvidhāḥ śrutvā lakṣmaṇabhāṣitāḥ | sumantraḥ śraddhayā prājño vākyametaduvāca ha || 7.50.9 ||
na santāpastvayā kāryaḥ saumitre maithilīṃ prati | dṛṣṭametatpurā vipraiḥ pituste lakṣmaṇāgrataḥ || 7.50.10 ||
bhaviṣyati dṛḍhaṃ rāmo duḥkhaprāyo 'pi saukhyabhāk | prāpsyate ca mahābāhurviprayogaṃ priyairdhruvam || 7.50.11 ||
tvāṃ caiva maithilīṃ caiva śatrughnabharatāvubhau | santyajiṣyati dharmātmā kālena mahatā mahān || 7.50.12 ||
idaṃ tvayi na vaktavyaṃ saumitre bharate 'pi vā | rājñā vo vyāhṛtaṃ vākyaṃ durvāsā yaduvāca ha || 7.50.13 ||
mahājanasamīpe ca mama caiva nararṣabha | ṛṣiṇā vyāhṛtaṃ vākyaṃ vasiṣṭhasya ca sannidhau || 7.50.14 ||
ṛṣestu vacanaṃ śrutvā māmāha puruṣarṣabhaḥ | sūta na kvacidevaṃ te vaktavyaṃ janasannidhau || 7.50.15 ||
tasyāhaṃ lokapālasya vākyaṃ tatsusamāhitaḥ | naiva jātvanṛtaṃ kāryamiti me saumya darśanam || 7.50.16 ||
sarvathaiva na vaktavyaṃ mayā saumya tavāgrataḥ | yadi te śravaṇe śraddhā śrūyatāṃ raghunandana || 7.50.17 ||
yadyapyahaṃ narendreṇa rahasyaṃ śrāvitaḥ purā | tathāpyudāhariṣyāmi daivaṃ hi duratikramam || 7.50.18 ||
yenedamīdṛśaṃ prāptaṃ duḥkhaṃ śokasamanvitam | na tvayā bharate vācyaṃ śatrughnasyāpi sannidhau || 7.50.19 ||
tacchrutvā bhāṣitaṃ tasya gambhīrārthapadaṃ mahat | tathyaṃ brūhīti saumitriḥ sūtaṃ vākyamathābravīt || 7.50.20 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe pañcāśaḥ sargaḥ || 50 ||
tathā sañcoditaḥ sūto lakṣmaṇena mahātmanā | tadvākyamṛṣiṇā proktaṃ vyāhartumupacakrame || 7.51.1 ||
purā nāmnā hi durvāsā atreḥ putro mahāmuniḥ | vasiṣṭhasyāśrame puṇye vārṣikyaṃ samuvāsa ha || 7.51.2 ||
tamāśramaṃ mahātejāḥ pitā te sumahāyaśāḥ | purohitaṃ mahātmānaṃ didṛkṣuragamastvayam || 7.51.3 ||
sa dṛṣṭvā sūryasaṅkāśaṃ jvalantamiva tejasā | upaviṣṭaṃ vasiṣṭhasya savyapārśve mahāmunim || 7.51.4 ||
tau munī tāpasaśreṣṭhau vinīto hyabhivādayat | sa tābhyāṃ pūjito rājā svāgatenāsanena ca ||
pādyena phalamūlaiśca uvāsa munibhiḥ saha || 7.51.5 ||
teṣāṃ tatropaviṣṭānāṃ tāstāḥ sumadhurāḥ kathāḥ | babhūvuḥ paramarṣīṇāṃ madhyādityagate 'hani || 7.51.6 ||
tataḥ kathāyāṃ kasyāñcitprāñjaliḥ pragraho nṛpaḥ | uvāca taṃ mahātmānamatreḥ putraṃ tapodhanam || 7.51.7 ||
bhagavankiṃ pramāṇena mama vaṃśo bhaviṣyati | kimāyuśca hi me rāmaḥ putrāścānye kimāyuṣaḥ || 7.51.8 ||
rāmasya ca sutā ye syusteṣāmāyuḥ kiyadbhavet | kāmyayā bhagavanbūhi vaṃśasyāsya gatiṃ mama || 7.51.9 ||
tacchrutvā vyāhṛtaṃ vākyaṃ rājño daśarathasya ca | durvāsāḥ sumahātejā vyāhartumupacakrame || 7.51.10 ||
śṛṇu rājanpurāvṛttaṃ tadā devāsure yudhi | daityāḥ surairbhartsyamānā bhṛgupatnīṃ samāśritāḥ || 7.51.11 ||
tayā parigṛhītāṃstāndṛṣṭvā kruddhaḥ sureśvaraḥ | cakreṇa śitadhāreṇa bhṛgupatnyāḥ śiro 'harat || 7.51.13 ||
tatastāṃ nihatāṃ dṛṣṭvā patnīṃ bhṛgukulodvahaḥ | śaśāpa sahasā kruddho viṣṇuṃ ripukulārdanam || 7.51.14 ||
yasmādavadhyāṃ me patnīmavadhīḥ krodhamūrcchitaḥ | tasmāttvaṃ mānuṣe loke janiṣyasi janārdana || 7.51.15 ||
tatra patnīviyogaṃ tvaṃ prāpsyase bahuvārṣikam || 7.51.16 ||
śāpābhihatacetāssa svātmanā bhāvito 'bhavat || 7.51.17 ||
arcayāmāsa taṃ devaṃ bhṛguḥ śāpena pīḍitaḥ | tapasārādhito devo hyabravīdbhaktavatsalaḥ | lokānāṃ saṃhitārthaṃ tu taṃ śāpaṃ grāhyamuktavān || 7.51.19 ||
iti śapto mahātejā bhṛguṇā pūrvajanmani | ihāgato hi putratvaṃ tava pārthivasattama || 7.51.20 ||
rāma ityabhivikhyātastriṣu lokeṣu mānada | tatphalaṃ prāpsyate cāpi bhṛguśāpakṛtaṃ mahat || 7.51.21 ||
ayodhyāyāḥ patī rāmo dīrghakālaṃ bhaviṣyati | sukhinaśca samṛddhāśca bhaviṣyantyasya ye 'nugāḥ || 7.51.22 ||
daśa varṣasahasrāṇi daśa varṣaśatāni ca | rāmo rājyamupāsitvā brahmalokaṃ gamiṣyati || 7.51.23 ||
samṛddhaiścāśvamedhaiśca iṣṭvā paramadurjayaḥ | rājavaṃśāṃśca bahuśo bahūnsaṃsthāpayiṣyati || 7.51.24 ||
dvau putrau tu bhaviṣyete sītāyāṃ rāghavasya tu | anyatra na tvayodhyāyāṃ satyametannasaṃśayaḥ || 7.51.25 ||
sītāyāśca tataḥ putrāvabhiṣekṣyati rāghavaḥ || 7.51.26 ||
sa sarvamakhilaṃ rājño vaṃśasyāha gatāgatam | ākhyāya sumahātejāstūṣṇīmāsīnmahāmuniḥ || 7.51.27 ||
tūṣṇīmbhūte tadā tasminrājā daśaratho munau | abhivādya mahātmānau punarāyātpurottamam || 7.51.28 ||
etadvaco mayā tatra muninā vyāhṛtaṃ purā | śrutaṃ hṛdi ca nikṣiptaṃ nānyathā tadbhaviṣyati || 7.51.29 ||
evaṃ gate na santāpaṃ kartumarhasi rāghava | sītārthe rāghavārthe vā dṛḍho bhava narottama || 7.51.30 ||
śrutvā tu vyāhṛtaṃ vākyaṃ sūtasya paramādbhutam | praharṣamatulaṃ lebhe sādhu sādhviti cābravīt || 7.51.31 ||
tataḥ saṃvadatorevaṃ sūtalakṣmaṇayoḥ pathi | astamarke gate vāsaṃ keśinyāṃ tāvathoṣatuḥ || 7.51.32 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe ekapañcāśaḥ sargaḥ || 51 ||
tatra tāṃ rajanīmuṣya keśinyāṃ raghunandanaḥ | prabhāte punarutthāya lakṣmaṇaḥ prayayau tadā || 7.52.1 ||
tato 'rdhadivase prāpte praviveśa mahārathaḥ | ayodhyāṃ ratnasampūrṇāṃ hṛṣṭapuṣṭajanāvṛtām || 7.52.2 ||
saumitristu paraṃ dainyaṃ jagāma sumahāmatiḥ | rāmapādau samāsādya vakṣyāmi kimahaṃ gataḥ || 7.52.3 ||
tasyaivaṃ cintayānasya bhavanaṃ śaśisannibham | rāmasya paramodāraṃ purastānsamadṛśyata || 7.52.4 ||
rājñastu bhavanadvāri so 'vatīrya rathottamāt | avāṅmukho dīnamanāḥ praviveśānivāritaḥ || 7.52.5 ||
sa dṛṣṭvā rāghavaṃ dīnamāsīnaṃ paramāsane | netrābhyāmaśrupūrṇābhyāṃ dadarśāgrajamagrataḥ || 7.52.6 ||
jagrāha caraṇau tasya lakṣmaṇo dīnacetanaḥ | uvāca dīnayā vācā prāñjaliḥ susamāhitaḥ || 7.52.7 ||
āryasyājñāṃ puraskṛtya visṛjya janakātmajām | gaṅgātīre yathoddiṣṭe vālmīkerāśrame śucau || 7.52.8 ||
tatra tāṃ ca śubhācārāmāśramānte yaśasvinīm | punarapyāgato vīra pādamūlamupāsitum || 7.52.9 ||
mā śucaḥ puruṣavyāghra kālasya gatirīdṛśī | tvadvidhā na hi śocanti buddhimanto manasvinaḥ || 7.52.10 ||
sarve kṣayāntā nicayāḥ patanāntāḥ samucchrayāḥ | saṃyogā viprayogāntā maraṇāntaṃ ca jīvitam || 7.52.11 ||
tasmātputreṣu dāreṣu mitreṣu ca dhaneṣu ca | nātiprasaṅgaḥ kartavyo viprayogo hi tairdhruvam || 7.52.12 ||
śaktastvamātmanā ' 'tmānaṃ vinetuṃ manasaiva hi | lokānsarvāṃśca kākutstha kiṃ punaḥ śokamātmanaḥ || 7.52.13 ||
nedṛśeṣu vimuhyanti tvadvidhāḥ puruṣarṣabhāḥ | apavādaḥ sa kila te punareṣyati rāghava || 7.52.14 ||
yadarthaṃ maithilī tyaktā apavādabhayānnṛpa | so 'pavādaḥ pure rājanbhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ || 7.52.15 ||
sa tvaṃ puruṣaśārdūla dhairyeṇa susamāhitaḥ | tyajaināṃ durbalāṃ buddhiṃ santāpaṃ mā kuruṣva ha || 7.52.16 ||
evamuktaḥ sa kākutstho lakṣmaṇena mahātmanā | uvāca parayā prītyā saumitriṃ mitravatsalaḥ || 7.52.17 ||
evametannaraśreṣṭha yathā vadasi lakṣmaṇa | paritoṣaśca me vīra mama kāryānuśāsane || 7.52.18 ||
nivṛttiścāgatā saumya santāpaśca nirākṛtaḥ | bhavadvākyaiḥ surucirairanunīto 'smi lakṣmaṇa || 7.52.19 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe dvipañcāśaḥ sargaḥ || 52 ||
lakṣmaṇasya tu tadvākyaṃ niśamya paramādbhutam | suprītaścābhavadrāmo vākyametaduvāca ha || 7.53.1 ||
durlabhastvīdṛśo bandhurasminkāle viśeṣataḥ | yādṛśastvaṃ mahābuddhermama saumya mano 'nugaḥ || 7.53.2 ||
yacca me hṛdaye kiñcidvartate śubhalakṣaṇa | tanniśāmaya ca śrutvā kuruṣva vacanaṃ mama || 7.53.3 ||
catvāro divasāḥ saumya kāryaṃ paurajanasya vai | akurvāṇasya saumitre tanme marmāṇi kṛntati || 7.53.4 ||
āhūyantāṃ prakṛtayaḥ purodhā mantriṇastathā | kāryārthinaśca puruṣāḥ striyaśca puruṣarṣabha || 7.53.5 ||
paurakāryāṇi yo rājā na karoti dine dine | saṃvṛte narake ghore patito nātra saṃśayaḥ || 7.53.6 ||
śrūyate hi purā rājā nṛgo nāma mahāyaśāḥ | babhūva pṛthivīpālo brahmaṇyaḥ satyavāk śuciḥ || 7.53.7 ||
sa kadācidgavāṃ koṭīḥ savatsāḥ svarṇabhūṣitāḥ | nṛdevo bhūmidevebhyaḥ puṣkareṣu dadau nṛpaḥ || 7.53.8 ||
tataḥ saṅgādgatā dhenuḥ savatsā sparśitā 'nagha | brāhmaṇasyāhitāgneśca daridrasyoñchavartinaḥ || 7.53.9 ||
sa naṣṭāṃ gāṃ kṣudhārto vai anviṣaṃstatra tatra ca | nāpaśyatsarvarājyeṣu saṃvatsaragaṇānbahūn || 7.53.10 ||
tataḥ kanakhalaṃ gatvā jīrṇavatsāṃ nirāmayām | dadarśa gāṃ svakāṃ dhenuṃ brāhmaṇasya niveśane || 7.53.11 ||
atha tāṃ nāmadheyena svakenovāca sa dvijaḥ | āgaccha śabaletyevaṃ sā tu śuśrāva gauḥ svaram || 7.53.12 ||
tasya taṃ svaramājñāya kṣudhārtasya dvijasya vai | anvagātpṛṣṭhataḥ sā gaurgacchantaṃ pāvakopamam || 7.53.13 ||
yo 'pi pālayate vipraḥ so 'pi gāmanvagāddrutam | gatvā tamṛṣimācaṣṭa mama gauriti satvaram || 7.53.14 ||
sparśitā rājasiṃhena mama dattā nṛgeṇa ha | tayorbrāhmaṇayorvādo mahānāsīdvipaścitoḥ || 7.53.15 ||
vivadantau tato 'nyonyaṃ dātāramabhijagmatuḥ | tau rājabhavanadvāri na prāptau nṛgaśāsanam || 7.53.16 ||
ahorātrāṇyanekāni vasantau krodhamīyatuḥ | ūcatuśca mahātmānau tāvubhau dvijasattamau || kruddhau paramasamprāptau vākyaṃ ghorābhisaṃhitam || 7.53.17 ||
arthināṃ kāryasiddhyarthaṃ yasmāttvaṃ naiṣi darśanam | adṛśyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ kṛkalāso bhaviṣyasi || 7.53.18 ||
bahuvarṣasahasrāṇi bahuvarṣaśatāni ca | śvabhre 'smin kṛkalāso vai dīrghakālaṃ vasiṣyasi || 7.53.19 ||
utpatsyate hi loke 'sminyadūnāṃ kīrtivardhanaḥ | vāsudeva iti khyāto viṣṇuḥ puruṣavigrahaḥ || 7.53.20 ||
sa te mokṣayitā rājaṃstasmācchāpādbhaviṣyasi | kṛtā ca tena kālena niṣkṛtiste bhaviṣyati || 7.53.21 ||
bhārāvataraṇārthaṃ hi naranārāyaṇāvubhau | utpatsyete mahāvīryau kalau yuga upasthite || 7.53.22 ||
evaṃ tau śāpamutsṛjya brāhmaṇau vigatajvarau | tāṃ gāṃ hi durbalāṃ vṛddhāṃ dadaturbrāhmaṇāya vai || 7.53.23 ||
evaṃ sa rājā taṃ śāpamupabhuṅkte sudāruṇam || 7.53.24 ||
kāryārthināṃ vimardo hi rājñāṃ doṣāya kalpate | tacchīghraṃ darśanaṃ mahyamabhivartantu kāryiṇaḥ || 7.53.25 ||
sukṛtasya hi kāryasya phalaṃ nāpaiti pārthivaḥ | tasmādgaccha pratīkṣasva saumitre kāryavāñjanaḥ || 7.53.26 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe tripañcāśaḥ sargaḥ || 53 ||
rāmasya bhāṣitaṃ śrutvā lakṣmaṇaḥ paramārthavit | uvāca prāñjalirvākyaṃ rāghavaṃ dīptatejasam || 7.54.1 ||
alpāparādhe kākutstha dvijābhyāṃ śāpa īdṛśaḥ | mahānnṛgasya rājarṣeryamadaṇḍa ivāparaḥ || 7.54.2 ||
śrutvā tu pāpasaṃyuktamātmānaṃ puraṣarṣabha | kimuvāca nṛgo rājā dvijau krodhasamanvitau || 7.54.3 ||
lakṣmaṇenaivamuktastu rāghavaḥ punarabravīt | śṛṇu saumya yathā pūrvaṃ sa rājā śāpavikṣataḥ || 7.54.4 ||
athādhvani gatau viprau vijñāya sa nṛgastadā | āhūya mantriṇaḥ sarvānnaigamānsapurodhasaḥ || 7.54.5 ||
tānuvāca nṛgo rājā sarvāśca prakṛtīstathā | duḥkhena susamāviṣṭaḥ śrūyatāṃ me samāhitaiḥ || 7.54.6 ||
nāradaḥ parvataścaiva mama dattvā mahadbhayam | gatau tribhuvanaṃ bhadrau vāyubhūtāvaninditau || 7.54.7 ||
kumāro 'yaṃ vasurnāma sa devo 'dyābhiṣicyatām | śvabhraṃ ca yatsukhasparśaṃ kriyatāṃ śilpibhirmama | yatrāhaṃ saṅkṣayiṣyāmi śāpaṃ brāhmaṇaniḥsṛtam || 7.54.8 ||
varṣaghnamekaṃ śvabhraṃ tu himaghnamaparaṃ tathā | grīṣmaghnaṃ tu sukhasparśamekaṃ kurvantu śilpinaḥ || 7.54.9 ||
phalavantaśca ye vṛkṣāḥ puṣpavatyaśca yā latāḥ | viropyantāṃ bahuvidhāśchāyāvantaśca gulminaḥ || 7.54.10 ||
kriyatāṃ ramaṇīyaṃ ca śvabhrāṇāṃ sarvatodiśam | sukhamatra vasiṣyāmi yāvatkālasya paryayaḥ || 7.54.11 ||
puṣpāṇi ca sugandhīni kriyatāṃ teṣu nityaśaḥ | parivārya yathā me syuradhyardhaṃ yojanaṃ tathā || 7.54.12 ||
evaṃ kṛtvā vidhānaṃ sa sandideśa vasaṃ tadā | dharmanityaḥ prajāḥ putra kṣatradharmeṇa pālaya || 7.54.13 ||
pratyakṣaṃ te yathā śāpo dvijābhyāṃ mayi pātitaḥ | naraśreṣṭha saroṣābhyāmaparādhe 'pi tādṛśe || 7.54.14 ||
mā kṛthāstanusantāpaṃ matkṛte 'pi nararṣabha | kṛtāntaḥ kuśalaḥ putra yenāsmi vyasanīkṛtaḥ || 7.54.15 ||
prāptavyānyeva prāpnoti gantavyānyeva gacchati | labdhavyānyeva labhate duḥkhāni ca sukhāni ca || 7.54.16 ||
pūrve jātyantare vatsa mā viṣādaṃ kuruṣva ha || 7.54.17 ||
evamuktvā nṛpastatra sutaṃ rājā mahāyaśāḥ | śvabhraṃ jagāma sukṛtaṃ vāsāya puruṣarṣabha || 7.54.18 ||
evaṃ praviśyaiva nṛpastadānīṃ śvabhraṃ mahāratnavibhūṣitaṃ tat | sampādayāmāsa tadā mahātmā śāpaṃ dvijābhyāṃ hi ruṣā vimuktam || 7.54.19 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe catuḥpañcāśaḥ sargaḥ || 54 ||
eṣa te nṛgaśāpasya vistaro 'bhihito mayā | yadyasti śravaṇe śraddhā śṛṇuṣvehāparāṃ kathām || 7.55.1 ||
evamuktastu rāmeṇa saumitriḥ punarabravīt | tṛptirāścaryabhūtānāṃ kathānāṃ nāsti me nṛpa || 7.55.2 ||
lakṣmaṇenaivamuktastu rāma ikṣvākunandanaḥ | kathāṃ paramadharmiṣṭhāṃ vyāhartumupacakrame || 7.55.3 ||
āsīdrājā nimirnāma ikṣvākūṇāṃ mahātmanām | putro dvādaśamo vīrye dharme ca pariniṣṭhitaḥ || 7.55.4 ||
sa rājā vīryasampannaḥ puraṃ devapuropamam | niveśayāmāsa tadā abhyāśe gautamasya tu || 7.55.5 ||
purasya sukṛtaṃ nāma vaijayantamiti śrutam | niveśaṃ yatra rājarṣirnimiścakre mahāyaśāḥ || 7.55.6 ||
tasya buddhiḥ samutpannā niveśya sumahāpuram | yajeyaṃ dīrghasatreṇa pituḥ prahlādayanmanaḥ || 7.55.7 ||
tataḥ pitaramāmantrya ikṣvākuṃ hi manoḥ sutam | vasiṣṭhaṃ varayāmāsa pūrvaṃ brahmarṣisattamam || 7.55.8 ||
anantaraṃ sa rājarṣirnimirikṣvākunandanaḥ | atrimaṅgirasaṃ caiva bhṛguṃ caiva tapodhanam || 7.55.9 ||
tamuvāca vasiṣṭhastu nimiṃ rājarṣisattamam | vṛto 'haṃ pūrvamindreṇa antaraṃ pratipālaya || 7.55.10 ||
anantaraṃ mahāvipro gautamaḥ pratyapūrayat | vasiṣṭho 'pi mahātejā indrayajñamathākarot || 7.55.11 ||
nimistu rājā viprāṃstānsamānīya narādhipaḥ | ayajaddhimavatpārśve svapurasya samīpataḥ | pañcavarṣasahasrāṇi rājā dīkṣāmupāgamat || 7.55.12 ||
indrayajñāvasāne tu vasiṣṭho bhagavanṛṣiḥ | sakāśamāgato rājño hautraṃ kartumaninditaḥ || 7.55.13 ||
tadantaramathāpaśyadgautamenābhipūritam | kopena mahatāviṣṭo vasiṣṭho brahmaṇaḥ sutaḥ || 7.55.14 ||
sa rājño darśanākāṅkṣī muhūrtaṃ samupāviśat | tasminnahani rājarṣirnidrayā 'pahṛto bhṛśam || 7.55.15 ||
tato manyurvasiṣṭhasya prādurāsīnmahātmanaḥ | adarśanena rājarṣervyāhartumupacakrame || 7.55.16 ||
yasmāttvamanyaṃ vṛtavānmāmavajñāya pārthiva | cetanena vinābhūto dehastava bhaviṣyati || 7.55.17 ||
tataḥ prabuddho rājarṣiḥ śrutvā śāpamudāhṛtam | brahmayonimathovāca saṃrambhāt krodhamūrcchitaḥ || 7.55.18 ||
ajānataḥ śayānasya krodhena kaluṣīkṛtaḥ | muktavānmayi śāpāgniṃ yamadaṇḍamivāparam || 7.55.19 ||
tasmāttavāpi brahmarṣe cetanena vinā kṛtaḥ | dehaḥ suruciraprakhyo bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ || 7.55.20 ||
iti roṣavaśādubhau tadānīmanyonyaṃ śapitau nṛpadvijendrau | sahasaiva babhūvaturvidehau tattulyādhigataprabhāvavantau || 7.55.21 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe pañcapañcāśaḥ sargaḥ || 55 ||
rāmasya bhāṣitaṃ śrutvā lakṣmaṇaḥ paravīrahā | uvāca prāñjalirvākyaṃ rāghavaṃ dīptatejasam || 7.56.1 ||
nikṣiptadehau kākutsya kathaṃ tau dvijapārthivau | punardehena saṃyogaṃ jagmaturdevasammatau || 7.56.2 ||
lakṣmaṇenaivamuktastu rāmaścekṣvākunandanaḥ | pratyuvāca mahātejā lakṣmaṇaṃ puruṣarṣabhaḥ || 7.56.3 ||
tau parasparaśāpena dehāvutsṛjya dhārmikau | abhūtāṃ nṛpaviprarṣī vāyubhūtau tapodhanau || 7.56.4 ||
aśarīraḥ śarīrasya kṛte 'nyasya mahāmuniḥ | vasiṣṭhaḥ sumahātejā jagāma piturantikam || 7.56.5 ||
so 'bhivādya tataḥ pādau devadevasya dharmavit | pitāmahamathovāca vāyubhūta idaṃ vacaḥ || 7.56.6 ||
bhagavannimiśāpena videhatvamupāgamam | lokanātha mahādeva aṇḍajo 'pi tvamabjajaḥ || 7.56.7 ||
sarveṣāṃ dehahīnānāṃ mahadduḥkhaṃ bhaviṣyati | lupyante sarvakāryaṇi hīnadehasya vai prabho | dehasyānyasya sadbhāve prasādaṃ kartumarhasi || 7.56.8 ||
tamuvāca tato brahmā svayambhūramitaprabhaḥ | mitrāvaruṇajaṃ teja praviśa tvaṃ mahāyaśaḥ || 7.56.9 ||
ayonijastvaṃ bhavitā tatrāpi dvijasattama | dharmeṇa mahatā yuktaḥ punareṣyasi me vaśam || 7.56.10 ||
evamuktastu devena cābhivādya pradakṣiṇam | kṛtvā pitāmahaṃ tūrṇaṃ prayayau varuṇālayam || 7.56.11 ||
tameva kālaṃ mitro 'pi varuṇatvamakārayat | kṣīrodena sahopetaḥ pūjyamānaḥ surottamaiḥ || 7.56.12 ||
etasminneva kāle tu urvaśī paramāpsarāḥ | yadṛcchayā tamuddeśamāyayau sakhibhirvṛtā || 7.56.13 ||
tāṃ dṛṣṭvā rūpasampannāṃ krīḍantīṃ varuṇālaye | āviśatparamo harṣo varuṇaṃ corvaśīkṛte || 7.56.14 ||
sa tāṃ padmapalāśākṣīṃ pūrṇacandranibhānanām | varuṇo varayāmāsa maithunāyāpsarovarām || 7.56.15 ||
pratyuvāca tataḥ sā tu varuṇaṃ prāñjaliḥ sthitā | mitreṇāhaṃ vṛtā sākṣātpūrvameva sureśvara || 7.56.16 ||
varuṇastvabravīdvākyaṃ kandarpaśarapīḍitaḥ | idaṃ tejaḥ samutsrakṣye kumbhe 'smindevanirmite || 7.56.17 ||
evamutsṛjya suśroṇi tvayyahaṃ varavarṇini | kṛtakāmo bhaviṣyāmi yadi necchasi saṅgamam || 7.56.18 ||
tasya tallokapālasya varuṇasya subhāṣitam | urvaśī paramaprītā śrutvā vākyamuvāca ha || 7.56.19 ||
kāmametadbhavatvevaṃ hṛdayaṃ me tvayi sthitam | bhāvaścāpyadhikastubhyaṃ deho mitrasya tu prabho || 7.56.20 ||
urvaśyā evamuktastu retastanmahadadbhutam | jvaladagniśikhāprakhyaṃ tasminkumbhe hyapāsṛjat || 7.56.21 ||
urvaśī tvagamattatra mitro vai yatra devatā | tāṃ tu mitraḥ susaṅkramya urvaśīmidamabravīt || 7.56.22 ||
mayā nimantritā pūrvaṃ kasmāttvamavasarjitā | patimanyaṃ vṛtavatī tasmāttvaṃ duṣṭacāriṇī || 7.56.23 ||
anena duṣkṛtena tvaṃ matkrodhakaluṣīkṛtā | manuṣyalokamāsthāya kañcitkālaṃ nivatsyasi || 7.56.24 ||
budhasya putro rājarṣiḥ kāśīrājaḥ purūravāḥ | tamadya gaccha durbuddhe sa te bhartā bhaviṣyati || 7.56.25 ||
tataḥ sā śāpadoṣeṇa purūravasamabhyagāt | pratiyāte purūravaṃ budhasyātmajamaurasam || 7.56.26 ||
tasya jajñe tataḥ śrīmānāyuḥ putro mahābalaḥ | nahuṣo yasya putrastu babhūvendrasamadyutiḥ || 7.56.27 ||
vajramutsṛjya vṛtrāya bhrānte 'tha tridiveśvare | śataṃ varṣasahasrāṇi yenendratvaṃ praśāsitam || 7.56.28 ||
sā tena śāpena jagāma bhūmiṃ tadorvaśī cārudatī sunetrā | bahūni varṣāṇyavasacca subhrūḥ śāpakṣayādindrasado yayau ca || 7.56.29 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe ṣaṭpañcāśaḥ sargaḥ || 56 ||
tāṃ śrutvā divyasaṅkāśāṃ kathāmadbhutadarśanām | lakṣmaṇaḥ paramaprīto rāghavaṃ vākyamabravīt || 7.57.1 ||
nikṣiptadehau kākutstha kathaṃ tau dvijapārthivau | punardehena saṃyogaṃ jagmurdevasammatau || 7.57.2 ||
tasya tadbhāṣitaṃ śrutvā rāmaḥ satyaparākramaḥ | tāṃ kathāṃ kathayāmāsa vasiṣṭhasya mahātmanaḥ || 7.57.3 ||
yastu kumbho raghuśreṣṭha tejaḥpūrṇo mahātmanoḥ | tasmiṃstejomayau viprau sambhūtāvṛṣisattamau || 7.57.4 ||
pūrvaṃ samabhavattatra hyagastyo bhagavānṛṣiḥ | nāhaṃ sutastavetyuktvā mitraṃ tasmādapākramat || 7.57.5 ||
taddhi tejastu mitrasya urvasyāḥ pūrvamāhitam | tasminsamabhavatkumbhe tattejo yatra vāruṇam || 7.57.6 ||
kasyacittvatha kālasya mitrāvaruṇasambhavaḥ | vasiṣṭhastejasā yukto jajñe ikṣvākudaivatam || 7.57.7 ||
tamikṣvākurmahātejā jātamātramaninditam | vavre purodhasaṃ saumya vaṃśasyāsya bhavāya naḥ || 7.57.8 ||
evaṃ tvapūrvadehasya vasiṣṭhasya mahātmanaḥ | kathito nirgamaḥ saumya nimeḥ śṛṇu yathā 'bhavat || 7.57.9 ||
dṛṣṭvā videhaṃ rājānamṛṣayaḥ sarva eva te | taṃ ca te yojayāmāsuryāgadīkṣāṃ manīṣiṇaḥ || 7.57.10 ||
taṃ ca dehaṃ narendrasya rakṣanti sma dvijottamāḥ | gandhairmālyaiśca vastraiśca paurabhṛtyasamanvitāḥ || 7.57.11 ||
tato yajñe samāpte tu bhṛgustatredamabravīt | ānayiṣyāmi te cetastuṣṭo 'smi tava pārthiva || 7.57.12 ||
suprītāśca surāḥ sarve nimeścetastathābruvan | varaṃ varaya rājarṣe kva te ceto nirūpyatām || 7.57.13 ||
evamuktaḥ suraiḥ sarvairnimeścetastadābravīt | netreṣu sarvabhūtānāṃ vaseyaṃ surasattamāḥ || 7.57.14 ||
bāḍhamityeva vibudhā nimeścetastadā 'bruvan | netreṣu sarvabhūtānāṃ vāyubhūtaścariṣyasi || 7.57.15 ||
tvatkṛte ca nimiṣyanti cakṣūṃṣi pṛthivīpate | vāyubhūtena caratā viśramārthaṃ muhurmuhuḥ || 7.57.16 ||
evamuktvā tu vibudhāḥ sarve jagmuryathāgatam | ṛṣayo 'pi mahātmāno nimerdehaṃ samāharan || 7.57.17 ||
araṇiṃ tatra nikṣipya mathanaṃ cakrurojasā | mantrahomairmahātmānaḥ putrahetornimestadā || 7.57.18 ||
araṇyāṃ mathyāmānāyāṃ prādurbhūto mahātapāḥ | mathanānmithirityāhurjananājjanako 'bhavat | yasmādvidehātsambhūto vaidehastu tataḥ smṛtaḥ || 7.57.19 ||
evaṃ videharājaśca janakaḥ pūrvako 'bhavat | mithirnāma mahātejāstenāyaṃ maithilo 'bhavat || 7.57.20 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe saptapañcāśaḥ sargaḥ || 57 ||
evaṃ bruvati rāme tu lakṣmaṇaḥ paravīrahā | pratyuvāca mahātmānaṃ jvalantamiva tejasā || 7.58.1 ||
mahadadbhutamāścaryaṃ videhasya purātanam | nirvṛttaṃ rājaśārdūla vasiṣṭhasya nimessaha || 7.58.2 ||
nimistu kṣatriyaḥ śūro viśeṣeṇa ca dīkṣitaḥ | na kṣamāṃ kṛtavānrājā vasiṣṭhasya mahātmanaḥ || 7.58.3 ||
evamuktastu tenāyaṃ śrīmān kṣatriyapuṅgavaḥ | uvāca lakṣmaṇaṃ vākyaṃ sarvaśāstraviśāradam || 7.58.4 ||
rāmo ramayatāṃ śreṣṭho bhrātaraṃ dīptatejasam | na sarvatra kṣamā vīra puruṣeṣu pradṛśyate || 7.58.5 ||
saumitre duḥsaho roṣo yathā kṣānto yayātinā | sattvānugaṃ puraskṛtya tannibodha samāhitaḥ || 7.58.6 ||
nahuṣasya suto rājā yayātiḥ pauravardhanaḥ | tasya bhāryādvayaṃ saumya rūpeṇāpratimaṃ bhuvi || 7.58.7 ||
ekā tu tasya rājarṣernāhuṣasya puraskṛtā | śarmiṣṭhā nāma daiteyī duhitā vṛṣaparvaṇaḥ || 7.58.8 ||
anyā tūśanasaḥ patnī yayāteḥ puruṣarṣabha | na tu sā dayitā rājño devayānī sumadhyamā || 7.58.9 ||
tayoḥ putrau tu sambhūtau rūpavantau samāhitau | śarmiṣṭhā 'janayatpūruṃ devayānī yaduṃ tadā || 7.58.10 ||
pūrustu dayito rājño guṇairmātṛkṛtena ca | tato duḥkhasamāviṣṭo yadurmātaramabravīt || 7.58.11 ||
bhārgavasya kule jātā devasyākliṣṭakarmaṇaḥ | sahase hṛdgataṃ duḥkhamavamānaṃ ca duḥsaham || 7.58.12 ||
āvāṃ ca sahitau devi praviśāva hutāśanam | rājā tu ramatāṃ sārdhaṃ daityaputryā bahukṣapāḥ || 7.58.13 ||
yadi vā sahanīyaṃ te māmanujñātumarhasi | kṣama tvaṃ na kṣamiṣye 'haṃ mariṣyāmi na saṃśayaḥ || 7.58.14 ||
putrasya bhāṣitaṃ śrutvā paramārtasya rodataḥ | devayānī tu saṅkruddhā sasmāra pitaraṃ tadā || 7.58.15 ||
iṅgitaṃ tadabhijñāya duhiturbhārgavastadā | āgatastvaritaṃ tatra devayānī tu yatra sā || 7.58.16 ||
dṛṣṭvā cāprakṛtisthāṃ tāmaprahṛṣṭāmacetanām | pitā duhitaraṃ vākyaṃ kimetaditi cābravīt || 7.58.17 ||
pṛcchantamasakṛttaṃ vai bhārgavaṃ dīptatejasam | devayānī tu saṅkruddhā pitaraṃ vākyamabravīt || 7.58.18 ||
ahamagniṃ viṣaṃ tīkṣṇamapo vā munisattama | bhakṣayiṣye pravekṣyāmi na tu śakṣyāmi jīvitum || 7.58.19 ||
na māṃ tvamavajānīṣe duḥkhitāmavamānitām | vṛkṣasyāvajñayā brahmaṃśchidyante vṛkṣajīvinaḥ || 7.58.20 ||
avajñayā ca rājarṣiḥ paribhūya ca bhārgava | mayyavajñāṃ prayuṅkte hi na ca māṃ bahu manyate || 7.58.21 ||
tasyāstadvacanaṃ śrutvā kopenābhipariplutaḥ | vyāhartumupacakrāma bhārgavo nahuṣātmajam || 7.58.22 ||
yasmānmāmavajānīṣe nāhuṣa tvaṃ durātmavān | jarayā parayā jīrṇaḥ śaithilyamupayāsyasi || 7.58.23 ||
evamuktvā duhitaraṃ samāśvāsya ca bhārgavaḥ | punarjagāma brahmarṣirbhavanaṃ svaṃ mahāyaśāḥ || 7.58.24 ||
sa evamuktvā dvijapuṅgavāgryaḥ sutāṃ samāśvāsya ca devayānīm | punaryayau sūryasamānatejā dattvā ca śāpaṃ nahuṣātmajāya || 7.58.25 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe 'ṣṭapañcāśaḥ sargaḥ || 58 ||
śrutvā tūśanasaṃ kruddhaṃ tadā ' 'rto nahuṣātmajaḥ | jarāṃ paramikāṃ prāpya yaduṃ vacanamabravīt || 7.59.1 ||
yado tvamasi dharmajño madarthaṃ pratigṛhyatām | jarāṃ paramikāṃ putra bhogai raṃsye mahāyaśaḥ || 7.59.2 ||
na tāvatkṛtakṛtyo 'smi viṣayeṣu nararṣabha | anubhūya tadā kāmaṃ tataḥ prāpsyāmyahaṃ jarām || 7.59.3 ||
yadustadvacanaṃ śrutvā pratyuvāca nararṣabham | putraste dayitaḥ pūruḥ pratigṛhṇātu vai jarām || 7.59.4 ||
bahiṣkṛto 'hamartheṣu sannikarṣācca pārthiva | pratigṛhṇātu vai rājanka sahāśnāti bhojanam || 7.59.5 ||
tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rājā pūrumathābravīt | iyaṃ jarā mahābāho madarthaṃ pratigṛhyatām || 7.59.6 ||
nāhuṣeṇaivamuktastu pūruḥ prāñjalirabravīt | dhanyo 'smyanugṛhīto 'smi śāsane 'smi tava sthitaḥ || 7.59.7 ||
pūrorvacanamājñāya nāhuṣaḥ parayā mudā | praharṣamatulaṃ lebhe jarāṃ saṅkrāmayacca tām || 7.59.8 ||
tataḥ sa rājā taruṇaḥ prāpya yajñānsahasraśaḥ | bahuvarṣasahasrāṇi pālayāmāsa medinīm || 7.59.9 ||
atha dīrghasya kālasya rājā pūrumathābravīt | ānayasva jarāṃ putra nyāsaṃ niryātayasva me || 7.59.10 ||
nyāsabhūtā mayā putra tvayi saṅkrāmitā jarā | tasmātpratigrahīṣyāmi tāṃ jarāṃ mā vyathāṃ kṛthāḥ || 7.59.11 ||
prītaścāsmi mahābāho śāsanasya pratigrahāt | tvāṃ cāhamabhiṣekṣyāmi prītiyukto narādhipam || 7.59.12 ||
evamuktvā sutaṃ pūruṃ yayātirnahuṣātmajaḥ | devayānīsutaṃ kruddho rājā vākyamuvāca ha || 7.59.13 ||
rākṣasastvaṃ mayā jātaḥ putrarūpo durāsadaḥ | pratihaṃsi mamājñāṃ yat prajārthe viphalo bhava || 7.59.14 ||
pitaraṃ gurubhūtaṃ māṃ yasmāttvamavamanyase | rākṣasānyātudhānāṃstvaṃ janayiṣyasi dāruṇān || 7.59.15 ||
na tu somakulotpanne vaṃśe sthāsyati durmateḥ | vaṃśo 'pi bhavatastulyo durvinīto bhaviṣyati || 7.59.16 ||
tamevamuktvā rājarṣiḥ pūruṃ rājyavivardhanam | abhiṣekeṇa sampūjya āśramaṃ praviveśa ha || 7.59.17 ||
tataḥ kālena mahatā diṣṭāntamupajagmivān | tridivaṃ saṅgato rājā yayātirnahuṣātmajaḥ || 7.59.18 ||
pūruścakāra tadrājyaṃ dharmeṇa mahatā vṛtaḥ | pratiṣṭhāne puravare kāśirājye mahāyaśāḥ || 7.59.19 ||
yadustu janayāmāsa yātudhānānsahasraśaḥ | pure krauñcavane durge rājavaṃśabahiṣkṛtaḥ || 7.59.20 ||
eṣa tūśanasā muktaḥ śāpotsargo yayātinā | dhāritaḥ kṣatradharmeṇa yannimiśca na cakṣame || 7.59.21 ||
etatte sarvamākhyātaṃ darśanaṃ sarvakāriṇām | anuvartāmahe saumya doṣo na syādyathā nṛge || 7.59.22 ||
