iti kathayati rāme candratulyānane ca praviralataratāraṃ vyoma jajñe tadānīm | aruṇakiraṇaraktā digbabhau caiva pūrvā kusumarasavimuktaṃ vastramākuṇṭhiteva || 7.59.23 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe ekonaṣaṣṭitamaḥ sargaḥ || 59 ||
tayoḥ saṃvadatorevaṃ rāmalakṣmaṇayostadā | vāsantikī niśā prāptā na śītā na ca gharmadā || 7.60.1 ||
tataḥ prabhāte vimale kṛtapaurvāhṇikakriyaḥ | abhicakrāma kākutstho darśanaṃ paurakāryavit || 7.60.2 ||
tataḥ sumantrastvāgamya rāghavaṃ vākyamabravīt | ete pratihatā rājandvāri tiṣṭhanti tāpasāḥ || 7.60.3 ||
bhārgavacyavanaṃ caiva puraskṛtya maharṣayaḥ | darśanaṃ te mahārājñaścodayanti kṛtatvarāḥ | prīyamāṇā naravyāghra yamunātīravāsinaḥ || 7.60.4 ||
tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rāmaḥ provāca dharmavit | praveśyantāṃ mahābhāgā bhārgavapramukhā dvijāḥ || 7.60.5 ||
rājñastvājñāṃ puraskṛtya dvāḥstho mūrdhni kṛtāñjaliḥ | praveśayāmāsa tadā tāpasānsudurāsadān || 7.60.6 ||
śataṃ samadhikaṃ tatra dīpyamānaṃ svatejasā | praviṣṭaṃ rājabhavanaṃ tāpasānāṃ mahātmanām || 7.60.7 ||
te dvijāḥ pūrṇakalaśaiḥ sarvatīrthāmbusatkṛtaiḥ | gṛhītvā phalamūlaṃ ca rāmasyābhyāharanbahu || 7.60.8 ||
pratigṛhya tu tatsarvaṃ rāmaḥ prītipuraskṛtaḥ | tīrthodakāni sarvāṇi phalāni vividhāni ca || 7.60.9 ||
uvāca ca mahābāhuḥ sarvāneva mahāmunīn | imānyāsanamukhyāni yathārhamupaviśyatām || 7.60.10 ||
rāmasya bhāṣitaṃ śrutvā sarva eva maharṣayaḥ | bṛsīṣu rucirākhyāsu niṣeduḥ kāñcanīṣu te || 7.60.11 ||
upaviṣṭānṛṣīṃstatra dṛṣṭvā parapurañjayaḥ | prayataḥ prāñjalirbhūtvā rāghavo vākyamabravīt || 7.60.12 ||
kimāgamanakāryaṃ vaḥ kiṃ karomi samāhitaḥ | ājñāpyo 'haṃ maharṣīṇāṃ sarvakāmakaraḥ sukham || 7.60.13 ||
idaṃ rājyaṃ ca sakalaṃ jīvitaṃ ca hṛdi sthitam | sarvametaddvidārthaṃ me satyametadbravīmi vaḥ || 7.60.14 ||
tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā sādhukāro mahānabhūt | ṛṣīṇāmugratapasāṃ yamunātīravāsinām || 7.60.15 ||
ūcuśca te mahātmāno harṣeṇa mahatā vṛtāḥ | upapannaṃ naraśreṣṭha tavaiva bhuvi nānyataḥ || 7.60.16 ||
bahavaḥ pārthivā rājannatikrāntā mahābalāḥ | kāryasya gauravaṃ matvā pratijñāṃ nābhyarocayan || 7.60.17 ||
tvayā punarbrāhmaṇagauravādiyaṃ kṛtā pratijñā hyanavekṣya kāraṇam | tataśca kartā hyasi nātra saṃśayo mahābhayātऺtrātumṛṣīṃstvamarhasi || 7.60.18 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe ṣaṣṭitamaḥ sargaḥ || 60 ||
evaṃ bruvadbhirṛṣibhiḥ kākutstho vākyamabravīt | kiṃ kāryaṃ brūta munayo bhayaṃ tāvadapaitu vaḥ || 7.61.1 ||
tathā bruvati kākutsthe bhārgavo vākyamabravīt | bhayānāṃ śṛṇu yanmūlaṃ deśasya ca nareśvara || 7.61.2 ||
pūrvaṃ kṛtayuge rājandaiteyaḥ sumahābalaḥ | lolāputro 'bhavajjyeṣṭho madhurnāma mahāsuraḥ || 7.61.3 ||
brahmaṇyaśca śaraṇyaśca buddhyā ca pariniṣṭhitaḥ | suraiśca paramodāraiḥ prītistasyātulā 'bhavat || 7.61.4 ||
sa madhurvīryasampanno dharme ca susamāhitaḥ | bahuvarṣasahasrāṇi rudraprītyā 'karottapaḥ || 7.61.5 ||
rudraḥ prīto 'bhavattasmai varaṃ dātuṃ yayau ca saḥ | bahumānācca rudreṇa dattastasyādbhuto varaḥ || 7.61.6 ||
śūlaṃ śūlādviniṣkṛṣya mahāvīryaṃ mahāprabham | dadau mahātmā suprīto vākyaṃ caitaduvāca ha || 7.61.7 ||
tvayāyamatulo dharmo matprasādakaraḥ kṛtaḥ | prītyā paramayā yukto dadāmyāyudhamuttamam || 7.61.8 ||
yāvatsuraiśca vipraiśca na virudhyermahāsura | tāvacchūlaṃ tavedaṃ syādanyathā nāśamepyati || 7.61.9 ||
yaśca tvāmabhiyuñjīta yuddhāya vigatajvaraḥ | taṃ śūlo bhasmasātkṛtvā punareṣyati te karam || 7.61.10 ||
evaṃ rudrādvaraṃ labdhvā bhūya eva mahāsuraḥ | praṇipatya mahādevaṃ vākyametaduvāca ha || 7.61.11 ||
bhagavanmama vaṃśasya śūlametadanuttamam | bhavettu satataṃ deva surāṇāmīśvaro hyasi || 7.61.12 ||
taṃ bruvāṇaṃ madhuṃ devaḥ sarvabhūtapatiḥ śivaḥ | pratyuvāca mahātejā naitadevaṃ bhaviṣyati || 7.61.13 ||
mā bhūtte viphalā vāṇī matprasādakṛtā śubhā | bhavataḥ putramekaṃ tu śūlametadbhajiṣyate || 7.61.14 ||
yāvatkarasthaḥ śūlo 'yaṃ bhaviṣyati sutasya te | avadhyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ śūlahasto bhaviṣyati || 7.61.15 ||
evaṃ madhurvaraṃ labdhvā devātsumahadadbhutam | bhavanaṃ so 'suraśreṣṭhaḥ kārayāmāsa suprabham || 7.61.16 ||
tasya patnī mahābhāgā priyā kumbhīnasīti yā | viśvāvasorapatyaṃ sā hyanalāyāṃ mahāprabhā || 7.61.17 ||
tasyāḥ putro mahāvīryo lavaṇo nāma dāruṇaḥ | bālyātprabhṛti duṣṭātmā pāpānyeva samācarat || 7.61.18 ||
taṃ putraṃ durvinītaṃ tu dṛṣṭvā krodhasamanvitaḥ | madhuḥ sa śokamāpede na cainaṃ kiñcidabravīt || 7.61.19 ||
sa vihāya tvimaṃ lokaṃ praviṣṭo varuṇālayam | śūlaṃ niveśya lavaṇe varaṃ tasmai nyavedayat || 7.61.20 ||
sa prabhāveṇa śūlasya daurātmyenātmanastathā | santāpayati lokāṃstrīnviśeṣeṇa ca tāpasān || 7.61.21 ||
evaṃprabhāvo lavaṇaḥ śūlaṃ caiva tathāvidham | śrutvā pramāṇaṃ kākutstha tvaṃ hi naḥ paramā gatiḥ || 7.61.22 ||
bahavaḥ pārthivā rāma bhayārtairṛṣibhiḥ purā | abhayaṃ yācitā vīra trātāraṃ na ca vidmahe || 7.61.23 ||
te vayaṃ rāvaṇaṃ śrutvā hataṃ sabalavāhanam | trātāraṃ vidmahe tāta nānyaṃ bhuvi narādhipam | tatparitrātumicchāmo lavaṇādbhayapīḍitān || 7.61.24 ||
iti rāma niveditaṃ tu te bhayajaṃ kāraṇamutthitaṃ ca yat | vinivārayituṃ bhavānkṣamaḥ kuru taṃ kāmamahīnavikrama || 7.61.25 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe ekaṣaṣṭitamaḥ sargaḥ || 61 ||
tathokte tānṛṣīnrāmaḥ pratyuvāca kṛtāñjaliḥ | kimāhāraḥ kimācāro lavaṇaḥ kva ca vartate || 7.62.1 ||
rāghavasya vacaḥ śrutvā ṛṣayaḥ sarva eva te | tato nivedayāmāsurlavaṇo vavṛdhe yathā || 7.62.2 ||
āhāraḥ sarvasattvāni viśeṣeṇa ca tāpasāḥ | ācāro raudratā nityaṃ vāso madhuvane tathā || 7.62.3 ||
hatvā bahusahasrāṇi siṃhavyāghramṛgadvipān | mānuṣāṃścaiva kurute nityamāhāramāhnikam || 7.62.4 ||
tato 'ntarāṇi sattvāni khādate sa mahābalaḥ | saṃhāre samanuprāpte vyāditāsya ivāntakaḥ || 7.62.5 ||
tacchrutvā rāghavo vākyamuvāca sa mahāmunīn | ghātayiṣyāmi tadrakṣo hyapagacchatu vo bhayam || 7.62.6 ||
pratijñāya tathā teṣāṃ munīnāmugratejasām | sa bhrāta'nsahitānsarvānuvāca raghunandanaḥ || 7.62.7 ||
ko hantā lavaṇaṃ vīraḥ kasyāṃśaḥ sa vidhīyatām | bharatasya mahābāhoḥ śatrughnasya ca dhīmataḥ || 7.62.8 ||
rāghaveṇaivamuktastu bharato vākyamabravīt | ahamenaṃ vadhiṣyāmi mamāṃśaḥ sa vidhīyatām || 7.62.9 ||
bharatasya vacaḥ śrutvā dhairyaśauryasamanvitam | lakṣmaṇāvarajastasthau hitvā sauvarṇamāsanam || 7.62.10 ||
śatrughnastvabravīdvākyaṃ praṇipatya narādhipam | kṛtakarmā mahābāhurmadhyamo raghunandanaḥ || 7.62.11 ||
āryeṇa hi purā śūnyā tvayodhyā paripālitā | santāpaṃ hṛdaye kṛtvā āryasyāgamanaṃ prati || 7.62.12 ||
duḥkhāni ca bahūnīha hyanubhūtāni pārthiva | śayāno duḥkhaśayyāsu nandigrāme 'vasatpurā || 7.62.13 ||
phalamūlāśano bhūtvā jaṭī cīradharastathā | anubhūyedṛśaṃ duḥkhameṣa rāghavanandanaḥ | preṣye mayi sthite rājanna bhūyaḥ kleśamāpnuyāt || 7.62.14 ||
tathā bruvati śatrughne rāghavaḥ punarabravīt | evaṃ bhavatu kākutstha kriyatāṃ mama śāsanam || 7.62.15 ||
rājye tvāmabhiṣekṣyāmi madhostu nagare śubhe | niveśaya mahābāho bharataṃ yadyavekṣase || 7.62.16 ||
śūrastvaṃ kṛtavidyaśca samarthaśca niveśane || 7.62.17 ||
yo hi śatruṃ samutpāṭya pārthivasya punaḥ kṣaye | na vidhatte nṛpaṃ tatra narakaṃ sa hi gacchati || 7.62.18 ||
sa tvaṃ hatvā madhusutaṃ lavaṇaṃ pāpaniścayam | rājyaṃ praśādhi dharmeṇa vākyaṃ me yadyavekṣase || 7.62.19 ||
uttaraṃ ca na vaktavyaṃ śūra vākyāntare mama | bālena pūrvajasyājñā kartavyā nātra saṃśayaḥ || 7.62.20 ||
abhiṣekaṃ ca kākutstha pratīcchasva mayodyatam | vasiṣṭhapramukhairviprairvidhimantrapuraskṛtam || 7.62.21 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe dviṣaṣṭitamaḥ sargaḥ || 62||
evamuktastu rāmeṇa parāṃ vrīḍāmupāgamat | śatrughno vīryasampanno mandaṃ mandamuvāca ha || 7.63.1 ||
adharmaṃ vidma kākutstha hyasminnarthe nareśvara | kathaṃ tiṣṭhatsu jyeṣṭheṣu kanīyānabhiṣicyate || 7.63.2 ||
avaśyaṃ karaṇīyaṃ ca śāsanaṃ puruṣarṣabha | tava caiva mahābhāga śāsanaṃ duratikramam || 7.63.3 ||
tvatto mayā śrutaṃ vīra śrutibhyaśca mayā śrutam | nottaraṃ hi mayā vācyaṃ madhyame pratijānati || 7.63.4 ||
vyāhṛtaṃ durvaco ghoraṃ hantāsmi lavaṇaṃ mṛdhe | tasyaivaṃ me duruktasya durgatiḥ puruṣarṣabha || 7.63.5 ||
uttaraṃ nahi vaktavyaṃ jyeṣṭhenābhihite punaḥ | adharmasahitaṃ caiva paralokavivarjitam || 7.63.6 ||
so 'haṃ dvitīyaṃ kākutstha na vakṣyāmi tavottaram | mā dvitīyena daṇḍo vai nipatenmayi mānada || 7.63.7 ||
kāmakāro hyahaṃ rājaṃstavāsmi puruṣarṣabha | adharmaṃ jahi kākutstha matkṛte raghunandana || 7.63.8 ||
evamukte tu śūreṇa śatrughnena mahātmanā | uvāca rāmaḥ saṃhṛṣṭo bharataṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ tathā || 7.63.9 ||
sambhārānabhiṣekasya ānayadhvaṃ samāhitāḥ | adyaiva puruṣavyāghramabhiṣekṣyāmi rāghavam || 7.63.10 ||
purohitaṃ ca kākutsthaṃ naigamānṛtvijastathā | mantriṇaścaiva tānsarvānānayadhvaṃ mamājñayā || 7.63.11 ||
rājñaḥ śāsanamājñāya tathā 'kurvanmahārathāḥ | abhiṣekasamārambhaṃ puraskṛtya purodhasam | praviṣṭā rājabhavanaṃ rājāno brāhmaṇāstathā || 7.63.12 ||
tatho 'bhiṣeko vavṛdhe śatrughnasya mahātmanaḥ | sampraharṣakaraḥ śrīmānrāghavasya purasya ca || 7.63.13 ||
abhiṣiktastu śatrughno babhau cādityasannibhaḥ | abhiṣiktaḥ purā skandaḥ sendrairiva marudgaṇaiḥ || 7.63.14 ||
abhiṣikte tu śatrughne rāmeṇākliṣṭakarmaṇā | paurāḥ pramuditāścāsanbrāhmaṇāśca bahuśrutāḥ || 7.63.15 ||
kausalyā ca sumitrā ca maṅgalaṃ kekayī tathā | cakrustā rājabhavane yāścānyā rājayoṣitaḥ || 7.63.16 ||
ṛṣayaśca mahātmāno yamunātīravāsinaḥ | hataṃ lavaṇamāśaṃsuḥ śatrughnasyābhiṣecanāt || 7.63.17 ||
tato 'bhiṣiktaṃ śatrughnamaṅkamāropya rāghavaḥ | uvāca madhurāṃ vāṇīṃ tejastasyābhipūrayan || 7.63.18 ||
ayaṃ śarastvamoghaste divyaḥ parapurañjayaḥ | anena lavaṇaṃ saumya hantā 'si raghunandana || 7.63.19 ||
sṛṣṭaḥ śaro 'yaṃ kākutstha yadā śete mahārṇave || 7.63.20 ||
svayambhūrajito devo yannāpaśyansurāsurāḥ | adṛśyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ tenāyaṃ tu śarottamaḥ || 7.63.21 ||
sṛṣṭaḥ krodhābhibhūtena vināśārthaṃ durātmanoḥ | madhukaiṭabhayorvīra vighāte vartamānayoḥ | sraṣṭukāmena lokāṃstrīṃstau cānena hatau yudhi || 7.63.22 ||
tau hatvā janabhogārthaṃ kaiṭabhaṃ tu madhuṃ tathā | anena śaramukhyena tato lokāṃścakāra saḥ || 7.63.23 ||
nāyaṃ mayā śaraḥ pūrvaṃ rāvaṇasya vadhārthinā | muktaḥ śatrughna bhūtānāṃ mahāṃstrāso bhavediti || 7.63.24 ||
yacca tasya mahacchūlaṃ tryambakeṇa mahātmanā | dattaṃ śatruvināśāya madhorāyudhamuttamam || 7.63.25 ||
sa taṃ nikṣipya bhavane pūjyamāna punaḥ punaḥ | diśaḥ sarvāḥ samāsādya prāpnotyāhāramuttamam || 7.63.26 ||
yadā tu yuddhamākāṅkṣan kaścidenaṃ samāhvayet | tadā śūlaṃ gahītvā taṃ bhasma rakṣaḥ karoti hi || 7.63.27 ||
sa tvaṃ puruṣaśārdūla tamāyudhavinākṛtam | apraviṣṭaṃ puraṃ pūrvaṃ dvāri tiṣṭha dhṛtāyudhaḥ || 7.63.28 ||
apraviṣṭaṃ ca bhavanaṃ yuddhāya puruṣarṣabha | āhvayethā mahābāho tato hantāsi rākṣasam || 7.63.29 ||
anyathā kriyamāṇe tu avadhyaḥ sa bhaviṣyati | yadi tvevaṃ kṛte vīra vināśamupayāsyati || 7.63.30 ||
etatte sarvamākhyātaṃ śūlasya ca viparyayaḥ | śrīmataḥ śitikaṇṭhasya kṛtyaṃ hi duratikramam || 7.63.31 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe triṣaṣṭitamaḥ sargaḥ || 63 ||
evamuktvā ca kākutsthaṃ praśasya ca punaḥ punaḥ | punarevāparaṃ vākyamuvāca raghunandanaḥ || 7.64.1 ||
imānyaśvasahasrāṇi catvāri puruṣarṣabha | rathānāṃ dve sahasre ca gajānāṃ śatamuttamam || 7.64.2 ||
antarā paṇavīthyaśca nānāpaṇyopaśobhitāḥ | anugacchantu kākutsthaṃ tathaiva naṭanartakāḥ || 7.64.3 ||
hiraṇyasya suvarṇasya niyutaṃ puruṣarṣabha | ādāya gaccha śatrughna paryāptadhanavāhanaḥ || 7.64.4 ||
balaṃ ca subhṛtaṃ vīra hṛṣṭapuṣṭamanuddhatam | sambhāṣāsampradānena rañjayasva nagettama || 7.64.5 ||
na hyarthāstatra tiṣṭhanti na dārā na ca bāndhavāḥ | suprīto bhṛtyavargaśca yatra tiṣṭhasi rāghava || 7.64.6 ||
tato hṛṣṭajanākīrṇāṃ prasthāpya mahatīṃ camūm | eka eva dhanuṣpāṇirgaccha tvaṃ madhuno vanam || 7.64.7 ||
yathā tvāṃ na prajānāti gacchantaṃ yuddhakāṅkṣiṇam | lavaṇastu madhoḥ putrastathā gaccheraśaṅkitam || 7.64.8 ||
na tasya mūtyuranyo 'sti kaściddhi puruṣarṣabha | darśanaṃ yo 'bhigaccheta sa vadhyo lavaṇena hi || 7.64.9 ||
sa hi grīṣmo 'payāte tu varṣārātra upāgate | hanyāstvaṃ lavaṇaṃ saumya sahi kālo 'sya durmateḥ || 7.64.10 ||
maharṣīṃstu puratkṛtya prayāntu tava saunikāḥ | yathā grīṣmāvaśeṣeṇa tareyurjāhnavījalam || 7.64.11 ||
tatra sthāpya balaṃ sarvaṃ nadītīre samāhitaḥ | agrato dhanuṣā sārdhaṃ gaccha tvaṃ laghuvikramaḥ || 7.64.12 ||
evamuktastu rāmeṇa śatrughnastānmahābalān | senāmukhyānsamānīya tato vākyamuvāca ha || 7.64.13 ||
ete vo gaṇitā vāsā yatra tatra nivatsyatha | sthātavyaṃ cāvirodhena yathā bādhā na kasyacit || 7.64.14 ||
tathā tāṃstu samājñāpya prasthāpya ca mahadbalam | kausalyāṃ ca sumitrāṃ ca kaikeyīṃ cābhyavādayat || 7.64.15 ||
rāmaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya śirasā 'bhipraṇamya ca | rāmeṇa cābhyanujñātaḥ śatrughnaḥ śatrutāpanaḥ || 7.64.16 ||
lakṣmaṇaṃ bharataṃ caiva praṇipatya kṛtāñjaliḥ | purohitaṃ vasiṣṭhaṃ ca śatrughnaḥ prayatātmavān | pradakṣiṇamatho kṛtvā nirjagāma mahābalaḥ || 7.64.17 ||
prasthāpya senāmatha so 'gratastadā gajendravājipravaraughasaṅkulām | upāsa māsaṃ tu narendrapārśvatastvatha prayāto raghuvaṃśavardhanaḥ || 7.64.18 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe catuṣṣaṣṭitamaḥ sargaḥ || 64 ||
prasthāpya ca balaṃ sarvaṃ māsamātroṣitaḥ pathi | eka evāśu śatrughno jagāma tvaritaṃ tadā || 7.65.1 ||
dvirātramantare śūra uṣya rāghavanandanaḥ | vālmīkerāśramaṃ puṇyamagacchadvāsamuttamam || 7.65.2 ||
so 'bhivādya mahātmānaṃ vālmīkiṃ munisattamam | kṛtāñjaliratho bhūtvā vākyametaduvāca ha || 7.65.3 ||
bhagavanvastumicchāmi guroḥ kṛtyādihāgataḥ | śvaḥ prabhāte gamiṣyāmi pratīcīṃ vāruṇīṃ diśam || 7.65.4 ||
śatrughnasya vacaḥ śrutvā prahasya munipuṅgavaḥ | pratyuvāca mahātmānaṃ svāgataṃ te mahāyaśaḥ || 7.65.5 ||
svamāśramamidaṃ saumya rāghavāṇāṃ kulasya hi | āsanaṃ pādyamardhyaṃ ca nirviśaṅkaḥ pratīccha me || 7.65.6 ||
pratigṛhya tadā pūjāṃ phalamūlaṃ ca bhojanam | bhakṣayāmāsa kākutsthastṛptiṃ ca paramāṃ gataḥ || 7.65.7 ||
sa bhuktvā phalamūlaṃ ca maharṣiṃ tamuvāca ha | iyaṃ yajñavibhūtiste kasyāśramasamīpataḥ || 7.65.8 ||
tattasya bhāṣitaṃ śrutvā vālmīkirvākyamabravīt | śatrughna śṛṇu yasyedaṃ babhūvāyatanaṃ purā || 7.65.9 ||
yuṣmākaṃ pūrvako rājā saudāsastasya bhūpateḥ | putro vīrasaho nāma vīryavānatidhārmikaḥ || 7.65.10 ||
sa bāla eva saudāso mṛgayāmupacakrame | cañcūryamāṇaṃ dadṛśe sa śūro rākṣasadvayam || 7.65.11 ||
śārdūlarūpiṇau ghorau mṛgānbahusahasraśaḥ | bhakṣamāṇāvasantuṣṭau paryāptiṃ naiva jagmatuḥ || 7.65.12 ||
sa tu tau rākṣasau dṛṣṭvā nirmṛgaṃ ca vanaṃ kṛtam | krodhena mahatā ' 'viṣṭo jaghānaikaṃ maheṣuṇā || 7.65.13 ||
vinipātya tamekaṃ tu saudāsaḥ puruṣarṣabhaḥ | vijvaro vigatāmārṣo hataṃ rakṣo hyudaikṣata || 7.65.14 ||
nirīkṣamāṇaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā sahāyaṃ tasya rakṣasaḥ | santāpamakarodghoraṃ saudāsaṃ cedamabravīt || 7.65.15 ||
yasmādanaparādhaṃ tvaṃ sahāyaṃ mama jaghnivān | tasmāttavāpi pāpiṣṭha pradāsyāmi pratikriyām || 7.65.16 ||
evamuktvā tu tadrākṣastatraivāntaradhīyata | kālaparyāyayogena rājā mitrasaho 'bhavat || 7.65.17 ||
rājāpi yajate yajñamasyāśramasamīpataḥ | aśvamedhaṃ mahāyajñaṃ taṃ vasiṣṭho 'bhyapālayat || 7.65.18 ||
tatra yajño mahānāsīdbahuvarṣagaṇāyutaḥ | samṛddhaḥ parayā lakṣmyā devayajñasamo 'bhavat || 7.65.19 ||
athāvasāne yajñasya pūrvavairamanusmaran | vasiṣṭharūpī rājānamiti hovāca rākṣasaḥ || 7.65.20 ||
asya yajñasya jāto 'ntaḥ sāmiṣaṃ bhojanaṃ mama | dīyatāmiha śīghraṃ vai nātra kāryā vicāraṇā || 7.65.21 ||
tacchrutvā vyāhṛtaṃ vākyaṃ rakṣasā brahmarūpiṇā | bhakṣyasaṃskārakuśalamuvāca pṛthivīpatiḥ || 7.65.22 ||
haviṣyaṃ sāmiṣaṃ svādu yathā bhavati bhojanam | tathā kuruṣva śīghraṃ vai parituṣyedyathā guruḥ || 7.65.23 ||
śāsanātpārthivendrasya sūdaḥ sambhrāntamānasaḥ | sa rākṣasaḥ punastatra sūdaveṣamathākarot || 7.65.24 ||
sa mānuṣamatho māṃsaṃ pārthivāya nyavedayat | idaṃ svādu haviṣyaṃ ca sāmiṣaṃ cānnamāhṛtam || 7.65.25 ||
sa bhojanaṃ vasiṣṭhāya patnyā sārdhamupāharat | madayantyā naravyāghra sāmiṣaṃ rakṣasā hṛtam || 7.65.26 ||
jñātvā tadāmiṣaṃ vipro mānuṣaṃ bhājanaṃ gatam | krodhena mahatā ' 'viṣṭo vyāhartumupacakrame || 7.65.27 ||
yasmāttvaṃ bhojanaṃ rājanmamaitaddātumicchasi | tasmādbhojanametatte bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ || 7.65.28 ||
tataḥ kruddhastu saudāsastoyaṃ jagrāha pāṇinā | vasiṣṭhaṃ śaptumārebhe bhāryā cainamavārayat || 7.65.29 ||
rājanprabhuryato 'smākaṃ vasiṣṭho bhagavānṛṣiḥ | pratiśaptuṃ na śaktastvaṃ devatulyaṃ purodhasam || 7.65.30 ||
tataḥ krodhamayaṃ toyaṃ tejobalasamanvitam | vyasarjayata dharmātmā tataḥ pādau siṣeca ca || 7.65.31 ||
tenāsya rājñastau pādau tadā kalmāṣatāṃ gatau | tadāprabhṛti rājā 'sau saudāsaḥ sumahāyaśāḥ | kalmāṣapādaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ khyātaścaiva tathā nṛpaḥ || 7.65.32 ||
sa rājā saha patnyā vai praṇipatya muhurmuhuḥ | punarvasiṣṭhaṃ provāca yaduktaṃ brahmarūpiṇā || 7.65.33 ||
tacchrutvā pārthivendrasya rakṣasā vikṛtaṃ ca tat | punaḥ provāca rājānaṃ vasiṣṭhaḥ puruṣarṣabham || 7.65.34 ||
mayā roṣaparītena yadidaṃ vyāhṛtaṃ vacaḥ | naitacchakyaṃ vṛthā kartuṃ pradāsyāmi ca te varam || 7.65.35 ||
kālo dvādaśa varṣāṇi śāpasyānto bhaviṣyati | matprāsādācca rājendra vyatītaṃ na smariṣyasi || 7.65.36 ||
evaṃ sa rājā taṃ śāpamupabhujyārisūdanaḥ | pratilebhe punā rājyaṃ prajāścaivānvapālayat || 7.65.37 ||
tasya kalmāṣapādasya yajñasyāyatanaṃ śubham | āśramasya samīpe 'sya yanmāṃ pṛcchasi rāghava || 7.65.38 ||
tasya tāṃ pārthivendrasya kathāṃ śrutvā sudāruṇām | viveśa parṇaśālāyāṃ maharṣimabhivādya ca || 7.65.39 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe pañcaṣaṣṭitamaḥ sargaḥ || 65 ||
yāmeva rātriṃ śatrughnaḥ parṇaśālāmupāviśat | tāmeva rātriṃ sītāpi prasūtā dārakadvayam || 7.66.1 ||
tato 'rdharātrasamaye bālakā munidārakāḥ | vālmīkeḥ priyamācakhyuḥ sītāyāḥ prasavaṃ śubham || 7.66.2 ||
bhagavanrāmapatnī sā prasūtā dārakadvayam | tato rakṣāṃ mahātejaḥ kuru bhūtavināśinīm || 7.66.3 ||
teṣāṃ tadvacanaṃ śrutvā maharṣiḥ samupāgamat | bālacandrapratīkāśau devaputrau mahaujasau || 7.66.4 ||
jagāma tatra hṛṣṭātmā dadarśa ca kumārakau | bhūtaghnīṃ cākarottābhyāṃ rakṣāṃ rakṣovināśinīm || 7.66.5 ||
kuśamuṣṭimupādāya lavaṃ caiva tu sa dvijaḥ | vālmīkiḥ pradadau tābhyāṃ rakṣāṃ bhūtavināśinīm || 7.66.6 ||
yastayoḥ pūrvajo jātaḥ sa kuśairmantrasatkṛtaiḥ | nirmārjanīyastu tadā kuśa ityasya nāma tat || 7.66.7 ||
yaścāvaro bhavettābhyāṃ lavena sa samāhitaḥ | nirmārjanīyo vṛddhābhirlava ityeva nāmataḥ || 7.66.8 ||
evaṃ kuśalavau nāmnā tāvubhau yamajātakau | matkṛtābhyāṃ ca nāmabhyāṃ khyātiyuktau bhaviṣyataḥ || 7.66.9 ||
tāṃ rakṣāṃ jagṛhustāśca munihastātsamāhitāḥ | akurvaṃśca tato rakṣāṃ tayorvigatakalmaṣāḥ || 7.66.10 ||
tathā tāṃ kriyamāṇāṃ ca vṛddhābhirjanma nāma ca | saṅkīrtanaṃ ca rāmasya sītāyāḥ prasavau śubhau || 7.66.11 ||
ardharātre tu śatrughnaḥ śuśrāva sumahatpriyam | parṇaśālāṃ tato gatvā mātardiṣṭyeti cābravīt || 7.66.12 ||
tathā tasya prahṛṣṭasya śatrughnasya mahātmanaḥ | vyatītā vārṣikī rātriḥ śrāvaṇī laghuvikramaḥ || 7.66.13 ||
prabhāte sumahāvīryaḥ kṛtvā paurvāhṇikīṃ kriyām | muniṃ prāñjalirāmantrya yayau paścānmukhaḥ punaḥ || 7.66.14 ||
sa gatvā yamunātīraṃ saptarātroṣitaḥ pathi | ṛṣīṇāṃ puṇyakīrtīnāmāśrame vāsamabhyayāt || 7.66.15 ||
sa tatra munibhiḥ sārdhaṃ bhārgavapramukhairnṛpaḥ | kathābhirabhirūpābhirvāsaṃ cakre mahāyaśāḥ || 7.66.16 ||
sa kāñcanādyairmunibhiḥ sameto raghupravīro rajanīṃ tadānīm | kathāprakārairbahubhirmahātmā virāmayāmāsa narendrasūnuḥ || 7.66.17 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe ṣaṭṣaṣṭitamaḥ sargaḥ || 66 ||
atha rātryāṃ pravṛttāyāṃ śatrughno bhṛgunandanam | papraccha cyavanaṃ vipraṃ lavaṇasya yathā balam || 7.67.1 ||
śūlasya ca balaṃ brahmanke ca pūrvaṃ vināśitāḥ | anena śūlamukhyena dvandvayuddhamupāgatāḥ || 7.67.2 ||
tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā śatrughnasya mahātmanaḥ | pratyuvāca mahātejāścyavano raghunandanam || 7.67.3 ||
asaṅkhyeyāni karmāṇi yānyasya raghunandana | ikṣvākuvaṃśaprabhave yadvṛttaṃ tacchṛṇaṣva me || 7.67.4 ||
ayodhyāyāṃ purā rājā yuvanāśvasuto balī | māndhāteti sa vikhyātastriṣu lokeṣu vīryavān || 7.67.5 ||
sa kṛtvā pṛthivīṃ kṛtsnāṃ śāsane pṛthivīpatiḥ | suralokamito jetumudyogamakaronnṛpaḥ || 7.67.6 ||
indrasya ca bhayaṃ tīvraṃ surāṇāṃ ca mahātmanām | māndhātari kṛtodyoge devalokajigīṣayā || 7.67.7 ||
ardhāsanena śakrasya rājyārdhena ca pārthivaḥ | vandyamānaḥ suragaṇaiḥ pratijñāmadhyarohata || 7.67.8 ||
tasya pāpamabhiprāyaṃ viditvā pākaśāsanaḥ | sāntvapūrvamidaṃ vākyamuvāca yuvanāśvajam || 7.67.9 ||
rājā tvaṃ mānuṣe loke na tāvatpuruṣarṣabha | akṛtvā pṛthivīṃ vaśyāṃ devarājyamihecchasi || 7.67.10 ||
yadi vīra samagrā te medinī nikhilā vaśe | devarājyaṃ kuruṣveha sabhṛtyabalavāhanaḥ || 7.67.11 ||
indramevaṃ bruvāṇaṃ taṃ māndhātā vākyamabravīt | kva me śakra pratihataṃ śāsanaṃ pṛthivītale || 7.67.12 ||
tamuvāca sahasrākṣo lavaṇo nāma rākṣasaḥ | madhuputro madhuvane na te ' 'jñāṃ kurute 'nagha || 7.67.13 ||
tacchrutvā vipriyaṃ ghoraṃ sahasrākṣeṇa bhāṣitam | vrīḍito 'vāṅmukho rājā vyāhartuṃ na śaśāka ha || 7.67.14 ||
āmantrya tu sahasrākṣaṃ hriyā kiñcidavāṅmukhaḥ | punarevāgamacchrīmānimaṃ lokaṃ nareśvaraḥ || 7.67.15 ||
sa kṛtvā hṛdaye 'marṣaṃ sabhṛtyabalavāhanaḥ | ājagāma madhoḥ putraṃ vaśe kartumarindamaḥ || 7.67.16 ||
sa kāṅkṣamāṇo lavaṇaṃ yuddhāya puruṣarṣabhaḥ | dūtaṃ sampreṣayāmāsa sakāśaṃ lavaṇasya hi || 7.67.17 ||
sa gatvā vipriyāṇyāha bahūni madhunaḥ sutam | vadantamevaṃ taṃ dūtaṃ bhakṣayāmāsa rākṣasaḥ || 7.67.18 ||
cirāyamāṇe dūte tu rājā krodhasamanvitaḥ | ardayāmāsa tadrakṣaḥ śaravṛṣṭyā samantataḥ || 7.67.19 ||
tataḥ prahasya tadrakṣaḥ śūlaṃ jagrāha pāṇinā | vadhāya sānubandhasya mumocāyudhamuttamam || 7.67.20 ||
tacchūlaṃ dīpyamānaṃ tu sabhṛtyabalavāhanam | bhasmīkṛtvā nṛpaṃ bhūyo lavaṇasyāgamatkaram || 7.67.21 ||
evaṃ sa rājā sumahānhataḥ sabalavāhanaḥ | śūlasya tu balaṃ saumya aprameyamanuttamam || 7.67.22 ||
śvaḥ prabhāte tu lavaṇaṃ vadhiṣyasi na saṃśayaḥ | agṛhītāyudhaṃ kṣipraṃ dhruvo hi vijayastava || 7.67.23 ||
lokānāṃ svasti caiva syātkṛte karmaṇi ca tvayā | etatte sarvamākhyātaṃ lavaṇasya durātmanaḥ || 7.67.24 ||
śūlasya ca balaṃ ghoramaprameyaṃ nararṣabha | vināśaścaiva māndhāturyattenābhūcca pārthiva || 7.67.25 ||
tvaṃ śvaḥ prabhāte lavaṇaṃ mahātmanvadhiṣyase nātra tu saṃśayo me | śūlaṃ vinā nirgatamāmiṣārthe dhruvo jayaste bhavitā narendra || 7.67.26 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe saptaṣaṣṭitamaḥ sargaḥ || 67 ||
kathāṃ kathayatāṃ teṣāṃ jayaṃ cākāṅkṣatāṃ śubham | vyatītā rajanī śīghraṃ śatrughnasya mahātmanaḥ || 7.68.1 ||
tataḥ prabhāte vimale tasminkāle sa rākṣasaḥ | nirgatastu purāddhīro bhakṣyāhārapracoditaḥ || 7.68.2 ||
etasminnantare vīraḥ śatrughno yamunāṃ nadīm | tīrtvā madhupuradvāri dhanuṣpāṇiratiṣṭhata || 7.68.3 ||
tato 'rdhadivase prāpte krūrakarmā sa rākṣasaḥ | āgacchadbahusāhasraṃ prāṇināṃ bhāramudvahan || 7.68.4 ||
tato dadarśa śatrughnaṃ sthitaṃ dvāri dhṛtāyudham | tamuvāca tato rakṣaḥ kimanena kariṣyasi || 7.68.5 ||
īdṛśānāṃ sahasrāṇi sāyudhānāṃ narādhama | bhakṣitāni mayā roṣātkālamākāṅkṣase nu kim || 7.68.6 ||
āhāraścāsya sampūrṇo mamāyaṃ puruṣādhama | svayaṃ praviṣṭo 'dya mukhaṃ kathamāsādya durmate || 7.68.7 ||
tasyaivaṃ bhāṣamāṇasya hasataśca muhurmuhuḥ | śatrughno vīryasampanno roṣādaśrūṇyavāsṛjat || 7.68.8 ||
tasya roṣābhibhūtasya śatrughnasya mahātmanaḥ | tejomayā marīcyastu sarvagātrairviniṣpatan || 7.68.9 ||
uvāca ca susaṅkruddhaḥ śatrughnastaṃ niśācaram | yoddhumicchāmi durbuddhe dvandvayuddhaṃ tvayā saha || 7.68.10 ||
putro daśarathasyāhaṃ bhrātā rāmasya dhīmataḥ | śatrughno nityaśatrughno vadhākāṅkṣī tavāgataḥ || 7.68.11 ||
tasya me yuddhakāmasya dvandvayuddhaṃ pradīyatām | śatrustvaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ na me jīvangamiṣyasi || 7.68.12 ||
tasmiṃstathā bruvāṇe tu rākṣasaḥ prahasanniva | pratyuvāca naraśreṣṭhaṃ diṣṭyā prāpto 'si durmate || 7.68.13 ||
mama mātṛṣvasurbhrātā rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ | hato rāmeṇa durbuddhe strīhetoḥ puruṣādhama || 7.68.14 ||
tacca sarvaṃ mayā kṣāntaṃ rāvaṇasya kulakṣayam | avajñāṃ purataḥ kṛtvā mayā yūyaṃ viśeṣataḥ || 7.68.15 ||
nihatāśca hi me sarve paribhūtāstṛṇaṃ yathā | bhūtāścaiva bhaviṣyāśca yūyaṃ ca puruṣādhamāḥ || 7.68.16 ||
tasya te yuddhakāmasya yuddhaṃ dāsyāmi durmate | tiṣṭhaṃ tvaṃ ca muhūrtaṃ tu yāvadāyudhamānaye | īpsitaṃ yādṛśaṃ tubhyaṃ sajjaye yāvadāyudham || 7.68.17 ||
tamuvācāśu śatrughnaḥ kva me jīvangamiṣyasi | śatruryadṛcchayā dṛṣṭo na moktavyaḥ kṛtātmanā || 7.68.18 ||
yo hi viklavayā buddhyā prasaraṃ śatrave dadau | sa hato mandabuddhitvādyathā kāpuruṣastathā || 7.68.19 ||
tasmātsudṛṣṭaṃ kuru jīvalokaṃ śaraiḥ śitaistvāṃ vividhairnayāmi | yamasya gehābhimukhaṃ hi pāpaṃ ripuṃ trilokasya ca rāghavasya || 7.68.20 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe 'ṣṭaṣaṣṭitamaḥ sargaḥ || 68 ||
tacchrutvā bhāṣitaṃ tasya śatrughnasya mahātmanaḥ | krodhāmāhārayattīvraṃ tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābravīt || 7.69.1 ||
pāṇau pāṇiṃ viniṣpiṣya dantānkaṭakaṭāyya ca | lavaṇo raghuśārdūlamāhvayāmāsa cāsakṛt || 7.69.2 ||
taṃ bruvāṇaṃ tathā vākyaṃ lavaṇaṃ ghoradarśanam | śatrughno devaśatrughna idaṃ vacanamabravīt || 7.69.3 ||
na śatrughnastathā jāto yathā 'nye nirjitāstvayā | tadadya bāṇābhihato vraja tvaṃ yamasādanam || 7.69.4 ||
ṛṣayo 'pyadya pāpātmanmayā tvāṃ nihataṃ raṇe | paśyantu viprā vidvāṃsastridaśā iva rāvaṇam || 7.69.5 ||
tvayi madbāṇanirdagdhe patite 'dya niśācara | pure janapade cāpi kṣemameva bhaviṣyati || 7.69.6 ||
adya madbāhuniṣkrāntaḥ śaro vajranibhānanaḥ | pravekṣyate te hṛdayaṃ padmamaṃśurivārkajaḥ || 7.69.7 ||
evamukto mahāvṛkṣaṃ lavaṇaḥ krodhamūrcchitaḥ | śatrughnorasi cikṣepa sa ca taṃ śatadhācchinat || 7.69.8 ||
taddṛṣṭvā viphalaṃ karma rākṣasaḥ punareva tu | pādapānsubahūngṛhya śatrughnāyāsṛjadbalī || 7.69.9 ||
śatrughnaścāpi tejasvī vṛkṣānāpatato bahūn | tribhiścaturbhirekaikaṃ ciccheda nataparvabhiḥ || 7.69.10 ||
tato bāṇamayaṃ varṣaṃ vyasṛjadrākṣasorasi | śatrughno vīryasampanno vivyathe na sa rākṣasaḥ || 7.69.11 ||
tataḥ prahasya lavaṇo vṛkṣamudyamya vīryavān | śirasyabhyahanacchūraṃ srastāṅgaḥ sa mumoha vai || 7.69.12 ||
tasminnipatite vīre hāhākāro mahānabhūt | ṛṣīṇāṃ devasaṅghānāṃ gandharvāpsarasāṃ tathā || 7.69.13 ||
tamavajñāya tu hataṃ śatrughnaṃ bhuvi pātitam | rakṣo labdhāntaramapi na viveśa svamālayam || 7.69.14 ||
nāpi śūlaṃ prajagrāha taṃ dṛṣṭvā bhuvi pātitam | tato hata iti jñātvā tānbhakṣānsamudāvahat || 7.69.15 ||
muhūrtāllabdhasañjñastu punastasthau dhṛtāyudhaḥ | śatrughno vai puradvāri ṛṣibhiḥ samprapūjitaḥ || 7.69.16 ||
tato divyamamoghaṃ taṃ jagrāha śaramuttamam | jvalantaṃ tejasā ghoraṃ pūrayantaṃ diśo daśa || 7.69.17 ||
vajrānanaṃ vajravegaṃ merumandarasannibham | nataṃ parvasu sarveṣu saṃyugeṣvaparājitam || 7.69.18 ||
asṛkcandanadigdhāṅgaṃ cārupatraṃ patatriṇam | dānavendrācalendrāṇāmasurāṇāṃ ca dāraṇam || 7.69.19 ||
taṃ dīptamiva kālāgniṃ yugānte samupasthite | dṛṣṭvā sarvāṇi bhūtāni paritrāsamupāgaman || 7.69.20 ||
sadevāsuragandharvaṃ munibhiḥ sāpsarogaṇam | jagaddhi sarvamasvasthaṃ pitāmahamupasthitam || 7.69.21 ||
uvāca devadeveśaṃ varadaṃ prapitāmaham | devānāṃ bhayasaṃmoho lokānāṃ saṅkṣayaṃ prati || 7.69.22 ||
nedṛśaṃ dṛṣṭapūrvaṃ ca na śrutaṃ prapitāmaha | devānāṃ bhayasammoho lokānāṃ saṅkṣayaṃ prati || 7.69.23 ||
teṣāṃ tadvacanaṃ śrutvā brahmā lokapitāmahaḥ | bhayakāraṇamācaṣṭa lokānāmabhayaṅkaraḥ | uvāca madhurāṃ vāṇīṃ śṛṇudhvaṃ sarvadevatāḥ || 7.69.24 ||
vadhāya lavaṇasyājau śaraḥ śatrughnadhāritaḥ | tejasā tasya sammūḍhāḥ sarve smaḥ surasattamāḥ || 7.69.25 ||
eṣa pūrvasya devasya lokakartuḥ sanātanaḥ | śarastejomayo vatsā yena vai bhayamāgatam || 7.69.26 ||
eṣa vai kaiṭabhasyārthe madhunaśca mahāśaraḥ | sṛṣṭo mahātmanā tena vadhārthe daityayostayoḥ || 7.69.27 ||
eka eva prajānāti viṣṇustejomayaṃ śaram | eṣā eva tanuḥ pūrvā viṣṇostasya mahātmanaḥ || 7.69.28 ||
ito gacchata paśyadhvaṃ vadhyamānaṃ mahātmanā | rāmānujena vīreṇa lavaṇaṃ rākṣasottamam || 7.69.29 ||
tasya te devadevasya niśamya vacanaṃ surāḥ | ājagmuryatra yudhyete śatrughnalavaṇāvubhau || 7.69.30 ||
taṃ śaraṃ divyasaṅkāśaṃ śatrughnakaradhāritam | dadṛśuḥ sarvabhūtāni yugāntāgnimivotthitam || 7.69.31 ||
akāśamāvṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvā devairhi raghunandanaḥ | siṃhanādaṃ bhṛśaṃ kṛtvā dadarśa lakṣaṇaṃ punaḥ || 7.69.32 ||
āhūtaśca punastena śatrughnena mahātmanā | lavaṇaḥ krodhasaṃyukto yuddhāya samupasthitaḥ || 7.69.33 ||
ākarṇātsa vikṛṣyātha taddhanurdhanvināṃ varaḥ | taṃ mumoca mahābāṇaṃ lavaṇasya mahorasi || 7.69.34 ||
urastasya vidāryāśu praviveśa rasātalam || 7.69.35 ||
gatvā rasātalaṃ divyaḥ śaro vibudhapūjitaḥ | punarevāgamattūrṇamikṣvākukulanandanam || 7.69.36 ||
śatrughnaśaranirbhinno lavaṇaḥ sa niśācaraḥ | papāta sahasā bhūmau vajrāhata ivācalaḥ || 7.69.37 ||
tacca śūlaṃ mahattena hate lavaṇarākṣase | paśyatāṃ sarvadevānāṃ rudrasya vaśamanvagāt || 7.69.38 ||
ekeṣupātena bhṛśaṃ nipātya lokatrayasyāpi raghupravīraḥ | vinirbabhāvuttamacāpabāṇastamaḥ praṇudyeva sahasraraśmiḥ || 7.69.39 ||
tato hi devā ṛṣipannagāśca prapūjire hyapsarasaśca sarvāḥ | diṣṭyā jayo dāśaratheravāptastyaktvā bhayaṃ sarpa iva praśāntaḥ || 7.69.40 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe ekonasaptatitamaḥ sargaḥ || 69 ||
hate tu lavaṇe devāḥ sendrāḥ sāgnipurogamāḥ | ūcuḥ sumadhurāṃ vāṇīṃ śatrughnaṃ śatrutāpanam || 7.70.1 ||
diṣṭyā te vijayo vatsa diṣṭyā lavaṇarākṣasaḥ | hataḥ puruṣaśārdūla varaṃ varaya suvrata || 7.70.2 ||
varadāstu mahābāho sarva eva samāgatāḥ | vijayākāṅkṣiṇastubhyamamoghaṃ darśanaṃ hi naḥ || 7.70.3 ||
devānāṃ bhāṣitaṃ śrutvā śūro mūrdhni kṛtāñjaliḥ | pratyuvāca mahābāhuḥ śatrughnaḥ prayatātmavān || 7.70.4 ||
iyaṃ madhupurī rasyā madhurā devanirmitā | niveśaṃ prāpnuyācchīghrameṣa me 'stu varaḥ paraḥ || 7.70.5 ||
taṃ devāḥ prītamanaso bāḍhamityeva rāghavam | bhaviṣyati purī ramyā śūrasenā na saṃśayaḥ || 7.70.6 ||
te tathoktvā mahātmāno divamāruruhustadā | śatrughno 'pi mahātejāstāṃ senāṃ samupānayat || 7.70.7 ||
sā senā śīghramāgacchacchrutvā śatrughnaśāsanam | niveśanaṃ ca śatrughnaḥ śrāvaṇena samārabhat || 7.70.8 ||
sā purā divyasaṅkāśā varṣe dvādaśame śubhe | niviṣṭā śūrasenānāṃ viṣayaścākutobhayaḥ || 7.70.9 ||
kṣetrāṇi sasyayuktāni kāle varṣati vāsavaḥ | arogavīrapuruṣā śatrughnabhujapālitā || 7.70.10 ||
ardhacandrapratīkāśā yamunātīraśobhitā | śobhitā gṛhamukhyaiśca catvarāpaṇavīthikaiḥ | cāturvarṇyasamāyuktā nānāvāṇijyaśobhitā || 7.70.11 ||
yacca tena purā śubhraṃ lavaṇena kṛtaṃ mahat | tacchobhayati śatrughno nānāvarṇopaśobhitām || 7.70.12 ||
ārāmaiśca vihāraiśca śobhamānaṃ samantataḥ | śobhitāṃ śobhanīyaiśca tathā 'nyairdaivamānuṣaiḥ || 7.70.13 ||
tāṃ purīṃ divyasaṅkāśāṃ nānāpaṇyopaśobhitām | nānādeśāgataiścāpi vaṇigbhirupaśobhitām || 7.70.14 ||
tāṃ samṛddhāṃ samṛddhārthaḥ śatrughno bharatānujaḥ | nirīkṣya paramaprītaḥ paraṃ harṣamupāgamat || 7.70.15 ||
tasya buddhiḥ samutpannā niveśya madhurāṃ purīm | rāmapādau nirīkṣe 'haṃ varṣe dvādaśa āgate || 7.70.16 ||
tataḥ sa tāmamarapuropamāṃ purīṃ niveśya vai vividhajanābhisaṃvṛtām | narādhipo raghupatipādadarśane dadhe matiṃ raghukulavaṃśavardhanaḥ || 7.70.17 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe saptatitamaḥ sargaḥ || 70 ||
tato dvādaśame varṣe śatraghno rāmapālitām | ayodhyāṃ cakame gantumalpabhṛtyabalānugaḥ || 7.71.1 ||
tato mantripurogāṃśca balamukhyānnivartya ca | jagāma hayamukhyaiśca rathānāṃ ca śatena saḥ || 7.71.2 ||
sa gatvā gaṇitānvāsānsaptāṣṭau raghunandanaḥ | vālmīkyāśramamāgatya vāsaṃ cakre mahāyaśāḥ || 7.71.3 ||
so 'bhivādya tataḥ pādau vālmīkeḥ puruṣarṣabhaḥ | pādyamardhyaṃ tathātithyaṃ jagrāha munihastataḥ || 7.71.4 ||
bahurūpāḥ sumadhurāḥ kathāstatra sahasraśaḥ | kathayāmāsa sa muniḥ śatrughnāya mahātmane || 7.71.5 ||
uvāca ca munirvākyaṃ lavaṇasya vadhāśritam | suduṣkaraṃ kṛtaṃ karma lavaṇaṃ nighnatā tvayā || 7.71.6 ||
bahavaḥ pārthivāḥ saumya hatāḥ sabalavāhanāḥ | lavaṇena mahābāho yudhyamānā mahābalāḥ || 7.71.7 ||
sa tvayā nihataḥ pāpo līlayā puruṣarṣabha | jagataśca bhayaṃ tatra praśāntaṃ tava tejasā || 7.71.8 ||
rāvaṇasya vadho ghoro yatnena mahatā kṛtaḥ | idaṃ tu sumahatkarma tvayā kṛtamayatnataḥ || 7.71.9 ||
prītiścāsminparā jātā devānāṃ lavaṇe hate | bhūtānāṃ caiva sarveṣāṃ jagataśca priyaṃ kṛtam || 7.71.10 ||
tacca yuddhaṃ mayā dṛṣṭaṃ yathāvatpuruṣarṣabha | sabhāyāṃ vāsavasyātha upaviṣṭena rāghava || 7.71.11 ||
mamāpi paramā prītirhṛdi śatrughna vartate | upāghrāsyāmi te mūrdhni snehasyaiṣā parā gatiḥ || 7.71.12 ||
ityuktvā mūrdhni śatrughnamupāghrāya mahāmuniḥ | ātithyamakarottasya ye ca tasya padānugāḥ || 7.71.13 ||
sa bhuktavānnaraśreṣṭho gītamādhuryamuttamam | śuśrāva rāmacaritaṃ tasminkāle yathākṛmam || 7.71.14 ||
tantrīlayasamāyuktaṃ tristhānakaraṇānvitam | saṃskṛtaṃ lakṣaṇopetaṃ samatālasamanvitam | śuśrāva rāmacaritaṃ tasminkāle purā kṛtam || 7.71.15 ||
tānyakṣarāṇi satyāni yathāvṛttāni pūrvaśaḥ | śrutvā puruṣaśārdūlo visañjño bāṣpalocanaḥ || 7.71.16 ||
sa muhūrtamivāsañjño viniḥśvasya muhurmuhuḥ | tasmin gīte yathāvṛttaṃ vartamānamivāśṛṇot || 7.71.17 ||
padānugāśca ye rājñastāṃ śrutvā gītisampadam | avāṅmukhāśca dīnāśca hyāścaryamiti cābruvan || 7.71.18 ||
parasparaṃ ca ye tatra sainikāḥ sambabhāṣire | kimidaṃ kva ca vartāmaḥ kimetatsvapnadarśanam || 7.71.19 ||
artho yo naḥ purā dṛṣṭastamāśramapade punaḥ | śṛṇumaḥ kimidaṃ svapno gītabandhaṃ śriyo bhavet || 7.71.20 ||
vismayaṃ te paraṃ gatvā śatrughnamidamabruvan | sādhu pṛccha naraśreṣṭha vālmīkiṃ munipuṅgavam || 7.71.21 ||
śatrughnastvabravītsarvānkautūhalasamanvitān | sainikā na kṣamo 'smākaṃ paripraṣṭumihedṛśaḥ || 7.71.22 ||
āścaryāṇi bahūnīha bhavantyasyāśrame muneḥ | na tu kautūhalādyuktamanveṣṭuṃ taṃ mahāmunim || 7.71.23 ||
evaṃ tadvākyamuktvā ca sainikānraghunandanaḥ | abhivādya maharṣiṃ taṃ svaṃ niveśaṃ yayau tadā || 7.71.24 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe ekasaptatimaḥ sargaḥ || 71 ||
taṃ śayānaṃ naravyāghraṃ nidrā nābhyāgamattadā | cintayantamanekārthaṃ rāmagītamanuttamam || 7.72.1 ||
tasya śabdaṃ sumadhuraṃ tantrīlayasamanvitam | śrutvā rātrirjagāmāśu śatrughnasya mahātmanaḥ || 7.72.2 ||
tasyāṃ niśāyāṃ vyuṣṭāyāṃ kṛtvā paurvāhṇikaṃ kramam | uvāca prāñjalirvākyaṃ śatrughno munipuṅgavam || 7.72.3 ||
bhagavandraṣṭumicchāmi rāghavaṃ raghunandanam | tvayā 'nujñātumicchāmi sahaibhiḥ saṃśitavrataiḥ || 7.72.4 ||
ityevaṃvādinaṃ taṃ tu śatrughnaṃ śatrutāpanam | vālmīkiḥ sampariṣvajya visasarja ca rāghavam || 7.72.5 ||
so 'bhivādya muniśreṣṭhaṃ rathamāruhya suprabham | ayodhyāmagamattūrṇaṃ rāghavotsukadarśanaḥ || 7.72.6 ||
sa praviṣṭaḥ purīṃ ramyāṃ śrīmānikṣvākunandanaḥ | praviveśa mahābāhuryatra rāmo mahādyutiḥ || 7.72.7 ||
sa rāmaṃ mantrimadhyasthaṃ pūrṇacandranibhānanam | paśyannamaramadhyasthaṃ sahasranayanaṃ yathā || 7.72.8 ||
so 'bhivādya mahātmānaṃ jvalantamiva tejasā | uvāca prāñjalirvākyaṃ rāmaṃ satyaparākramam || 7.72.9 ||
yadājñaptaṃ mahārāja sarvaṃ tatkṛtavānaham | hataḥ sa lavaṇaḥ pāpaḥ purī cāsya niveśitā || 7.72.10 ||
dvādaśaite gatā varṣāstvāṃ vinā raghunandana | notsaheyamahaṃ vastuṃ tvayā virahito nṛpa || 7.72.11 ||
sa me prasādaṃ kākutstha kuruṣvāmitavikrama | mātṛhīno yathā vatso na ciraṃ pravasāmyaham || 7.72.12 ||
evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ śatrughnaṃ pariṣvajyedamabravīt | mā viṣādaṃ kṛthāḥ śūra naitatkṣatriyaceṣṭitam || 7.72.13 ||
nāvasīdanti rājāno vipravāseṣu rāghava | prajā naḥ paripālyā hi kṣatradharmeṇa rāghava || 7.72.14 ||
kāle kāle tu māṃ vīra ayodhyāmavalokitum | āgaccha tvaṃ naraśreṣṭha gantāsi ca puraṃ tava || 7.72.15 ||
mamāpi tvaṃ sudayitaḥ prāṇairapi na saṃśayaḥ | avaśyaṃ karaṇīyaṃ ca rājyasya paripālanam || 7.72.16 ||
tasmāttvaṃ vasa kākutstha saptarātramihāvasa | ūrdhvaṃ gantāsi madhurāṃ sabhṛtyabalavāhanaḥ || 7.72.17 ||
rāmasyaitadvacaḥ śrutvā dharmayuktaṃ manogatam | śatrughno dīnayā vācā bāḍhamityeva cābravīt || 7.72.18 ||
saptarātraṃ ca kākutstho rāghavasya yathājñayā | uṣya tatra maheṣvāso gamanāyopacakrame || 7.72.19 ||
āmantrya tu mahātmānaṃ rāmaṃ satyaparākramam | bharataṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ caiva mahārathamupāruhat || 7.72.20 ||
dūramābhyāmanugato lakṣmaṇena mahātmanā | bharatena ca śatrughno jagāmāśu puraṃ tataḥ || 7.72.21 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe dvisaptatitamaḥ sargaḥ || 72 ||
prasthāpya tu sa śatrughnaṃ bhrātṛbhyāṃ saha rāghavaḥ | pramumoda sukhī rājyaṃ dharmeṇa paripālayan || 7.73.1 ||
tataḥ katipayāhaḥsu vṛddho jānapado dvijaḥ | mṛtaṃ bālamupādāya rājadvāramupāgamat || 7.73.2 ||
rudanbahuvidhā vācaḥ snehaduḥkhasamanvitāḥ | asakṛtputra putreti vākyametaduvāca ha || 7.73.3 ||
kiṃ nu me duṣkṛtaṃ karma purā dehāntare kṛtam | yadahaṃ putramekaṃ tvāṃ paśyāmi nidhanaṃ gatam || 7.73.4 ||
aprāptayauvanaṃ bālaṃ pañcavarṣasahasrakam | akāle kālamāpannaṃ mama duḥkhāya putraka || 7.73.5 ||
alpairahobhirnidhanaṃ gamiṣyāmi na saṃśayaḥ | ahaṃ ca jananī caiva tava śokena putraka || 7.73.6 ||
na smarāmyanṛtaṃ hyuktaṃ na ca hiṃsāṃ smarāmyaham | sarveṣāṃ prāṇināṃ pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ naiva smarāmyaham || 7.73.7 ||
kenādya duṣkṛtenāyaṃ bāla eva mamātmajaḥ | akṛtvā pitṛkāryāṇi gato vaivasvatakṣayam || 7.73.8 ||
nedṛśaṃ dṛṣṭapūrvaṃ me śrutaṃ vā ghoradarśanam | mṛtyuraprāptakālānāṃ rāmasya viṣaye yathā || 7.73.9 ||
rāmasya duṣkṛtaṃ kiñcinmahadasti na saṃśayaḥ | yathā hi viṣayasthānāṃ bālānāṃ mṛtyurāgataḥ || 7.73.10 ||
nahyanyaviṣayasthānāṃ bālānāṃ mṛtyuto bhayam | tvaṃ rājañjīvayasvainaṃ bālaṃ mṛtyuvaśaṃ gatam || 7.73.11 ||
rājadvāri mariṣyāmi patnyā sārdhamanāthavat | brahmahatyāṃ tato rāma samupetya sukhī bhava || 7.73.12 ||
bhrātṛbhiḥ sahito rājandīrghamāyuravāpsyasi | uṣitāḥ sma sukhaṃ rājye tavāsminsumahābala || 7.73.13 ||
idaṃ tu patitaṃ tasmāttava rāma vaśe sthitāḥ | kālasya vaśamāpannāḥ svalpaṃ hi nahi naḥ sukham || 7.73.14 ||
sampratyanātho viṣaya ikṣvākūṇāṃ mahātmanām | rāmaṃ nāthamihāsādya bālāntakaraṇaṃ dhruvam || 7.73.15 ||
rājadoṣairvipadyante prajā hyavidhipālitāḥ | asadvṛtte tu nṛpatāvakāle mriyate janaḥ || 7.73.16 ||
yadvā pureṣvayuktāni janā janapadeṣu ca | kurvate na ca rakṣā 'sti tadā kālakṛtaṃ bhayam || 7.73.17 ||
suvyaktaṃ rājadoṣo hi bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ | pure janapade cāpi tato bālavadho hyayam || 7.73.18 ||
evaṃ bahuvidhairvākyairuparudhya muhurmuhuḥ | rājānaṃ duḥkhasantaptaḥ sutaṃ tamupagūhate || 7.73.19 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe trisaptatitamaḥ sargaḥ || 73 ||
tathā tu karuṇaṃ tasya dvijasya paridevanam | śuśrāva rāghavaḥ sarvaṃ duḥkhaśokasamanvitam || 7.74.1 ||
sa duḥkhena ca santapto mantriṇastānupāhvayat | vasiṣṭhaṃ vāmadevaṃ ca bhrātarau saha naigamān || 7.74.2 ||
tato dvijā vasiṣṭhena sārdhamaṣṭau praveśitāḥ | rājānaṃ devasaṅkāśaṃ vardhasveti tato 'bruvan || 7.74.3 ||
mārkaṇḍeyo 'tha maudgalyo vāmadevaśca kāśyapaḥ | kātyāyano 'tha jābālirgautamo nāradastathā | ete dvijarṣabhāḥ sarve āsaneṣūpaveśitāḥ || 7.74.4 ||
maharṣīnsamanuprāptānabhivādya kṛtāñjaliḥ | mantriṇo naigamāṃścaiva yathārhamanukūlataḥ || 7.74.5 ||
teṣāṃ samupaviṣṭānāṃ sarveṣāṃ dīptatejasām | rāghavaḥ sarvamācaṣṭe dvijo 'yamuparodhate || 7.74.6 ||
tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rājño dīnasya nāradaḥ | pratyuvāca śubhaṃ vākyamṛṣīṇāṃ sannidhau nṛpam || 7.74.7 ||
śṛṇu rājanyathākāle prāpto bālasya saṅkṣayaḥ | śrutvā kartavyatāṃ rājankuruṣvaraghunandana || 7.74.8 ||
purā kṛtayuge rājanbrāhmaṇā vai tapasvinaḥ | abrāhmaṇastadā rājanna tapasvī kathañcana || 7.74.9 ||
tasminyuge prajvalite brahmabhūte tvanāvṛte | amṛtyavastadā sarve jajñire dīrghadarśinaḥ || 7.74.10 ||
tatastretāyugaṃ nāma mānavānāṃ vapuṣmatām | kṣatriyāstatra jāyante pūrṇena tapasā 'nvitāḥ || 7.74.11 ||
vīryeṇa tapasā caiva te 'dhikāḥ pūrvajanmani | mānavā ye mahātmānastvatra tretāyuge yuge || 7.74.12 ||
brahmakṣatraṃ ca tatsarvaṃ yatpūrvamaparaṃ ca yat | yugayorubhayorāsītsamavīryasamanvitam || 7.74.13 ||
apaśyaṃstu na te sarve viśeṣamadhikaṃ tataḥ | sthāpanaṃ cakrire tatra cāturvarṇyasya sammatam || 7.74.14 ||
tasminyuge prajvalite dharmabhūte hyanāvṛte | adharmaḥ pādamekaṃ tu pātayatpṛthivītale || 7.74.15 ||
adharmeṇa hi saṃyuktastejo mandaṃ bhaviṣyati || 7.74.16 ||
āmiṣaṃ yacca pūrveṣāṃ rājasaṃ ca malaṃ bhṛśam | anṛtaṃ nāma tadbhūtaṃ pādena pṛthivītale || 7.74.17 ||
anṛtaṃ pātayitvā tu pādamekamadharmataḥ | tataḥ prāduṣkṛtaṃ pūrvamāyuṣaḥ pariniṣṭhitam || 7.74.18 ||
patite tvanṛte tasminnadharme ca mahītale | śubhānyevācaraँllokaḥ satyadharmaparāyaṇaḥ || 7.74.19 ||
tretāyuge ca vartante brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyāśca ye | tapo 'tapyanta te sarve śuśrūṣāmapare janāḥ || 7.74.20 ||
sa dharmaḥ paramasteṣāṃ vaiśyaśūdraṃ samāgamat | pūjāṃ ca sarvavarṇānāṃ śūdrāścakrurviśeṣataḥ || 7.74.21 ||
etasminnantare teṣāmadharme cānṛte ca ha | tataḥ pūrve bhṛśaṃ hrāsamagamannṛpasattama || 7.74.22 ||
tataḥ pādamadharmassa dvitīyamavatārayat | tato dvāparasañjñā 'sya yugasya samajāyata || 7.74.23 ||
tasmindvāparasañjñe tu vartamāne yugakṣaye | adharmaścānṛtaṃ caiva vavṛdhe puruṣarṣabha || 7.74.24 ||
tasmindvāparasaṅkhyāte tapo vaiśyānsamāviśat | tribhyo yugebhyastrīnvarṇānkramādvai tapa āviśat || 7.74.25 ||
tribhyo yugebhyastrīnvarṇāndharmaśca pariniṣṭhitaḥ | na śuddho labhate dharmaṃ yugatastu nararṣabha | hīnavarṇo nṛpaśreṣṭha tapyate sumahattapaḥ || 7.74.26 ||
bhaviṣyacchūdrayonyāṃ vai tapaścaryā kalau yuge | adharmaḥ paramo rājandvāpare śūdrajanmanaḥ || 7.74.27 ||
sa vai viṣayaparyante tava rājanmahātapāḥ | adya tapyati durbuddhistena bālavadho hyayam || 7.74.28 ||
yo hyadharmamakāryaṃ vā viṣaye pārthivasya tu | karoti cāśrīmūlaṃ tatpure vā durmatirnaraḥ | kṣipraṃ ca narakaṃ yāti sa ca rājā na saṃśayaḥ || 7.74.29 ||
adhītasya ca taptasya karmaṇaḥ sukṛtasya ca | ṣaṣṭhaṃ bhajati bhāgaṃ tu prajā dharmeṇa pālayan || 7.74.30 ||
ṣaṅbhāgasya na bhoktā 'sau rakṣate na prajāḥ katham || 7.74.31 ||
sa tvaṃ puruṣaśārdūla mārgasva viṣayaṃ svakam | duṣkṛtaṃ yatra paśyethāstatra yatnaṃ samācara || 7.74.32 ||
evaṃ ceddharmavṛddhiśca nṛṇāṃ cāyurvivardhanam | bhaviṣyati naraśreṣṭha bālasyāsya ca jīvitam || 7.74.33 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe catuḥsaptatitamaḥ sargaḥ || 74 ||
nāradasya tu tadvākyaṃ śrutvā 'mṛtamayaṃ tadā | praharṣamatulaṃ lebhe lakṣmaṇaṃ cedamabravīt || 7.75.1 ||
gaccha saumya dvijaśreṣṭhaṃ samāśvāsaya suvratam | bālasya tu śarīraṃ tattailadroṇyāṃ nidhāpaya || 7.75.2 ||
gandhaiśca paramodāraistailaiścāpi sugandhibhiḥ | yathā na kṣīyate bālastathā saumya vidhīyatām || 7.75.3 ||
yathā śarīro bālasya guptaḥ san śiṣṭakarmaṇaḥ | vipattiḥ paribhedo vā na bhavecca tathā kuru || 7.75.4 ||
evamādiśya kākutstho lakṣmaṇaṃ śubhalakṣaṇam | manasā puṣpakaṃ dadhyāvāgaccheti mahāyaśāḥ || 7.75.5 ||
iṅgitaṃ sa tu vijñāya puṣpako hemabhūṣitaḥ | ājagāma muhūrtena samīpe rāghavasya vai || 7.75.6 ||
so 'bravītpraṇato bhūtvā ayamasmi narādhipa | vaśyastava mahābāho kiṅkaraḥ samupasthitaḥ || 7.75.7 ||
bhāṣitaṃ ruciraṃ śrutvā puṣpakasya narādhipaḥ | abhivādya maharṣīṃstān vimānaṃ so 'dhyarohata || 7.75.8 ||
dhanurgṛhītvā tūṇī ca khaḍgaṃ ca ruciraprabham | nikṣipya nagare vīrau saumitribharatāvubhau || 7.75.9 ||
prāyātpratīcīṃ haritaṃ vicinvaṃśca tatastataḥ | uttarāmagamacchrīmāndiśaṃ himavatā vṛtām || 7.75.10 ||
apaśyamānastatrāpi svalpamapyatha duṣkṛtam | pūrvāmapi diśaṃ sarvāmatho 'paśyannarādhipaḥ || 7.75.11 ||
praviśuddhasamācārāmādarśatalanirmalām | puṣpakastho mahābāhustadāpaśyannarādhipaḥ || 7.75.12 ||
dakṣiṇāṃ diśamākrāmattato rājarṣinandanaḥ | śaivalasyottare pārśve dadarśa sumahatsaraḥ || 7.75.13 ||
tasminsarasi tapyantaṃ tāpasaṃ sumahattapaḥ | dadarśa rāghavaḥ śrīmāँllambamānamadhomukham || 7.75.14 ||
rāghavastamupāgamya tapyantaṃ tapa uttamam | uvāca sa tadā vākyaṃ dhanyastvamasi suvrata || 7.75.15 ||
kasyāṃ yonyāṃ tapovṛddha vartase dṛḍhavikrama | kautūhalāttvāṃ pṛcchāmi rāmo dāśarathirhyaham || 7.75.16 ||
ko 'rtho manīṣitastubhyaṃ svargalābhaḥ paro 'thavā | varāśrayo yadarthaṃ tvaṃ tapasyasi suduṣkaram | yamāśritya tapastaptaṃ śrotumicchāmi tāpasa || 7.75.17 ||
brāhmaṇo vā 'si bhadraṃ te kṣatriyo vā 'si durjayaḥ | vaiśyastṛtīyavarṇo vā śūdro vā satyavāgbhava || 7.75.18 ||
ityevamuktaḥ sa narādhipena hyavākchirā dāśarathāya tasmai | uvāca jātiṃ nṛpapuṅgavāya yatkāraṇe caiva tapaḥprayatnaḥ || 7.75.19 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe pañcasaptatitamaḥ sargaḥ || 75 ||
tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rāmasyākliṣṭakarmaṇaḥ | avākchirāstathābhūtvā vākyametaduvāca ha || 7.76.1 ||
śūdrayonyāṃ prasūto 'smi śambūko nāma nāmataḥ | devatvaṃ pārthaye rāma saśarīro mahāyaśaḥ || 7.76.2 ||
na mithyā 'haṃ vade rāma devalokajigīṣayā | śūdraṃ māṃ viddhi kākutstha tapa ugraṃ samāsthitam || 7.76.3 ||
bhāṣatastasya śūdrasya khaḍgaṃ suruciraprabham | niṣkṛṣya kośādvimalaṃ śiraściccheda rāghavaḥ || 7.76.4 ||
tasmiñchūdre hate devāḥ sendrāḥ sāgnipurogamāḥ | sādhu sādhviti kākutsthaṃ praśaśaṃsurmuhurmuhuḥ || 7.76.5 ||
puṣpavṛṣṭirmahatyāsīddivyānāṃ susugandhinām | puṣpāṇāṃ vāyumuktānāṃ sarvataḥ prapapāta ha || 7.76.6 ||
suprītāścābruvanrāmaṃ devāḥ satyaparākramam | surakāryamidaṃ saumya sukṛtaṃ te mahāmate || 7.76.7 ||
gṛhāṇa ca varaṃ saumya yattvamicchasyarindama | svargabhāṅnahi śūdro 'yaṃ tvatkṛte raghunandana || 7.76.8 ||
devānāṃ bhāṣitaṃ śrutvā rāghavaḥ susamāhitaḥ | uvāca prāñjalirvākyaṃ sahasrākṣaṃ purandaram || 7.76.9 ||
yadi devāḥ prasannā me dvijaputraḥ sa jīvatu | diśantu varametaṃ me ipsitaṃ paramaṃ mama || 7.76.10 ||
mamāpacārādyāto 'sau brāhmaṇasyaikaputrakaḥ | aprāptakālaḥ kālena nīto vaivasvatakṣayam || 7.76.11 ||
taṃ jīvayatha bhadraṃ vo nānṛtaṃ kartumarhatha | dvijasya saṃśruto 'rtho me jīvayiṣyāmi te sutam || 7.76.12 ||
rāghavasya tu tadvākyaṃ śrutvā vibudhasattamāḥ | pratyucū rāghavaṃ prītā devāḥ prītisamanvitam || 7.76.13 ||
nirvṛto bhava kākutstha so 'sminnahani bālakaḥ | jīvitaṃ prāptavānbhūyaḥ sametaścāpi bandhubhiḥ || 7.76.14 ||
yasminmuhūrte kākutstha śūdro 'yaṃ vinipātitaḥ | tasminmuhūrte bālo 'sau jīvena samayujyata || 7.76.15 ||
svasti prāpnuhi bhadraṃ te sādhu yāma nararṣabha | agastyasyāśramapadaṃ draṣṭumicchāma rāghava || 7.76.16 ||
tasya dīkṣā samāptā hi brahmarṣeḥ sumahādyuteḥ | dvādaśaṃ hi gataṃ varṣaṃ jalaśayyāṃ samāsataḥ || 7.76.17 ||
kākutstha tadgamiṣyāmo muniṃ samabhinanditum | tvaṃ cāpyāgaccha bhadraṃ te draṣṭuṃ tamṛṣisattamam || 7.76.18 ||
sa tatheti pratijñāya devānāṃ raghunandanaḥ | āruroha vimānaṃ taṃ puṣpakaṃ hemabhūṣitam || 7.76.19 ||
tato devāḥ prayātāste vimānairbahuvistaraiḥ | rāmo 'pyanujagāmāśu kumbhayonestapovanam || 7.76.20 ||
dṛṣṭvā tu devānsamprāptānagastyastapasāṃ nidhiḥ | arcayāmāsa dharmātmā sarvāṃstānaviśeṣataḥ || 7.76.21 ||
pratigṛhya tataḥ pūjāṃ sampūjya ca mahāmunim | jagmuste tridaśā hṛṣṭā nākapṛṣṭhaṃ sahānugaiḥ || 7.76.22 ||
gateṣu teṣu kākutsthaḥ puṣpakādavaruhya ca | tato 'bhivādayāmāsa hyagastyamṛṣisattamam || 7.76.23 ||
so 'bhivādya mahātmānaṃ jvalantamiva tejasā | ātithyaṃ paramaṃ prāpya niṣasāda narādhipaḥ || 7.76.24 ||
tamuvāca mahātejāḥ kumbhayonirmahātapāḥ | svāgataṃ te naraśreṣṭha diṣṭyā prāpto 'si rāghava || 7.76.25 ||
tvaṃ me bahumato rāma guṇairbahubhiruttamaiḥ | atithiḥ pūjanīyaśca mama nityaṃ hṛdi sthitaḥ || 7.76.26 ||
surā hi kathayanti tvāmāgataṃ śūdraghātinam | brāhmaṇasya tu dharmeṇa tvayā jīvāpitaḥ sutaḥ || 7.76.27 ||
uṣyatāṃ ceha rajanī sakāśe mama rāghava | prabhāte puṣpakeṇa tvaṃ gantā 'si purameva hi || 7.76.28 ||
tvaṃ hi nārāyaṇaḥ śrīmāṃstvayi sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam | tvaṃ prabhuḥ sarvadevānāṃ puruṣastvaṃ sanātanaḥ || 7.76.29 ||
idaṃ cābharaṇaṃ saumya nirmitaṃ viśvakarmaṇā | divyaṃ divyena vapuṣā dīpyamānaṃ svatejasā | pratigṛhṇīṣva kākutstha matpriyaṃ kuru rāghava || 7.76.30 ||
dattasya hi punardāne sumahatphalamucyate | bharaṇe hi bhavān śaktaḥ sendrāṇāṃ marutāmapi || 7.76.31 ||
tvaṃ hi śaktastārayituṃ sendrānapi divaukasaḥ | tasmātpradāsye vidhivattatpratīccha narādhipa || 7.76.32 ||
divyamābharaṇaṃ citraṃ pradīptamiva bhāskaram || 7.76.33 ||
athovāca mahātmānamikṣvākūṇāṃ mahārathaḥ | rāmo matimatāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ kṣatradharmamanusmaran || 7.76.34 ||
pratigraho 'yaṃ bhagavanbrāhmaṇasyāvigarhitaḥ | gṛhṇīyāṃ kṣatriyo 'haṃ vai kathaṃ brāhmaṇapuṅgava || 7.76.35 ||
brāhmaṇena viśeṣeṇa dattaṃ tadvaktumarhasi | evamuktastu rāmeṇa pratyuvāca mahānṛṣiḥ || 7.76.36 ||
āsankṛtayuge rāma brahmabhūte purāyuge | apārthivāḥ prajāḥ sarvāḥ surāṇāṃ tu śatakratuḥ || 7.76.37 ||
tāḥ prajā devadeveśaṃ rājārthaṃ samupādravan | surāṇāṃ sthāpito rājā tvayā deva śatakratuḥ || 7.76.38 ||
prayaccha no hi lokeśa pārthivaṃ narapuṅgavam | yasmai pūjāṃ prayuñjānā dhūtapāpāścaremahi | na vasāmo vinā rājñā eṣa no niścayaḥ paraḥ || 7.76.39 ||
prajānāṃ vacanaṃ śrutvā niścayitvā 'rthamuttamam || 7.76.40 ||
tato brahmā suraśreṣṭho lokapālānsavāsavān | samāhūyābravītsarvāṃstejobhāgānprayacchata || 7.76.41 ||
tato dadurlokapālāḥ sarve bhāgānsvatejasaḥ | akṣupacca tato brahmā yato jātaḥ kṣupo nṛpaḥ || 7.76.42 ||
taṃ brahmā lokapālānāṃ sahāṃśaiḥ samayojayat | tato dadau nṛpaṃ tāsāṃ prajānāmīśvaraṃ kṣupam || 7.76.43 ||
tatraindreṇa ca bhāgena mahīmājñāpayannṛpaḥ | vāruṇena tu bhāgena vapuḥ puṣyati pārthivaḥ || 7.76.44 ||
kaubereṇa tu bhāgena vittamāsāṃ dadau tadā | yastu yāmyo 'bhavadbhāgastena śāsti sma sa prajāḥ || 7.76.45 ||
tatraindreṇa naraśreṣṭha bhāgena raghunandana | pratigṛhṇīṣva bhadraṃ te tāraṇārthaṃ mama prabho || 7.76.46 ||
tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā ṛṣeḥ paramadhārmikam | tadrāmaḥ pratijagrāha munerābharaṇaṃ varam || 7.76.47 ||
pratigṛhya tato rāmastadābharaṇamuttamam | āgamaṃ tasya dīptasya praṣṭumevopacakrame || 7.76.48 ||
atyadbhutamidaṃ divyaṃ vapuṣā yuktamuttamam | kathaṃ vā bhagavatā prāptaṃ kuto vā kena vā hṛtam || 7.76.49 ||
kutūhalitayā brahmanpṛcchāmi tvāṃ mahāyaśaḥ | āścaryāṇāṃ bahūnāṃ hi nidhiḥ paramako bhavān || 7.76.50 ||
evaṃ bruvati kākutsthe munirvākyamathābravīt | śṛṇu rāma yathāvṛttaṃ purā tretāyuge yuge || 7.76.51 ||
ramaṇīyapradeśe 'smin vane yaddṛṣṭavānaham | āścaryaṃ me mahābāho dānamāśritya kevalam || 7.76.52 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe ṣaṭsaptatitamaḥ sargaḥ || 76 ||
purā tretāyuge rāma babhūva bahuvistaram | samantādyojanaśataṃ vimṛgaṃ pakṣivarjitam || 7.77.1 ||
tasminnirmānuṣe 'raṇye kurvāṇastapa uttamam | ahamākramituṃ saumya tadaraṇyamupāgamam || 7.77.2 ||
tasya rūpamaraṇyasya nirdeṣṭuṃ na śaśāka ha | phalamūlaiḥ sukhāsvādairbahurūpaiśca pādapaiḥ || 7.77.3 ||
tasyāraṇyasya madhye tu saro yojanamāyatam | haṃsakāraṇḍavākīrṇaṃ cakravākopaśobhitam || 7.77.4 ||
padmotpalasamākīrṇaṃ samatikrāntaśaivalam | tadāścaryamivātyarthaṃ sukhāsvādamanuttamam || 7.77.5 ||
arajaskaṃ tathā 'kṣobhyaṃ śrīmatpakṣigaṇāyutam | samīpe tasya saraso mahadadbhutamāśramam || 7.77.6 ||
purāṇaṃ puṇyamatyarthaṃ tapasvijanavarjitam | tatrāhamavasaṃ rātriṃ naidāghīṃ puruṣarṣabha || 7.77.7 ||
prabhāte kālyamutthāya sarastadupacakrame | athāpaśyaṃ śavaṃ tatra supuṣṭamajaraṃ kvacit || 7.77.8 ||
paṅkibhedena puṣṭāṅgaṃ samāśritasarovaram | tiṣṭhantaṃ parayā lakṣmyā tasmiṃstoyāśaye nṛpa || 7.77.9 ||
tamarthaṃ cintayāno 'haṃ muhūrtaṃ tatra rāghava | uṣito 'smi sarastīre kinnvidaṃ syāditi prabho || 7.77.10 ||
athāpaśyaṃ muhūrtena divyamadbhutadarśanam | vimānaṃ paramodāraṃ haṃsayuktaṃ manojavam || 7.77.11 ||
atyarthaṃ svargiṇaṃ ta vimāne raghunandana | upāste 'psarasāṃ vīra sahasraṃ divyabhūṣaṇam || 7.77.12 ||
gāyanti divyageyāni vādayanti tathā 'parāḥ | kṣvelayanti tathā cānyā nṛtyanti ca tathā 'parāḥ || 7.77.13 ||
aparāścandraraśmyābhairhemadaṇḍaiśca cāmaraiḥ | dodhūyurvadanaṃ tasya puṇḍarīkanibhekṣaṇam || 7.77.14 ||
tataḥ siṃhāsanaṃ tyaktvā merukūṭamivāṃśumān | paśyato me tadā rāma vimānādavaruhya ca | taṃ śavaṃ bhakṣayāmāsa sa svargī raghunandana || 7.77.15 ||
tathā bhuktvā yathākāmaṃ māṃsaṃ bahu supīvaram | avatīrya saraḥ svargī saṃspraṣṭumupacakrame || 7.77.16 ||
upaspṛśya yathānyāyaṃ sa svargī raghupuṅgava | āroḍhumupacakrāma vimānavaramuttamam || 7.77.17 ||
tamahaṃ devasaṅkāśamārohantamudīkṣya vai | athāhamabruvaṃ vākyaṃ svargiṇaṃ puruṣarṣabha || 7.77.18 ||
ko bhavāndevasaṅkāśa āhāraśca vigarhitaḥ | tvayedaṃ bhujyate saumya kimarthaṃ vaktumarhasi || 7.77.19 ||
kasya syādīdṛśo bhāva āhāro devasammataḥ | āścaryaṃ vartate saumya śrotumicchāmi tattvataḥ || 7.77.20 ||
nāhamaupayikaṃ manye tava bhakṣyamidaṃ śavam || 7.77.21 ||
ityevamuktaḥ sa narendra nākī kautūhalātsūnṛtayā girā ca | śrutvā ca vākyaṃ mama sarvametatsarvaṃ tathā cākathayanmameti || 7.77.22 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe saptasaptatitamaḥ sargaḥ || 77 ||
śrutvā tu bhāṣitaṃ vākyaṃ mama rāma śubhākṣaram | prāñjaliḥ pratyuvācedaṃ sa svargī raghunandana || 7.78.1 ||
śṛṇu brahmanpurā vṛttaṃ mamaitatsukhaduḥkhayoḥ | anatikramaṇīyaṃ hi yathā pṛcchasi māṃ dvija || 7.78.2 ||
purā vaidarbhako rājā pitā mama mahāyaśāḥ | sudeva iti vikhyātastriṣu lokeṣu vīryavān || 7.78.3 ||
tasya putradvayaṃ brahmandvābhyāṃ strībhyāmajāyata | ahaṃ śveta iti khyāto yavīyānsuratho 'bhavat || 7.78.4 ||
tataḥ pitari svaryāte paurā māmabhyaṣecayan | tatrāhaṃ kṛtavānrājyaṃ dharmyaṃ ca susamāhitaḥ || 7.78.5 ||
evaṃ varṣasahasrāṇi samatītāni suvrata | rājyaṃ kārayato brahmanprajā dharmeṇa rakṣataḥ || 7.78.6 ||
so 'haṃ nimitte kasmiṃścidvijñātāyurdvijottama | kāladharmaṃ hṛdi nyasya tato vanamupāgamam || 7.78.7 ||
so 'haṃ vanamidaṃ durgaṃ mṛgapakṣivivarjitam | tapaścartuṃ praviṣṭo 'smi samīpe sarasaḥ śubhe || 7.78.8 ||
bhrātaraṃ surathaṃ rājye hyabhiṣicya mahīpatim | idaṃ saraḥ samāsādya tapastaptaṃ mayā ciram || 7.78.9 ||
so 'haṃ varṣasahasrāṇi tapastrīṇi mahāvane | taptvā suduṣkaraṃ prāpto brahmalokamanuttamam || 7.78.10 ||
tasya me svargabhūtasya kṣutpipāse dvijottama | bādhete paramodāra tato 'haṃ vyathitendriyaḥ | gatvā tribhuvanaśreṣṭhaṃ pitāmahamuvāca ha || 7.78.11 ||
bhagavanbrahmaloko 'yaṃ kṣutpipāsāvivarjitaḥ | kasyāyaṃ karmaṇaḥ pākaḥ kṣutpipāsānugo hyaham || 7.78.12 ||
āhāraḥ kaśca me deva tanme brūhi pitāmaha || 7.78.13 ||
pitāmahastu māmāha tavāhāraḥ sudevaja | svādūni svāni māṃsāni tāni bhakṣaya nityaśaḥ || 7.78.14 ||
svaśarīraṃ tvayā puṣṭaṃ kurvatā tapa uttamam | anuptaṃ rohate śveta na kadācinmahāmate || 7.78.15 ||
tṛptirna te 'sti sūkṣmā 'pi vane satvaniṣevite | purā tu bhikṣamāṇāya bhikṣā vai yataye nṛpa | na hi dattā tvayendrābha yasmādatithaye 'pi vai || 7.78.16 ||
dattaṃ na te 'sti sūkṣmo 'pi tapa eva niṣevase | tena svargagato vatsa bādhyase kṣutpipāsayā || 7.78.17 ||
sa tvaṃ supuṣṭamāhāraiḥ svaśarīramanuttamam | bhakṣayitvāmṛtarasaṃ tena tṛptirbhaviṣyati || 7.78.18 ||
yadā tu tadvanaṃ śveta agastyaḥ sumahānṛṣiḥ | āgamiṣyati durdharṣastadā kṛcchrādvimokṣyate || 7.78.19 ||
sa hi tārayituṃ saumya śaktaḥ suragaṇānapi | kiṃ punastvāṃ mahābāho kṣutpipāsāvaśaṃ gatam || 7.78.20 ||
so 'haṃ bhagavataḥ śrutvā devadevasya niścayam | āhāraṃ garhitaṃ svaśarīraṃ dvijottama || 7.78.21 ||
bahūnvarṣagaṇānbrahmanbhujyamānamidaṃ mayā | kṣayaṃ nābhyeti brahmarṣe tṛptiścāpi mamottamā || 7.78.22 ||
tasya me kṛcchrabhūtasya kṛcchrādasmādvimocaya | anyeṣāṃ na gatirhyatra kumbhayonimṛte dvijam || 7.78.23 ||
idamābharaṇaṃ saumya tāraṇārthaṃ dvijottama | pratigṛhṇīṣva bhadraṃ te prasādaṃ kartumarhasi || 7.78.24 ||
idaṃ tāvatsuvarṇaṃ ca dhanaṃ vastrāṇi ca dvija | bhakṣyaṃ bhojyaṃ ca brahmarṣe dadātyābharaṇāni ca || 7.78.25 ||
sarvānkāmānprayacchāmi bhogāṃśca munipuṅgava | tāraṇe bhagavanmahyaṃ prasādaṃ kartumarhasi || 7.78.26 ||
tasyāhaṃ svargiṇo vākyaṃ śrutvā duḥkhasamanvitam | tāraṇāyopajagrāha tadābharaṇamuttamam || 7.78.27 ||
mayā pratigṛhīte tu tasminnābharaṇe śubhe | mānuṣaḥ pūrvako deho rājarṣervinanāśa ha || 7.78.28 ||
pranaṣṭe tu śarīre 'sau rājarṣiḥ parayā mudā | tṛptaḥ pramudito rājā jagāma tridivaṃ sukham || 7.78.29 ||
tenedaṃ śakratulyena divyamābharaṇaṃ mama | tasminnimitte kākutstha dattamadbhutadarśanam || 7.78.30 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe 'ṣṭasaptatitamaḥ sargaḥ || 78 ||
tadadbhutatamaṃ vākyaṃ śrutvāgastyasya rāghavaḥ | gauravādvismayāccaiva punaḥ praṣṭuṃ pracakrame || 7.79.1 ||
bhagavaṃstadvanaṃ ghoraṃ tapastapyati yatra saḥ | śveto vaidarbhako rājā kathaṃ syādamṛgadvijam || 7.79.2 ||
tadvanaṃ sa katha rājā śūnyaṃ manujavarjitam | tapaścartuṃ praviṣṭaḥ sa śrotumicchāmi tattvataḥ || 7.79.3 ||
rāmasya vacanaṃ śrutvā kautūhalasamanvitam | vākyaṃ paramatejasvī vaktumevopacakrame || 7.79.4 ||
purā kṛtayuge rāma manurdaṇḍadharaḥ prabhuḥ | tasya putro mahānāsīdikṣvākuḥ kulanandanaḥ || 7.79.5 ||
taṃ putraṃ pūrvaṃkaṃ rājye nikṣipya bhuvi durjayam | pṛthivyāṃ rājavaṃśānāṃ bhava kartetyuvāca ha || 7.79.6 ||
tathaiveti pratijñātaṃ pituḥ putreṇa rāghava | tataḥ paramasantuṣṭo manuḥ putramuvāca ha || 7.79.7 ||
prīto 'smi paramodāra tvaṃ kartā 'si na saṃśayaḥ | daṇḍena ca prajā rakṣa mā ca daṇḍamakāraṇe || 7.79.8 ||
aparādhiṣu yo daṇḍaḥ pātyate mānaveṣu vai | sa daṇḍo vidhivanmuktaḥ svargaṃ nayati pārthivam || 7.79.9 ||
tasmāddaṇḍe mahābāho yatnavānbhava putraka | dharmo hi paramo loke kurvataste bhaviṣyati || 7.79.10 ||
iti taṃ bahu sandiśya manuḥ putraṃ samādhinā | jagāma tridivaṃ hṛṣṭo brahmalokaṃ sanātanam || 7.79.11 ||
prayāte tridivaṃ tasminnikṣvākuramitaprabhaḥ | janayiṣye kathaṃ putrāniti cintāparo 'bhavat || 7.79.12 ||
karmabhirbahurūpaiśca taistairmanusutassutān | janayāmāsa dharmātmā śataṃ devasutopamān || 7.79.13 ||
teṣāmavarajastāta sarveṣāṃ raghunandana | mūḍhaścākṛtavidyaśca na śuśrūṣati pūrvajān || 7.79.14 ||
nāma tasya ca daṇḍeti pitā cakre 'lpamedhasaḥ | avaśyaṃ daṇḍapatanaṃ śarīre 'sya bhaviṣyati || 7.79.15 ||
apaśyamānastaṃ deśaṃ ghoraṃ putrasya rāghava | vindhyaśaivalayormadhye rājyaṃ prādādarindama || 7.79.16 ||
sa daṇḍastatra rājābhūdramye parvatarodhasi | puraṃ cāpratimaṃ rāma nyaveśayadanuttamam || 7.79.17 ||
purasya cākaronnāma madhumantamiti prabho | purohitaṃ tūśanasaṃ varayāmāsa suvratam || 7.79.18 ||
evaṃ sa rājā tadrājyamakarotsapurohitaḥ | prahṛṣṭamanujākīrṇaṃ devarājaṃ yathā vṛṣā || 7.79.19 ||
tataḥ sa rājā manujendraputraḥ sārdhaṃ ca tenośanasā tadānīm | cakāra rājyaṃ sumahānmahātmā śakro divīvośanasā sametaḥ || 7.79.20 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe ekonaśītitamaḥ sargaḥ || 79 ||
etadākhyāya rāmāya maharṣiḥ kumbhasambhavaḥ | asyāmevāparaṃ vākyaṃ kathāyāmupacakrame || 7.80.1 ||
tataḥ sa daṇḍaḥ kākutstha bahuvarṣagaṇāyutam | akarottatra dāntātmā rājyaṃ nihatakaṇṭakam || 7.80.2 ||
atha kāle tu kasmiṃścidrājā bhārgavamāśramam | ramaṇīyamupākrāmaccaitre māsi manorame || 7.80.3 ||
tatra bhārgavakanyāṃ sa rūpeṇāpratimāṃ bhuvi | vicarantīṃ vanoddeśe daṇḍo 'paśyadanuttamām || 7.80.4 ||
sa dṛṣṭvā tāṃ sudurmedhā anaṅgaśarapīḍitaḥ | abhigamya susaṃvignāṃ kanyāṃ vacanamabravīt || 7.80.5 ||
kutastvamasi suśroṇi kasya vā 'si sutā śubhe | pīḍito 'hamanaṅgena gacchāmi tvāṃ śubhānane || 7.80.6 ||
tasya tvevaṃ bruvāṇasya mohonmattasya kāminaḥ | bhārgavī pratyuvācedaṃ vacaḥ sānunayaṃ nṛpam || 7.80.7 ||
bhārgavasya sutāṃ viddhi devasyākliṣṭakarmaṇaḥ | arajāṃ nāma rājendra jyeṣṭhāmāśramavāsinīm || 7.80.8 ||
mā māṃ spṛśa balādrājankanyā pitṛvaśā hyaham | guruḥ pitā me rājendra tvaṃ ca śiṣyo mahātmanaḥ | vyasanaṃ sumahatkruddhaḥ sa te dadyānmahātapāḥ || 7.80.9 ||
yadi vānyanmayā kāryaṃ dharmadṛṣṭena satpathā | varayasva naraśreṣṭha pitaraṃ me mahādyutim || 7.80.10 ||
anyathā tu phalaṃ tubhyaṃ bhavedghorābhisaṃhitam | krodhena hi pitā me 'sau trailokyamapi nirdahet || 7.80.11 ||
dāsyate cānavadyāṅga tava mā yācitaḥ pitā || 7.80.12 ||
evaṃ bruvāṇāmarajāṃ daṇḍaḥ kāmavaśaṃ gataḥ | pratyuvāca madonmattaḥ śirasyādhāya cāñjalim || 7.80.13 ||
prasādaṃ kuru suśroṇi na kālaṃ kṣeptumarhasi | tvatkṛte hi mama prāṇā vidīryante varānane || 7.80.14 ||
tvāṃ prāpya me vadho vā syācchāpo vā yadi dāruṇaḥ | bhaktaṃ bhajasva māṃ bhīru bhajamānaṃ suvihvalam || 7.80.15 ||
evamuktvā tu tāṃ kanyāṃ dorbhyāṃ gṛhya balādbalī | visphurantīṃ yathākāmaṃ maithunāyopacakrame || 7.80.16 ||
etamarthaṃ mahāghoraṃ daṇḍaḥ kṛtvā sudāruṇam | nagaraṃ prayayāvāśu madhumantamanuttamam || 7.80.17 ||
arajā 'pi rudantī sā āśramasyāvidūrataḥ | pratīkṣanti susaṃtrastā pitaraṃ devasannibham || 7.80.18 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe 'śītitamaḥ sargaḥ || 80 ||
sa muhūrtādupaśrutya devarṣiramitaprabhaḥ | svamāśramaṃ śiṣyavṛtaḥ kṣudhārtaḥ sannyavartata || 7.81.1 ||
so 'paśyadarajāṃ dīnāṃ rajasā samabhiplutām | jyotsnāmiva grahagrastāṃ pratyūṣe na virājatīm || 7.81.2 ||
tasya roṣaḥ samabhavatkṣudhārtasya viśeṣataḥ | nirdahanniva lokāṃstrīñchiṣyāṃścaitaduvāca ha || 7.81.3 ||
paśyadhvaṃ viparītasya daṇḍasyāvijitātmanaḥ | vipattiṃ ghorasaṅkāśāṃ kruddhāmagniśikhāmiva || 7.81.4 ||
kṣayo 'sya durmateḥ prāptaḥ sānugasya durātmanaḥ | yaḥ pradīptāṃ hutāśasya śikhāṃ vai spraṣṭumicchati || 7.81.5 ||
yasmātsa kṛtavānpāpamīdṛśaṃ ghorasaṃhitam | tasmātprāpsyati durmedhāḥ phalaṃ pāpasya karmaṇaḥ || 7.81.6 ||
saptarātreṇa rājāsau sabhṛtyabalavāhanaḥ | pāpakarmasamācāro vadhaṃ prāpsyati durmatiḥ || 7.81.7 ||
samantādyojanaśataṃ viṣayaṃ cāsya durmateḥ | dhakṣyate pāṃsuvarṣeṇa mahatā pākaśāsanaḥ || 7.81.8 ||
sarvasatvāni yānīha sthāvarāṇi carāṇi ca | mahatā pāṃsuvarṣeṇa vilayaṃ sarvato 'gaman || 7.81.9 ||
daṇḍasya viṣayo yāvattāvatsarvasamucchrayam | pāṃsuvarṣamivālakṣyaṃ saptarātraṃ bhaviṣyati || 7.81.10 ||
ityuktvā krodhatāmrākṣastadāśramanivāsinam | janaṃ janapadānteṣu sthīyatāmiti cābravīt || 7.81.11 ||
śrutvā tūśanaso vākyaṃ so ' 'śramāvasatho janaḥ | niṣkrānto viṣayāttasmātsthānaṃ cakre 'tha bāhyataḥ || 7.81.12 ||
sa tathoktvā munijanamarajāmidamabravīt | ihaiva vasa durmedhe āśrame susamāhitā || 7.81.13 ||
idaṃ yojanaparyantaṃ saraḥ suruciraprabham | araje vijvarā bhuṅkṣva kālaścātra pratīkṣyatām || 7.81.14 ||
tvatsamīpe ca ye sattvā vāsameṣyanti tāṃ niśām | avadhyāḥ pāṃsuvarṣeṇa te bhaviṣyanti nityadā || 7.81.15 ||
śrutvā niyogaṃ brahmarṣeḥ sā 'rajā bhārgavī tadā | tatheti pitaraṃ prāha bhārgavaṃ bhṛśaduḥkhitā | ityuktvā bhārgavo vāsamanyatra samakārayat || 7.81.16 ||
tacca rājyaṃ narendrasya sabhṛtyabalavāhanam | saptāhādbhasmasādbhūtaṃ yathoktaṃ brahmavādinā || 7.81.17 ||
tasyāsau daṇḍaviṣayo vindhyaśaivalayornṛpa | śapto brahmarṣiṇā tena vaidharmye sahite kṛte || 7.81.18 ||
tataḥ prabhṛti kākutstha daṇḍakāraṇyamucyate | tapasvinaḥ sthitā hyatra janasthānamato 'bhavat || 7.81.19 ||
etatte sarvamākhyātaṃ yanmāṃ pṛcchasi rāghava | sandhyāmupāsituṃ vīra samayo hyativartate || 7.81.20 ||
ete maharṣayaḥ sarve pūrṇakumbhāḥ samantataḥ | kṛtodakā naravyāghra ādityaṃ paryupāsate || 7.81.21 ||
sa tairbrāhmaṇamabhyastaṃ sahitairbrahmavittamaiḥ | ravirastaṃ gato rāma gacchodakamupaspṛśa || 7.81.22 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe ekāśītitamaḥ sargaḥ || 81 ||
ṛṣervacanamājñāya rāmaḥ sandhyāmupāsitum | upākramatsaraḥ puṇyamapsarogaṇasevitam || 7.82.1 ||
tatrodakamupaspṛśya sandhyāmanvāsya paścimām | āśramaṃ prāviśadrāmaḥ kumbhayonermahātmanaḥ || 7.82.2 ||
tasyāgastyo bahuguṇaṃ kandamūlaṃ tathauṣadhim | śālyādīni pavitrāṇi bhojanārthamakalpayat || 7.82.3 ||
sa bhuktavānnaraśreṣṭhastadannamamṛtopamam | prītaśca parituṣṭaśca tāṃ rātriṃ samupāviśat || 7.82.4 ||
prabhāte kālyamutthāya kṛtvā ' 'hnikamarindamaḥ | ṛṣiṃ samupacakrāma gamanāya raghūttamaḥ || 7.82.5 ||
abhivādyābravīdrāmo maharṣiṃ kumbhasambhavam | āpṛcche svāṃ purīṃ gantuṃ māmanujñātumarhasi || 7.82.6 ||
dhanyo 'smyanugṛhīto 'smi darśanena mahātmanaḥ | draṣṭuṃ caivāgamiṣyāmi pāvanārthamihātmanaḥ || 7.82.7 ||
tathā vadati kākutsthe vākyamadbhutadarśanam | uvāca paramaprīto dharmanetrastapodhanaḥ || 7.82.8 ||
atyadbhutamidaṃ vākyaṃ tava rāma śubhākṣaram | pāvanaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ tvameva raghunandana || 7.82.9 ||
muhūrtamapi rāma tvāṃ ye ca paśyanti kecana | pāvitāḥ svargabhūtāśca pūjyāste sarvadaivataiḥ || 7.82.10 ||
ye ca tvāṃ ghoracakṣurbhiḥ paśyanti prāṇino bhuvi | hatāste yamadaṇḍena sadyo nirayagāminaḥ || 7.82.11 ||
īdṛśastvaṃ raghuśreṣṭha pāvanaḥ sarvadehinām | bhuvi tvāṃ kathayanto 'pi siddhimeṣyanti rāghava || 7.82.12 ||
gaccha cāriṣṭamavyāgraḥ panthānamakutobhayam | praśādhi rājyaṃ dharmeṇa gatirhi jagato bhavān || 7.82.13 ||
evamuktastu muninā prāñjaliḥ pragraho nṛpaḥ | abhyavādayata prājñastamṛṣiṃ puṇyaśālinam || 7.82.14 ||
abhivādya muniśreṣṭhaṃ tāṃśca sarvāṃstapodhanān | adhyārohattadavyagraḥ puṣpakaṃ hemabhūṣitam || 7.82.15 ||
taṃ prayāntaṃ munigaṇā hyāśīrvādaiḥ samantataḥ | apūjayanmahendrābhaṃ sahasrākṣamivāmarāḥ || 7.82.16 ||
svasthaḥ sa dadṛśe rāmaḥ puṣpake hemabhūṣite | śaśī meghasamīpastho yathā jaladharāgame || 7.82.17 ||
tato 'rdhadivase prāpte pūjyamānastatastataḥ | ayodhyāṃ prāpya kākutstho madhyakakṣyāmavāruhat || 7.82.18 ||
tato visṛjya ruciraṃ puṣpakaṃ kāmagāmi tat | visarjayitvā gaccheti svasti te 'stviti ca prabhuḥ || 7.82.19 ||
kakṣāntaravinikṣiptaṃ dvāssthaṃ rāmo 'bravīdvacaḥ | lakṣmaṇaṃ bharataṃ caiva gatvā tau laghuvikramau || mamāgamanamākhyāya śabdāpayata mā ciram || 7.82.20 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe vdyaśītitamaḥ sargaḥ || 82 ||
tacchrutvā bhāṣitaṃ tasya rāmasyākliṣṭa karmaṇaḥ | dvāssthaḥ kumārāvāhūya rāghavāya nyavedayat || 7.83.1 ||
dṛṣṭvā tu rāghavaḥ prāptau priyau bharatalakṣmaṇau | pariṣvajya tadā rāmo vākyametaduvāca ha || 7.83.2 ||
kṛtaṃ mayā yathā tathyaṃ dvijakāryamanuttamam | dharmasetumatho bhūyaḥ kartumicchāmi rāghavau || 7.83.3 ||
akṣayyaścāvyayaścaiva dharmaseturmato mama | dharmaprasādhakaṃ hyetat sarvapāpapraṇāśanam || 7.83.4 ||
yuvābhyāmātmabhūtābhyāṃ rājasūyamanuttamam | sahito yaṣṭumicchāmi tatra dharmo hi śāśvataḥ || 7.83.5 ||
iṣṭvā tu rājasūyena mitraḥ śatrunibarhaṇaḥ | suhutena suyajñena varuṇatvamupāgamat || 7.83.6 ||
somaśca rājasūyena iṣṭvā dharmeṇa dharmavit | prāptaśca sarvalokeṣu kīrtisthānaṃ ca śāśvatam || 7.83.7 ||
asminnahani yacchreyaścintyatāṃ tanmayā saha | hitaṃ cāyatiyuktaṃ ca prayatau kartumarhathaḥ || 7.83.8 ||
śrutvā tu rāghavasyaitadvākyaṃ vākyaviśāradaḥ | bharataḥ prāñjalirbhūtvā vākyametaduvāca ha || 7.83.9 ||
tvayi dharmaḥ paraḥ sādho tvayi sarvā vasundharā | pratiṣṭhitā mahābāho yaśaścāmitavikrama || 7.83.10 ||
mahīpālāśca sarve tvāṃ prajāpatimivāmarāḥ | nirīkṣante mahātmānaṃ lokānāthaṃ yathā vayam || 7.83.11 ||
putrāśca pitṛvadrājanpaśyanti tvāṃ mahābala | pṛthivyā gatibhūto 'si prāṇināmapi rāghava || 7.83.12 ||
sa tvamevaṃvidhaṃ yajñamāhartāsi kathaṃ nṛpa | pṛthivyāṃ rājavaṃśānāṃ vināśo yatra dṛśyate || 7.83.13 ||
pṛthivyāṃ ye ca puruṣā rājanpauruṣamāgatāḥ | sarveṣāṃ bhavitā tatra saṅkṣayaḥ sarvakopajaḥ || 7.83.14 ||
sa tvaṃ puruṣaśārdūla guṇairatulavikrama | pṛthivīṃ nārhase hantuṃ vaśe hi tava vartate || 7.83.15 ||
bharatasya tu tadvākyaṃ śrutvā 'mṛtamayaṃ tadā | praharṣamatulaṃ lebhe rāmaḥ satyaparākramaḥ || 7.83.16 ||
uvāca ca śubhaṃ vākyaṃ kaikeyyānandavardhanam | prīto 'smi parituṣṭo 'smi tavādya vacane 'nagha || 7.83.17 ||
idaṃ vacanamaklībaṃ tvayā dharmasamāhitam | vyāhṛtaṃ puruṣavyāghra pṛthivyāḥ paripālanam || 7.83.18 ||
eṣyadasmadabhiprāyādrājasūyātkratūttamāt | nivartayāmi dharmajña tava suvyāhṛtena ca || 7.83.19 ||
lokapīḍākaraṃ karma na kartavyaṃ vicakṣaṇaiḥ | bālānāṃ tu śubhaṃ vākyaṃ grāhya lakṣmaṇapūrvaja | tasmācchṛṇomi te vākyaṃ sādhu yuktaṃ mahāmate || 7.83.20 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe tryaśītitamaḥ sargaḥ || 83 ||
tathoktavati rāme tu bharate ca mahātmani | lakṣmaṇo 'tha śubhaṃ vākyamuvāca raghunandanam || 7.84.1 ||
aśvamedho mahāyajñaḥ pāvanaḥ sarvapāpmanām | pāvanastava durdharṣo rocatāṃ raghunandana || 7.84.2 ||
śrūyate hi purāvṛttaṃ vāsave sumahātmani | brahmahatyāvṛtaḥ śakro hayamedhena pāvitaḥ || 7.84.3 ||
purā kila mahābāho devāsurasamāgame | vṛtro nāma mahānāsīddaiteyo lokasammataḥ || 7.84.4 ||
vistīrṇo yojanaśatamucchritastriguṇaṃ tataḥ | anurāgeṇa lokāṃstrīnsnehātpaśyati sarvataḥ || 7.84.5 ||
dharmajñaśca kṛtajñaśca buddhyā ca pariniṣṭhitaḥ | śaśāsa pṛthivīṃ sphītāṃ dharmeṇa susamāhitaḥ || 7.84.6 ||
tasminpraśāsati tadā sarvakāmadughā mahī | rasavanti prabhūnāni mūlāni ca phalāni ca || 7.84.7 ||
akṛṣṭapacyā pṛthivī susampannā mahātmanaḥ | sa rājyaṃ tādṛśaṃ bhuṅkte sphītamadbhutadarśanam || 7.84.8 ||
tasya buddhiḥ samuptannā tapaḥ kuryāmanuttamam | tapo hi paramaṃ śreyaḥ sammohamitaratsukham || 7.84.9 ||
sa nikṣipya sutaṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ paureṣu madhureśvaram | tapa ugraṃ samātiṣṭhattāpayansarvadevatāḥ || 7.84.10 ||
tapastapyati vṛtre tu vāsavaḥ paramārtavat | viṣṇuṃ samupasaṅkramya vākyametaduvāca ha || 7.84.11 ||
tapasyatā mahābāho lokāḥ vṛtreṇa nirjitāḥ | balavānsa hi dharmātmā nainaṃ śakṣyāmi śāsitum || 7.84.12 ||
yadyasau tapa ātiṣṭhedbhūya evāsureśvara | yāvallokā dhariṣyanti tāvadasya vaśānugāḥ || 7.84.13 ||
taṃ cainaṃ paramodāramupekṣasi mahābalam | kṣaṇaṃ hi na bhavedvṛtraḥ kruddhe tvayi sureśvara || 7.84.14 ||
yadā hi prītisaṃyogaṃ tvayā viṣṇo samāgataḥ | tadāprabhṛti lokānāṃ nāthatvamupalabdhavān || 7.84.15 ||
sa tvaṃ prasādaṃ lokānāṃ kuruṣva susamāhitaḥ | tvatkṛtena hi sarvaṃ syāpraśāntamarujaṃ jagat || 7.84.16 ||
ime hi sarve viṣṇo tvāṃ nirīkṣante divaukasaḥ | vṛtraghātena mahatā teṣāṃ sāhyaṃ kuruṣva ha || 7.84.17 ||
tvayā hi nityaśaḥ sāhyaṃ kṛtameṣāṃ mahātmanām | asahyamidamanyeṣāmagatīnāṃ gatirbhavān || 7.84.18 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe caturaśītitamaḥ sargaḥ || 84 ||
lakṣmaṇasya tu tadvākyaṃ śrutvā śatrunibarhaṇaḥ | vṛtraghātamaśeṣeṇa kathayetyāha suvrata || 7.85.1 ||
rāghaveṇaivamuktastu sumitrānandavardhanaḥ | bhūya eva kathāṃ divyāṃ kathayāmāsa suvrataḥ || 7.85.2 ||
sahasrākṣavacaḥ śrutvā sarveṣāṃ ca divaukasām | viṣṇurdevānuvācedaṃ sarvānindrapurogamān || 7.85.3 ||
pūrvaṃ sauhṛdabaddho 'smi vṛtrasya ha mahātmanaḥ | tena yuṣmatpriyārthaṃ hi nāhaṃ hanmi mahāsuram || 7.85.4 ||
avaśyaṃ karaṇīyaṃ ca bhavatāṃ sukhamuttamam | tasmādupāyamākhyāsye yena vṛtro nihanyate || 7.85.5 ||
tridhābhūtaṃ kariṣyāmi hyātmānaṃ surasattamāḥ | tena vṛtraṃ sahasrākṣo vadhiṣyati na saṃśayaḥ || 7.85.6 ||
ekāṃśo vāsavaṃ yātu dvitīyo vajrameva tu | tṛtīyo bhūtalaṃ śakrastadā vṛtraṃ vadhiṣyati || 7.85.7 ||
tathā bruvati deveśe devā vākyamathābruvan | evametanna sandeho yathā vadasi daityahan || 7.85.8 ||
bhadraṃ te 'stu gamiṣyāmo vṛtrāsuravadhaiṣiṇaḥ | bhajasva paramodāra vāsavaṃ svena tejasā || 7.85.9 ||
tataḥ sarve mahātmānaḥ sahasrākṣapurogamāḥ | tadāraṇyamupākrāmanyatra vṛtro mahāsuraḥ || 7.85.10 ||
te paśyaṃstejasā bhūtaṃ tapyantamasurottamam | pibantamiva lokāṃstrīnnirdahantamivāmbaram || 7.85.11 ||
dṛṣṭvaiva cāsuraśreṣṭhaṃ devāstrāsamupāgaman | kathamenaṃ vadhiṣyāmaḥ kathaṃ na syātparājayaḥ || 7.85.12 ||
teṣāṃ cintayatāṃ tatra sahasrākṣaḥ purandaraḥ | vajraṃ pragṛhya pāṇibhyāṃ prāhiṇodvṛtramūrdhani || 7.85.13 ||
kālāgnineva ghoreṇa taptenaiva mahārciṣā | patatā vṛtraśirasā jagatऺtrāsamupāgamat || 7.85.14 ||
asambhāvyaṃ vadhaṃ tasya vṛtrasya vibudhādhipaḥ | cintayāno jagāmāśu lokasyāntaṃ mahāyaśāḥ || 7.85.15 ||
tamindraṃ brahmahatyā ' 'śu gacchantamanugacchati | apataccāsya gātreṣu tamindraṃ duḥkhamāviśat || 7.85.16 ||
hatārayaḥ pranaṣṭendrā devāḥ sāgnipurogamāḥ | viṣṇuṃ tribhuvaneśānaṃ muhurmuhurapūjayan || 7.85.17 ||
tvaṃ gatiḥ parameśāna pūrvajo jagataḥ pitā | rakṣārthaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ viṣṇutvamupajagmivān || 7.85.18 ||
hataścāyaṃ tvayā vṛtro brahmahatyā ca vāsavam | bādhate suraśārdūla mokṣaṃ tasyā vinirdiśa || 7.85.19 ||
teṣāṃ tadvacanaṃ śrutvā devānāṃ viṣṇurabravīt | māmeva yajatāṃ śakraḥ pāvayiṣyāmi vajriṇam || 7.85.20 ||
puṇyena hayamedhena māmiṣṭvā pākaśāsanaḥ | punareṣyati devānāmindratvamakutobhayam || 7.85.21 ||
evaṃ sandiśya tāṃ vāṇīṃ devānāmamṛtopamām | jagāma viṣṇurdeveśaḥ stūyamānastriviṣṭapam || 7.85.22 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe pañcāśītitamaḥ sargaḥ || 85 ||
tadā vṛtravadhaṃ sarvamakhilena sa lakṣmaṇaḥ | kathayitvā naraśreṣṭhaḥ kathāśeṣaṃ pracakrame || 7.86.1 ||
tato hate mahāvīrye vṛtre devabhayaṅkare | brahmahatyāvṛtaḥ śakraḥ sañjñāṃ lebhe na vṛtrahā || 7.86.2 ||
so 'ntamāśritya lokānāṃ naṣṭasañjño vicetanaḥ | kālaṃ tatrāvasatkañcidveṣṭamāna ivoragaḥ || 7.86.3 ||
atha naṣṭe sahasrākṣe udvignamabhavajjagat | bhūmiśca dhvastasaṅkāśā niḥsnehā śuṣkakānanā || 7.86.4 ||
niḥsrotasaśca te sarve tu hradāśca saritastathā | saṅkṣobhaścaiva sattvānāmanāvṛṣṭikṛto 'bhavat || 7.86.5 ||
kṣīyamāṇe tu loke 'sminsambhrāntamanasaḥ surāḥ | yaduktaṃ viṣṇunā pūrvaṃ taṃ yajñaṃ samupānayan || 7.86.6 ||
tataḥ sarve suragaṇāḥ sopādhyāyāḥ saharṣibhiḥ | taṃ deśaṃ samupājagmuryatrendro bhayamohitaḥ || 7.86.7 ||
te tu dṛṣṭvā sahasrākṣamāvṛtaṃ brahmahatyayā | taṃ puraskṛtya deveśamaśvamedhamupākraman || 7.86.8 ||
tato 'śvamedhaḥ sumahānmahendrasya mahātmanaḥ | vavṛdhe brahmahatyayāḥ pāvanārthaṃ nareśvara || 7.86.9 ||
tato yajñe samāpte tu brahmahatyā mahātmanaḥ | abhigamyābravīdvākyaṃ kva me sthānaṃ vidhāsyatha || 7.86.10 ||
te tāmūcustadā devāstuṣṭāḥ prītisamanvitāḥ | caturdhā vibhajātmānamātmanaiva durāsade || 7.86.11 ||
devānāṃ bhāṣitaṃ śrutvā brahmahatyā mahātmanām | sannidhau sthānamanyatra varayāmāsa durvasā || 7.86.12 ||
ekenāṃśena vatsyāmi pūrṇodāsu nadīṣu vai | caturo vārṣikānmāsāndarpaghnī kāmavāriṇī || 7.86.13 ||
bhūmyāmahaṃ sarvakālamekenāṃśena sarvadā | vasiṣyāmi na sandehaḥ satyenaitadbravīmi vaḥ || 7.86.14 ||
yo 'yamaṃśastṛtīyo me strīṣu yauvanaśāliṣu | trirātraṃ darpapūrṇāsu vaśiṣye darpaghātinī || 7.86.15 ||
hantāro brāhmaṇānye tu mṛṣāpūrvamadūṣakān | tāṃścaturthena bhāgena saṃśrayiṣye surarṣabhāḥ || 7.86.16 ||
pratyūcustāṃ tato devā yathā vadasi durvase | tathā bhavatu tatsarvaṃ sādhayasva yadīpsitam || 7.86.17 ||
tataḥ prītyā 'nvitā devāḥ sahasrākṣaṃ vavandire | vijvaraḥ sa ca pūtātmā vāsavaḥ samapadyata || 7.86.18 ||
praśāntaṃ ca jagatsarvaṃ sahasrākṣe pratiṣṭhite | yajñaṃ cādbhutasaṅkāśaṃ tadā śakro 'bhyapūjayat || 7.86.19 ||
īdṛśo hyaśvamedhasya prasādo raghunandana | yajasva sumahābhāga hayamedhena pārthiva || 7.86.20 ||
iti lakṣmaṇavākyamuttamaṃ nṛpatiratīva manoharaṃ mahātmā | paritoṣamavāpa hṛṣṭacetā niśamayyendrasamānavikramaujāḥ || 7.86.21 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe ṣaḍaśītitamaḥ sargaḥ || 86 ||
tacchrutvā lakṣmaṇenoktaṃ vākyaṃ vākyaviśāradaḥ | pratyuvāca mahātejāḥ prahasanrāghavo vacaḥ || 7.87.1 ||
evameva naraśreṣṭha yathā vadasi lakṣmaṇa | vṛtraghātamaśeṣeṇa vājimedhaphalaṃ ca yat || 7.87.2 ||
śrūyate hi purā saumya kardamasya prajāpateḥ | putro bāhlīśvaraḥ śrīmānilo nāma mahāśayāḥ || 7.87.3 ||
sa rājā pṛthivīṃ sarvāṃ vaśe kṛtvā sudhārmikaḥ | rājyaṃ caiva naravyāghra putravatparyapālayat || 7.87.4 ||
suraiśca paramodārairdaiteyaiśca mahādhanaiḥ | nāgarākṣasagandharvairyakṣaiśca sumahātmabhiḥ || 7.87.5 ||
pūjyate nityaśaḥ saumya bhayārtai raghunandana | abibhyaṃśca trayo lokāḥ saroṣasya mahātmanaḥ || 7.87.6 ||
sa rājā tādṛśo hyāsīddharme vīrye ca niṣṭhitaḥ | buddhyā ca paramodāro bāhlīkeśo mahāyaśāḥ || 7.87.7 ||
sa pracakre mahābāhurmṛgayāṃ rucire vane | caitre manorame māsi sabhṛtyabalavāhanaḥ || 7.87.8 ||
prajaghne ca nṛpo 'raṇye mṛgāñchatasahasraśaḥ | hatvaiva tṛptirnābhūcca rājñastasya mahātmanaḥ || 7.87.9 ||
nānāmṛgāṇāmayutaṃ vadhyamānaṃ mahātmanā | yatra jāto māhāsenastaṃ deśamupacakrame || 7.87.10 ||
tasminpradeśe deveśa śailarājasutāṃ haraḥ | ramayāmāsa durdharṣaḥ sarvairanucaraiḥ saha || 7.87.11 ||
kṛtvā strīrūpamātmānamumeśo gopatidhvajaḥ | devyāḥ priyacikīrṣuḥ saṃstasminparvatanirjhare || 7.87.12 ||
ye tu tatra vanoddeśe sattvāḥ puruṣavādinaḥ | vṛkṣāḥ puruṣanāmānaste 'bhavan strījanāstadā || 7.87.13 ||
yacca kiñcana tatsarvaṃ nārīsañjñaṃ babhūva ha | etasminnantare rājā sa ilaḥ kardamātmajaḥ | nighnanmṛgasahasrāṇi taṃ deśamupacakrame || 7.87.14 ||
sa dṛṣṭvā strīkṛtaṃ sarvaṃ savyālamṛgapakṣakam | ātmanaṃ strīkṛtaṃ caiva sānugaṃ raghunandana || 7.87.15 ||
tasya duḥkhaṃ mahaccāsīddṛṣṭvā ' 'tmānaṃ tathāgatam | umāpateśca tatkarma jñātvā trāsamupāgamat || 7.87.16 ||
tato devaṃ mahātmānaṃ śitikaṇṭhaṃ kapardinam | jagāma śaraṇaṃ rājā sabhṛtyabalavāhanaḥ || 7.87.17 ||
tataḥ prahasya varadaḥ saha devyā maheśvaraḥ | prajāpatisutaṃ vākyamuvāca varadaḥ svayam || 7.87.18 ||
uttiṣṭhottiṣṭha rājarṣe kārdameya mahābala | puruṣatvamṛte saumya varaṃ varaya suvrata || 7.87.19 ||
tataḥ sa rājā duḥkhārtaḥ pratyākhyāto mahātmanā | na ca jagrāha strībhūto varamanyaṃ surottamāt || 7.87.20 ||
tataḥ śokena mahatā śailarājasutāṃ nṛpaḥ | praṇipatya hyumāṃ devīṃ sarveṇaivāntarātmanā || 7.87.21 ||
īśe varāṇāṃ varade lokānāmasi bhāminī | amoghadarśane devī bhaja saumyena cakṣuṣā || 7.87.22 ||
hṛdgataṃ tasya rājarṣervijñāya harasannidhau | pratyuvāca śubhaṃ vākyaṃ devī rudrasya saṃmatā || 7.87.23 ||
ardhasya devo varado varārdhasya tava hyaham | tasmādardhaṃ gṛhāṇa tvaṃ strīpuṃsoryāvadicchasi || 7.87.24 ||
tadadbhutataraṃ śrutvā devyā varamanuttamam | samprahṛṣṭamanā bhūtvā rājā vākyamathābravīt || 7.87.25 ||
yadi devi prasannā me rūpeṇāpratimā bhuvi | māsaṃ strītvamupāsitvā māsaṃ syāṃ puruṣaḥ punaḥ || 7.87.26 ||
īpsitaṃ tasya vijñāya devī surucirānanā | pratyuvāca śubhaṃ vākyamevameva bhaviṣyati || 7.87.27 ||
rājanpuruṣabhūtastvaṃ strībhāvaṃ na smariṣyasi | strībhūtaśca paraṃ māsaṃ na smariṣyasi pauruṣam || 7.87.28 ||
evaṃ sa rājā puruṣo māsaṃ bhūtvātha kārdamiḥ | trailokyasundarī nārī māsamekamilā 'bhavat || 7.87.29 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe saptāśītitamaḥ sargaḥ || 87 ||
tāṃ kathāmilasambaddhāṃ rāmeṇa samudīritām | lakṣmaṇo bharataścaiva śrutvā paramavismitau || 7.88.1 ||
tau rāmaṃ prāñjalī bhūtvā tasya rājño mahātmanaḥ | vistaraṃ tasya bhāvasya tadā papracchatuḥ punaḥ || 7.88.2 ||
kathaṃ sa rājā strībhūto vartayāmāsa durgatiḥ | puruṣaḥ sa yadā bhūtaḥ kāṃ vṛttiṃ vartayatyasau || 7.88.3 ||
tayostadbhāṣitaṃ śrutvā kautūhalasamanvitam | kathayāmāsa kākutsthastasya rājño yathāgatam || 7.88.4 ||
tameva prathamaṃ māsaṃ strībhūtā lokasundarī | tābhiḥ parivṛtā strībhirye ca pūrvapadānugāḥ || 7.88.5 ||
tatkānanaṃ vigāhvāśu vijahre lokasundarī | drumagulmalatākīrṇaṃ padbhyāṃ padmadalekṣaṇā || 7.88.6 ||
vāhanāni ca sarvāṇi sā tyaktvā vai samantataḥ | parvatābhogavivare tasminreme ilā tadā || 7.88.7 ||
atha tasminvanoddeśe parvatasyāvidūrataḥ | saraḥ suruciraprakhyaṃ nānāpakṣigaṇairyutam || 7.88.8 ||
dadarśa sā tvilā tasminbudhaṃ somasutaṃ tadā | jvalantaṃ svena vapuṣā pūrṇasomamivoditam || 7.88.9 ||
tapantaṃ ca tapastīvramambhomadhye durāsadam | yaśaskaraṃ kāmakaraṃ kāruṇye paryavasthitam || 7.88.10 ||
sā taṃ jalāśayaṃ sarvaṃ kṣobhayāmāsa vismitā | sahagaiḥ pūrvapuruṣaiḥ strībhūtai raghunandana || 7.88.11 ||
budhastu tāṃ samīkṣyaiva kāmabāṇavaśaṃ gataḥ | nopalebhe tadā ' 'tmānaṃ sañcacāla tadā ' 'mbhasi || 7.88.12 ||
ilāṃ nirīkṣamāṇastu trailokyābhyadhikāṃ śubhām | cintāṃ samabhyatikrāmat kā nviyaṃ devatādhikā || 7.88.13 ||
na devīṣu na nāgīṣu nāsurīṣvapsaraḥsu ca | dṛṣṭapūrvā mayā kācidrūpeṇānena śobhitā || 7.88.14 ||
sadṛśīyaṃ mama bhavedyadi nānyaparigrahaḥ | iti buddhiṃ samāsthāya jalātkūlamupāgamat || 7.88.15 ||
āśramaṃ samupāgamya tatastāḥ pramadottamāḥ | śabdāpayata dharmātmā tāścainaṃ ca vavandire || 7.88.16 ||
sa tāḥ papraccha dharmātmā kasyaiṣā lokasundarī | kimarthamāgatā caiva sarvamākhyāta mā ciram || 7.88.17 ||
śubhaṃ tu tasya tadvākyaṃ madhuraṃ madhurākṣaram | śrutvā striyaśca tāḥ sarvā ūcurmadhurayā girā || 7.88.18 ||
asmākameṣā suśroṇī prabhutve vartate sadā | apatiḥ kānanānteṣu sahāsmābhiścaratyasau || 7.88.19 ||
tadvākyamavyaktapadaṃ tāsāṃ strīṇāṃ niśamya ca | vidyāmāvartanīṃ puṇyāmāvartayata sa dvijaḥ || 7.88.20 ||
so 'rthaṃ viditvā sakalaṃ tasya rājño yathāgatam | sarvā eva striyastāśca babhāṣe munipuṅgavaḥ || 7.88.21 ||
atra kimpuruṣīrbhūtvā śailarodhasi vatsyatha | āvāsastu girāvasmiñchīghrameva vidhīyatām || 7.88.22 ||
mūlapatraphalaiḥ sarvā vartayiṣyatha nityadā | striyaḥ kimpuruṣānnāma bharta'nsamupalapsyatha || 7.88.23 ||
tāḥ śrutvā somaputrasya vācaṃ kimpuruṣīkṛtāḥ | upāsāñcakrire śailaṃ vadhvastā bahulāstadā || 7.88.24 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe 'ṣṭāśītitamaḥ sargaḥ || 88 ||
śrutvā kimpuruṣotpattiṃ lakṣmaṇo bharatastadā | āścaryamiti cābrūtāmubhau rāmaṃ janeśvaram || 7.89.1 ||
atha rāmaḥ kathāmetāṃ bhūya eva mahāyaśāḥ | kathayāmāsa dharmātmā prajāpatisutasya vai || 7.89.2 ||
sarvāstā vidrutā dṛṣṭvā kinnarīrṛṣisattamaḥ | uvāca rūpasampannāṃ tāṃ striyaṃ prahasanniva || 7.89.3 ||
somasyāhaṃ sudayitaḥ sutaḥ surucirānane | bhajasva māṃ varārohe bhaktyā snigdhena cakṣuṣā || 7.89.4 ||
tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā śūnye svajanavarjite | ilā suruciraprakhyaṃ pratyuvāca mahāgraham || 7.89.5 ||
ahaṃ kāmacarī saumya tavāsmi vaśavartinī | praśādhi māṃ somasuta yathecchasi tathā kuru || 7.89.6 ||
tasyāstadadbhutaprakhyaṃ śrutvā harṣamupāgataḥ | sa vai kāmī saha tayā reme candramasaḥ sutaḥ || 7.89.7 ||
budhasya mādhavo māsastāmilāṃ rucirānanām | gato ramayato 'tyarthaṃ kṣaṇavattasya kāminaḥ || 7.89.8 ||
atha māse tu sampūrṇe pūrṇendusadṛśānanaḥ | prajāpatisutaḥ śrīmāñchayane pratyabudhyata || 7.89.9 ||
so 'paśyatsomajaṃ tatra tapantaṃ salilāśaye | ūrdhvabāhuṃ nirālambaṃ taṃ rājā pratyabhāṣata || 7.89.10 ||
bhagavanparvataṃ durgaṃ praviṣṭo 'smi sahānugaḥ | na ca paśyāmi tatsainyaṃ kva nu te māmakā gatāḥ || 7.89.11 ||
tacchrutvā tasya rājarṣernaṣṭasañjñasya bhāṣitam | pratyuvāca śubhaṃ vākyaṃ sāntvayanparayā girā || 7.89.12 ||
aśmavarṣeṇa mahatā bhṛtyāste vinipātitāḥ | tvaṃ cāśramapade supto vātavarṣabhayārditaḥ || 7.89.13 ||
samāśvasihi bhadraṃ te nirbhayo vigatajvaraḥ | phalamūlāśano vīra nivaseha yathāsukham || 7.89.14 ||
sa rājā tena vākyena pratyāśvasto mahāmatiḥ | pratyuvāca tato vākyaṃ dīno bhṛtyakṣayād bhṛśam || 7.89.15 ||
tyakṣyāmyahaṃ svakaṃ rājyaṃ nāhaṃ bhṛtyairvinākṛtaḥ | vartayeyaṃ kṣaṇaṃ brahmansamanujñātumarhasi || 7.89.16 ||
suto dharmaparo brahmañjyeṣṭho mama mahāyaśāḥ | śaśabinduriti khyātaḥ sa me rājyaṃ prapatsyate || 7.89.17 ||
na hi śakṣyāmyahaṃ hitvā bhṛtyadārānsukhānvitān | prativaktuṃ mahātejaḥ kiñcidapyaśubhaṃ vacaḥ || 7.89.18 ||
tathā bruvati rājendre budhaḥ paramamadbhutam | sāntvapūrvamathovāca vāsasta iha rocatām || 7.89.19 ||
na santāpastvayā kāryaḥ kārdameya mahābala | saṃvatsaroṣitasyeha kārayiṣyāmi te hitam || 7.89.20 ||
