tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā budhasyākliṣṭakarmaṇaḥ | vāsāya vidadhe buddhiṃ yaduktaṃ brahmavādinā || 7.89.21 ||
māsaṃ sa strī tadā bhūtvā ramayatyaniśaṃ śudā | māsaṃ puruṣabhāvena dharmabuddhiṃ cakāra saḥ || 7.89.22 ||
tataḥ sā navame māsi ilā somasutātsutam | janayāmāsa suśroṇī purūravasamūrjitam || 7.89.23 ||
jātamātraṃ tu suśroṇī piturhaste nyaveśayat | budhasya samavarṇabhamilā putraṃ mahābalam || 7.89.24 ||
budhastu puruṣībhūtaṃ sa vai saṃvatsarāntaram | kathābhī ramayāmāsa dharmayuktābhirātmavān || 7.89.25 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe ekonanavatitamaḥ sargaḥ || 89 ||
tathoktavati rāme tu tasya janma tadadbhutam | uvāca lakṣmaṇo bhūyo bharataśca mahāyaśāḥ || 7.90.1 ||
ilā sā somaputrasya saṃvatsaramathoṣitā | akarotkiṃ naraśreṣṭha tattvaṃ śaṃsitumarhasi || 7.90.2 ||
tayostadvākyamādhuryaṃ niśamya paripṛcchatoḥ | rāmaḥ punaruvācemāṃ prajāpatisute kathām || 7.90.3 ||
puruṣatvaṃ gate śūre budhaḥ paramabuddhimān | saṃvartaṃ paramodāramājuhāva mahāyaśāḥ || 7.90.4 ||
cyavanaṃ bhṛguputraṃ ca muniṃ cāriṣṭaneminam | pramodanaṃ modakaraṃ tato durvāsasaṃ munim || 7.90.5 ||
etānsarvānsamānīya vākyajñastattvadarśanaḥ | uvāca sarvānsuhṛdo dhairyeṇa susamāhitān || 7.90.6 ||
ayaṃ rājā mahābāhuḥ kardamasya ilaḥ sutaḥ | jānītainaṃ yathābhūtaṃ śreyo hyatra vidhīyatām || 7.90.7 ||
teṣāṃ saṃvadatāmeva tamāśramamupāgamat | kardamastu mahātejā dvijaiḥ saha mahātmabhiḥ || 7.90.8 ||
pulastyaśca kratuścaiva vaṣaṭkārastathaiva ca | oṅkāraśca mahātejāstamāśramamupāgamat || 7.90.9 ||
te sarve hṛṣṭamanasaḥ parasparasamāgame | hitaiṣiṇo bālhipateḥ pṛthagvākyānyathābruvan || 7.90.10 ||
kardamastvabravīdvākyaṃ sutārthaṃ paramaṃ hitam | dvijāḥ śṛṇuta madvākyaṃ yacchreyaḥ pārthivasya hi || 7.90.11 ||
nānyaṃ paśyāmi bhaiṣajyamantarā vṛṣabhadhvajam | nāśvamedhātparo yajñaḥ priyaścaiva mahātmanaḥ | tasmādyajāmahe sarve pārthivārthe durāsadam || 7.90.12 ||
kardamenaivamuktāstu sarva eva dvijarṣabhāḥ | rocayanti sma taṃ yajñaṃ rudrasyārādhanaṃ prati || 7.90.13 ||
saṃvartasya tu rājarṣeḥ śiṣyaḥ purapurañjayaḥ | marutta iti vikhyātastaṃ yajñaṃ samupāharat || 7.90.14 ||
tato yajño mahānāsīdbudhāśramasamīpataḥ | rudraśca paramaṃ toṣamājagāma mahāyaśāḥ || 7.90.15 ||
atha yajñe samāpte tu prītaḥ paramayā mudā | umāpatirdvijānsarvānuvāca ilasannidhau || 7.90.16 ||
prīto 'smi hayamedhena bhaktyā ca dvijasattamāḥ | asya bāhlipateścaiva kiṃ karomi priyaṃ śubham || 7.90.17 ||
tathā vadati deveśe dvijāste susamāhitāḥ | prasādayanti deveśaṃ yathā syātpuruṣastvilā || 7.90.18 ||
tataḥ prīto mahādevaḥ puruṣatvaṃ dadau punaḥ | ilāyai sumahātejā dattvā cāntaradhīyata || 7.90.19 ||
nivṛtte hayamedhe ca gataścādarśanaṃ haraḥ | yathāgataṃ dvijāḥ sarve hyagacchandīrghadarśinaḥ || 7.90.20 ||
rājā tu bāhlimutsṛjya madhyadeśe hyanuttamam | niveśayāmāsa puraṃ pratiṣṭhānaṃ yaśaskaram || 7.90.21 ||
śaśabinduśca rājarṣirbāhliṃ purapurañjayaḥ | pratiṣṭhāne ilo rājā prajāpatisuto balī || 7.90.22 ||
sa kāle prāptavāँllokamilo brāhmamanuttamam | ailaḥ purūravā rājā pratiṣṭhānamavāptavān || 7.90.23 ||
īdṛśo hyaśvamedhasya prabhāvaḥ puruṣarṣabhau | strībhūtaḥ pauruṣaṃ lebhe yaccānyadapi durlabham || 7.90.24 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe navatitamaḥ sargaḥ || 90 ||
etadākhyāya kākutstho bhrātṛbhyāmamitaprabhaḥ | lakṣmaṇaṃ punarevāha dharmayuktamidaṃ vacaḥ || 7.91.1 ||
vasiṣṭhaṃ vāmadevaṃ ca jābālimatha kaśyapam | dvijāṃśca sarvapravarānaśvamedhapuraskṛtān || 7.91.2 ||
etānsarvānsamānīya mantrayitvā ca lakṣmaṇa | hayaṃ lakṣaṇasampannaṃ vimokṣyāmi samādhinā || 7.91.3 ||
tadvākyaṃ rāghaveṇoktaṃ śrutvā tvaritavikramaḥ | dvijānsarvānsamāhūya darśayāmāsa rāghavam || 7.91.4 ||
te dṛṣṭvā devasaṅkāśaṃ kṛtapādābhivandanam | rāghavaṃ sudurādharṣamāśīrbhiḥ samapūjayan || 7.91.5 ||
prāñjaliḥ sa tadā bhūtvā rāghavo dvijasattamān | ācacakṣe 'śvamedhasya hyabhiprāyaṃ mahāyaśāḥ || 7.91.6 ||
te tu rāmasya tacchrutvā namaskṛtvā vṛṣadhvajam | aśvamedhaṃ dvijāḥ sarve pūjayanti sma sarvaśaḥ || 7.91.7 ||
sa teṣāṃ dvijamukhyānāṃ vākyamadbhutadarśanam | aśvamedhāśritaṃ śrutvā bhṛśaṃ prīto 'bhavattadā || 7.91.8 ||
vijñāya karma tatteṣāṃ rāmo lakṣmaṇamabravīt | preṣayasva drutaṃ dūtān sugrīvāya mahātmane || 7.91.9 ||
yathā mahadbhirharibhirbahubhiśca vanaukasām | sārdhamāgaccha bhadraṃ te hyanubhoktuṃ mahotsavam || 7.91.10 ||
bibhīṣaṇaśca rakṣobhiḥ kāmagairbahubhirvṛtaḥ | aśvamedhaṃ mahāyajñamāyātvatulavikramaḥ || 7.91.11 ||
rājānaśca mahābhāgā ye me priyacikīrṣavaḥ | sānugāḥ kṣipramāyāntu yajñaṃ draṣṭumanuttamam || 7.91.12 ||
deśāntaragatā ye ca dvijā dharmasamāhitāḥ | āmantrayasva tānsarvānaśvamedhāya lakṣmaṇa || 7.91.13 ||
ṛṣayaśca mahābāho āhūyantāṃ tapodhanāḥ | deśāntaragatāḥ sarve sadārāśca dvijātayaḥ | tathaiva tālāvacarāstathaiva naṭanartakāḥ || 7.91.14 ||
yajñavāṭaśca sumahāngomatyā naimiśe vane | ājñāpyatāṃ mahābāho taddhi puṇyamanuttamam || 7.91.15 ||
śāntayaśca mahābāho pravartyantāṃ samantataḥ || 7.91.16 ||
śataśaścāpi dharmajñāḥ kratumukhyamanuttamam | anubhūya mahāyajñaṃ naimiśe raghunandana || 7.91.17 ||
tuṣṭaḥ puṣṭaśca sarvo 'sau mānitaśca yathāvidhi | prītiṃ yāsyati dharmajña śīghramāmantryatāṃ janaḥ || 7.91.18 ||
śataṃ vāhasahasrāṇāṃ taṇḍulānāṃ vapuṣmatām | ayutaṃ tilamudgānāṃ prayātvagre mahābala || 7.91.19 ||
caṇakānāṃ kulitthānāṃ māṣāṇāṃ lavaṇasya ca | ato 'nurūpaṃ snehaṃ ca gandhaṃ saṅkṣiptameva ca || 7.91.20 ||
suvarṇakoṭyo bahulā hiraṇyasya śatottarāḥ | agrato bharataḥ kṛtvā gacchatvagre samādhinā || 7.91.21 ||
antarā paṇyavīthyaśca sarve ca naṭanartakāḥ | sūdā nāryaśca bahavo nityaṃ yauvanaśālinaḥ || 7.91.22 ||
bharatena tu sārdhaṃ te yāntu sainyāni cāgrataḥ | naigamā balavṛddhāśca dvijāśca susamāhitāḥ || 7.91.23 ||
karmāntikānvardhakinaḥ kośādhyakṣāṃśca naigamān | mama māta'stathā sarvāḥ kumārāntaḥpurāṇi ca || 7.91.24 ||
kāñcanīṃ mama patnīṃ ca dīkṣāyāṃ jñāṃśca karmaṇi | agrato bharataḥ kṛtvā gacchatvagre mahāyaśāḥ || 7.91.25 ||
upakāryā mahārhāśca pārthivānāṃ mahaujasām | sānugānāṃ naraśreṣṭho vyādideśa mahābalaḥ || 7.91.26 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe ekanavatitamaḥ sargaḥ || 91 ||
tatsarvamakhilenāśu prasthāpya bharatāgrajaḥ | hayaṃ lakṣaṇasampannaṃ kṛṣṇasāraṃ mumoca ha || 7.92.1 ||
ṛtvigbhirlakṣmaṇaṃ sārdhamaśvatantre niyojya ca | tato 'bhyagacchatkākutsthaḥ saha sainyena naimiśam || 7.92.2 ||
yajñavāṭaṃ mahābāhurdṛṣṭvā paramamadbhutam | prabarṣamatulaṃ lebhe śrīmāniti vaco 'bravīt || 7.92.3 ||
naimiṣe vasatastasya sarva eva narādhipāḥ | āninyurupahārāṃśca tānrāmaḥ pratyapūjayat || 7.92.4 ||
upakāryā mahārhāśca pārthivānāṃ mahātmanām | sānugānāṃ naraśreṣṭho vyādideśa mahāmatiḥ || 7.92.5 ||
annapānāni vastrāṇi sānugānāṃ mahātmanām | bharataḥ sandadāvāśu śatrughnasahitastadā || 7.92.6 ||
vānarāśca mahātmānaḥ sugrīvasahitāstadā | viprāṇāṃ praṇatāḥ sarve cakrire pariveṣaṇam || 7.92.7 ||
bibhīṣaṇaśca rakṣobhirbahubhiḥ sragvibhirvṛtaḥ | ṛṣīṇāmugratapasāṃ pūjāṃ cakre mahātmanām || 7.92.8 ||
evaṃ suvihito yajño hayamedho 'bhyavartata | lakṣmaṇenāguptā ca hayacaryā pravartata | īdṛśaṃ rājasiṃhasya yajñapravaramuttamam || 7.92.9 ||
nānyaḥ śabdo 'bhavattatra hayamedhe mahātmanaḥ | chandato dehi visrabdho yāvattuṣyanti yācakāḥ || 7.92.10 ||
tāvatsarvāṇi dattāni kratumadhye mahātmanaḥ | vividhāni ca gauḍāni khāṇḍavāni tathaiva ca || 7.92.11 ||
na nissṛtaṃ bhatatyoṣṭhādvacanaṃ yāvadarthinām | tāvadvānararakṣobhirdattamevābhyadṛśyata || 7.92.12 ||
na kaścinmalinastatra dīno vā 'pyatha kṛrśataḥ | tasminyajñavare rājño hṛṣṭapuṣṭajanāvṛte || 7.92.13 ||
ye ca tatra mahātmāno munayaścirajīvinaḥ | nāsmaraṃstādṛśaṃ yajñaṃ nāpyāsīt sa kadācana || 7.92.14 ||
yaḥ kṛtyavānsuvarṇena suvarṇaṃ labhate sma saḥ | vittārthī labhate vittaṃ ratnārthī ratnameva ca || 7.92.15 ||
rajatānāṃ suvarṇānāmaśmanāmatha vāsasām | aniśaṃ dīyamānānāṃ rāśiḥ samupadṛśyate || 7.92.16 ||
na śakrasya dhaneśasya yamasya varuṇasya vā | īdṛśo dṛṣṭapūrvo na evamūcustapodhanāḥ || 7.92.17 ||
sarvatra vānarāstasthuḥ sarvatraiva ca rākṣasāḥ | vāsodhanānnamarthibhyaḥ pūrṇahastā dadurbhṛśam || 7.92.18 ||
īdṛśo rājasiṃhasya yajñaḥ sarvaguṇānvitaḥ | saṃvatsaramatho sāgraṃ vartate na ca hīyate || 7.92.19 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe dvinavatitamaḥ sargaḥ || 92 ||
vartamāne tathābhūte yajñe ca paramādbhute | saśiṣya ājagāmāśu vālmīkirmunipuṅgavaḥ || 7.93.1 ||
sa dṛṣṭvā divyasaṅkāśaṃ yajñamadbhutadarśanam | ekānte ṛṣivāṭānāṃ cakāra uṭajāñchubhān || 7.93.2 ||
śakaṭāṃśca bahūnpūrṇānphalamūlaiśca śobhanān | vālmīkivāṭe rucire sthāpayannavidūrataḥ || 7.93.3 ||
āsītsupūjito rājñā munibhiśca mahātmabhiḥ | vālmīkiḥ sumahātejā nyavasatparamātmavān || 7.93.4 ||
sa śiṣyāvabravīddhṛṣṭau yuvāṃ gatvā samāhitau | kṛtsnaṃ rāmāyaṇaṃ kāvyaṃ gāyethāṃ parayā mudā || 7.93.5 ||
ṛṣivāṭeṣu puṇyeṣu brāhmaṇāvasatheṣu ca | rathyāsu rājamārgeṣu pārthivānāṃ gṛheṣu ca || 7.93.6 ||
rāmasya bhavanadvāri yatra karma ca kurvate | ṛtvijāmagrataścaiva tatra geyaṃ viśeṣataḥ || 7.93.7 ||
imāni ca phalānyatra svādūni vividhāni ca | jātāni parvatāgreṣu cāsvādyāsvādya gāyatām || 7.93.8 ||
na yāsyathaḥ śramaṃ vatsau bhakṣayitvā phalāni vai | mūlāni ca sumṛṣṭāni nagarādbahirāsyathaḥ || 7.93.9 ||
yadi śabdāpayedrāmaḥ śravaṇāya mahīpatiḥ | ṛṣīṇāmupaviṣṭānāṃ tato geyaṃ pravartatām || 7.93.10 ||
divase viṃśatiḥ sargā geyā madhurayā girā | pramāṇairbahubhistatra yathoddiṣṭā mayā purā || 7.93.11 ||
lobhaścāpi na kartavyaḥ svalpo 'pi dhanakāṅkṣayā | kiṃ dhanenāśramasthānāṃ phalamūlopajīvinā || 7.93.12 ||
yadi pṛcchetsa kākutstho yuvāṃ kasyeti dārakau | āvāṃ vālmīkiśiṣyau svo brūtamevaṃ narādhipam || 7.93.13 ||
imāstantrīḥ sumadhurāḥ sthānaṃ vā 'pūrvadarśanam | mūrcchayitvā sumadhuraṃ gāyatāṃ vigatajvarau || 7.93.14 ||
ādiprabhṛti geyaṃ syānna cāvajñāya pārthivam | pitā hi sarvabhūtānāṃ rājā bhaviti dharmataḥ || 7.93.15 ||
tadyuvāṃ hṛṣṭamanasau śvaḥ prabhāte samāsthitau | gāyethāṃ madhuraṃ geyaṃ tantrīlayasamanvitam || 7.93.16 ||
iti sandiśya bahuśo muniḥ prācetasastadā | vālmīkiḥ paramodārastūṣṇīmāsīnmahāyaśāḥ || 7.93.17 ||
sandiṣṭau muninā tena tāvubhau maithilīsutau | tathaiva karavāveti nirjagmaturarindamau || 7.93.18 ||
tāmadbhutāṃ tau hṛdaye kumārau niveśya vāṇīmṛṣibhāṣitāṃ tadā | samutsukau tau samamūṣaturniśāṃ yathā 'śvinau bhārgavanītisaṃhitām || 7.93.19 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe trinavatitamaḥ sargaḥ || 93 ||
tau rajanyāṃ prabhātāyāṃ snātau hutahutāśanau | yathoktamṛṣiṇā pūrvaṃ sarvaṃ tatropagāyatām || 7.94.1 ||
tāṃ sa śuśrāva kākutsthaḥ pūrvācāryavijirmitām | apūrvāṃ pāṭhyajātiṃ ca geyena samalaṅkṛtām || 7.94.2 ||
pramāṇairbahubhirbaddhāṃ tantrīlayasamanvitām | bālābhyāṃ rāghavaḥ śrutvā kautūhalaparo 'bhavat || 7.94.3 ||
atha karmāntare rājā samāhūya mahāmunīn | pārthivāṃśca naravyāghraḥ paṇḍitānnaigamāṃstathā || 7.94.4 ||
paurāṇikāñchabdavido ye ca vṛddhā dvijātayaḥ | svarāṇāṃ lakṣaṇajñāṃśca utsukāndvijasattamān || 7.94.5 ||
lakṣaṇajñāṃśca gāndharvānnaigamāṃśca viśeṣataḥ | pādākṣarasamāsajñāṃśchandaḥsu pariniṣṭhitān || 7.94.6 ||
kalāmātrāviśeṣajñāñjyotiṣe ca paraṃ gatān | kriyākalpavidaścaiva tathā kāryavido janān || 7.94.7 ||
bhāṣājñāniṅgitajñāṃśca naigamāṃścāpyaśeṣataḥ | hetūpacārakuśalān vacane cāpi haitukān || 7.94.8 ||
chandovidaḥ purāṇajñānvaidikāndvijasattamān | citrajñānvṛttasūtrajñāngītanṛtyaviśāradān || 7.94.9 ||
śāstrajñānnītinipuṇānvedāntārthaprabodhakān | etānsarvānsamānīya gātārau samaveśayat || 7.94.10 ||
dṛṣṭvā munigaṇāḥ sarve pārthivāśca mahaujasaḥ | pibanta iva cakṣurbhyāṃ rājānaṃ gāyakau ca tau || 7.94.11 ||
ūcuḥ parasparaṃ cedaṃ sarva eva samantataḥ | ubhau rāmasya sadṛśau bimbādbimbamivotthitau || 7.94.12 ||
jaṭilau yadi na syātāṃ na valkaladharau yadi | viśeṣaṃ nādhigacchāmo gāyato rāghavasya ca || 7.94.13 ||
teṣāṃ saṃvadatāmevaṃ śrota'ṇāṃ harṣavardhanam | geyaṃ pracakratustatra tāvubhau munidārakau || 7.94.14 ||
tataḥ pravṛttaṃ madhuraṃ gāndharvamatimānuṣam | na ca tṛptiṃ yayuḥ sarve śrotāro gānasampadā || 7.94.15 ||
pravṛttamāditaḥ pūrvasargaṃ nāradadarśitam | tataḥ prabhṛti sargāṃśca yāvadviṃśatyagāyatām || 7.94.16 ||
tato 'parāhṇasamaye rāghavaḥ samabhāṣata | śrutvā viṃśatisargāṃstānbhrātaraṃ bhrātṛvatsalaḥ || 7.94.17 ||
aṣṭādaśasahasrāṇi suvarṇasya mahātmanoḥ | prayaccha śīghraṃ kākutstha yadanyadabhikāṅkṣitam | dadau śīghraṃ sa kākutstho bālayorvai pṛthakpṛthak || 7.94.18 ||
dīyamānaṃ suvarṇaṃ tu nāgṛhṇītāṃ kuśīlavau | ūcatuśca mahātmānau kimaneneti vismitau || 7.94.19 ||
vanyena phalamūlena niratau vanavāsinau | suvarṇena hiraṇyena kiṃ kariṣyāvahe vane || 7.94.20 ||
tathā tayoḥ prabruvatoḥ kautūhalasamanvitāḥ | śrotāraścaiva rāmaśca sarva eva suvismitāḥ || 7.94.21 ||
tasya caivāgamaṃ rāmaḥ kāvyasya śrotumutsukaḥ | papraccha tau mahātejāstāvubhau munidārakau || 7.94.22 ||
kimpramāṇamidaṃ kāvyaṃ kā pratiṣṭhā mahātmanaḥ | kartā kāvyasya mahataḥ kva cāsau munipuṅgavaḥ || 7.94.23 ||
pṛcchantaṃ rāghavaṃ vākyamūcaturmunidārakau || 7.94.24 ||
vālmīkirbhagavānkartā samprāpto yajñasaṃvidham | yenedaṃ caritaṃ tubhyamaśeṣaṃ sampradarśitam || 7.94.25 ||
sannibaddhaṃ hi ślokānāṃ caturviśatsahasrakam | upākhyānaśataṃ caiva bhārgaveṇa tapasvinā || 7.94.26 ||
ādiprabhṛti vai rājanpañcasargaśatāni ca | kāṇḍāni ṣaṭ kṛtānīha sottarāṇi mahātmanā | kṛtāni guruṇāsmākamṛṣiṇā caritaṃ tava || 7.94.27 ||
pratiṣṭhā ' 'jīvitaṃ yāvattāvatsarvasya vartate || 7.94.28 ||
sottarāṇi mahātmanā | yadi buddhiḥ kṛtā rājañchravaṇāya mahāratha | karmāntare kṣaṇībhūtastacchṛṇuṣva sahānujaḥ || 7.94.29 ||
bāḍhamityabravīdrāmastau cānujñāpya rāghavam | prahṛṣṭau jagmatuḥ sthānaṃ yatrāste munipuṅgavaḥ || 7.94.30 ||
rāmo 'pi munibhiḥ sārdhaṃ pārthivaiśca mahātmabhiḥ | śrutvā tadgītimādhuryaṃ karmaśālāmupāgamat || 7.94.31 ||
śuśrāva tattālalayopapannaṃ sargānvitaṃ sa svaraśabdayuktam | tantrīlayavyañjanayogayuktaṃ kuśīlavābhyāṃ parigīyamānam || 7.94.32 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe caturnavatitamaḥ sargaḥ || 94 ||
rāmo bahūnyahānyevaṃ tadgītaṃ paramaṃ śubham | śuśrāva munibhiḥ sārdhaṃ pārthivaiḥ saha vānaraiḥ || 7.95.1 ||
tasmingīte tu vijñāya sītāputrau kuśīlavau | tasyāḥ pariṣado madhye rāmo vacanamabravīt | dūtāñchuddhasamācārānāhūyātmamanīṣayā || 7.95.2 ||
madvaco brūta gacchadhvamito bhagavato 'ntikam || 7.95.3 ||
pariṣado madhye rāmo vacanamabravīt | yadi śuddhasamācārā yadi vā vītakalmaṣā | karotvihātmanaḥ śuddhimanumānya mahāmunim || 7.95.4 ||
chandaṃ muneśca vijñāya sītāyāśca manogatam | pratyayaṃ dātukāmāyāstataḥ śaṃsata me laghu || 7.95.5 ||
śvaḥ prabhāte tu śapathaṃ maithilī janakātmajā | karotu pariṣanmadhye śodhanārthaṃ mamaiva ca || 7.95.6 ||
śrutvā tu ऱ्āgavasyaitadvacaḥ paramamadbhutam | dūtāḥ samprayayurbāṭaṃ yatrāste munipuṅgavaḥ || 7.95.7 ||
te praṇamya mahātmānaṃ jvalantamamitaprabham | ūcuste rāmavākyāni mṛdūni madhurāṇi ca || 7.95.8 ||
teṣāṃ tadvyāhṛtaṃ śrutvā rāmasya ca manogatam | vijñāya sumahātejā munirvākyamathābravīt || 7.95.9 ||
evaṃ bhavatu bhadraṃ vo yathā vadati rāghavaḥ | tathā kariṣyate sītā daivataṃ hi patiḥ striyāḥ || 7.95.10 ||
tathoktā muninā sarve rājadūtā mahaujasam | pratyetya rāghavaṃ kṣipraṃ munivākyaṃ babhāṣire || 7.95.11 ||
tataḥ prahṛṣṭaḥ kākutsthaḥ śrutvā vākyaṃ mahātmanaḥ | ṛṣīṃstatra sametāṃśca rājñaścaivābhyabhāṣata || 7.95.12 ||
bhagavantaḥ saśiṣyā vai sānugāśca narādhipāḥ | paśyantu sītāśapathaṃ yaścaivānyo 'pi kāṅkṣate || 7.95.13 ||
tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ | sarveṣāmṛṣimukhyānāṃ sādhuvādo mahānabhūt || 7.95.14 ||
rājānaśca mahātmānaḥ praśaṃsanti sma rāghavam | upapannaṃ naraśreṣṭha tvayyeva bhuvi nānyataḥ || 7.95.15 ||
evaṃ viniścayaṃ kṛtvā śvobhūta iti rāghavaḥ | visarjayāmāsa tadā sarvāṃstāñchatrusūdanaḥ || 7.95.16 ||
iti sampravicārya rājasiṃhaḥ śvobhūte śapathasya niścayaṃ vai | visasarja munīnnṛpāṃśca sarvānsa mahātmā mahato mahānubhāvaḥ || 7.95.17 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe pañcanavatitamaḥ sarga || 95 ||
tasyāṃ rajanyāṃ vyuṣṭāyāṃ yajñavāṭagato nṛpaḥ | ṛṣīnsarvānmahātejāḥ śabdāpayati rāghavaḥ || 7.96.1 ||
vasiṣṭho vāmadevaśca jābāliratha kāśyapaḥ | viśvāmitro dīrghatapā durvāsāśca mahātapāḥ || 7.96.2 ||
pulastyo 'pi tathā śaktirbhārgavaścaiva vāmanaḥ | mārkaṇḍeyaśca dīrghāyurmaudgalyaśca mahāyaśāḥ || 7.96.3 ||
gargaśca cyavanaścaiva śatānandaśca dharmavit | bharadvājaśca tejasvī hyagniputraśca suprabhaḥ || 7.96.4 ||
nāradaḥ parvataścaiva gautamaśca mahāyaśāḥ | kātyāyanaḥ suyajñaśca hyagastyastapasāṃ nidhiḥ || 7.96.5 ||
ete cānye ca bahavo munayaḥ saṃśitavratāḥ | kautūhalasamāviṣṭāḥ sarva eva samāgatāḥ || 7.96.6 ||
rākṣasāśca mahāvīryā vānarāśca mahābalāḥ | sarva eva samājagmurmahātmānaḥ kutūhalāt || 7.96.7 ||
kṣatriyā ye ca śūdrāśca vaiśyāścaiva sahasraśaḥ | nānādeśagatāścaiva brāhmaṇāḥ saṃśitavratāḥ || 7.96.8 ||
jñānaniṣṭhāḥ karmaniṣṭhāḥ yoganiṣṭhāstathāpare | sītāśapathavīkṣārthaṃ sarva eva samāgatāḥ || 7.96.9 ||
tadā samāgataṃ sarvamaśmabhūtamivācalam | śrutvā munivarastūrṇaṃ sasītaḥ samupāgamat || 7.96.10 ||
tamṛṣiṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ sītā tvanvagacchadavāṅmukhī | kṛtāñjalirbāṣpagalā kṛtvā rāmaṃ manogatam || 7.96.11 ||
dṛṣṭvā śrutimivāyāntīṃ brahmāṇamanugāminīm | vālmīkeḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ sītāṃ sādhuvādo mahānabhūt || 7.96.12 ||
tato halahalāśabdaḥ sarveṣāmevamābabhau | duḥkhajanmaviśālena śokenākulitātmanām || 7.96.13 ||
sādhu rāmeti kecittu sādhu sīteti cāpare | ubhāveva ca tatrānye prekṣakāḥ sampracukruśuḥ || 7.96.14 ||
tato madhye janaughasya praviśya munipuṅgavaḥ | sītāsahāyo vālmīkiriti hovāca rāghavam || 7.96.15 ||
iyaṃ dāśarathe sītā suvratā dharmacāriṇī | apavādaiḥ parityaktā mamāśramasamīpataḥ || 7.96.16 ||
lokāpavādabhītasya tava rāma mahāvrata | pratyayaṃ dāsyate sītā tadanujñātumarhasi || 7.96.17 ||
imau tu jānakīputrāvubhau ca yamajātakau | sutau tavaiva durdharṣau satyametadbravīmi te || 7.96.18 ||
pracetaso 'haṃ daśamaḥ putro rāghavanandana | na smarāmyanṛtaṃ vākyamimau tu tava putrakau || 7.96.19 ||
bahuvarṣasahasrāṇi tapaścaryā mayā kṛtā | nopāśnīyāṃ phalaṃ tasyā duṣṭeyaṃ yadi maithilī || 7.96.20 ||
manasā karmaṇā vācā bhūtapūrvaṃ na kilbiṣam | tasyāḥ phalamupāśnīyāmapāpā maithilī yadi || 7.96.21 ||
ahaṃ pañcasu bhūteṣu manaṣṣaṣṭheṣu rāghava | vicintya sītāṃ śuddheti jagrāha vananirjhare || 7.96.22 ||
iyaṃ śuddhasamācārā apāpā patidevatā | lokāpavādabhītasya pratyayaṃ tava dāsyati || 7.96.23 ||
tasmādiyaṃ naravarātmaja śuddhabhāvā divyena dṛṣṭiviṣayeṇa tadā praviṣṭā | lokāpavādakaluṣīkṛtacetasā yā tyaktā tvayā priyatamā viditā 'pi śuddhā || 7.96.24 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe ṣaṇṇavatitamaḥ sargaḥ || 96 ||
vālmīkinaivamuktastu rāghavaḥ pratyabhāṣata | prāñjalirjagato madhye dṛṣṭvā tāṃ varavarṇinīm || 7.97.1 ||
evametanmahābhāga yathā vadasi dharmavit | pratyayastu mama brahmaṃstava vākyairakalmaṣaiḥ || 7.97.2 ||
pratyayastu purā vṛtto vaidehyāḥ surasannidhau | śapathastu kṛtastatra tena veśma praveśitā | lokāpavādo balavānyena tyaktā hi maithilī || 7.97.3 ||
seyaṃ lokabhayādbrahmannapāpetyabhijānatā | parityaktā mayā sītā tadbhāvankṣantumarhati || 7.97.4 ||
jānāmi cemau putrau me yamajātau kuśīlavau | śuddhāyāṃ jagato madhye maithilyāṃ prītirastu me || 7.97.5 ||
abhiprāyaṃ tu vijñāya rāmasya surasattamāḥ | sītāyāḥ śapathe tasmin mahendrādyā mahaujasaḥ || 7.97.6 ||
pitāmahaṃ puraskṛtya sarva eva samāgatāḥ || 7.97.7 ||
ādityā vasavo rudrā hyaśvinau samarudgaṇāḥ | gandharvāpsarasaścaiva sarva eva samāgatāḥ || 7.97.8 ||
sādhyāśca viśvedevāśca sarve ca paramarṣayaḥ | nāgāḥ suparṇāḥ siddhāśca te sarve hṛṣṭamānasāḥ | sītāśapathasambhrāntāḥ sarva eva samāgatāḥ || 7.97.9 ||
dṛṣṭvā devānṛṣīṃścaiva rāghavaḥ punarabravīt | pratyayo me naraśreṣṭhā ṛṣivākyairakalmaṣaiḥ || 7.97.10 ||
śuddhāyāṃ jagato madhye vaidehyāṃ prītirastu me || 7.97.11 ||
tato vāyuḥ śubhaḥ puṇyo divyagandho manoramaḥ | tajjanaughaṃ suraśreṣṭho hlādayāmāsa sarvataḥ || 7.97.12 ||
tadadbhutamivācintyaṃ niraikṣanta samāgatāḥ | mānavāḥ sarvarāṣṭrebhyaḥ pūrvaṃ kṛtayuge yathā || 7.97.13 ||
sarvānsamāgatāndṛṣṭvā sītā kāṣāyavāsinī | abravītprāñjalirvākyamadhodṛṣṭiravāṅmukhī || 7.97.14 ||
yathā 'haṃ rāghavādanyaṃ manasāpi na cintaye | tathā me mādhavī devī vivaraṃ dātumarhati || 7.97.15 ||
manasā karmaṇā vācā yathā rāmaṃ samarcaye | tathā me mādhavī devī vivaraṃ dātumarhati || 7.97.16 ||
yathaitatsatyamuktaṃ me vedmi rāmātparaṃ na ca | tathā me mādhavī devī vivaraṃ dātumarhati || 7.97.17 ||
tathā śapantyāṃ vaidehyāṃ prādurāsīttadadbhutam | bhūtalādutthitaṃ divyaṃ siṃhāsanamanuttamam || 7.97.18 ||
dhriyamāṇaṃ śirobhistu nāgairamitavikramaiḥ | divyaṃ divyena vapuṣā divyaratnavibhūṣitaiḥ || 7.97.19 ||
tasmiṃstu dharaṇī devī bāhubhyāṃ gṛhya maithilīm | svāgatenābhinandyaināmāsane copaveśayat || 7.97.20 ||
tāmāsanagatāṃ dṛṣṭvā praviśantīṃ rasātalam | puṣpavṛṣṭiravicchinnā divyā sītāmavākirat || 7.97.21 ||
sādhukāraśca sumahāndevānāṃ sahasotthitaḥ | sādhu sādhviti vai sīte yasyāste śīlamīdṛśam || 7.97.22 ||
evaṃ bahuvidhā vāco hyantarikṣagatāḥ surāḥ | vyājahrurhṛṣṭamanaso dṛṣṭvā sītāpraveśanam || 7.97.23 ||
yajñavāṭagatāścāpi munayaḥ sarva eva te | rājānaśca naravyāghrā vismayānnoparemire || 7.97.24 ||
antarikṣe ca bhūmau ca sarve sthāvarajaṅgamāḥ | dānavāśca mahākāyāḥ pātāle pannagādhipāḥ || 7.97.25 ||
kecidvineduḥ saṃhṛṣṭāḥ keciddhyānaparāyaṇāḥ | kecidrāmaṃ nirīkṣante kecitsītāmacetanāḥ || 7.97.26 ||
sītāpraveśanaṃ dṛṣṭvā teṣāmāsītsamāgamaḥ | tanmuhūrtamivātyarthaṃ samaṃ sammohitaṃ jagat || 7.97.27 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe saptanavatitamaḥ sargaḥ || 97 ||
rasātalaṃ praviṣṭāyāṃ vaidehyāṃ sarvavānarāḥ | cukruśuḥ sādhu sādhvīti munayo rāmasannidhau || 7.98.1 ||
daṇḍakāṣṭhamavaṣṭabhya bāṣpavyākulitekṣaṇaḥ | avākchirā dīnamanā rāmo hyāsītsuduḥkhitaḥ || 7.98.2 ||
sa ruditvā ciraṃ kālaṃ bahuśo bāṣpamutsṛjan | krodhaśokasamāviṣṭo rāmo vacanamabravīt || 7.98.3 ||
abhūtapūrvaṃ śokaṃ me manaḥ spraṣṭumivecchati | paśyato me yathā naṣṭā sītā śrīriva rūpiṇī || 7.98.4 ||
sā 'darśanaṃ purā sītā laṅkāpāre mahodadheḥ | tataścāpi mayānītā kiṃ punarvasudhātalāt || 7.98.5 ||
vasudhe devi bhavati sītā niryātyatāṃ mama | darśayiṣyāmi vā roṣaṃ yathā māmavagacchasi || 7.98.6 ||
kāmaṃ śvaśrūrmamaiva tvaṃ tvatsakāśāddhi maithilī | karṣatā halahastena janakenoddhṛtā purā || 7.98.7 ||
tasmānniryātyatāṃ sītā vivaraṃ vā prayaccha me | pātāle nākapṛṣṭhe vā vaseyaṃ sahitastayā || 7.98.8 ||
ānaya tvaṃ hi tāṃ sītāṃ matto 'haṃ maithilīkṛte | na me dāsyasi cetsītāṃ yathārūpāṃ mahītale || 7.98.9 ||
saparvatavanāṃ kṛtsnāṃ vidhamiṣyāmi te sthitam | nāśayiṣyāmyahaṃ bhūmiṃ sarvamāpo bhavatviha || 7.98.10 ||
evaṃ bruvāṇe kākutsthe krodhaśokasamanvite | brahmā suragaṇaiḥ sārdhamuvāca raghunandanam || 7.98.11 ||
rāma rāma na santāpaṃ kartumarhasi suvrata | smara tvaṃ pūrvakaṃ bhāvaṃ mantraṃ cāmitrakarśana || 7.98.12 ||
na khalu tvāṃ mahābāho smārayeyamanuttamam | imaṃ muhūrtaṃ durdharṣa smara tvaṃ janma vaiṣṇavam || 7.98.13 ||
sītā hi vimalā sādhvī tava pūrvaparāyaṇā | nāgalokaṃ sukhaṃ prāyāttvadāśrayatapobalāt || 7.98.14 ||
svarge te saṅgamo bhūyo bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ | asyāstu pariṣanmadhye yadbravīmi nibodha tat || 7.98.15 ||
etadeva hi kāvyaṃ te kāvyānāmuttamaṃ śrutam | sarvaṃ vistarato rāma vyākhyāsyati na saṃśayaḥ || 7.98.16 ||
janmaprabhṛti te vīra sukhaduḥkhopasevanam | bhaviṣyaduttaraṃ ceha sarvaṃ vālmīkinā kṛtam || 7.98.17 ||
ādikāvyamidaṃ rāma tvayi sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam | nahyanyo 'rhati kāvyānāṃ yaśobhāgrāghavādṛte || 7.98.18 ||
śrutaṃ te pūrvametaddhi mayā sarvaṃ suraiḥ saha | divyamadbhutarūpaṃ ca satyavākyamanāvṛtam || 7.98.19 ||
sa tvaṃ puruṣaśārdūla dharmeṇa susamāhitaḥ | śeṣaṃ bhaviṣyaṃ kākutstha kāvyaṃ rāmāyaṇaṃ śṛṇu || 7.98.20 ||
uttaraṃ nāma kāvyasya śeṣamatra mahāyaśaḥ | tacchṛṇuṣva mahāteja ṛṣibhiḥ sārdhamuttamam || 7.98.21 ||
na khalvanyena kākutstha śrotavyamidamuttamam | paramam ṛṣiṇā vīra tvayaiva raghunandana || 7.98.22 ||
etāvaduktvā vacanaṃ brahmā tribhuvaneśvaraḥ | jagāma tridivaṃ devo devaiḥ saha sabāndhavaiḥ || 7.98.23 ||
ye ca tatra mahātmāna ṛṣayo brāhmalaukikāḥ | brahmaṇā samanujñātā nyavartanta mahaujasaḥ | uttaraṃ śrotumanaso bhaviṣyaṃ yacca rāghave || 7.98.24 ||
tato rāmaḥ śubhāṃ vāṇīṃ devadevasya bhāṣitām | śrutvā paramatejasvī vālmīkimidamabravīt || 7.98.25 ||
bhagavan śrotumanasa ṛṣayo brāhmalaukikāḥ | bhaviṣyaduttaraṃ yanme śvobhūte sampravartatām || 7.98.26 ||
evaṃ viniścayaṃ kṛtvā sampragṛhya kuśīlavau | taṃ janaughaṃ visṛjyātha parṇaśālāmupāgamat | tāmeva śocataḥ sītāṃ sā vyatīyāya śarvarī || 7.98.27 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe 'ṣṭanavatitamaḥ sargaḥ || 98 ||
rajanyāṃ tu prabhātāyāṃ samānīya mahāmunīn | gīyatāmaviśaṅkābhyāṃ rāmaḥ putrāvuvāca ha || 7.99.1 ||
tataḥ samupaviṣṭeṣu brahmarṣiṣu mahātmasu | bhaviṣyaduttaraṃ kāvyaṃ jagatustau kuśīlavau || 7.99.2 ||
praviṣṭāyāṃ tu sītāyāṃ bhūtalaṃ satyasampadā | tasyāvasāne yajñasya rāmaḥ paramadurmanāḥ || 7.99.3 ||
apaśyamāno vaidehīṃ mene śūnyamidaṃ jagat | śokena paramāyasto na śāntiṃ manasā 'gamat || 7.99.4 ||
visṛjya pārthivānsarvānṛkṣavānararākṣasān | janaughaṃ vipramukhyānāṃ vittapūrvaṃ visṛjya ca || 7.99.5 ||
evaṃ samāpya yajñaṃ tu vidhivatsa tu rāghavaḥ | tato visṛjya tānsarvānrāmo rājīvalocanaḥ || 7.99.6 ||
hṛdi kṛtvā tadā sītāmayodhyāṃ praviveśa ha | iṣṭayajño narapatiḥ putradvayasamanvitaḥ || 7.99.7 ||
na sītāyāḥ parāṃ bhāryāṃ vavre sa raghunandanaḥ | yajñe yajñe ca patnyarthaṃ jānakī kāñcanī bhavat || 7.99.8 ||
daśavarṣasahasrāṇi vājimeghānathākarot | vājapeyāndaśaguṇāṃstathā bahusuvarṇakān || 7.99.9 ||
agniṣṭomātirātrābhyāṃ gosavaiśca mahādhanaiḥ | īje kratubhiranyaiśca sa śrīmānāptadakṣiṇaiḥ || 7.99.10 ||
evaṃ sa kālaḥ sumahānrājyasthasya mahātmanaḥ | dharme prayatamānasya vyatīyādrāghavasya tu || 7.99.11 ||
anurañjanti rājānamahanyahani rāghavam | ṛkṣavānararakṣāṃsi sthitā rāmasya śāsane || 7.99.12 ||
kāle varṣati parjanyaḥ subhikṣaṃ vimalā diśaḥ | hṛṣṭapuṣṭajanākīrṇaṃ puraṃ janapadāstathā || 7.99.13 ||
nākāle mriyate kaścinna vyādhiḥ prāṇināṃ tathā | nānartho vidyate kaścidrāme rājyaṃ praśāsati || 7.99.14 ||
atha dīrghasya kālasya rāmamātā yaśasvinī | putrapautraiḥ parivṛtā kāladharmamupāgamat || 7.99.15 ||
anviyāya sumitrā ca kaikeyī ca yaśasvinī | dharmaṃ kṛtvā bahuvidhaṃ tridive paryavasthitā || 7.99.16 ||
sarvāḥ pramuditāḥ svarge rājñā daśarathena ca | samāgatā mahābhāgāḥ sarvadharmaṃ ca lebhire || 7.99.17 ||
tāsāṃ rāmo mahādānaṃ kāle kāle prayacchati | māta'ṇāmaviśeṣeṇa brāhmaṇeṣu tapasviṣu || 7.99.18 ||
pitryāṇi brahmaratnāni yajñānparamadustarān | cakāra rāmo dharmātmā pita'ndevānvivardhayan || 7.99.19 ||
evaṃ varṣasahasrāṇi bahūnyatha yayuḥ sukham | yajñairbahuvidhaṃ dharmaṃ vardhayānasya sarvadā || 7.99.20 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe ekonaśatatamaḥ sargaḥ || 99 ||
kasyacittvatha kālasya yudhājitkekayo nṛpaḥ | svaguruṃ preṣayāmāsa rāghavāya mahātmane | gārgyamaṅgirasaḥ putraṃ brahmarṣimamitaprabham || 7.100.1 ||
daśa cāśvasahasrāṇi prītidānamanuttamam || 7.100.2 ||
kambalāni ca ratnāni citravastramathottamam | rāmāya pradadau rājā śubhānyābharaṇāni ca || 7.100.3 ||
śrutvā tu rāghavo dhīmānmaharṣiṃ gārgyamāgatam | mātulasyāśvapatinaḥ prahitaṃ tanmahādhanam || 7.100.4 ||
pratyudgamya ca kākutsthaḥ krośamātraṃ sahānujaḥ | gārgyaṃ sampūjayāmāsa yathā śakro bṛhaspatim || 7.100.5 ||
tathā sampūjya tamṛṣiṃ taddhanaṃ pratigṛhya ca | pṛṣṭvā pratipadaṃ sarvaṃ kuśalaṃ mātulasya ca | upaviṣṭaṃ mahābhāgaṃ rāmaḥ praṣṭuṃ pracakrame || 7.100.6 ||
kimāha mātulo vākyaṃ yadarthaṃ bhagavāniha | prāpto vākyavidāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ sākṣādiva bṛhaspatiḥ || 7.100.7 ||
rāmasya bhāṣitaṃ śrutvā maharṣiḥ kāryavistaram | vaktumadbhutasaṅkāśaṃ rāghavāyopacakrame || 7.100.8 ||
mātulaste mahābāho vākyamāha nararṣabhaḥ | yudhājitprītisaṃyuktaṃ śrūyatāṃ yadi rocate || 7.100.9 ||
ayaṃ gandharvaviṣayaḥ phalamūlopaśobhitaḥ | sindhorubhayataḥ pārśve deśaḥ paramaśobhanaḥ || 7.100.10 ||
taṃ ca rakṣanti gandharvāḥ sāyudhā yuddhakovidāḥ | śailūṣasya sutā vīra trikoṭyo vai mahābalāḥ || 7.100.11 ||
tānvinirjitya kākutstha gandharvanagaraṃ śubham | niveśaya mahāboho sve pure susamāhite || 7.100.12 ||
anyasya na gatistatra deśaḥ paramaśobhanaḥ | rocatāṃ te mahābāho nāhaṃ tvāmahitaṃ vade || 7.100.13 ||
tacchrutvā rāghavaḥ prīto maharṣermātulasya ca | uvāca bāḍhamityeva bharataṃ cānvavaikṣata || 7.100.14 ||
so 'bravīdrāghavaḥ prītaḥ sāñjalipragraho dvijam | imau kumārau taṃ deśaṃ brahmarṣe vicariṣyataḥ || 7.100.15 ||
bharatasyātmajau vīrau takṣaḥ puṣkala eva ca | mātulena suguptau tu dharmeṇa susamāhitau || 7.100.16 ||
bharataṃ cāgrataḥ kṛtvā kumārau sabalānugau | nihatya gandharvasutāndve pure vibhajiṣyataḥ || 7.100.17 ||
niveśya te puravare ātmajau sanniveśya ca | āgamiṣyati me bhūyaḥ sakāśamatidhārmikaḥ || 7.100.18 ||
brahmarṣimevamuktvā tu bharataṃ sabalānugam | ājñāpayāmāsa tadā kumārau cābhyaṣecayat || 7.100.19 ||
nakṣatreṇa ca saumyena puraskṛtyāṅgirassutam | bharataḥ saha sainyena kumārābhyāṃ viniryayau || 7.100.20 ||
sā senā śakrayukteva nagarānniryayāvatha | rāghavānugatā dūraṃ durādharṣā surairapi || 7.100.21 ||
māṃsādāni ca sattvāni rakṣāṃsi sumahānti ca | anujagmurhi bharataṃ rudhirasya pipāsayā || 7.100.22 ||
bhūtagrāmāśca bahavo māṃsabhakṣāḥ sudāruṇāḥ | gandharvaputramāṃsāni bhoktukāmāḥ sahasraśaḥ || 7.100.23 ||
siṃhavyāghravarāhāṇāṃ khecarāṇāṃ ca pakṣiṇām | bahūni vai sahasrāṇi senāyā yayuragrataḥ || 7.100.24 ||
adhyardhamāsamuṣitā pathi senā nirāmayā | hṛṣṭapuṣṭajanākīrṇā kekayaṃ samupāgamat || 7.100.25 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe śatatamaḥ sargaḥ || 100 ||
śrutvā senāpatiṃ prāptaṃ bharataṃ kekayādhipaḥ | yudhājidgārgyasahitaṃ parāṃ prītimupāgamat || 7.101.1 ||
sa niryayau janaughena mahatā kekayādhipaḥ | tvaramāṇo 'bhicakrāma gandharvānkāmarūpiṇaḥ || 7.101.2 ||
bharataśca yudhājicca sametau laghuvikramaiḥ | gandharvanagaraṃ prāptau sabalau sapadānugau || 7.101.3 ||
śrutvā tu bharataṃ prāptaṃ gandharvāste samāgatāḥ | yoddhukāmā mahāvīryā vyanadan vai samantataḥ || 7.101.4 ||
tataḥ samabhavadyuddhaṃ tumulaṃ romaharṣaṇam | saptarātraṃ mahābhīmaṃ na cānyatarayorjayaḥ || 7.101.5 ||
khaḍgaśaktidhanurgrāhā nadyaḥ śoṇitasaṃsravāḥ | nṛkalevaravāhinyaḥ pravṛttāḥ sarvatodiśam || 7.101.6 ||
tato rāmānujaḥ kruddhaḥ kālasyāstraṃ sudāruṇam | saṃvartaṃ nāma bharato gandharveṣvabhyacodayat || 7.101.7 ||
te baddhāḥ kālapāśena saṃvartena vidāritāḥ | kṣaṇenābhihatāstena tisraḥ koṭyo mahātmanām || 7.101.8 ||
taṃ ghātaṃ ghorasaṅkāśaṃ na smaranti divaukasaḥ | nimeṣāntaramātreṇa tādṛśānāṃ mahātmanām || 7.101.9 ||
hateṣu teṣu sarveṣu bharataḥ kekayīsutaḥ | niveśayāmāsa tadā samṛddhe dve purottame || 7.101.10 ||
takṣaṃ takṣaśilāyāṃ tu puṣkalaṃ puṣkalāvate | gandharvadeśe rucire gāndhāraviṣaye ca saḥ || 7.101.11 ||
dhanaratnaughasaṅkīrṇe kānanairupaśobhite | anyonyasaṅgharṣakṛte spardhayā guṇavistaraiḥ || 7.101.12 ||
ubhe suruciraprakhye vyavahārairakilbiṣaiḥ | udyānayānasampūrṇe suvibhaktāntarāpaṇe || 7.101.13 ||
ubhe puravare ramye vistarairupaśobhite | gṛhamukhyaiḥ surucirairvimānasamavarṇibhiḥ || 7.101.14 ||
śobhite śobhanīyaiśca devāyatanavistaraiḥ | tālaistamālaistilakairvakulairupaśobhite || 7.101.15 ||
niveśya pañcabhirvarṣairbharato rāghavānujaḥ | punarāyānmahābāhurayodhyāṃ kekayīsutaḥ || 7.101.16 ||
so 'bhivādya mahātmānaṃ sākṣāddharmamivāparam | rāghavaṃ bharataḥ śrīmānbrahmāṇamiva vāsavaḥ || 7.101.17 ||
śaśaṃsa ca yathāvṛttaṃ gandharvavadhamuttamam | niveśanaṃ ca deśasya śrutvā prīto 'sya rāghavaḥ || 7.101.18 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe ekottaraśatatamaḥ sargaḥ || 101 ||
tacchrutvā harṣamāpede rāghavo bhrātṛbhiḥ saha | vākyaṃ cādbhutasaṅkāśaṃ tadā provāca lakṣmaṇam || 7.102.1 ||
imau kumārau saumitre tava dharmaviśāradau | aṅgadaścandraketuśca rājyārthe dṛḍhavikramau || 7.102.2 ||
imau rājye 'bhiṣekṣyāmi deśaḥ sādhu vidhīyatām | ramaṇīyo hyasambādho rametāṃ yatra dhanvinau || 7.102.3 ||
na rājño yatra pīḍā syānnāśramāṇāṃ vināśanam | sa deśo dṛśyatāṃ saumya nāparādhyāmahe yathā || 7.102.4 ||
tathoktavati rāme tu bharataḥ pratyuvāca ha | ayaṃ kārupatho deśo ramaṇīyo nirāmayaḥ || 7.102.5 ||
niveśyatāṃ tatra puramaṅgadasya mahātmanaḥ | candraketoḥ suruciraṃ candrakāntaṃ nirāmayam || 7.102.6 ||
tadvākyaṃ bharatenoktaṃ pratijagrāha rāghavaḥ | taṃ ca kṛtvā vaśe deśamaṅgadasya nyaveśayat || 7.102.7 ||
aṅgadīyā purī ramyāpyaṅgadasya niveśitā | ramaṇīyā suguptā ca rāmeṇākliṣṭakarmaṇā || 7.102.8 ||
candraketośca mallasya mallabhūmyāṃ niveśitā | candrakānteti vikhyātā divyā svargapurī yathā || 7.102.9 ||
tato rāmaḥ parāṃ prītiṃ lakṣmaṇo bharatastathā | yayuryuddhe durādharṣā abhiṣekaṃ ca cakrire || 7.102.10 ||
abhiṣicya kumārau sa prasthāpayati rāghavaḥ | aṅgadaṃ paścimāṃ bhūmiṃ candraketumudaṅmukham || 7.102.11 ||
aṅgadaṃ cāpi saumitrirlakṣmaṇo 'nujagāma ha | candraketostu bharataḥ pārṣṇigrāho babhūva ha || 7.102.12 ||
lakṣmaṇastvaṅgadīyāyāṃ saṃvatsaramathoṣitaḥ | putre sthite durādharṣe ayodhyāṃ punarāgamat || 7.102.13 ||
bharato 'pi tathaivoṣya saṃvatsaramato 'dhikam | ayodhyāṃ punarāgamya rāmapādāvupāsta saḥ || 7.102.14 ||
ubhau saumitribharatau rāmapādāvanuvratau | kālaṃ gatamapi snehānna jajñāte 'tidhārmikau || 7.102.15 ||
evaṃ varṣasahasrāṇi daśa teṣāṃ yayustadā | dharme prayatamānānāṃ paurakāryeṣu nityadā || 7.102.16 ||
vihṛtya kālaṃ paripūrṇamānasāḥ śriyā vṛtā dharmapure susaṃsthitāḥ | trayaḥ samiddhā iva dīptatejaso mahādhvare sādhu hutāstrayo 'gnayaḥ || 7.102.17 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe vdyuttaraśatatamaḥ sargaḥ || 102 ||
kasyacittvatha kālasya rāme dharmapare sthite | kālastāpasarūpeṇa rājadvāramupāgamat || 7.103.1 ||
so 'bravīllakṣmaṇaṃ vākyaṃ dhṛtimantaṃ yaśaśvinam | māṃ nivedaya rāmāya samprāptaṃ kāryagauravāt || 7.103.2 ||
dūto 'smyatibalasyāhaṃ maharṣeramitaujasaḥ | rāmaṃ didṛkṣurāyātaḥ kāryeṇa hi mahābala || 7.103.3 ||
tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā saumitristvarayā 'nvitaḥ | nyavedayata rāmāya tāpasaṃ taṃ samāgatam || 7.103.4 ||
jayasva rāma dharmeṇa ubhau lokau mahādyute | dūtastvāṃ draṣṭumāyātastapasā bhāskaraprabhaḥ || 7.103.5 ||
tadvākyaṃ lakṣmaṇenoktaṃ śrutvā rāma uvāca ha | praveśyatāṃ munistāta mahaujāstasya vākyadhṛt || 7.103.6 ||
saumitristu tathetyuktvā prāveśayata taṃ munim | jvalantameva tejobhiḥ pradahantamivāṃśubhiḥ || 7.103.7 ||
so 'bhigamya raghuśreṣṭhaṃ dīpyapānaṃ svatejasā | ṛṣirmadhurayā vācā vardhasvetyāha rāghavam || 7.103.8 ||
tasmai rāmo mahātejāḥ pūjāmarghyapurogamām | dadau kuśalamavyagraṃ praṣṭumevopacakrame || 7.103.9 ||
pṛṣṭaśca kuśalaṃ tena rāmeṇa vadatāṃ varaḥ | āsane kāñcane divye niṣasāda mahāyaśāḥ || 7.103.10 ||
tamuvāca tato rāmaḥ svāgataṃ te mahāmune | prāpayāsya ca vākyāni yato dūtastvamāgataḥ || 7.103.11 ||
codito rājasiṃhena munirvākyamabhāṣata | dvandvametatpravaktavyaṃ hitaṃ vai yadyapekṣase || 7.103.12 ||
yaḥ śṛṇoti nirīkṣedvā sa vadhyo bhavitā tava | bhavedvai munimukhyasya vacanaṃ yadyapekṣase || 7.103.13 ||
sa tatheti pratijñāya rāmo lakṣmaṇamabravīt | dvāri tiṣṭha mahābāho pratihāraṃ visarjaya || 7.103.14 ||
sa me vadhyaḥ khalu bhavet kathādvandvaṃ samīritam | ṛṣermama ca saumitre paśyedvā śṛṇuyācca yaḥ || 7.103.15 ||
tato nikṣipya kākutstho lakṣmaṇaṃ dvāri saṅgraham | tamuvāca mune vākyaṃ kathayasveti rāghavaḥ || 7.103.16 ||
yatte manīṣitaṃ vākyaṃ yena vā 'si samāhitaḥ | kathayasvāviśaṅkastvaṃ mamāpi hṛdi vartate || 7.103.17 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe tryuttaraśatatamaḥ sargaḥ || 103 ||
śṛṇu rājanmahāsatva yadarthamahamāgataḥ | pitāmahena devena preṣito 'smi mahābala || 7.104.1 ||
tavāhaṃ pūrvasadbhāve putraḥ parapurañjaya | māyāsambhāvito vīra kālaḥ sarvasamāharaḥ || 7.104.2 ||
pitāmahaśca bhagavānāha lokapatiḥ prabhuḥ | samayaste kṛtaḥ saumya lokānsamparirakṣitum || 7.104.3 ||
saṅkṣipya hi purā lokānmāyayā svayameva hi | mahārṇave śayāno 'psu māṃ tvaṃ pūrvamajījanaḥ || 7.104.4 ||
bhogavantaṃ tato nāgamanantamudakeśayam | māyayā janayitvā tvaṃ dvau ca sattvau mahābalau || 7.104.5 ||
madhuṃ ca kaiṭabhaṃ caiva yayorasthicayairvṛtā | iyaṃ parvatasambādhā medinī cābhavanmahī || 7.104.6 ||
padme divye 'rkasaṅkāśe nābhyāmutpādya māmapi | prājāpatyaṃ tvayā karma mayi sarvaṃ niveśitam || 7.104.7 ||
so 'haṃ sannyastabhāro hi tvāmupāse jagatpatim | rakṣāṃ vidhatsva bhūteṣu mama tejaskaro bhavān || 7.104.8 ||
tatastvamapi durdharṣāttasmādbhāvātsanātanāt | rakṣārthaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ viṣṇutvamupajagmivān || 7.104.9 ||
adityāṃ vīryavānputro bhrāta'ṇāṃ vīryavardhanaḥ | samutpanneṣu kṛtyeṣu teṣāṃ sāhyāya kalpase || 7.104.10 ||
sa tvaṃ vitrāsyamānāsu prajāsu jagatāṃ vara | rāvaṇasya vadhākāṅkṣī mānuṣeṣu mano 'dadhāḥ || 7.104.11 ||
daśa varṣasahasrāṇi daśa varṣaśatāni ca | kṛtvā vāsasya niyatiṃ svayamevātmanā purā || 7.104.12 ||
sa tvaṃ manomayaḥ putraḥ pūrṇāyurmānuṣeṣviha | kālo 'yaṃ te naraśreṣṭha samīpamupavartitum || 7.104.13 ||
yadi bhūyo mahārāja prajā icchasyupāsitum | vasa vā vīra bhadraṃ ta evamāha pitāmahaḥ || 7.104.14 ||
atha vā vijigīṣā te suralokāya rāghava | sanāthā viṣṇunā devā bhavantu vigatajvarāḥ || 7.104.15 ||
śrutvā pitāmahenoktaṃ vākyaṃ kālasamīritam | rāghavaḥ prahasanvākyaṃ sarvasaṃhāramabravīt || 7.104.16 ||
śrutvā me devadevasya vākyaṃ paramamadbhutam | prītirhi mahatī jātā tavāgamanasambhavā || 7.104.17 ||
trayāṇāmapi lokānāṃ kāryārthaṃ mama sambhavaḥ | bhadraṃ te 'stu gamiṣyāmi yata evāhamāgataḥ || 7.104.18 ||
hadgato hyasi samprāpto na me tatra vicāraṇā | mayā hi sarvakṛtyeṣu devānāṃ vaśavartinām | sthātavyaṃ sarvasaṃhāra yathā hyāha pitāmahaḥ || 7.104.19 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe caturadhikaśatatamaḥ sargaḥ || 104 ||
tathā tayoḥ saṃvadatordurvāsā bhagavānṛṣiḥ | rāmasya darśanākāṅkṣī rājadvāramupāgamat || 7.105.1 ||
so 'bhigamya tu saumitrimuvāca ṛṣisattamaḥ | rāmaṃ darśaya me śīghraṃ purā me 'rtho 'tivartate || 7.105.2 ||
munestu bhāṣitaṃ śrutvā lakṣmaṇaḥ paravīrahā | abhivādya mahātmānaṃ vākyametaduvāca ha || 7.105.3 ||
kiṃ kāryaṃ brūhi bhagavanko vā 'rthaḥ kiṃ karomyaham | vyagro hi rāghavo brahmanmuhūrtaṃ pratipālyatām || 7.105.4 ||
tacchrutvā ṛṣiśārdūlaḥ krodhena kaluṣīkṛtaḥ | uvāca lakṣmaṇaṃ vākyaṃ nirdahanniva cakṣuṣā || 7.105.5 ||
asminkṣaṇe māṃ saumitre rāmāya prativedaya | asminkṣaṇe māṃ saumitre na nivedayase yadi || 7.105.6 ||
viṣayaṃ tvāṃ puraṃ caiva śapiṣye rāghavaṃ tathā | bharataṃ caiva saumitre yuṣmākaṃ yā ca santatiḥ || 7.105.7 ||
na hi śakṣyāmyahaṃ bhūyo manyuṃ dhārayituṃ hṛdi | tacchrutvā ghorasaṅkāśaṃ vākyaṃ tasya mahātmanaḥ | cintayāmāsa manasā tasya vākyasya niścayam || 7.105.8 ||
ekasya maraṇaṃ me 'stu mā bhūtsarvavināśanam | iti buddhyā viniścitya rāghavāya nyavedayat || 7.105.9 ||
lakṣmaṇasya vacaḥ śrutvā rāmaḥ kālaṃ visṛjya ca | nissṛtya tvaritaṃ rājā atreḥ putraṃ dadarśa ha || 7.105.10 ||
so 'bhivādya mahātmānaṃ jvalantamiva tejasā | kiṃ kāryamiti kākutsthaḥ kṛtāñjalirabhāṣata || 7.105.11 ||
tadvākyaṃ rāghaveṇoktaṃ śrutvā munivaraḥ prabhum | pratyāha rāmaṃ durvāsāḥ śrūyatāṃ dharmavatsala || 7.105.12 ||
adya varṣasahasrasya samāptistapaso mama | so 'haṃ bhojanamicchāmi yathāsiddhaṃ tavānagha || 7.105.13 ||
tacchrutvā vacanaṃ rājā rāghavaḥ prītamānasaḥ | bhojanaṃ munimukhyāya yathāsiddhamupāharat || 7.105.14 ||
sa tu bhuktvā muniśreṣṭhastadannamamṛtopamam | sādhu rāmeti sambhāṣya svamāśramamupāgamat || 7.105.15 ||
tasmin gate munivare svāśramaṃ lakṣmaṇāgrajaḥ | saṃsmṛtya kālavākyāni tato duḥkhamupāgamat || 7.105.16 ||
duḥkhena ca susantaptaḥ smṛtvā tadghoradarśanam | avāṅmukho dīnamanā vyāhartuṃ na śaśāka ha || 7.105.17 ||
tato buddhyā viniścitya kālavākyāni rāghavaḥ | naitadastīti niścitya tūṣṇīmāsīnmahāyaśāḥ || 7.105.18 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe pañcottaraśatatamaḥ sargaḥ || 105 ||
avāṅmukhamatho dīnaṃ dṛṣṭvā somamivāplutam | rāghavaṃ lakṣmaṇo vākyaṃ hṛṣṭo madhuramabravīt || 7.106.1 ||
na saṃtāpaṃ mahābāho madarthaṃ kartumarhasi | pūrvanirmāṇabaddhā hi kālasya gatirīdṛśī || 7.106.2 ||
jahi māṃ saumya visrabdhaṃ pratijñāṃ paripālaya | hīnapratijñāḥ kākutstha prayānti narakaṃ narāḥ || 7.106.3 ||
yadi prītirmahārāja yadyanugrāhyatā mayi | jahi māṃ nirviśaṅkastvaṃ dharmaṃ vardhaya rāghava || 7.106.4 ||
lakṣmaṇena tathoktastu rāmaḥ pracalitendriyaḥ | mantriṇaḥ samupānīya tathaiva ca purodhasam || 7.106.5 ||
abravīcca tadā vṛttaṃ teṣāṃ madhye sa rāghavaḥ | durvāsobhigamaṃ caiva pratijñāṃ tāpasasya ca || 7.106.6 ||
tacchrutvā mantriṇaḥ sarve sopādhyāyāḥ samāsata | vasiṣṭhastu mahātejā vākyametaduvāca ha || 7.106.7 ||
dṛṣṭametanmahābāho kṣayaṃ te romaharṣaṇam | lakṣmaṇena viyogaśca tava rāma mahāyaśaḥ || 7.106.8 ||
tyajainaṃ balavānkālo mā pratijñāṃ vṛthā kṛtāḥ | vinaṣṭāyāṃ pratijñāyāṃ dharmo 'pi ca layaṃ vrajet || 7.106.9 ||
tato dharme vinaṣṭe tu trailokyaṃ sacarācaram | sadevarṣigaṇaṃ sarvaṃ vinaśyettu na saṃśayaḥ || 7.106.10 ||
sa tvaṃ puruṣaśārdūla trailokyasyābhipālanāt | lakṣmaṇena vinā cādya jagatsvasthaṃ kuruṣva ha || 7.106.11 ||
teṣāṃ tatsamavetānāṃ vākyaṃ dharmārthasaṃhitam | śrutvā pariṣado madhye rāmo lakṣmaṇamabravīt || 7.106.12 ||
visarjaye tvāṃ saumitre mā bhūddharmaviparyayaḥ | tyāgo vadho vā vihitaḥ sādhūnāṃ tūbhayaṃ samam || 7.106.13 ||
rāmeṇa bhāṣite vākye bāṣpavyākulitendriyaḥ | lakṣmaṇastvaritaṃ prāyātsvagṛhaṃ na viveśa ha || 7.106.14 ||
sa gatvā sarayūtīramupaspṛśya kṛtāñjaliḥ | nigṛhya sarvasrotāṃsi niḥśvāsaṃ na mumoca ha || 7.106.15 ||
aniḥśvasantaṃ yuktaṃ taṃ saśakrāḥ sāpsarogaṇāḥ | devāḥ sarṣigaṇāḥ sarve puṣpairabhyakiraṃstadā || 7.106.16 ||
adṛśyaṃ sarvamanujaiḥ saśarīraṃ mahābalam | pragṛhya lakṣmaṇaṃ śakrastridivaṃ saṃviveśa ha || 7.106.17 ||
tato viṣṇoścaturbhāgamāgataṃ surasattamāḥ | dṛṣṭvā pramuditāḥ sarve 'pūjayan samaharṣayaḥ || 7.106.18 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe ṣaḍuttaraśatatamaḥ sargaḥ || 106 ||
visṛjya lakṣmaṇaṃ rāmo duḥkhaśokasamanvitaḥ | purodhasaṃ mantriṇaśca naigamāṃścedamabravīt || 7.107.1 ||
adya rājye 'bhiṣekṣyāmi bharataṃ dharmavatsalam | ayodhyāyāḥ patiṃ vīraṃ tato yāsyāmyahaṃ vanam || 7.107.2 ||
praveśayata sambhārānmābhūtkālasya paryayaḥ | adyaivāhaṃ gamiṣyāmi lakṣmaṇena gatāṃ gatim || 7.107.3 ||
tacchrutvā rāghaveṇoktaṃ sarvāḥ prakṛtayo bhṛśam | mūrdhabhiḥ praṇatā bhūmau gatasattvā ivābhavan || 7.107.4 ||
bharataśca visañjño 'bhūcchrutvā rāmasya bhāṣitam | rājyaṃ vigarhayāmāsa rāghavaṃ cedamabravīt || 7.107.5 ||
satyenāhaṃ śape rājansvargaloke na caiva hi | na kāmaye yathā rājyaṃ tvāṃ vinā raghunandana || 7.107.6 ||
imau kuśalavau rājannabhiṣiñca narādhipa | kosaleṣu kuśaṃ vīramuttareṣu tathā lavam || 7.107.7 ||
śatrughnasya tu gacchantu dūtāstvaritavikramāḥ | idaṃ gamanamasmākaṃ svargāyākhyātu mā ciram || 7.107.8 ||
tacchrutvā bharatenoktaṃ dṛṣṭvā cāpi hyadhomukhān | paurānduḥkhena santaptānvasiṣṭho vākyamabravīt || 7.107.9 ||
vatsa rāma imāḥ paśya dharaṇīṃ prakṛtīrgatāḥ | jñātvaiṣāmīpsitaṃ kāryaṃ mā caiṣāṃ vipriyaṃ kṛthāḥ || 7.107.10 ||
vasiṣṭhasya tu vākyena utthāpya prakṛtījanam | kiṃ karomīti kākutsthaḥ sarvā vacanamabravīt || 7.107.11 ||
tataḥ sarvāḥ prakṛtayo rāmaṃ vacanamabruvan | gacchantamanugacchāmo yatra rāma gamiṣyasi || 7.107.12 ||
paureṣu yadi te prītiryadi sneho hyanuttamaḥ | saputradārāḥ kākutstha samāgacchāma satpatham || 7.107.13 ||
tapovanaṃ vā durgaṃ vā nadīmambhonidhiṃ tathā | vayaṃ te yadi na tyājyāḥ sarvānno naya īśvara || 7.107.14 ||
eṣā naḥ paramā prītireṣa naḥ paramo varaḥ | hṛdgatā naḥ sadā prītistavānugamane nṛpa || 7.107.15 ||
paurāṇāṃ dṛḍhabhaktiṃ ca bāḍhamityeva so 'bravīt | svakṛtāntaṃ cānvavekṣya tasminnahani rāghavaḥ || 7.107.16 ||
kosaleṣu kuśaṃ vīramuttareṣu tathā lavam | abhiṣicya mahātmānāvubhau rāmaḥ kuśīlavau || 7.107.17 ||
abhiṣiktau sutāvaṅke pratiṣṭhāpya pure tataḥ | pariṣvajya mahābāhurmūrdhnyupāghrāya cāsakṛt || 7.107.18 ||
rathānāṃ tu sahasrāṇi nāgānāmayutāni ca | daśāyutāni cāśvānāmekaikasya dhanaṃ dadau || 7.107.19 ||
bahuratnau bahudhanau hṛṣṭapuṣṭajanāvṛtau | sve pure preṣayāmāsa bhrātarau tu kuśīlavau || 7.107.20 ||
abhiṣicya sutau vīrau pratiṣṭhāpya pure tadā | dūtānsampreṣayāmāsa śatrughnāya mahātmane || 7.107.21 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe saptottaraśatatamaḥ sargaḥ || 107 ||
te dūtā rāmavākyena coditā laghuvikramāḥ | prajagmurmadhurāṃ śīghraṃ cakrurvāsaṃ na cādhvani || 7.108.1 ||
te tu tribhirahorātraiḥ samprāpya madhurāmatha | śatrughnāya yathātattvamācakhyuḥ sarvameva tat || 7.108.2 ||
lakṣmaṇasya parityāgaṃ pratijñāṃ rāghavasya ca | putrayorabhiṣekaṃ ca paurānugamanaṃ tathā || 7.108.3 ||
kuśasya nagarī ramyā vindhyaparvatarodhasi | kuśāvatīti nāmnā sā kṛtā rāmeṇa dhīmatā | śrāvastīti purī ramyā śrāvitā ca lavasya ha || 7.108.4 ||
ayodhyāṃ vijanāṃ kṛtvā rāghavo bharatastathā | svargasya gamanodyogaṃ kṛtavantau mahārathau || 7.108.5 ||
evaṃ sarvaṃ nivedyāśu śatrughnāya mahātmane | viremuste tato dūtāstvara rājeti cābruvan || 7.108.6 ||
tacchrutvā ghorasaṅkāśaṃ kulakṣayamupasthitam | prakṛtīstu samānīya kāñcanaṃ ca purodhasam || 7.108.7 ||
teṣāṃ sarvaṃ yathāvṛttamabravīdraghanandanaḥ | ātmanaśca viparyāsaṃ bhaviṣyaṃ bhrātṛbhiḥ saha || 7.108.8 ||
tataḥ putradvayaṃ vīraḥ so 'bhyaṣiñcannarādhipaḥ | subāhurmadhurāṃ lebhe śatrughātī ca vaidiśam || 7.108.9 ||
dvidhā kṛtvā tu tāṃ senāṃ mādhurīṃ putrayordvayoḥ | dhanaṃ ca yuktaṃ kṛtvā vai sthāpayāmāsa pārthivaḥ || 7.108.10 ||
subāhuṃ madhurāyāṃ ca vaideśe śatrughātinam | yayau sthāpya tadā 'yodhyāṃ rathenaikena rāghavaḥ || 7.108.11 ||
sa dadarśa mahātmānaṃ jvalantamiva pāvakam | sūkṣmakṣaumāmbaradharaṃ munibhiḥ sārdhamakṣayaiḥ || 7.108.12 ||
so 'bhivādya tato rāmaṃ prāñjaliḥ prayatendriyaḥ | uvāca vākyaṃ dharmajñaṃ dharmamevānucintayan || 7.108.13 ||
kṛtvābhiṣekaṃ sutayordvayo rāghavanandana | tavānugamane rājanviddhi māṃ kṛtaniścayam || 7.108.14 ||
na cānyadapi vaktavyamato vīra na śāsanam | vilokyamānamicchāmi madvidhena viśeṣataḥ || 7.108.15 ||
tasya tāṃ buddhimaklībāṃ vijñāya raghunandanaḥ | bāḍhamityeva śatrughnaṃ rāmo vākyamuvāca ha || 7.108.16 ||
tasya vākyasya vākyānte vānarāḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ | ṛkṣarākṣasasaṅghāśca samāpeturanekaśaḥ || 7.108.17 ||
sugrīvaṃ te puraskṛtya sarva eva samāgatāḥ | taṃ rāmaṃ draṣṭumanasaḥ svargāyābhimukhaṃ sthitam || 7.108.18 ||
devaputrā ṛṣisutā gandharvāṇāṃ sutāstathā | rāmakṣayaṃ viditvā te sarva eva samāgatāḥ || 7.108.19 ||
te rāmamabhivādyocuḥ sarve vānararākṣasāḥ | tavānugamane rājansamprāptāḥ kṛtaniścayāḥ || 7.108.20 ||
yadi rāma vināsmābhirgacchestvaṃ puruṣottama | yamadaṇḍamivodyamya tvayā sma vinipātitāḥ || 7.108.21 ||
tairevamuktaḥ kākutstho bāḍhamityabravīt smayan || 7.108.22 ||
etasminnantare rāmaṃ sugrīvo 'pi mahābalaḥ | praṇamya vidhivadvīraṃ vijñāpayitumudyataḥ || 7.108.23 ||
abhiṣicyāṅgadaṃ vīramāgato 'smi nareśvara | tavānugamane rājanviddhi māṃ kṛtaniścayam || 7.108.24 ||
tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rāmo ramayatāṃ varaḥ | vānarendramathovācaṃ maitraṃ tasyānucintayan || 7.108.25 ||
sakhe śṛṇuṣva sugrīva na tvayā 'haṃ vinākṛtaḥ | gaccheyaṃ devalokaṃ vā paramaṃ vā padaṃ mahat || 7.108.26 ||
bibhīṣaṇamathovāca rākṣasendraṃ mahāyaśāḥ | yāvatprajā dhariṣyanti tāvattvaṃ vai bibhīṣaṇa | rākṣasendra mahāvīrya laṅkāsthastvaṃ dhariṣyasi || 7.108.27 ||
yāvaccandraśca sūryaśca yāvattiṣṭhati medinī | yāvacca matkathā loke tāvadrājyaṃ tavāstviha || 7.108.28 ||
śāsitastvaṃ sakhitvena kāryaṃ te mama śāsanam | prajāḥ saṃrakṣa dharmeṇa nottaraṃ vaktumarhasi || 7.108.29 ||
kiñcānyadvaktumicchāmi rākṣasendra mahāmate || 7.108.30 ||
ārādhaya jagannāthamikṣvākukuladaivatam | ārādhanīyamaniśaṃ sarvairdaivaiḥ savāsavaiḥ || 7.108.31 ||
tatheti pratijagrāha rāmavākyaṃ vibhīṣaṇaḥ | rājā rākṣasamukhyānāṃ rāghavājñāmanusmaran || 7.108.32 ||
tamevamuktvā kākutstho hanūmantamathābravīt | jīvite kṛtabuddhistvaṃ mā pratijñāṃ vilopaya || 7.108.33 ||
matkathāḥ pracariṣyanti yāvalloke harīśvara | tāvadramasva suprīto madvākyamanupālayan || 7.108.34 ||
evamuktastu hanumānrāghaveṇa mahātmanā | vākyaṃ vijñāpayāmāsa paraṃ harṣamavāpya ca || 7.108.35 ||
yāvattava kathā loke vicariṣyati pāvanī | tāvatsthāsyāmi medinyāṃ tavājñāmanupālayan || 7.108.36 ||
jāmbavantaṃ tathoktvā tu vṛddhaṃ brahmasutaṃ tathā | maindaṃ ca dvividaṃ caiva pañca jāmbavatā saha |
tānevamuktvā kākutsthaḥ sarvāṃstānṛkṣavānarān | uvāca bāḍhaṃ gacchadhvaṃ mayā sārdhaṃ yathepsitam || 7.108.38 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe 'ṣṭotaraśatatamaḥ sargaḥ || 108 ||
prabhātāyāṃ tu śarvaryāṃ pṛthuvakṣā mahāyaśāḥ | rāmaḥ kamalapatrākṣaḥ purodhasamathābravīt || 7.109.1 ||
agnihotraṃ vrajatvagre dīpyamānaṃ saha dvijaiḥ | vājapeyātapatraṃ ca śobhamānaṃ mahāpathe || 7.109.2 ||
tato vasiṣṭhastejasvī sarvaṃ niravaśeṣataḥ | cakāra vidhivaddharmaṃ mahāprāsthānikaṃ vidhim || 7.109.3 ||
tataḥ sūkṣmāmbaradharo brahmamāvartayanparam | kuśāngṛhītvā pāṇibhyāṃ prasajya prayayāvatha || 7.109.4 ||
avyāharankvacitkiñcinniśceṣṭo niḥsukhaḥ pathi | nirjagāma gṛhāttasmāddīpyamāna ivāṃśumān || 7.109.5 ||
rāmasya dakṣiṇe pārśve sapadmā śrīrapāśritā | savye tu hrīrmahādevī vyavasāyastathāgrataḥ || 7.109.6 ||
śarā nānāvidhāścāpi dhanurāyatamuttamam | tathā ' 'yudhāni te sarve yayuḥ puruṣavigrahāḥ || 7.109.7 ||
vedā brāhmaṇarūpeṇa gāyatrī sarvarakṣiṇī | oṅkāro 'tha vaṣaṭkāraḥ sarve rāmamanuvratāḥ || 7.109.8 ||
ṛṣayaśca mahātmānaḥ sarva eva mahīsurāḥ | anvagacchanmahātmānaṃ svargadvāramapāvṛtam || 7.109.9 ||
taṃ yāntamanugacchanti hyantaḥpuracarāḥ striyaḥ | savṛddhabāladāsīkāḥ savarṣavarakiṅkarāḥ || 7.109.10 ||
sāntaḥpuraśca bharataḥ śatrughnasahito yayau | rāmaṃ gatimupāgamya sāgnihotramanuvrataḥ || 7.109.11 ||
te ca sarve mahātmānaḥ sāgnihotrāḥ samāgatāḥ | saputradārāḥ kākutsthamanujagmurmahāmatim || 7.109.12 ||
mantriṇo bhṛtyavargāśca saputrapaśubāndhavāḥ | sarve sahānugā rāmamanvagacchanprahṛṣṭavat || 7.109.13 ||
tataḥ sarvāḥ prakṛtayo hṛṣṭapuṣṭajanāvṛtāḥ | gacchantamanvagachaṃstaṃ rāghavaṃ guṇarañjitāḥ || 7.109.14 ||
tataḥ sastrīpumāṃsaste sapakṣipaśuvāhanāḥ | rāghavasyānugāḥ sarve hṛṣṭā vigatakalmaṣāḥ || 7.109.15 ||
snātāḥ pramuditāḥ sarve hṛṣṭāḥ puṣṭāśca vānarāḥ | dṛḍhaṃ kilakilāśabdaiḥ sarvaṃ rāmamanuvratam || 7.109.16 ||
na tatra kaściddīno vā vrīḍito vā 'pi duḥkhitaḥ | hṛṣṭaṃ samuditaṃ sarvaṃ babhūva paramādbhutam || 7.109.17 ||
draṣṭukāmo 'tha niryāntaṃ rāmaṃ jānapado janaḥ | yaḥ prāptaḥ so 'pi dṛṣṭvaiva svargāyānugato mudā || 7.109.18 ||
ṛkṣavānararakṣāṃsi janāśca puravāsinaḥ | āgacchanparayā bhaktyā pṛṣṭhataḥ susamāhitāḥ || 7.109.19 ||
yāni bhūtāni nagare 'pyantardhānagatāni ca | rāghavaṃ tānyanuyayuḥ svargāya samupasthitam || 7.109.20 ||
yāni paśyanti kākutsthaṃ sthāvarāṇi carāṇi ca | sarvāṇi rāmagamane hyanujagmurhi tānyapi || 7.109.21 ||
nocchvasattadayodhyāyāṃ susūkṣmamapi dṛśyate | tiryagyonigatāścāpi sarve rāmamanuvratāḥ || 7.109.22 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe navādhikaśatatamaḥ sargaḥ || 109 ||
adhyardhayojanaṃ gatvā nadīṃ paścānmukhāśritām | sarayūṃ puṇyasalilāṃ dadarśa raghunandanaḥ || 7.110.1 ||
tāṃ nadīmākulāvartāṃ sarvatrānusarannṛpaḥ | āgataḥ saprajo rāmastaṃ deśaṃ raghunandanaḥ || 7.110.2 ||
atha tasminmuhūrte tu brahmā lokapitāmahaḥ | sarvaiḥ parivṛto devairṛṣibhiśca mahātmabhiḥ || 7.110.3 ||
āyayau yatra kākutsthaḥ svargāya samupasthitaḥ | vimānaśatakoṭībhirdivyābhirabhisaṃvṛtaḥ || 7.110.4 ||
divyatejovṛtaṃ vyoma jyotirbhūtamanuttamam | svayamprabhaiḥ svatejobhiḥ svargibhiḥ puṇyakarmabhiḥ || 7.110.5 ||
puṇyā vātā vavuścaiva gandhavantaḥ sukhapradāḥ | papāta puṣpavṛṣṭiśca devairmuktā mahaughavat || 7.110.6 ||
tasmiṃstūryaśataiḥ kīrṇe gandharvāpsarasaṅkule | sarayūsalilaṃ rāmaḥ padbhyāṃ samupacakrame || 7.110.7 ||
tataḥ pitāmaho vāṇīmantarikṣādabhāṣata | āgaccha viṣṇo bhadraṃ te diṣṭyā prāpto 'si rāghava || 7.110.8 ||
bhrātṛbhiḥ saha devābhaiḥ praviśasva svikāṃ tanum | yāmicchasi mahābāho tāṃ tanuṃ praviśa svikām | vaiṣṇavīṃ tāṃ mahātejastadvākāśaṃ sanātanam || 7.110.9 ||
tvaṃ hi lokagatirdeva na tvāṃ kecitprajānate | ṛte māyāṃ viśālākṣīṃ tava pūrvaparigrahām | tvāmacintyaṃ mahadbhūtamakṣayaṃ sarvasaṅgraham || 7.110.10 ||
yāmicchasi mahātejastāṃ tanuṃ praviśa svayam || 7.110.11 || ्āṃ
viśālākṣīṃ tava pūrvaparigrahām | pitāmahavacaḥ śrutvā viniścitya mahāmatiḥ | viveśa vaiṣṇavaṃ tejaḥ saśarīraḥ sahānujaḥ || 7.110.12 ||
tato viṣṇumayaṃ devaṃ pūjayanti sma devatāḥ | sādhyā marudgaṇāścaiva sendrāḥ sāgnipurogamāḥ || 7.110.13 ||
ye ca divyā ṛṣigaṇā gandharvāpsarasaśca yāḥ | suparṇanāgayakṣāśca daityadānavarākṣasāḥ || 7.110.14 ||
sarvaṃ puṣṭaṃ pramuditaṃ susampūrṇamanoratham | sādhu sādhviti tairdevaistridivaṃ gatakalmaṣam || 7.110.15 ||
atha viṣṇurmahātejāḥ pitāmahamuvāca ha | eṣāṃ lokaṃ janaughānāṃ dātumarhasi suvrata || 7.110.16 ||
ime hi sarve snehānmāmanuyātā yaśasvinaḥ | bhaktā hi bhajitavyāśca tyaktātmānaśca matkṛte || 7.110.17 ||
tacchrutvā viṣṇuvacanaṃ brahmā lokaguruḥ prabhuḥ | lokānsāntānikānnāma yāsyantīme samāgatāḥ || 7.110.18 ||
yacca tiryaggataṃ kiñcittvāmevamanucintayat | prāṇāṃstyakṣyati bhaktyā vai tatsantāne nivatsyati || 7.110.19 ||
sarvairbrahmaguṇairyukte brahmalokādanantare || 7.110.20 ||
vānarāśca svikāṃ yonimṛkṣāścaiva tathā yayuḥ | yebhyo vinissṛtāḥ sarve surebhyaḥ surasambhavāḥ || 7.110.21 ||
teṣu praviviśe caiva sugrīvaḥ sūryamaṇḍalam | paśyatāṃ sarvadevānāṃ svānpita'npratipedire || 7.110.22 ||
tathoktavati deveśe gopratāramupāgatāḥ | bhejire sarayūṃ sarve harṣapūrṇāśruviklavāḥ || 7.110.23 ||
avagāhya jalaṃ yo yaḥ prāṇī hyāsīt prahṛṣṭavat | mānuṣaṃ dehamutsṛjya vimānaṃ so 'dhyarohata || 7.110.24 ||
tiryagyonigatānāṃ ca śatāni sarayūjalam | samprāpya tridivaṃ jagmuḥ prabhāsuravapūṃṣi ca | divyā divyena vapuṣā devā dīptā ivābhavan || 7.110.25 ||
gatvā tu sarayūtoyaṃ sthāvarāṇi carāṇi ca | prāpya tattoyavikledaṃ devalokamupāgaman || 7.110.26 ||
tasminnapi samāpannā ṛkṣavānararākṣasāḥ | te 'pi svargaṃ praviviśurdehānnikṣipya cāmbhasi || 7.110.27 ||
tataḥ samāgatānsarvānsthāpya lokagururdivi | jagāma tridaśaiḥ sārdhaṃ sadā hṛṣṭairdivaṃ mahat || 7.110.28 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe vālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe daśādhikaśatatamaḥ sargaḥ || 110 ||
etāvadetadākhyānaṃ sottaraṃ brahmapūjitam | rāmāyaṇamiti khyātaṃ mukhyaṃ vālmīkīnā kṛtam || 7.111.1 ||
tataḥ pratiṣṭhito viṣṇuḥ svargaloke yathā puram | yena vyāptamidaṃ sarvaṃ trailokyaṃ sacarācaram || 7.111.2 ||
tato devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhāśca paramarṣayaḥ | nityaṃ śṛṇvanti santuṣṭāḥ divyaṃ rāmāyaṇaṃ divi || 7.111.3 ||
idamākhyānamāyuṣyaṃ saubhāgyaṃ pāpanāśanam | rāmāyaṇaṃ vedasamaṃ śrāddheṣu śrāvayedbudhaḥ || 7.111.4 ||
aputro labhate putramadhano labhate dhanam | sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyeta padamapyasya yaḥ paṭhet || 7.111.5 ||
pāpānyapi ca yaḥ kuryādahanyahani mānavaḥ | paṭhatyekamapi ślokaṃ pāpātsa parimucyate || 7.111.6 ||
vācakāya ca dātavyaṃ vastraṃ dhenuṃ hiraṇyakam | vācake parituṣṭe tu tuṣṭāḥ syuḥ sarvadevatāḥ || 7.111.7 ||
etadākhyānamāyuṣyaṃ paṭhanrāmāyaṇaṃ naraḥ | saputrapautro loke 'sminpretya ceha mahīyate || 7.111.8 ||
ayodhyā 'pi purī ramyā śūnyā varṣagaṇānbahūn | ṛṣabhaṃ prāpya rājānaṃ nivāsamupayāsyati || 7.111.9 ||
etadākhyānamāyuṣyaṃ sabhaviṣyaṃ sahottaram | kṛtavānpracetasaḥ putrastadbrahmāpyanvamanyata || 7.111.10 ||
aśvamedhasahasrasya vājapeyāyutasya ca | labhate śrāvaṇādeva sargasyaikasya mānavaḥ || 7.111.11 ||
prayāgādīni tīrthāni gaṅgādyāḥ saritastathā | naimiśādīnyaraṇyāni kurukṣetrādikānyapi | gatāni tena loke 'sminyena rāmāyaṇaṃ śrutam || 7.111.12 ||
hemabhāraṃ kurukṣetre graste bhānau prayacchati | yaśca rāmāyaṇaṃ loke śṛṇoti sadṛśāvubhau || 7.111.13 ||
samyakchraddhāsamāyuktaḥ śṛṇute rāghavīṃ kathām | sarvapāpātpramucyeta viṣṇulokaṃ sa gacchati || 7.111.14 ||
ādikāvyamidaṃ tvārṣaṃ purā vālmīkinā kṛtam | yaḥ śṛṇoti sadā bhaktyā sa gacchedvaiṣṇavīṃ tanum || 7.111.15 ||
putradārāśca vardhante sampadaḥ santatistathā | satyametadviditvā tu śrotavyaṃ niyatātmabhiḥ || 7.111.16 ||
gāyatryāśca svarūpaṃ tadrāmāyaṇamanuttamam || 7.111.17 ||
aputro labhate putramadhano labhate dhanam | sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyeta padamapyasya yaḥ paṭhet || 7.111.18 ||
yaḥ paṭhecchṛṇuyānnityaṃ caritaṃ rāghavasya ha | bhaktyā niṣkalmaṣo bhūtvā dīrghamāyuravāpnuyāt || 7.111.19 ||
cintayedrāghavaṃ nityaṃ śreyaḥ prāptuṃ ya icchati | śrāvayedidamākhyānaṃ brāhmaṇebhyo dine dine || 7.111.20 ||
yastvidaṃ raghunāthasya caritaṃ sakalaṃ paṭhet | so 'sukṣaye viṣṇulokaṃ gacchatyeva na saṃśayaḥ || 7.111.21 ||
pitā pitāmahastasya tathaiva prapitāmahaḥ | tatpitā tatpitā caiva viṣṇuṃ yānti na saṃśayaḥ || 7.111.22 ||
caturvargapradaṃ nityaṃ caritaṃ rāghavasya tu | tasmādyatnavatā nityaṃ śrotavyaṃ paramaṃ sadā || 7.111.23 ||
śṛṇvanrāmāyaṇaṃ bhaktyā yaḥ pādaṃ padameva vā | sa yāti brahmaṇaḥ sthānaṃ brahmaṇā pūjyate sadā || 7.111.24 ||
evametatpurāvṛttamākhyānaṃ bhadramastu vaḥ | pravyāharata visrabdhaṃ balaṃ viṣṇoḥ pravardhatām || 7.111.25 ||
ityārṣe śrīmadrāmāyaṇe śrīmadvālmīkīye ādikāvye caturviṃśatsahasrikāyāṃ saṃhitāyāṃ śrīmaduttarakāṇḍe ekādaśottaraśatatamaḥ sargaḥ || 111 ||
|| ityuttarakāṇḍaḥ samāptaḥ ||
|| ityārṣe śrīmadvālmīkīye ādikāvye śrīmadrāmāyaṇaṃ sampūrṇam ||
|| śrīsītārāmacandrārpaṇamastu ||
